103a5(1): rigs kyi/ gtso po rigs kyi bdag po yang zer/ gsum ni sgra snang mdzad gsung snang mtha' thugs rdo rje sems/ dpa'i sku'i yum// sa sangs rgyas spyan gsung gi yum gos dkar thugs kyi mA ma ki/ rigs kyi yum gsum/ rigs kyi sems dpa'
103a6(1): sku'i// 'jam dpal gsung spyan ras thugs phyag rdor dang / rigs kyi khro bo sku// gshin rje gsung rta mgrin thugs bdud rtsi 'khyil/ rigs kyi pho nya gsum sku'i rdo rje/ rtse mo gsung rdo rje rnon po thugs rdo rje ki la ya/ kri ya'i lha lnga gsum bco lnga
103b1(1): paphags pa dkon mchog sri zhu'i mgron no// mchod pas mnyes par bya ba yin// gnod sbyin brgyad ni/ shar na// gnod 'dzin chu dbang dmar skya phyag na bum pa thogs pa/ lho na nor bu bzang po ljang gu rat+na'i bum gsum mgul ba nas bzung ba dang //
103b2(1): ba na gang ba/ nor bzang ser po g.yas bum pa g.yon ne'u le/ byang du gnod sbyin gnod sprin che/ na po ljang gu ral gri ne'u le/ byang shar// rgyal ba 'khyil pa dkar po g.yas phub dang ral gri g.yon ne'u le/ shar lhor rol pa'i phreng ba mthing ga
103b3(1): yalas mdung g.yon ne'u le/ lho nub tu/ sgo'i dbang po ser po g.yas mchod rten g.yon ne'u le/ nub byang du spyod pa'i dbang po ser po g.yas nor bu g.yon ne'u le gnod sbyin brgyad/ lha chen brgyad ni// dbang phyug che dang dbang phyug chen po dkar
103b4(1): ga na dbu rgyan no/ biSh+Ta dang / beSh+Ta ni lha chen khyab 'jug ste mthing ga 'khor lo'o// b+h+r-i gi ri ti sku mdog ljang ser po lang bsnams pa dga' byed dbang / dmar po mda' gzhu// gzhon nu smin drug dkar po bum pa tshogs kyi bdag/ dkar po la
103b5(1): stobs bzang ser nag gzhol lha chen legs ldan nag po sdug nag ging chen po brgyad/ klu chen brgyad ni// mtha' yas mar po rin chen dang ni 'jog po dmar po margyal dang // stobs kyi rgyu sngon bldan dang rigs ldan dkar ba na chen
103b6(1): nga po dang // nor rgyas bu ser po rin po che phreng ba dang dung skyong ljang gu dung dang // pad+ma dkar po pad+ma bsnams/ chu lha dkar ser zhags pa bsnams pa'o// klu chen brgyad/ gza' chen brgyad ni// pa wa sangs dkar po pad+ma bsnams dang mig dmar
104a1(1): dmar po me sgron dang // phur bu sngon po at+pal dang ni sgra gcan 'dzin/ dud ka bdud rtsi tham pa bsnams// zla ba dkar po ku rba ta dang ni nyi ma dmar po pad+ma dang // gza' lhag sdang ser mchod sprin gyi spen pa nag po be con 'dzin
104a2(1): gza' chen brgyad/ rgyu skar nyer brgyad la/ shar gyi bdun dkar ba'o// zhi ba'i las mdzad pa// smin drug dkar po pad+ma thogs dang ni snar ma dang / phyag mtshan chad 'dug/ mgo pad+ma 'dzin dang lag lag pa 'dzin dang na bas so pad+ma dang // rgyal nor
104a3(1): tha dang skag ni sbal shar na gnas/ sgo'i bdun ser po rgyas pa// mchu pad+ma dang gre pad+ma dang spo pad+ma dang ni// me bzhi pad+ma nag pa gnyis sems rdo rje thogs pa dang // sa ga bgrang zeng bdun ni lho na gnas/ nub kyi bdun dmar po dbang
104a4(1): gigi las mdzad// lha mtshams gzi brjid chen po tham pa dang // de bzhin snron rdo rje dang snrums dbyug pa dang ni// chu stod be con dang ni chu smad pad+ma dang // gro bzhin bum pa byi bzhin 'khor lo nub na gnas/ drag po byang gi bdun
104a5(1): ljang gu/ mon gru dung dmar po dang ni mon gre bum pa dang / de bzhin khrums stod ral gri khrums smad pad+ma dang // nam gru pad+ma dang ni tha skar me tog a sho ka dang // bra nye be con bdun ni byang na gnas/ gnod sbyin// ha ri ka ser po rin
104a6(1): po che dang bum pa 'dzin dang pany+tsi ka/ ser po rin po che'i snye ma dang bum pa 'dzin// mchod sbyin bzang po dbul bar bya'o// gnod sbyin brgyad kyi sngags// oM yak+She shwa rA ya swA hA/ lha chen brgyad kyi sngags// oM de ba swaM sraM swA hA/ klu chen brgyad kyi
104b1(1): sngags// oM re re na ti na nA ga li ri li ri phu ta ta ri tsi he swA ha/ gza' chen brgyad kyi sngags// IM gra he shwa ri d+ya pra oM pra hi tsa ri ya pra ba daM dzo ti ma ra ye swA ha/ yang byung / ba da dzo ti ra ma yA swA hA/ rgyu skar nyer brgyad kyi sngags// oM
104b2(1): nak+Sha tra da ni ra na da ni ye sA hA/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo lte ba'i phyogs su bkan te bzhag la// thal mo ba ka na te gung mo bsgreng / g.yon pa'i mdzub mo dgug g.yas pa de la phyogs par bya ste/ gung mo bsgreng
104b3(1): ngongo// g.yon pa mdzub bkug gnod sbyin rgya/ lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la/ gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsnol la mdzub mo gnyis bcug ste ze bo'i steng du bzhag pa'o// khong stong gung mo gshibs la
104b4(1): bsnol// mdzub bkug mthe bong steng bzhag lha// klu thams cad kyi ni lag pa gnyis thal mo bkan la sbrul gyi gdengs ka lta bur bca' ba'o// thal mo sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka ltar// bzung ba klu rnams phyag rgya yin// gza' spyi'i ni
104b5(1): lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la mthe bong gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng ba nas bzang ba'o// gza' rnams lag gnyis gcig tu sbyar// mthe bong gnyis po gshibs te bsgreng / rma kar spyi'i ni gapa'i phyag rgya de nyid las gung lo dang mthe bong
104b6(1): gnyis bzlog ste sbyar ba'o// rgyu skar rnams kyis de nyid las// gung mo mthe bong gnyis bzlog sbyar// lha srin sde brgyad kyi gtso byas pa'i/ rgyas par bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu/ 'bring bco brgyad/ bsdus pa lha srin sde brgyad do// lha dang
105a1(1): klu dang dri za dang // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye dang // 'dab bzang grul bum srin po brgyad/ sa chen 'khor lo nag po'i sngags/ oM swa sa swA hA/ klu chen dkyil 'khor du spong ba'i sngags/ oM nA ga swA hA/ dri ba'i rgyal po/ oM thi
105a2(1): zar phud lnga pa'i shud d+he swa ra hi ni swA hA/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i sngags yin no// oM ma hA sa nan bi ha sa nan swA hA/ lto 'phye'i rgyal pos dmigs kyi sngags/ oM ga ra lan bi ra lam swA hA/ 'dab bzangs kyi sngags/ oM hri ha swA hA/ grul bram gyi
105a3(1): sngags/ oM bi shud d+he swA hA/ srin po'i// oM rag sha ni swA hA/ lha srin sde brgyad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya// mchog sbyin 'degs pa ltar byas la// zhal du gsol bar dbul bar bya'o// de ltar zhal du gsol ba dbul bar bya ba'i bgegs rigs
105a4(1): stong phrag brgyad rtsal gdon gyi rigs bco brgyad bsdus pa las/ gtso bo bzhi ni wa'i gdon yar ngo'i tshes bcu gcig dang bcu gsum la 'dzin// lha yi gdon dang 'byung po'i gdon/ gnam stong la 'dzin// tshangs pa mar ngo'i chos bco lnga dang bco brgyad la
105a5(1): srin po mar ngo'i tshes gcig la 'di man chad gdon phal ba'o dri za'i gdon/ bcu gnyis dang bcu bzhi la// srin po'i gdon yar ngo'i gcig la dang klu yi gdon/ dug rgyas par byed pa ste chos lnga la// log 'dren gdon yar ngo'i bcu dang snying nad gtong
105a6(1): bas brjed byed gdon/ mar ngo'i bcu gcig/ klo nad gtong bas// smyo byed gdon dgu dang lha ma yin/ yar ngo'i bcu gsum dang mar ngo'i bcu gnyis/ sha za'i gdon rnam pa gsum las sha za gad mo can rgod cing rtse bar byed pa// sha za'i gdon yar ngo'i
105b1(1): bcu/ dang sha za gzu lum can ma sring la yang rgol bar byed gzu lum can/ ches bcu la// be sa ra yi gdon ni sha za srul po'i gdon te tshes brgyad la 'dzin/ spyod pa sna tshogs ston no// dang ni// nam gru'i gdon byis pa'i gdon bzhi las nam gru'i ni ma
105b2(1): mo'i rigs su ste mar ngo'i bco brgyad la 'dzin/ dang bya yi gdon/ mar sbal pa'i bu'i gdon te mar ngo'i bcu gsum// skem byed gdon lus skem par byed pas ches bcu gnyis la 'dzin/ dang gzhon nu'i gdon/ bus pa la gnod pas mar ngo'i gnyis/ oM de
105b3(1): ba ga Ne b+h+yaHswa ha/ lha'i gdon te lus mdzes shing phan par byed pas na sa'o// nA ga ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ klu ste rigs lnga dang ldan no// a su ra ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ lha dngos ma yin pas snga ma yin no// ma tr-i ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ khrung gi rigs min te nam mkha' la
105b4(1): lding bas na nam mkha' lding / ga ru Da ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ gan+d+ha rba ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ kin+na ra ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ ma ho ra ga ga Ne b+h+yaHswA ha/ rang gi gnod pa gzhan la ster bas gnod sbyin zhes bya ste/ lus la reg pa'i dug yod pa'o// yak+Sha ga Ne b+h+yaHswA
105b5(1): ha/ srin po'i bgegs rak+ta sa ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ mi dwags kyi bgegs/ pre ta ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ pi shA tsa ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ sha ba'i gdon rnams dang / b+hU ta ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / kuSh+maN+Da ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ pA ta ga Ne b+h+yaHsa
105b6(1): hA/ ka Ta pU ta ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ skan+da ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ b+h+yo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / un+ma da ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ tsA ya ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ a pasmA ra ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ osta rA ka ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ phyag rgya'i rnam pa mang po yang /
106a1(1): g.yas pas mchod sbyin 'degs pa las// g.yon pa mdzub mo dmigs la gtad/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu la// mchod sbyin dbul bar bya ba'o// lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur
106a2(1): bcang // mdzub mo bsgreng la gtor mar gtang // sngags 'dis rab tu sbyin par bya/ a nr-i su tri pre du dza/ rigs drug gi sa bon// bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu la shar khams gsum gyi bdag po dgug pa/ trang ka ri trang ka ri/
106a3(1): na sprin gyi sgron ma dgug pa/ mi tsi mi tsi/ nub na rdo rje mchu dgug pa/ ra ra sram sra ma/ byang na bi nA ya ka dgug pa/ tri tri gaM gaM guM guM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM traM ka ri traM ka ri swA ha/ srin po rnams kyil/ mi tsi mi tsi swA ha/ sha ba rnams kyil/ gung hing
106a4(1): gung hing sA hA/ 'byung po rnams/ an+ta rI k+Sha tsa ra nan[:]sA ha/ bar snang la 'phyo ba rnams kyi'o/ b+ho'u ta ma nan[:]sA hA/ sa bla ba rnams kyi'o/ ba ta la ba sa na na[:]sA ha/ sa 'og rnams kyi'o/ ma tri nan sA ha/ ma mo rnams kyi'o// gdon rnams kyi'o/ gra
106a5(1): ha nan swA ha/ snying rje'i mgron// 'gro ba rigs drug la sogs pa// dpal mgon// yon tan mgron len chags bgegs rigs rnams// ma lus kun la gtor ma yang // 'byung po'i gtor ma'i sngags 'di
106a6(1): gsungs// oM au ni khas len pa ste/ haM yig khas len pa ste/ haM yig phyis nas a yig tu gyur pa ni haM las a haM ka ra/ zhes pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gnas te/ bdag 'dzin la brten nas nyon mongs kyi gzhi'o// phung po la sogs pa rnams la nyon mongs kyi gtsor byas nas
106b1(1): bdag tu bzang ba la/ a ka ro mra khaM/ sa ka ra mra Tha ni gcar zad paH/ sarba d+harmA Na/ sa thams cad la thams cad dargyal ba the zang ba la gags pa rtags pa rnas pas// ga ma byed nas ma thos pa de sa thar rab tu rtags shes pam/ sa rba su r+tha ka ta/ dmyalas tha
106b2(1): na thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i tshul gyi/ oM spu'i bdag nyid sbrul sba/ gsung gi bdag nyid longs swa/ hUM thugs kyi bdag nyid chos sba/ shes rab phaT swA hA/ snying rje// mthu chen rgyal po sde bzhi la// phyi mtshams srung ba'i phrin las bcol// sku bzhi
106b3(1): sku bzhi ni/ dgongs pa kyang 'das kyi sgra yin pas/ thugs bud+ma dang mnyam/ sbyor ba khams gsum na mdzad pa'i sgra yin pas sems can gyi don byed pa dang / longs sku yin pas rgyan rnams kyi brgyan pa dang / sbrul sgra yin pas rigs pa'i rgyal ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'o//
106b4(1): dpal brgyad ldan pas na/ de yang brgyad ni/ yul 'khor krung gi dpal gnyis ni/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i dpal dang / rang bzhin 'khor gyi dpal lo// 'phags skyes po'i ni/ rang bzhin gnas kyi dang / drag po 'dul ba'i dpa' gnyis so// spyan mi bzang gi ni/ dug
106b5(1): sel ba'i dang // ye shes sgrol ba'i dpal gnyis so// rnam sras kyi ni/ ye shes mdzod kyi dang / rin chen gter gyi dpal gnyis so// gling bzhi'i sems can rgyal chen bzhi'i chab 'og na gnas pas 'bangs so yin/ lcags ri gcig gi nang na gnas pas khyim mchos yin/ rgyal
106b6(1): po'i 'bangs yin pas phur khyim dang 'dra ba yin no// phyogs bzhir mchod rten gzhal yas khang // shar na dri za yul 'khor skyong / rang gi yul dang 'khor la mtshan du btags pa ste/ rang gi yul dang 'khor stong phrag brgyad cu dang / rang gi gnas bsrung
107a1(1): bas na yul 'khor slong ngo // lho na grul bum 'phags skyes po// gnas dang gzhal las khang las mtshan du gsal te/ rat+na bdun las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang chad par du 'phags pa'i nang du skyes pas na 'phags skyes pa/ sgra gzi byin gzhan
107a2(1): las khyad par du 'phags pa'o// nub na klu rgyal spyan mi bzang / 'khor las ming tags pa dang / klu las mthong ba'i dug yod pas mig mi bzang zhes bya/ yang na rgyal po 'dis gnod sbyin nag po la sogs pa'i spyan 'dor bar byed pas na'o// byang na gnod sbyin
107a3(1): rnam thos sras/ pha ma las btags te/ yab drang srong rnam pa mang po thos pa'i sras yin pas na rnam thos sras so// ma lha mo dpal mo'i sras yin/ dpal lha mo sgeg mo dang / drang srong rnam pa mang po zos pa gnyis yid kyis bshos pa'o// de yin/ oM b+h+r-iSh+Ta raSh+Ta ya swA hA/
107a4(1): shar na yul 'khor skyong dkar po pi lang 'dzin pa'o// dpal gnyis te/ thugs 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i dpal dang / phyag gi pi wang rang bzhin 'khor gyi dpal gnyis so// oM bi rA D+ha kA ya swA hA/ lhor 'phags skyes po mthing ga ral gri bsnams pa'o// rang bzhin gyis dpal
107a5(1): rat+na'i khang pa dang / drag pos 'dul ba'i phyag gi ral gris gshin rje 'dul ba'o// oM bi ru pak+tA ya sA hA/ nub tu mig mi bzang dmar po sbrul zhags can/ dug lnga sel ba'i dpal sbrul zhags gis klu'i dug sel/ phyag g.yas na ye shes sgron me bsnams pa ni/ ye shes
107a6(1): sgron mo'i dpal lo// oM be shra ba NA ya swA hA/ byang rnam sras ne'u le'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa ni g.yon pa ste/ rin chen mdzod kyi dpal lo// ye shes gter gyi dpal ni/ g.yas na rin po che'i ring bsrel mchod rten no// bskyed nas spyan drangs bstim byas nas/
107b1(1): mtho gzhal yas khang dang shing ring rgyal por bskyed/ rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs te gnyis su med par bstim/ chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa ltar bsam mo// mchod nas bstod de phrin las bcol/ spos dang me tog la sogs gtor ma dang mchod pa gtsang mas mchod//
107b2(1): tshechetshe ba'i yon tan la/ bstod pa bya/ phyi mtshams bsrung bar phrin las bcol zhing gnyer gtad/ mtshams ma thon bar du bsrung bar// smon lam btab nas phyi mtshams bcad/ de smrab khang nas phyi rol du dri chu 'dor sa nas phyir mi 'gro// phyi mtshams rgyal
107b3(1): po'i tho las phyir mi 'da' bar nang du lus ngag/ de las spyod lam bag yang bya// sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung gis// 'jam pa'i lhan la 'dug nas ni// de bzhin nyid stong pa dang / kun snang snying rje bsgom/ rgyu'i ting nges hUM mthing nag
107b4(1): 'bar ba gcig bsgom/ de'i byin rlabs las ma gur+ya maN+Da la zhes brjod pas ma las nyi dkyil du gyur pa'i steng du hUM mthing nag 'bar ba gcig bsam/ hUM s+pha ra Na phaT ces spros pas/ hUM mang pos 'jig rten gang bas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi thugs dam chud bskul/
107b5(1): sems can gyi don byas/ saM ha ra Na hUM brjod pas hUM snga ma la thim/ hUM badz+ra s+pha ra Na phaT ces brjod pas phyag mtshan rdo rjer gyur/ de 'phros 'dus pas hUM badz+ra hUM d+haM ka dzaHzhes brjod pas rang zhe sdang rdo rje zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus dang sku mdog
107b6(1): mthing nag 'bar ba bskal me'i klong na bzhugs par bsams/ de la oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya/ la sogs pas sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed do// zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin du// gnas nas gnas bsrung rnam par bsam// shrI
108a1(1): badz+ra d+h+r-i ka hUM dzaH// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pas/ dbyar gyi sprin phung lta bu nyid// bskal pa'i me dpung rab tu 'bar// g.yas brkyangs par ni rab tu gnas// zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs /
108a2(1): nas/ ma surba maN+Da la zhes brjod pas ma las nyi dkyil bskyed pa'i steng du b+h+r-i ge 'phro 'dra las/ bAM ka ra badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha hUM zhes brjod pas/ khro bo bAM ka ra bskyed nas hUM ka ra zhe sdang rdo rje'i mdun du bka' nod pa'i tshul du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ci bka' stsal zhes zhus pa las/
108a3(1): sdang rdo rjes/ oM sam b+ha ni sram b+ha hA/ gr-i h+Na gre h+Na \u0f7f/ gre h+NA pa ya gre h+NA pa ya traM/ a na ya ho/ b+ha ga ban/ bing+ga ra da hA phaT/ ces pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i don ni/ hA ga ras phyogs mtshams su gdan zing zhig par bka' stsal/ bA ka ra'i thugs ka nas rbak+ki rang badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha
108a4(1): zhes brjod/ khro bo Tak+ki rA dzar khrongs kyis bskyed nas/ bka' nod pa'i tshul du rdo rje 'chang chen po ci bka' stsal zhes pa las/ hUM ka ras sum b+ha ni'i sngags lan cig zlas pa'i don ni/ phyogs mtshams su gdan zing zhig par bka' stsal nas/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes pas
108a5(1): bskul lo// mtshams khro bo dmar ba'i spyan/ zhal gsum mche gtsigs rnam par bsgyur// phyag gnyis hUM gi rgya bcings te// dang po rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri 'dzin/ g.yon gnyis dgra
108a6(1): sta zhags pa 'dzin// 'di 'dra'i gzugs ni bsam byas nas// rang gis de la bka' stsal to// hAM ka ras Tak+ki rA dza la tho ba dang lcags kyu gtad nas/ Tak+ki rA dza a b+hi ShIny+tsa zhes dbang bskur de nas Tak+ki rA dzas tho ba dang lcags kyu thogs
108b1(1): nas/ rdo rje'i 'gros dang chas nas sum b+ha ni'i sngags bzlas shing sems can chen po rnams kyi steng du phyogs skyong bcu gdan du btong bar byas te/ shar phyogs nas brgya byin pho mo gnyis snying ga nas lcags kyus bzung nas/ zo bas myos se myos se tsam du brdungs nas pho kha bub
108b2(1): mo gan rkyal du phyi chings su bcings nas gdan du gdeng / de bzhin du shar lho me lha/ lho gshin rje/ lho nub srin po/ nub klu/ nub byang rlung lha/ byang du gnod sbyin/ byang shar dbang ldan/ steng nyi zla pho mo/ 'og sa bdag/ shar du dri za pho mo gding ngo // hU~M kA ra badz+ra ma ha kro
108b3(1): d+ha hAM// 'dod pa'i rgyal po khro bo che/ thabs tha'i buk+ki na dza'i thug gapas gsan thong par gnas pa las rdo rje bu bram gyi za ba dang lcags kyi gtad pa las phyogs srung gdan bshams legs par nu ba gsal nas du rang 'ad du kunas b+ha ka ra la bcwas/ b+ha ka raN
108b4(1): nas zhe sdang rdo rje la bsdus pa'o// rdo rje tho ba lcags kyu 'dzin// gdan bting lags so khro rgyal gtso// rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rje blon po hAM ka ra dmangs Tak+ki rAd kyi tshul gcig yin// sUr+ya tsan+d+rA ya/ bya ngang pa'i steng na nyi zla steng / an+d+ra ya/
108b5(1): shar glang po'i steng du brgya byin/ ag+na ye/ shar lhor ra bskyes steng du me lha/ ya mA ya/ lhor ma he'i steng du gshin rje/ nai ra r-i t+ya ya/ lho nub mi'i steng du srin po/ ba ru NA ya/ nub chu srin steng na kla/ ba ya be/ nub byang sha ba'i steng du rlung lha/ ku be rA ya/ byang
108b6(1): rta'i steng du gnod sbyin/ i sha nA ya/ byang shar glang gi steng du dbang ldan/ nA ga b+hA be ya/ 'og phag gi steng du sa'i lha mo// gzugs chen 'bar bas 'jigs byed pa'i/ khro bo bcu dag phyung nas ni// hUM las bskyed pa'i nyi ma'i steng /
109a1(1): zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs ka nas ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bcu zam pa phyogs skyong steng du bskyed/ de'i steng du hUM bcu tham pa bskyed/ khro bo nub nas byang du bskyed de/ hUM pad+man+ta krita ha ya grI ba badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha zhes brjod pas/ nub tu rta mgrin zhal gsum phyag
109a2(1): drug sgra mdog dmar po/ zhal g.yas dkar g.yon mthing phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje/ bar ma rin chen/ tha ma ral gri/ g.yon dang po 'khor lo/ bar ma pad+ma// tha ma zhags pa/ bib+ta ta kr-ita a mr-i ta kuN+Da le badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/ zhal gsum phyag drug
109a3(1): sku mdog ljang gu g.yas ser g.yon dmar/ phyag dang po rdo rje dril bu/ g.yas gnyis rin chen ral gri/ g.yon gnyis pad+ma rgya gram mo// hUM pradz+nyA n+ta kr-ita a pa ra dze ta badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas/ shar du shes rab mthar byed dkar po/ g.yas dkar po g.yon dmar g.yas pa gsum na
109a4(1): rim pa bzhin/ mda' bo che/ 'khor lo ral gri/ g.yon pa gsum na zhags pa rin chen pad+ma'o// ya san+ta kr-i ta ya san+ta ka badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ zhes pas lhor/ ya ma mthar byed sgra mdog nag po/ g.yas ljang gu/ g.yon dmar po/ g.yas gsum dbyug pa rdo rje ral gri/ g.yon gsum gyi
109a5(1): gram rin chen pad+ma'o// nI la daN+Da badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas/ lho nub tu dbyug sngon dkar po/ g.yas dmar g.yon mthing / g.yas dang po be con/ bar ma rdo rje/ tha ma gser gyi rdo rje dpung mgor 'byar/ g.yon dang po sdigs mdzub/ bar ma rin chen/ tha ma pad+ma'o// hU~M Tak+ki rA dza
109a6(1): badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas nub byang du 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar po/ g.yas g.yon gnyis ka ljang gu/ phyag dang po gnyis bsnol nas thugs kar phyag rgya/ g.yas gnyis lcags kyu dang mda'/ g.yon gnyis zhags pa dang gzhu'o// hUM ma hA ba la badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ zhes pas byang shar du
109b1(1): rlabs pa ma/ g.yas sdang gaman thang \u0f7f/ g.yas dang ba rda dza/ bar ma ral bri/ ba ma rdo rje zag par 'gyur/ gzhan dang bzhags pa sngags mdzub/ bar ma gcis pargyab bzlas gcad// ba ma gnyis kyi bram pa// pra garba a tsal brda ma ha kra d+ha rgas pas/ shar skar mags mags
109b2(1): po dmar nag/ g.yas ljang g.yon dmar/ g.yas gsum ral gri rin chen rdo rje/ g.yon gsum zhags pa pad+ma rin chen no// hU~M ka ma la kuN+Da li badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas 'og tu pad+ma 'khyil ba dmar po g.yas sngo skya g.yon dkar/ g.yas gsum 'khor lo bad+ma rdo rje/ g.yon gsum
109b3(1): ne'u le pad+ma dril bu'o// hUM ka ra badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas/ steng du b+h+r-i ka ra mthing nag/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar/ g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis rdo rje dril bu thugs gar bsnol/ g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri/ g.yon gnyis dgra sta zhags pa'o// de kun kyang zhabs g.yas
109b4(1): brkyangs g.yon bskums pa/ dbu la thod pa skam pos brgyan pa/ sbrul dang thod pas se ral khar brgyan pa/ bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa'o// zhabs rnams yang na phur pa'o// smad ni rtse mor rnam par bsam// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor
109b5(1): rnams su yang / rim pa bzhin du kun tu bsam// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// gdab pa ni 'khor ba'i 'dre ldog/ dug gsum rtsad nas gcod/ phyogs skyong la gdab pa ni dper na rgyal po btson du bzung nas dmangs cham la
109b6(1): 'bebs pa ltar 'khor dbang du sdud pa'o// gnod mdzes bka' stsal phur pas gdab/ oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya/ sarba duSh+TaMn phaT/ ki la ya ki la ya/ sarba pA baM hUM/ badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha rod a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bA ka
110a1(1): tsit+ta badz+ra ki la ya/ Tak+ki rA dza badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ bdag zhe sdang rdo rje'i phyag g.yas nas sprul pa'i khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bsdams nas/ khro bo bcu la re re zhing ske nas bzung ste/ bgegs la phur pas btab la gnod mdzes kyi phyag
110a2(1): na tho ba bsnams pas phur pa'i spyi bor brdeg pas phyogs skyong la thal byung nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la thal byung bar bsam mo// hUM khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dag gis// bgegs ni bkug nas rnam par 'jig/ blo ldan rab tu sbyor ba yi// cho ga
110a3(1): bzhin tu phur kun thob// lnga pa gdab pa'i dgos pa ni/ phrar pa gdab pa yang phyogs spong ni chos kyi dbyings yin la/ thar pa ni thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes yin/ phrar pas btab ste rtse mo mar la lhag gis dbyung ba ni thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi
110a4(1): dbyings gting nas rtogs pa'i don yin no// de ltar phur pa btab nas phyogs mtshams steng 'og kun khro bo'i bskal pa'i me dpung sgo nga'i dbyibs lta bu'i nang du khro bo bsgom pa'o// phur pa 'debs mkhan ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bya ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag
110a5(1): g.yon du khro bo'i thar pa rnams blangs la/ g.yas pa'i gnod mdzes kyi tho bas spyi bo nas brdungs la gdab par bya'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal chen po// rdo rje phur bur nyid gnas pas// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra ba'i// me tog sat+pal 'od 'bar
110a6(1): ba'i phreng bas lus la brgyan pa ni sprin 'khrigs pa'i 'od 'dra// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// lte ba man chad chas rnams ni/ phur bur bsam pa'o// rtse mo lta bur rnam par bsam// ro stod khro bo lta bu nyid/ zhal gsum phyag
110b1(1): drug/ zhal gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// bgegs kyi tshogs la rab tu gzir/ phyogs skyong bcu ni mi dge ba bcu yin pas na dge ba'i gegs byed pas na bgegs yin no// de yi sngags 'di brjod byas nas// rdo rje phur pas nges
110b2(1): btab na// lcags sam shing la phur pa bcu byas nas dar gyi cod pan btags nas phyogs skyong bcu la gdam mo// bgegs lus shin tu mi g.yo ba'o// rdo rje'i tho ba phyag bsnams mchog/ gnod mdzes rgyal po rnam par bsgom/
110b3(1): hUM brjod 'bar ba'i lta bas ni// bgegs rnams thams cad phur kun gdab/ gnod mdzes kyi phyag na rdo rje'i tho ba thogs pas spyi bo nas brdung zhing gdab par bya'o// phyogs mtshams kun tu rdo rje'i me// rnam par 'phro ba rnam
110b4(1): bsams te// ma rungs pa ni tshig bsams na// phyogs mtshams kun tu 'bros par 'gyur// phyogs mtshams phur pa btab nas ni// steng 'og yang dag byin gyis brlab// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og
110b5(1): bcu/ khro bo'i rgyal po bdud rje rnams// ya mtshan che ba phyag 'tshal te// shar phyogs dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la sogs thabs kyis 'dul// lho phyogs 'chi bdag rgyal po thul bram la chags pa gshin rje zhabs kyis
110b6(1): gnon// nub phyogs klu rgyal mgrin sngon klu gdon rnam par gzir// byang phyogs gdug pa can gnod pa sbyin pa kun kyang brlag/ mtshams kyi khro bo chen pos ni// mtshams kyi bgegs me lha drang srong srin po lang ka rlung lha dbang
111a1(1): ldan rnams zil gyis gnon// phyogs bcur khro rgyal bdud rje rnams// ya mtshan che la phyag 'tshal te// bdud dgra thams cad yongs bcom nas// bgegs rnams ma lus zhi bar mdzod/ shar du
111a2(1): bka' bsgo ba bya// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ lhor gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ nub gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ byang du A na ya ho/ spyir b+ha ga bAn/ bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ rnam thar gru gsum yum gyi mkhar/ zod par sdod dur khrod kyi thod par
111a3(1): gnan te/ thod pa'i nang na 'chi bdag gshin rje'i sgra yod pas 'chi bdag ni lto bar gnan pa'i dgos pa'o// bcud dam sri gnan pa ni/ las las gyur pa'i dam sri las ngan gyi glus bskyed pa dang / rkyen las gyur pa'i dam gri chos pa dam po de 'drer song ba dang / gnod par
111a4(1): sems pa'i dam sri 'phral du glags 'chol ba rnams gnan te/ ling+ga la gzugs dang ming rus bris pa'o// snod bcud gcig la gcig chags par bya ba ni/ bal tshon sngon dmar gyis bcing bar bya'o// gnyen por shis pa'i lhas gnan pa ni/ phur pa khro bo mi g.yo bar bsgom
111a5(1): pa'o// rten 'brel 'dzom par gnan pa ni/ dong gru gsum yum gyi mkhar gnan/ thod pa skya bo 'chi bdag gi ltor gnan/ mtshan ma dmigs rten ling gar gnan/ byad du gzhug pa tsho skud kyis gnan/ rdo rje rgya gram gyis kha gcad do// gdul spyod drag po'i bro brdung ngo // shis pa'i
111a6(1): smon lam gdab bo/ dam sri phur pas gdab// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du// bskul ba'i rbod gtong chen po dang / ye shes lha dang 'brel ba'i pho nya las kyi lha dang 'brel ba'i pho nya rang dang 'brel ba'i pho nya las mkhan gyi pho nya'o// za
111b1(1): byed chen po'i khro bo mi g.yo ba ni dus gsum du bgegs kyi sha khrag la rngam pa'o// rngam stabs kyis/ rkyen las gyur pa'i dam sri dang gnod par sems pa'i dam sri dang las las gyur pa'i dam sri rnams/ ga nan pa'i las rnams dus la ba ba/ thugs/
111b2(1): hUM mdzad hUM gis Ar+ya a tsa la/ thugs las/ sprul pa'i 'od zer gsung hUM phaT la sogs pa/ rngam pa'i dang sgra'i gzi mdangs dang ldan// hUM dang phaT ces kyi sgra sgrogs sdang dgra gnod bgegs 'joms// dur khrod shar na khams
111b3(1): gagasum gyi bdag po dang / ljon sprin gyi sgron ma/ nub na rdo rje maT/ byang na bi na ya ka bgegs kyi tshogs 'joms mi g.yo mgon// hUM Ar+ya a tsa la/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ kI li kI la ya hUM phaT// ri rab chen po'i rmang du swa/ steng du ri rab
111b4(1): kyis gnan pas na/ ya ma rA dza'i zas su sbyin/ thod pa 'chi bdag gi grong khyer du bcug pas na// chu srin 'bar ba'i kha ru brdzang / gshin rje'i kha nas mi 'chor ba'i dpe/ g.yam pa la nang / 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi ri rab kyi phyag rgyas gnan/
111b5(1): gzugs bris pas/ bdun rgyud rigs ni skye ba bdun du rigs chad de/ mes po yang mes gsum/ bu tsha bo yang tsha gsum du ldang mi nus so// brlag 'gyur na// nam yang ldang bar mi 'gyur te/ gsang sngags mchog la dad pa'i/ byang chub kyi sems ni skyes
111b6(1): na gtang / bar bya'o// phrin las 'dul sbyong bro yang brdung / yi dam lha yi zhabs kyis brdzi// smon lam shis pa gdab par bya'o// ni/ ho dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi gnas/ zhe sdang 'dul ba'i gtso bo/ khro bdag chen po shri he ru ka'i sku gsung thugs kyi
112a1(1): dngos grub sgrub pa na/ gnas 'dir deng nas dbu bcugs nas nam mtshams las ma thung gi bar du la ma dam gri la sogs pa rnams 'dul bar mdzad du gsol/ zhes so// dur khrod ras sam sog pa la// gshin rje gzhin rje zhal gcig phyag
112a2(1): gnyis pa g.yas dbyug zo gson sdigs mdzub gdan ma tho'o/ bskyed bstim phrin las bcol/ rtogs dkar bas na/ gsang rtogs na zab pas na/ chen ma byas pas lhun grub pho brang nas/ ni 'og min gnas so// las kyi gshin rje'i bgegs
112a3(1): kyi bdag po la/ sngon/ bcom ldan chos rjes 'das rdo rje 'chang gis bka' bsgos pa'am stsal ba ltar// de bzhin du rjes su 'jug pa'i rig 'dzin sgrub pa pos/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang gi/ bka' gsang gzhung chen 'di bsgrub cing /
112a4(1): drang don ma yin par/ yang dag don la nges par 'jug na/ 'di dag mchog thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i dpe nor bu rin chen lta bu ste// 'di la gnod pa byed cing thob na bar du gcod pa'i// lha srin sde brgyad
112a5(1): dbang po kun/ lha klu gnod sbyin dri za mi'am ci 'dab bzang srin po nam mkha' lding / gshin rje khyed kyi sde brgyad 'khor dang bgegs g.yog/ lags kyi// rnam par smin pa'i las dge sdig rgyu 'bras kyi chos shod la/ kri yog kyang gsang sngags yin la/
112a6(1): gsang ba mchog gi nang pa ste rnal 'byor pas/ tshe gcig lus gcig la 'tshang rgya bas// bla med 'bras bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dngos grub ma thob bar/ du/ sgo bsrung bas mtshams bcad pa'i/ sa 'di yan chad ma btang bar// dpal
112b1(1): chen mi pham zhe sdang rdo rje'i bka' las mi 'da'/ zhig/ bdag cag gi sems dang gshin rje'i thugs ye nas gnyis su med/ dkyil 'khor gyi/ phyi 'khor skyong ba'i mu ran la/ lhor bzhugs/ rdo rje'i sngags kyi yal gam dam tshig thub par
112b2(1): mdzod// au ya ma gshin rje'i rgyal po'i mtshan sngags rA dza[:]sa do me ya// kring ski sa[:]sna dza[:]ma ri[:]sa ma ya staM// lug gi/ sog par bdud[:]rtsi 'khyil pa bris/ la dam tshig pa/ bskyed ye shes spyan drangs la bstim mchod pa phul
112b3(1): la phrin las bcol/ sngon lam gdab bkra shis gsol/ gnas gang na bzhugs na/ bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar 'dra'i klong / lha gang bzhugs na/ 'chi med khro bo chen po'i sku/ zhal gsum gyi phrin las gang mdzad na/ zhal g.yas zhal ser
112b4(1): rab tu bzhad pa ni/ dngos grub rgyas par mdzad// 'dzam bu na dA'i gser 'od 'dra/ dbus ma/ zhal kun tu rngams pas bar gcod sel bar byed ma rgad ljang gu'i mdangs// g.yon pa pad+ma rA ga 'dra/ dmar la gshe bas log lta tshar
112b5(1): gcod// dbu yi ral ba'i thor tshugs la rdo rje rgya gram gyis mdzes/ pa'i steng na// rigs kyi bdag po sangs rgyas don yod grub pa bzhug/ phyag drug gis phrin las ni/ thabs mchog g.yas rdo rje thabs snying rje rdo rje dang / g.yon// shes
112b6(1): rab stong pa dril bu gnyis thabs shes thugs kar bsnol/ g.yas bar ma na dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i/ yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ g.yas tha ma na// mtshon cha'i rgyal po ra la gri g.yas/ nyon mongs dug gsum 'joms/ g.yon dang po na 'khor ba'i
113a1(1): 'dam las/ chags med skyon bral pad ma dang / g.yon tha ma phrin/ las kyi rdo rje rgya gram g.yon/ sku'i rgyan dang cha lugs ni// gdug pa sbrul rigs bzhi rnams kyis phyag zhabs brgyan// char gsum/ zod phreng tshangs
113a2(1): skud do shal mdzad// dpa' bo stag lpags sham thabs can/ gdan ni gang lan/ bgegs chen bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// phrin las gang mdzad na thog ser bgegs la 'bebs// dngos grub gang bskul na bar
113a3(1): tshachad bsrung du gsol// oM a mr-i ta kun d+ha li ts+tshin d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM// phyi nang bgegs rnams bskrad pa yi/ gzhin rje gshed kyi sngags// gsang sngags phreng ba bshad kyi nyon/ oM bkra shis pa yin yang na bsod nams len thar
113a4(1): ra/ oM na maHphyag 'tshal lo sa man+ta kun nas ka ya k+Sha bA ka gsang tsilha thugs badz+ra NaM/ rdo rje rnams kyi// kha kha gsal gamal khA hi khA hi/ gsal cig gsol cig/ sarba duSh+Ta sa twa da ma ka gdug par sems pa thams cad 'dul ba/ a si mu sa la paR+Sha
113a5(1): pApa sha hasta/ ral gri btun shing dgra sta zhags pa'i phyag can/ tsa tuR+YA khu/ zhal bzhi pa tsa tun+ta da phyag bzhi pa Sha Ta tsa ra Na zhabs drug pa A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ cur sgron gyur spyon/ sarba duSh+Ta sdang ba thams cad prA Na a ba hA ri Ne/ srog 'brog pa/ ma hA bi g+h+nAM g+ha ta
113a6(1): ka/ bgegs chen po gsod pa/ bi kr-i ta A na na/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i bzhin can/ sarba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra/ 'byung po thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ aSh+Ta D+ha hA sa nA di ni/ gad rgyangs drag tu bzhad pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ byA g+hA tsarma ni pA sa na/ sna lpags kyi
113b1(1): sham thabs can/ ku ru ku ru/ mdzod mdzod/ sarba kar+m+ma Ni/ las rnams thams cad/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ chod chod/ sarba man+tha/ ngan sngags thams cad/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ phug cig phug cig/ ba ra mu dra na/ gzhan gyi phyag rgya/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ khug cig khug
113b2(1): cig/ sarba b+hU taM/ 'byung po thams cad/ nirma tha nirma tha/ 'joms par gyis 'joms par gyis/ sarba duSh+Ta/ gdug pa thams cad/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ dbye bar gyis dbye bar gyis/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/ dkyil 'khor dbus la/ be b+ha swa ta/ gshin rnge/ dzI
113b3(1): bi tan+ta ka raM/ srog mthar byed pa/ ku ru ku ru/ mdzod cig mdzod cig/ ma ma kaR+YaM/ bdag gi bya ba/ da ha da ha/ sregs shig sregs shig/ pa tsa pa tsa/ chos chos/ mA bi la m+ba mA bi lam+ba/ dmigs pa med par gyis dmigs pa med par gyis/ sa ma ya
113b4(1): ma nu sma ra/ dam tshig rjes su dran par gyis/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ tshal par gyis tshal par gyis/ yar+b+ba na sha ya/ pa ri pU ra ya/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su gang bar gyis/ he he b+ha ga bAn/ kye kye bcom ldan 'das/ ki ma tsi rA ya
113b5(1): saM/ rtse yang gyur bar/ ma ma sarba yar+tha sA d+ha ya swA hA/ bdag gi don thams cad 'grub pa'i gzhi zugs/ gzhan rje gshed kyi kyi srung ba'i sngags pa// na ma a maN+Da ka la sa kye+eH ban Na/ phyag 'tshal lo kun nas sra gzung thugs rdo rje la/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ ga
113b6(1): 'tshal lo rdo rje khro bo chen po la/ ma hA daMSh+To t+ka Ta b+hai ra wA yA/ khro bo chen po mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung ba la/ a se mu sa la pa chu pA sha ha sta ya/ ral gri gtun shing dgra sta zhags pa phyag na bsnams pa la/ au a mr-i ta kuN+Da li bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/
114a1(1): kha kha kho bo khA hi khA hi/ zo zhig po zhig/ hu lu hu lu/ zhugs shig zhugs shig/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ gnas par gyis gnas par gyis/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ chings chings/ ha na ha na/ rgyob rgyob/ da ha da ha/ grogs sregs pa tsa pa tsa/ chos chos
114a2(1): gar+b+ha gar+b+ha/ sgrogs sgrogs/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ rnam par khos rnam par khos/ sarba big+h+nAM bi nA ya ka na/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ tshigs bdag chen pa/ dzI bi tan+ta ka rA ya swA hA/ thog mthar byed pa la gzhi drugs
114a3(1): bdud rtsi 'khyil pas nang bsrung ba'i sngags// gtsang mar sbyar ba'i phud dag dang // sha khrag las byas gtor ma yis// 'byung po kun la byin byas te// gshin rje'i gnas su sngags kyis bskrad// phyi nang
114a4(1): bsdus pa ni/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu la gtor ma dang gser skyems btang la bden pa bdar la bskrad la gtang ngo // phyogs bzhir/ gom pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi sar/ mtho bzhi btsugs nas kyang / bgegs gtor rgyal chen phyogs skyong dam gri
114a5(1): byang rnams sngar yang bshad 'dir yang bshad pas 'gal zer na mi 'gal te/ mdor bstan pa rgyas par bshad pa gong du bshad/ 'dir ni bsdus nas bshad de/ mdor bstan/ rgyas bshad/ mjug sdud do// rgyal po chen po sde bzhin la/ rgyal chen sde bzhi mchod de/
114a6(1): po rdzas bsag/ bar du lha bsgom/ tha ma phrin las gzhung bsrang ngo // rdzas bzhi la/ mtho brtsig/ shing gzug/ dkyil 'khor bri/ mchod pa bsham mo// lha la bzhi/ bdag lhar bsgom/ mtho gzhal yas khang du bsgom/ shing rgyal por bsgom/ mchod pa byin brlab/ de nas
114b1(1): las bcol lo// phyi mtshams bsrung bar zhal 'ches pa'i// mthu chen phyogs skyong 'khor bcas la// gtor ma cha re byin nas kyang // phyi mtshams bsrung bar phrin las bcol// de nas gom pa bdun nang du nye bar phyogs
114b2(1): skyoslong bcu mchod de/ dang por rdzas bsag/ bar du lha bsgom/ tha mar las bcol lo// rdzas la bzhi/ hom khung bru/ shing brtsig/ mchod pa bsham/ bdag ltar bsgom/ hom khung khang pa/ shing phyogs spyod du bsgom/ mchod pa byin brlab bo// phrin las ni dang por mchod/ tha mar
114b3(1): phur pas gdab par bya'o// phur pa dar gyi cod pan can/ de nas phur pa gdab pa ni/ phyogs slong gi 'khor bka' mi nyan cing gsung mi sdod pa la gdab/ phur pa khro bcur bsgoms la dang po dbugs bar du gdab/ tha mar sbal pa sgo zhing mtshams bcad do// khro bo
114b4(1): bcu ru byin brlabs nas// phyi mtshams bsrung ba'i phrin las bcol// de nas phyag rgya chen po yi// ma d+ha la nag po gru gsum du// bar chad dam sri gnan byas te/ bag yangs bde bas nan tan bya// de nas dam
114b5(1): gnan te// gnas thos pa'i 'og tu rdzas thod par/ bar chad rkyen dang / gnad par sems pa/ las las grub pa gnan/ thabs dang par dgug pa mar dam ze gnan par bya'o// 'bur lugs ris su bris pa yi// chos kyi rgyal po bdud rtsi
114b6(1): 'khyil// phyi nang sgo byang gdags par bya'o// de nas sgo byang gdags te/ bgegs bsrung ba la gshin rje gshed gdags/ nang gi dngos grub phyir mi gtong bas dngos grub bsrung ba la bdud rtsi 'khril ba gdags so// dang po zhe sdang rdo rje la bka' bsgo ba ni pho
115a1(1): brang gi sa dang bslab pa'i dus te/ sa dang dus kyi gzhal las khang gi gnas 'di ru// yang dag pa'i don bslab pa la mi brtson zhing // byang chub don chos sku'i la mi gnas pa'i// mi dang dbang med mi min gyi 'byung po/
115a2(1): gang yang rung / de dag/ thams cad dbyer med gcig tu bsdus nas ni// rdul phran bzhin du brlag pa dang / sems lus rdul du gshig nas nyid theg pa chen po yi/ ra sems bskyed de/ 'bras bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dag la
115a3(1): dgod par mdzad/ zhe sdang rdo rjer/ ye shes phrin las bzhi'i nus can gyi mdzod/ le lo'am/ btang snyoms sam yal yol lam phyed phyod du bar ma btang zhig/ ces bka' bsgos te sangs rgyas rnams mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs/ badz+ra sa mA dza
115a4(1): dza/ zhes g.yas g.yon dpung pa'i khar se gol gdab bo// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis mdun gyi nam mkha' sprin zhin du gtibs nas mtshams kyi phrin las mdzad par bsam mo// rnal 'byor chen po'i dkyil
115a5(1): khor 'dir// gsang ba'i dam can 'di nyid kyi bka' bsrungs ma gtol ba rnams la so so nas// thams cad thugs rjes bkang zin gyis// bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu la 'byung po'i gtor ma btang zin gyis/ dus/ da lta nyid du so
115a6(1): sor rang rang gi gnas su de ngas/ gal te 'am/ ci ste mi 'gro bar 'dir 'dug gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang / khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin ldang nag g.yas rgya gram g.yon sdigs mdzub can gyis// de ma thag tu snying bkas nas
115b1(1): ni// bdun brgyud rigs kyang brlag par 'gyur// bden pa bdar zhing bskrad par bya/ bden pa bdar ba ni/ gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor/ bka' gsang rmad du byung ba/ dur khrod 'bar ba mchog gi gnas
115b2(1): 'dir 'du ba'i lha la ma gtogs pa bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'i rigs su gyur pa/ mi min mi ru rdzub/ lha min lha ru rdzub/ gsang sngags bla na med pa'i bka' dang dam tshig ma mnos shing / sngags nyan la mi dbang ba phyag rgya blta ba la mi dbang ba/ rnal 'byor pa mched
115b3(1): dang lcam dral gyi tshe srog gi bar du gcod cing / dngos grub kyi bgegs gtsug byed pa de dag bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar la srog gi sbrang bu mi gnas pa'am/ mar khol ma la chu'i thigs pa mi gnas pa'am/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ mun pa'i gzhi mi gnas pa bzhin du ma gnas
115b4(1): par dengs shig/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gshed po che/ g.yas bskor du ltos nas bgegs smad g.yon bskor du 'dus nas mtshams gcad de// oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM gardza gardza hUM phaT/ steng du d+hi ka ra sngo sgra mda' gzhu bsdams pa spad lpags phrar ro/ oM badz+ra
115b5(1): kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM ha na ha na hUM phaT/ gang du rnam par byal bdagang ban ma ma thad bas cad la/ gnas pa gcan 'anang la/ ba gtan la byed ca cwa/ thar jug brjon par byug pa chags pa byad sngags par mo badz+ra
115b6(1): kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ lhor gshin rje gshed mthing nag mi mgo'i dbyug pa/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M n+na ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ lho nub tu mi g.yo ba spug nag ral gri/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ nub tu mgrin
116a1(1): dmar ba sngags skrag/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pa ra dze ta ts+tsha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ nub brang gzhan gyis mi thub pa dmar sba ba dan zags pa skad grags kyi phur pa thar gsum pa g.yas bkar gsan bkar 'dra/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da la

116a3(1): dud kha gtun shing thogs pa/ swA smad phur pa'o// zhe sdang rdo rje'i pus g.yas pa zla ba'i steng na dpa' bo 'bru lnga g.yon nyi ma'i steng na yum lnga'i sa bon/ des spro bsdu byas nas sor mo bsnol bas rigs lnga yab yum sbyor ba byas pa'i mtshams nas mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'i thog dbab
116a4(1): pa'o// khro bo 'chol ba phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa bsnams pa'o// 'khor lo'i thogs/ oM b+h+rUM/ rdo rje'i thogs/ hUM b+h+rUM/ rin po che traM b+h+rUM/ pad+ma hrIHb+h+rUM/ rgya gram a b+h+rUM/ sngags 'dis rigs lnga yab yum sbyor mtshams nas khro bo 'chol ba 'phros nas phyag na mtshon chas
116a5(1): tshogs thogs pas bgegs rnams bskrad nas tshur 'dus nas mtshon cha rnams mdun du spangs nas khro bo rnams rang la thim pa'o// oM dz+wa la badz+ra/ man+ta sum b+ha ni/ man+ta dza la badz+ra/ badz+ra dza la badz+ra hUM phaT// g.yas pa dpa' bo 'bru lnga yab/ 8
116a6(1): ba dang gur gyi mtshams na lag pa g.yas pa nyi ma la oM AHhUM swA hA/ bsam pas rigs lnga gsal ba dang / g.yon pa dpa' mo 'bru lnga yum/ nyi ma la muM lAM mAM b+h+r-i taM// bsam pa las yum sngar gsal bas mdun na yod pa'i mtshon cha la dmigs nas dka' bsgo ba bya ba
116b1(1): dang / bgegs la bka' bsgo ba byas la mtshams gcad do// rigs lnga las sprul pa'i tshon cha la bka' bsgo ba ni/ nam mkha' stong pa las sprin ldang ba ltar g.yas bskor du bgegs bskrad g.yon bskor du mtshams gcad do// bgegs la bka' bsgo ba ni bgegs kyis ra ba
116b2(1): dang 'dra ba'i gur de la tshur mda' mi nus par bsam par bya'o// nga yi dkyil 'khor brtan bya'i phyir/ khro rgyal byin rlabs las byung ba'i// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// dkyil 'khor rim pa tshul bzhin bsrungs// steng
116b3(1): yang rdo rje'i bla re la/ 'og kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi gcal// phyogs mtshams rdo rjes btams pa las// gsang ba rdo rje'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ rdo rje'i mtshams kyi 'brel// 'khor lo dang ral gri dang dbyug tho
116b4(1): dang // phur bu rnams shes par bya'o// rdo rje'i tshul mchog nyid// de dag rang rang so so yi// phyag rgya rab tu bcad nas kyang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni gung mo gnyis rtse skad gzhan bsnol/ mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu gnan no// 'khor lo ni/ lag
116b5(1): pa g.yas g.yon sor mo'i rtse sprad la bral ba'o// ral gri ni mthe bong mthe'u chung mthil du bkugs la gzhan gsum po nyung ba'o// dbyug zo ni g.yas g.yon du gung mo rtse sprad gzhan bsnol la/ dbyug tho ltar phyar/ phur bu ni/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis phur pa 'dril ba ltar
116b6(1): bya'o// rdo rje'i badz+ra badz+ra rak+Sha/ dz+nyA na[:]tsakra rak+Sha/ 'khor lo// ral gri tik+tAts+tshin+da rak+Sha/ dbyug zo/ a ko Ta ya mung+ga ra[:]rak+Sha/ phur bu ki li ki la ya rak+Sha/ drug pa bka' nan ni tshig 'di dag brjod pas bgegs kyis 'di las 'da' mi nus par
117a1(1): bsam mo// mtshams bcad nang 'di tshun chad du/ bar chod byed pa rnams// sra yang 'da' bar ma byed cig/ ji ste bka' las 'das gyur na/ zhe sdang rdo rje 'am rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag mtshan/ tho ba lcags kyur bcas
117a2(1): pa yis// snying nas drang zhing brdung bar bya'o// thabs dang shes rab hUM las Ta ba rdo rje dri la/ hUM las dril bu shes rab stong pa/ bzung nas rkang pa hUM las rdo rje rgya gram du bsams la rgya gram bsam/ shar du zhi ba'i stabs// g.yas brkyang
117a3(1): shar la lhor rgyas pa'i stabs g.yon brkyang lho/ nub tu dbang gi stabs// zlum po nub la byang du drag po'i stabs gru bzhi byang // mtshams ni rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bskor nas/ bsad/ 'og rdo rje'i brag gi/ sa gzhi rdo rjer gtams par bsam ma/
117a4(1): byin gyis brlabs/ gong du song ba yin no// lung dkrugs pa'o// 'gyod rtogs ting 'dzin dad pa'i mes// nang bshags pa gnyis las/ me bzhis bshags pa ni/ 'gyod pa drag po'i mes rnam smin bsreg pa dang / rtogs pa blta ba'i mes rnam smin bsreg
117a5(1): pa dang / ting 'dzin goms pa'i mes rnam smin bsreg pa dang / dad pa brlabs po che'i mes rnam smin bsreg pa'o// rgyu bzhi'i bshags pa ni/ dam tshig nyams pa bshags pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa ni mched lcam gyis bskang gso'i dus su bya/ ye shes lha dang 'khon gcugs dpral ba ye
117a6(1): shes su mchog ni/ sngon 'gro'i dus su bya/ dam can dbang du bya ba ni/ tshogs kyi dus su dpal chen khro rgyal bya/ ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdus pa ni/ lhag ma'i dus su ye shes mkha' 'gro bya/ kha skong zhi khro gnyis ni/ bskyed rdzogs gzhung bgrong ba'i rjes la bya'o// nyams
117b1(1): pa'i chad pa bshags pa dang // lus ngag yid kyi sgrib pa yang // rab tu bshags par bya ba'o// spyi rkang rtsib lpags pa spu sen// rdor sa ra gur dra ba me// nang gi mtshams ni/ spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje/ rkang mthil rdo rje'i sa
117b2(1): gagazhi/ rtsib ma rdo rje'i ra ba/ pags pa rdo rje'i gur/ ba spu mda'i dra ba/ sen mo'i ri rab tu 'bar ba/ de ltar gnas pas srung ba'i 'khor lo rang gi lus la rdzogs par gnas so// sems nyid srog rtsa'i hUM ring rlung // sa gzhi rtsigs pa bla re gur/
117b3(1): nyid rlung sems kyi mtshams ni// sems kyi rang bzhin srog 'dzin pa'i rlung yi ge hUM du gnas te/ hU~M cha gcig srog las rtsol ba ba'i rlung du phyi rol du 'phros te/ hU~M de las 'og tu 'phros pas rdo rje'i sa gzhi/ phyogs su 'phros pas rdo rje'i rtsigs pa/ steng du 'phros pas rdo rje'i
117b4(1): gur/ bla rer gyur pa ni/ srog gi rlung sems nyid las/ rtsol ba'i rlung sems kyi snang bar gyur nas srung ba'i 'khor lor gyur pa'o// kun gzhi chos nyid pho brang na/ de kho na nyid kyi bshags pa ni rang gi kun gzhi chos nyid kyi pho brang myang 'das kyi grong khyer chen por
117b5(1): gnas pa de na// yid kyi rang byung ye shes lha/ yid rang byung gi ye shes dpal kun tu bzang po don skye ba med pa'i lhar gnas pa la// nyon mongs pa lnga rgyal ba rigs lnga bcom ldan 'das/ su bzhugs te gti mug rnam snang / zhe sdang mi bskyod pa/ nga rgyal
117b6(1): rin 'byung / 'dod chags snang mtha'/ phrag dog don yod grub par bzhugs so// sgo lnga'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// dbang po sgo lnga 'khor te/ mig gi dbang po sa snying byams pa yab yum/ rna ba sgrib sel phyi nang yab yum/ sna spyan ras gzigs phyi nang yab yum/
118a1(1): lce phyag rdor gyi nang yab yum/ lus kyi dbang sgo ba yab yum du ye nas gnas par bzhugs pa lags/ rtsa gnas snod du lus khams sbyar/ lus la gnas pa rtsa ni/ mchod pa'i snod yin la lus khams kyi bdud rtsi mchod pa'i rdzas su ye nas gnas pa
118a2(1): yin te/ bdud rtsi lnga yang sems can kun gyi lus la gnas so// rang sngags byin rlabs rlung gis dbul/ rang gi gi lus la grub pa'i sngags dpa' bo 'bru lnga nyid ye nas bdud rtsi byin gyis rlabs pa'i sngags yin/ snying po rlung gi spro bsdus rlung bzung nas lus kyis
118a3(1): sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par mchod pa 'bul lo// mnyes nas lus dang ngag yid la/ kyi sgrib pa lus sangs rgyas su ma shes pa dang / ngag sngags su ma shes pa dang / sems chos spar ma shes pa'o// mi shes pa kho na ma rig pa yin pas na sgrib pa dang / shes pa ni sgrib
118a4(1): pa dag pa'o// sgrib la mi gnas rang grol bshags/ de ltar rtogs pas sgrib pa mi gnas par rang sar grol ba kho na bshags pa yin no// de yang dper na mar me btegs pas mun pa rang dengs pa ltar rtogs pas sgrib pa rang dag par gyur pa'o// zhes gsungs
118a5(1): so// he ru ka yi ga la po las/ mtshams kyi phrin las kyis bar chad bsal ba ste brtag pa drug pa'o// // phyi bshags phyi skong phyi mtshams gsum ni/ chos thams cad thun mong du gsungs pa yin la/ nang mtshams nang bshags ni/ 'bras
118a6(1): bu gsang sngags nang pa kho na'i yin te/ de yang phyi skong dkon mchog mchod pa ni rgyu mtshan nyid dang mthun/ mgron bzhi mchod pa kri yog dang mthun/ phyogs skyong mchod cing phur pa gdab pa phyi mtshams so// nang mtshams dam sri sgo byan la sogs pa nang pa dang mthun no// sngon
118b1(1): 'gro phrin las kyi rim pa yin no// sgrub pa po la bar chad 'byung ba rnams bsal zhing phyi nang gi mtshams gcad par bya ba'i/ cho ga'i rim pa rnams yang nas yang du gsungs pas na/ brtag pa'o// brtag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te/ rtogs par byed
118b2(1): pas na brtag pa'o zer ro// rtog cing rdzogs par byed pa'o// yang na/ sa s+thi ta'i sgra las/ kalpa saM pa ta ni/ zhes bya ba yin te/ bod skad du/ rtog pa'am/ brtag pa'am/ cho ga'am/ cho ga zhib mo yin gsungs so// yi ge 'di nyid bla ma'i phyag dpe la mi bzhugs so// gzhan nas
118b3(1): gsungs pa 'dir kho bos bris so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor nub phyogs su bya'o// de bzhin gzhi/ zod spu zhal nub tu bstan slob dpon
118b4(1): dgongs pa'i gzhi yang / kham phor te thod pa dgu la ri mo bris pa'i sgra dgu/ snang ba'i 'od mar me dgu dang bcas par dgram/ dkyil 'khor/ rdzas kyis mdzes par 'khor bar bzhag/ la mtha' rtsang gis byang bskor ro// mig gi bde ba'i rten
118b5(1): lu ma ting nge 'dzin rten bris sgra la sogs yang mngon par bri/ sde dgram mo// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa 'og min na gnas/ so/ gzugs brnyan gyi rgya'am rnam grangs ni gser dngul lugs ma dang ni/ rdo la
118b6(1): brkos ma 'am ba so la 'bur du brkos shing / ras ba la la sogs pa las thags su btags pa dang khang bu dang / ste lha khang bris pa'i// sa 'am 'jim pa'i gzugs lder so dang dang ras sam shing la sogs pa la ri mo bris pa dang / sa la sogs pa la/ rdul
119a1(1): tshan du byas pa dang sa la sogs pa gang praka dang man+dan rnams las byas pa mang po rnams// nal 'thor bslab pa'i chu 'byor pa che chung dang sbyar/ ro// gzhi lam 'bras bu'i/ zung dang rtsa ba dang bskyed pa dang las sngags kyi sbyor ba mkhas pa can// de zed btsun
119a2(1): rtogs pa blta ba la sogs yongs su shes/ pa'o// gzugs brnyan gyi/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la brtson/ pa'o// rang gi lus la mtshon pa rgyar/ 'dom gang gru bzhi dang snying mtshon pas dpangs su chag gang la// yang na lus kyi phyed yin pas snying mtshon pa mda' gang gru bzhir
119a3(1): // dbus kyi/ byang chub sems ni me long ye shes te/ sngar sangs rgyas pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang mchog dam pa rab tu bslab pa'i phyir/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ bka' sdod min rnams la gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// snod min dbang ma thob
119a4(1): pa'am dam tshig med pa rnams la/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su byang chub sems kyi chag chag 'debs/ pas me long lta bu'i ye shes su gsal lo// oM ma hA ye shes dz+nyA na maN+Da la dkyil 'khor hUM/ sangs rgyas re re la sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga lnga mnga'
119a5(1): ba/ bdud rtsi dri chen ye shes lngar ldan pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// bka' snod min rnams la gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ snod min nam dbang ma thob pa'i dam tshig med pa rnams la gsang ba'i dkyil
119a6(1): khor chen po chag chag shar du 'debs/ so// chen po// ma hA ba su rgyu ma maN+Da dkyil 'khor la hUM// bdud rtsi mAM sa sha chen rin 'byung gi dam rdzas yin rin 'byung gi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga lnga ye shes lngar ldan pas na ye shes lngar ldan pas// de bzhin gshegs
119b1(1): pa'i gsang mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir// bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po lho na bdud rtsi sha chen gyi chag chag 'debs/ dkyil 'khor gyi lho nas chag chag gdab bo/ ma hA mAM sa maN+Da la hUM/ lus khams bdud rtsi lnga las khyad par du
119b2(1): yum gyi pad+ma rak+tas gangs pa ni// bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang mchog so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis rang spyi'i mtshan nyid rtogs par byed pa ste/ de bsgrub pa'i phyir/ pad dag 'byung gnas gang yin na// mkha' dbyings rnam dag
119b3(1): yum gyi gzhal yas nas/ rak+ta gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor snang mtha'i dam rdzas chen por spro/ dkyil 'khor gyi nub tu byug par bya'o// ma hA rak+ta maN+Da la hUM/ bdud rtsi dri chu ye shes lngar ldan pas/ bdud rtsi dri chus chag chag gdabs pas bya phug ron gyi ske'am rma bya'i mdongs ltar dri
119b4(1): chu kha dog lnga ldan no// ye shes las byung bya ba grub pa'i ye shes 'grub pa'i rgyu dri chu rang las byung ba'o// dag pa las kyi chu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis phrin las ma lus pa 'grub pa ste rtogs dka' las gsang mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir/ yang dag par
119b5(1): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// bka' rtogs par dka' bas gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po chag chag 'debs/ lha don yod grub pa'i gzhal yas khang du gnas par bya dngos su dri chus byug go// oM ma hA ma ma ki ri dri chu maN+Da dkyil 'khor
119b6(1): la hUM/ dbus nas shar te dbus nas byang chub sems dang / shar du dri chen dang / lhor mAM sa/ nub tu pad rAg/ byang du dri chus/ g.yas bskor gdab/ pas/ dbus chos kyi dbyings/ shar me long / lho mnyam nyid/ nub so sor rtogs pa/ byang bya ba grub pa'i// ye shes lnga yi byin
120a1(1): @rlabs phebs par bsam// ras ba la pad+ma'i rgyas pa dang // shi ba'i sgra yi spyad pa'am// ba su ta yi thig skud byas/ thig skud la bzhi ste/ rgyu phyi ltar ras bal lam/ pad+ma'i rgyus pa/ nang lugs sgra'am shi sgra la bya'o// gsang ba ni khyi dkar po'i rgyu ma'am zhing gi rgya
120a2(1): ma'o// ye shes lnga ldan/ kyai thig spad lnga bsgril gyis steng gi thig/ nam mkha' la thig gdab ste ye shes kyi lha steng gi nam mkha' la dbang por spyan drangs// sa thig dam tshig gi thig spad gsum bsgril gyis sa la btab pas sa gzhi/ sgra gsung thugs/ me zad pa rgyan gyis 'khor
120a3(1): lo'i che ba rgyas par bsam// slob dpon nub tu bzhugs pa thams cad dbang du byed pas so// theg grogs yum la gsum// dang por btsal// bar du chas su gzhug/ tha mar byin brlab bo// dang po ni rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs sam/ bram ze'am/
120a4(1): gdol pa'i bu mo mtshan ldan no// chas ni khrus bya/ drin zhim pos blugs/ gu gul bdug/ bgegs bskrad/ rgyan gdags so// byin gyis brlab pa ni/ yab kyi spyi bor thig skud bzhags 'od du zhu nas lhag pa byang chub sems su byin brlab/ yum gyi spyi bor bzhags pas wam
120a5(1): gyi lhag pa byang sems su byin gyis brlab bo/ la shar du yum/ bzhugs te bde ba'i ye shes shar bas so// bkra shis pas mchog grub mtshan ldan gyis thun mong grub pa'o// gzungs ma'i yum/ sku'i yon tan ni/ zhal nas ut+pa la ngad ldan zhing /
120a6(1): ut+pal mdzes pa dang / ngad zhim pa dang / sbrang rtsi mang ba dang / bung bas blang bar bde ba ltar/ sku mdzes par mtshon dper tshang / dri zhim pas ma mo mkha' 'gro 'du/ rak+ta mang bas dam rdzas tshang / kun nas 'grog par sla bas dam tshig mi nyams pa'o// gsung gi yon tan// skad
120b1(1): kyang ngang pa gzhon nu 'dra// snyan par smra zhing tshul dang ldan// bkra shis mtshan ldan thugs kyi yon tan yid du 'ong // mnyen lcug 'khril ldem dbyer mi phyed/ yon tan gyi yon tan// rdo rje las kyi don grub ma// gnyis med
120b2(1): sbyor ba'i byin rlabs kyis/ byang sems dkar dmar ni 'khor 'das kun bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pas/ des btab pas rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// yab yum mkha' nas thig bris la gdab pa'o// gsang ba'i dkyil
120b3(1): 'khor phrin las kyi yon tan thig 'debs kyis// las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas thig gdab bzhi las/ dang po khyab pa spyi'i thig snang srid chos nyid du rtogs pa'o// gnyis pa gsang ba byang chub sems
120b4(1): kyi thig ni/ thig smad sum gyi mkha' la 'phangs pas lhag pa byang chub sems dkar brengs kyis song bas// sram gyi mkha' zla khams su gsal ba'o// gsum pa ting nge 'dzin gyi thig ni steng du btab pas gzhal yas khang du gyur pa'o// 'og tu btab pas 'og gzhal las khang
120b5(1): du gyur pa'o// bzhi la rdul tshon gyi thig cha phye ba'o// thabs dang gsang ba byang chub sems kyi thig gdab pa shes rab ldan pa'i byin rlabs las/ theg pa 'og ma byi kri yog man chad la/ gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// gsang
120b6(1): pa byang chub sems kyi thig/ yab kyi byang sems yum gyi mkhar phab pas thig tu gyur pa/ btab pas// ye shes gzhal yas de la gzhal yas khang zla kham pa sram yi mkha' gyur to/ pho brang lhun gyis grub// oM gu h+ya e kra dz+nyA na maN+Da la hUM/
121a1(1): ting nge 'dzin gyi thig ni// ye shes lnga ldan gnam thog gis// steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dkyil 'khor lo brang gzhal las khang du byar 'gyur/ bar bsam mo/ sa thig btab pas 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams
121a2(1): cad yang // dkyil 'khor pho brang gzhal yas khang chen por gyur par bsam pa'o// thig gi 'bras bu bstan pa// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i byin rlabs las// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// gsang ba
121a3(1): byang chub sems kyi thig btab pas// dur khrod bdal ba'i gzhal yas lhun gyis grub/ b+hAM bi shwa bi shud+d+he/ badz+ra dzA na tsakra/ ma d+ha la b+h+rUM mtshon pa rdul tshon gyi thig ni dbus mi 'gyur ba'i thig/ shar me long / lho mnyam nyid/ nub so sor
121a4(1): rtog pa/ byang bya ba grub pa/ ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang la phyi dur khrod 'bar bar bsam mo// drug pa tshon bstan pa la gsum ste/ rmya/ rak+ta/ byin rlabs so// rgyu la gsum ste rab bstan no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rdzas// bu sha ra ga gser dang
121a5(1): ni// pad+ma rA ga mar ka ta// in+d+ra ni la tshon du sbyar// tshon gyi rgyu bstan pa la gsum ste/ phyi dang / nang dang / gsang ba'o// phyi la gsum ste/ rab dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i yon bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed pa'i dbang du bshad pa ste/ dkar po rin po
121a6(1): sha ra ga las byas pa'o// ser po gser/ dmar ba pad+ma rA ga/ ljang gu mar gad/ mthing ga in+d+ra ni la'o// de yang rgyu bzang na byin rlabs che ba dang / tshogs rdzogs pa dang brnyas pa mi bya ba'i dgos pa yod de/ rgyu bzang po la kun dang bas sems dang ba skye bas byin rlabs
121b1(1): che'o// tshogs rdzogs pa ni sa tshon bla ma dang mched kyis tshogs byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bzhengs pa'o// brnyas pa mi bya ba ni blun po ba glang rdzi lta bu yang tshul bsrung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po'i bran yang yid ches shing dang ba'o// 'bring gi/ mi yi dbang pos sbyar ste
121b2(1): dkar po nas sam 'bras/ las byas pa dang / ser po/ pra'o las byas pa dang / dmar po ram bu nas dmar po la bya dang / ljang gu nas sam nas kyi/ nag po sran ma la sogs pa bya// ldang pa sran ma la sogs pa// 'bring dang zhi ba'i tshon du
121b3(1): bshad/ zhi ba rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la khyad par du tshon 'bru sna lnga las bya'o// dur khrod kyi rdzas dang dbang po thal chen ser pos sdong ros dang / dmar po ro bsregs pa/ de yi so phag ljang gu dur khrod ram pa/ dU ra ba dang / sol bas bris pa
121b4(1): 'di ni khyad par du khro bo yi// dkyil 'khor dag la rab tu shis/ tshon za ma dkar po/ rdo thal ser po sa ser ram bab la ldong / ros/ dmar po// skrag gyis bsgyur la dmar po bya ba dang / mthing ga/ rams kyi bskur ba las byas
121b5(1): dang nag po 'bru bsregs pa/ zhe khro thun mong gi/ tha ma'i rdul tshon dag tu bshad// rak+ta ni gsang ba'i tshen ni 'bras bu chen po lnga bskal ba'i rak+ta 'am sum mtshan ldan gyi pad+ma ra k+ta'o// ri mo gcig pa zhes bya ba// de dag thams cad ri mo
121b6(1): gcig/ chags pa'i rak+ta byang chub sems// gsang sngags nang pa'i// dkyil 'khor kun nam gzugs brtan kun la rak+ta gtang ngo / gyi tshon rtsir bshad// yi ge 'bru lngas byin brlabs pa// phyag mtshan rig lnga yab yum
122a1(1): 'gyur// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rA ga ya mi/ bo d+hi tsit+ta dz+nyA na ma d+ha la hUM/ thod pa lnga phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bzhag gtso bo'i thugs ka nas yig 'bru lnga 'gros dngos po bkres nas 'bru lngar gyur/ de 'phros 'dus pas phyag mtshan
122a2(1): lngar gyur/ de 'od du zhu ba las ye shes lnga'i sngags brjod pas ye shes lngar gyur par bsam mo// rang bzhin 'byung ba lnga yi khyad par las/ tshon gyi che ba bzhi ste/ rgyu ma byas dag pas che ste/ phyi nang gsang ba'i rgyu yang ye shes rang byung gi 'byung ba lngar shar ro// rkyen ma bslabs
122a3(1): sbyangs pas che ste byin gyis brlabs pa de yang sngags brgya stong du mas bsgrubs te/ ting 'dzin skad cig mas sbyangs/ 'bras bu ye shes rang shar bas che ste/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga la phyag mtshan lngar gyur de las sku lngar gyur pa de yang ye shes sgyu ma tsam gyi sku/ nam mkha'i 'ja' ltar
122a4(1): rdzogs pa'o// yon tan mchog thun mong grub pas che ba ni thun mong khams gsum thugs rjes sgrol mchog ye shes lngar dag pa'o// 'od kyi 'ja' tshon ye shes lnga ru rdzogs/ khams gsum thugs rjes bsgral ba'i phyir// dag pa dri med ye shes lnga
122a5(1): ru bsgom// oM AHhUM swA hA/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pas/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi tshad med bzhi'i gru chad dang / thugs rje rgyun chad med pas/ bar khyams rnam thar bzhi'i sgo dang ldan pa la/ ye shes lnga'i// rin chen brtsigs pa rnam pa lnga/
122a6(1): 'dod yon lnga'i lha mo bzhugs snam thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su dmar la rin po che'i pha gu ser/ po// dra ba dra phyed zhi ba mu tig phreng ba dar dmar po la brgyus pa'i khro bo la mi mgo dang snying gi lcags kha la/ las mtha' phyin pas/ da ru khang ni ljang
122b1(1): ngam yang na nyon mongs pa dag pas dkar// rta babs brgyad pad+ha/ sbom pa/ rta rkang / bar chags/ shar ba/ chun 'byung / rin chen/ khrung mgo dang yang dag ldan/ rdo rje ra ba'i lcags ri me dpung 'bar/ bas mtha' 'khor// yang na de yi dbus
122b2(1): su ni// rab tu zlum po'i nang du thig bzhi btab/ pas// le'u tshe dgu dang ldan par bya/ 'o// sku tsag le gsung yig 'bru thugs kyi phyag mtshan gyi mtshan ma bris// dkyil 'khor gnyis te/ rdo rje dbyings dang / 'jigs byed chen po'o// dang po
122b3(1): la gsum ste/ sku phyag rgya'i tsa ka li dkyil 'khor dang / gsung yig 'bru'i bruM cing la dkyil 'khor dang / thugs phyag mtshan gyi'o// 'jigs byed la drug ste/ rang dpal gyi bzhin gyi dang / ye shes spyan drangs kyi dang / gzugs brtan gyi stegs bu dang / ting 'dzin gyi bskyed pa
122b4(1): dang / rtsa ba'i zod spu dang / rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ral gri mda' la sogs te/ zhi khro gnyis dril bas dkyil 'khor dgu'o// dbus khro bo gnyis las zla kham ni su 'gying phur btab nas bskor/ dbus dang tha ma/ dbus su khams gsum dbang du bsdus pa'i
122b5(1): rtags// zla kham dmar po nub bstan sgo/ de'i nang du 'khor gyi zla kham chung ba dgu yang bris// nub zla kham dkar dmar kha skrod pa'i phyogs zla kham dkar por bya/ zla gam gyi phyi'i// mu khyud thod pa rdo rjes ra ba bskor// yang na
122b6(1): dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mthing gar bya'o// pa// zla kham 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dam dbus dam dgu dang ldan par bri/ phrin las mthar phyin pas// gru chad ljang gu lha snam sems can la chags kyang bden gnyid dbyer med gcig tu mtshon
123a1(1): pas dmar// sgo ni phyogs dang mthun pa la/ shar dkar/ o ser/ nub dmar/ byang ldang / dpal gyi pho brang 'og min nas ting nges bstims la gzhag/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang ldar// ye shes lngar ldan bzhim thod pa char gsum
123a2(1): sku gsung thugs/ su bstim// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i snga rol du/ stegs bu byas thig btab pa'i rjes la/ bsre bsnan cho ga rab tu bya/ mched gsar pa// ma 'dres pa rnams yol bas bcad/ la dkyil 'khor mi ston no// 'dres pa
123a3(1): bsnan la dang por mtshams dang bshags/ yi dam gyi/ lha gsher ming gsang mtshan gsher de rnams brjed 'dug na dpog/ sman bsdus gsang ba'i rdzas la brten nas bkang bas na byin rlabs yi dam gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed/
123a4(1): la/ sman gyis mchod rang re rnams dngos grub blang bar bya// rnal 'byor rnams kyi bka' thub bam// rtogs na rang lus sku gsung ngag thugs yid yin te// ma rtogs na ni ngan song gsum/ rtogs na yi dam gyi sku gsung thugs
123a5(1): la/ ma rtogs na ngan song gsum du ltung bas naM sam zhes bya zhing / gti mug sku ste byol song / 'dod chags gsung ste yi dwags/ zhe sdang thugs te dmyal ba// su yang ris su bcad nas gang yang / 'da' bar ma byed cig/ de nas mched ma 'dres pa dang 'dres
123a6(1): pa bsre/ ba la bcu las/ dang por bca' bzangs ni dbang yin dngul ni zhi ba de gnyis bsres pa'i me long gis maN+Dal bya// ma d+ha la dri yi thig le lnga// tshoms lnga rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// rdo rjesa'i lam nas byang chub kyi lam sgor
123b1(1): drang / bar bya'o// rdo rje sku ltar skye 'jig dang bral ba yi dkyil 'khor du// bdag kyang lus skye 'jig dang bcas pa 'di skye 'jig med par bslab pa'i phyir bdag/ 'jug par// 'tshal lags kyi/ lha dang bla ma'i// thugs rjes bdag 'jug
123b2(1): papa po la dgongs nas kyang // bdag gi 'khor ba nas kyang 'das su 'dren pas na gnas rab mdzad du gsol// gsung dang thugs kyang gos bskur der shes bya// byang chub rdo rje rgyal sras 'khor dang bcas pa lcam dral la/ sngon gyi sgrub
123b3(1): pa pos/ mchod cing ji ltar bgyis pa ltar// bdag kyang 'khor ba nas mya ngan las 'das par rab tu bsgral ba dang / skye 'jig dang bral ba'i don// nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/ zhes brjod nas lus ngag yid gsum dang bas// slob dpon
123b4(1): dag la yon phul nas/ slob ma la/ thugs rjes gzung bar rab tu zhu/ 'o// 'khor ba nas kyang 'das su 'gro bar rig pas na// bdag gi rig pa'i me tog 'di yi dam gang yin brtag pa'i phyir// rig pa'i me tog lha la 'bul/ 'khor
123b5(1): rnams kyis gus pa bya ba yang gca ba kho na yin pas na// me tog dbus su gtad la dor/ gang la babs pa lhag pa'i lha/ rigs gang yin brtag pa'o// rtsa ba sku bla ma mched lham nya gsung gsang sngags dang phyag rgya thugs gsang ba bcu dang yan
123b6(1): lag bcas/ phog pa las/ mi 'da' sangs rgyas nyid ma grub par du bsrung ngo zhes/ phyi dbang dus su/ yang dang yang du nang dbang dus su dam tshig bcas pa bzhin/ phangs pa'i/ lus dang srog gces pa'i la babs kyang dam tshig ma
124a1(1): btang zhig/ sa ma ya dang tshig hUM// nyon mongs lngas rigs drug tu 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i// ma rig pa yi ling tog rnams/ ye shes mig dang 'dra bar mkhyen pa la/ ma rig pa ling
124a2(1): tog dang 'dra bas bsgribs pa// bde gshegs sman pa mkhas pa dang 'dra ba'i dgongs pas ma rig pa'i ling tog bsal bar bya// tsak+Shu mig pra be sha dbye phaT/ de nas dam tshig bsre bar bya ba yang // rdo rje slob dpon yang lus can yin pas
124a3(1): sgra'i dam chog gtso nyid dang // rdo rje mched dang lcam dral yang lus can yin pas na sgra'i dam chog la/ langs pa'i/ lus dang gces pa'i srog la bab gyur kyang / brnag par bya bas na// zhe sdang mnar sems yid la dran du me rung bas na mi
124a4(1): bskyed do// 'di ni sku yi dam tshig ste/ gsang sngags gsang ba mchog gi/ dam tshig mchog las 'da' mi bya// dam tshig mchog las ma 'da' zhig/ sa ma ya dam tshig na ra ka na/ mnas bstsal ba// sangs rgyas kyi bka'i dgongs pa
124a5(1): mkhyen pas/ lung dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyi/ gsang sngags kyi bcud du 'dzin par nus pas na// snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma la// yi dam gsal ba'i yi dam bsgom pa spu'i dam tshig yin pas de'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'bog pa la dgongs pas lha
124a6(1): phog pas/ sngags zlos pa dang phyag rgya bcas nas brda sprod pa rgyun mi gcad/ pa// 'di ni gsung gi dam tshig sngags kyis 'bod phyag rgyas brda sprod pa ste/ gsang sngags theg pa kun gyi/ dam tshig mchog yin la de'i bsrung bya las 'da' bar mi
124b1(1): bya/ sngags kyi phyi ba las khyad par du 'phags pas// dam tshig mchog las ma 'da' zhig/ sa ma ya dam tshig na ra[:]ka na/ 'da' ri shi zhes pa'o// lus/ bskyed rim dang sems rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ni// gnas pa rtsa yi dkyil
124b2(1): 'khor dang / rtsa gzhal yas khang dang lha sku'i dbyibs su// grub pa sngags kyi yi ge dang / 'bru lnga'i gsung du gnas pas// brten pa lus kyi khams kyi bdud rtsi dang / lha'i sku nyams bde bar gnas pa'o// snying po rlung gi man ngag rnams/
124b3(1): lha'i thugs su gnas pas sems can gyi dran rtog ltar thugs rje 'char ba'o// 'di ni[:]thugs kyi dam tshig ste/ bla ma'i man ngag thugs la brnag par bya ba'i don// dam tshig mchog phog pa las 'da' mi bya/ ma 'da' zhig ces pa'o// phyi pa las khyad par
124b4(1): 'phags pa// dam tshig mchog las ma 'da' zhig/ sa ma ya na ra ka na/ 'di ni sku lus can gsung brda sprod la thugs brnag par bya bas kyi dam tshig ste// dam tshig gong ma gsum po ma 'das na/ yi dam lha/ rdo rje sems dpa'
124b5(1): slob ma'i snying la gnas te// sku gzi brjid gsung sgra brjod thugs mkhyen pa'i ye shes sam dran rtog la dbang thob kyi dngos grub ni/ skye ba phyi mar mi 'gor// tshe 'di nyid la thob gyur la// dam tshig phog pa rnams ma bsrung bar nyams par gyur
124b6(1): pa na/ yun ring po mi thogs par// tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje dmyal bar ltung // oM sku AHgsung hUM/ thugs/ ming bsre ba ni// rdo rje las bos gsang mtshan gdags/ lha bsre ba ni bab pa'i lha dang mos pa'i// yi dam lha yang dpog par bya// de
125a1(1): yi snying po bkra ba'i phyir phog byas nas// rdo rje'i gral bas pa gsar pa re dang rting par bkra sbal phreng ba gtad// rig pa phreng ba gtad srog gi 'brel ba'i thugs rdo'i brtse gdung du phreng zag la/ mdzad pa
125a2(1): rnams/ thabs dang mo rnams shes rab rig pa brtse gdung phreng bab/ 'brel ba'i phreng ba brgyus/ sems cad/ rtse gcig lha bsgom pa dang 'grogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ spyod lam dus bzhir mi gtang ba// 'jab blos mi dmas bsnyen pas na zur
125a3(1): ma chag par rkyen dbang du ma song bar bgrang du gsol/ rdo rje/ badz+ra ma le phreng ba traM/ rat+na rigs// rtsa ba sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dang // bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi bsnyen pa nye bsnyen sgrub pa sgrub chen bsnyen cing bsgrub pa
125a4(1): dang // yi dam zhi khro'i lha mchog 'dzab bsnyen drang ba'i phyir/ gsang ba'i// dam tshig mnos nas rdo rje'i gral du mchi bar gnang // tiSh+Tha bzhugs shig sa ma ya dam tshig hUM// dam tshig gsar pa bsre ba rting pa bsnan pa ma byas
125a5(1): na// gsar rnying mched rnams ga la 'dre/ dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams zhugs par ga la 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dbus su ban+d+ha bsag pa rgyal rigs kyi// ban+d+ha yab yum snying po bri// phyogs bzhir rgyal rigs ko'u ri rje'u
125a6(1): rigs dang / tse'u re// dmangs rigs phra mo ha/ bram ze be tA lI lha mo bzhi// mtshams bzhir khrus mkhan phrag saM gar mkhan dang / b+ham+ba ri// gdol pa swe sha ni btso blag mkhan tsar+Na li rnams kyi// tshal bu mnyam par lha mo
125b1(1): ri// snying po lhar bskyed dbang byin brlabs/ rak+tas snying po bri rtsa sngags ltar bskyed ye shes lngas dbang bskur sgra gsung thugs su byin brlabs/ rang rang gnas nas// spyan drang dkyil 'khor dag la dgod/ dpal gyi zhal bu ni thod pa mtshan ldan
125b2(1): no// zhal bu ka pA la'i mtshan gsol pa/ dngos grub gnyis ster bas// 'phrul zhal yid bzhin phra men gser la g.yus spras pa 'dra rgyan gyis bklubs/ mkha' 'gro mas bskyod pa ste// rkang med mkha' la 'gro ba'i tog tog rkan sgra can//
125b3(1): sngon thod pa mtshan ldan sa la sbas pas nam mkha' la kan sgra rdebs shing song ba'o// sngon gyi skyes mchog sgrub pa po yi rdzas yin gyi// de sgrub pa pos sngags kyis bkug pas dpal chen po'i dngos grub grub pa'o// rnal 'byor pa gang // su zhig
125b4(1): mchog thun mong gi dngos grub 'dod pa nang thod pa mtshan ldan nga la long // gang zhig nga yi bka'/ gsang sngags kyi gzhung ltar mi byed rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig la mi gnas pa/ zod pa mtshan ldan/ nga yi gzugs mthong tsam
125b5(1): gyis 'tshig pa dang / thod pa mtshan ldan yod ces pa'i// sgra dag thos pa tsam gyis brlag par 'gyur// dkar po zangs g.yag 'tsher ba ni// snga rab 'das pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ thod pa skam pos chos sku ste skam thag chad pa dang
125b6(1): 'dra bas chos sku sgrib pa mtha' dag dang bral ba'o// chos kyi sku dri ma med pa'o// dang rab ldan zhing / rigs drug gi/ 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na la de bzhin gshegs// rlon pa ltung lor bcas pa ni// da ltar bzhugs pa'i bcom
126a1(1): ldan 'das// longs spyod rdzos pa'i sku/ thod par ri zhes pa brgya lcang lo can longs su ste longs sku ye shes snga ma ltar skam rlon par ba'o// dang rab ldan zhing / las con gyi dbang du/ 'gro ba'i rnams kyi gnas der mi gtong bas don
126a2(1): la de bzhin gshegs// dmar po ra ri chags pa ni// slad kyis 'byon pa'i bcom ldan 'das// sprul pa'i/ dbang po lnga dang ldan pa sbrul sgra ste/ mngon shes dang ldan pa ltar dbang po tshang ba'o// sku mdzad pa rdzogs pa dang rab ldan
126a3(1): zhing // 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don mdzad pas na la de bzhin gshegs// dbus na rab byung grub pa'i lha// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kya rnga ba man bas na// thugs mchog badz+ra rdo rje he ru ka khrag 'byung // badz+ra kro d+hi shwa rI
126a4(1): rje khro mo dbyings phyug gnyis// rang bzhin 'og min ldan gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po nas// dzaHhUM baM hoHbrjod pa sngags kyi phyag rgya bzhi pats+tsha ba bzhi bsgom la lha'i phyag rgya mtshon pa dpo'i phyag rgya bzhi/ rgyal po spyan 'dren pa la bu bca' ba lus kyi
126a5(1): phyag rgya bzhi lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu/ spyan drangs shing // dur khrod chen po'i gnas mchog dang / phyi gnas kyi dur khrod brgyad dang / nang lus kyi dang / gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga'i dang / de kho na nyid rnam shes kyi dang / mtshon pa dpe'i
126a6(1): dang // 'bras bu don gyi dur khrod/ brgyad do// dug gsum gti mug can tshangs pa/ 'dod chags can lha chen po/ zhe sdang can khyab 'jug bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// lha chen po ru tra pho mo bskol ba'i gdan stengs su/ de ltar longs spyod
126b1(1): la// dgyes shing gshegs bzhud mi mdzad par ni// brtan par bzhugs su gsol// thabs kyi rgyal po yin pas sgra gsum nyid dpal he ru ka'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'o// dpal chen nyid kyi gnas// rgyal po'i// pho brang yin pa'i rtags dang
126b2(1): snod bcud za mal las khyad par du byas pa skar lha gzhan pas khyad par rgyan du che// sprul pa lcang lo mang po'i kha bad can// brgya rlon pa sbal sgra'i rtags te dbang po lnga dang ldan pas mngon shes lnga mtshon// dbang po rnam lnga snod bcud rgyan
126b3(1): bkram nas/ badz+ra snod chos kyi dbyings nas dbang po lnga btud ye shes lngar 'char bas na/ dngos po dang mtshan ma'i mtha' la// mi gnas pas na dpal chen yab yum yab thabs kyi ye shes chen po yum shes rab chos dbyings stong pa/ bzhugs pa'i rten du
126b4(1): 'bul// badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ rdo rje dpal khro bo/ badz+ra kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ rdo rje khro mo dbyings phyag/ sa ma ya ho/ dam chog pa dgyes/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dam tshig dus la bab/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ dam tshig la brtan par bzhugs// rdo rje rigs mchog chen
126b5(1): po ste/ thabs rgya che ba/ rdo rje shes rab zab pa dril bu'i rig pa 'dzin/ snying rje chen po/ thabs dang stong pa nyid shes rab gnyis su ldan/ thabs kyi don mdzad shes rab kyi don rtogs pa'i// rtags kyi phyag rgyar bzhugs su gsol// oM
126b6(1): bid+ya dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ rigs pa ye shes rdo rje/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ oM d+harma chos kyi dbyings kyi d+ha tu gan d+ha hUM/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan// bzhugs gnas so so'i mtshan nyid// phyogs
127a1(1): // mtshams rang byung grub pa'i lha/ ma mo sa so'i che ba// ma mo chen mo me 'bar ma/ ba spu'i thag nas me 'bar bas sA la bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i dbus// rdo rje thugs kyi khro mo brgyad/ ma mo'i grangs/ gnas kyi rang bzhin// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal
127a2(1): yas khang / gnas kyi che ba// dug gsum gti mug tshang ba/ 'dod chags ma hA de ba/ zhe sdang khyab 'jug/ bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ bzhugs gdan// mchog phran bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su/ bzhugs tshul// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su
127a3(1): gsol// ma mo chen mo me 'bar ma/ mtshan// ko'u ri re shar dkar po/ chen mo gshegs su gsol// ska ma dag/ mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can/ dpal chen pos dra tra btul ba'i// sngon tshe ye nas bsnyen pa'i lha// sngon
127a4(1): gyi thugs dam da lta rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ bdag dang gcig/ gnas gang du na// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas su// gdan gang / zhing chung bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su/ tshul ji ltar// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// tso'u ri
127a5(1): lhor chom rkun mo pra mo nub rmongs mo be ta lI/ byang ro langs ma/ puk+ka shar lho spos ma g+hasma lho nub sge sha can sme sha nub byang sle mo ni/ nub byang ma tshogs ma// tsan d+ha byang shar gtum mo tshul mchog de yis dgod/ ko'u ri ma dang
127a6(1): 'dra bar// skye med chos kyi dbyings nyid las/ gnas khang phyi'i mtshan nyid gnas khang nang gi mtshan nyid ro'i klong // dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang / gnas khang gsang ba'i mtshan nyid lum gyi b+ha ga/ zla kham dbang gi dkyil 'khor gsal//
127b1(1): bzhugs gdan gtso bo la// dbang phyug 'khor rnams la mchog bran gdan steng na/ rgyu'i dus na rnam shes tshogs dgu 'bras bu'i dus na ye shes dgur shar nas lam gyis dus na// yang dag don gyi lha dgu ru// rang bzhin 'od gsal ye shes dgu// sgrib pa dgu po
127b2(1): rang gsal phyir/ gti mug la sogs mun pa dgu ye shes dgur/ dngos po dang mtshan mar mi dmigs te/ gsal bya bsgrib pa dgu sel byed kyi lha dgu bsal ba'i don ye shes dgur bye yang / don la dbyer med du// dmigs
127b3(1): med gsal rtog med tshul gyis// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM dz+nyA na d+hi pa A lo ke dz+wa la tiSh+Tha lhan/ ye shes mar me gsal ba 'bar ba brtan par bzhugs// skye spyi'i gnas med chos kyi dbyings nyid na//
127b4(1): bye brag gi gnas// bde skyid dga' ldan lha yi yul/ khyad par gyi gnas// lcang lo can gyi pho brang du// rjes 'jug sgrub pa po gang yin gyi gnas// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang / gdug pa can bsgral ba'i gnas// ma trang bsgral ba'i
127b5(1): khog pa la/ dpal rgya ma thang gi gnas// zla kham dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// myur dbyings las chags 'char ba ni rnam mapa' la tsa la 'chang bas tha'o// ye shes dgu yi snang ba gsal// chos kyi dbyings gang du yang la gnasas kyi ye
127b6(1): shes kyis// snod 'byung ba lnga bcud 'gro drug 'jig rten nam mkha' kun la khyab pa ltar chos kyi dbyings kyis/ kun la khyab/ pa'o// khyab pa'i ye shes chen po yi// 'khor ba kun nyon dang ni byang chub rnam byang kun/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
128a1(1): nam mkha' lta bu la sprin// mi gnas pa yi tshul gyis ni/ mar me dgod pa'i gnas// thugs rjes dbus kyi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas
128a2(1): kyang / bsal bu'i sgrib pa/ gti mug 'thibs pa'i mun pa bsal du gsol// oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha hUM/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ ye shes kyi ngo bo ma 'gags par rang gsal bas// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// skye med byang
128a3(1): chub sems nyid ni/ ma skyes pa me long gi zhal sgra brjod bral ba 'dra// ma skyes pa me long gi gzugs brtan la rnam tog med pa 'dra/ rang rig byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas kyi sgra gsung thugs dbyer med pas na// sku gsung thugs su nges par
128a4(1): rtogs// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis ni// zhi bas rtogs pa khyad par can skye ba'i gnas// rtogs pa chen po dung gi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang //
128a5(1): bsal ba'i sgrib pa/ zhe sdang gi dmyal bar skye ba'i 'bar ba'i mun nag bsal du gsol// gnyis su med pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo kyis// snod ma dag pa 'byung ba lnga dag pa chos nyid/ bcud ma dag pa sems can dag pa sangs
128a6(1): rgyas// snod bcud kun gyi 'jig rten dang // 'khor ba ngan pa mi 'dor ba dang ni byang chub bzang ste mi len par kun/ 'khor 'das// thams cad dbyer med du mnyam pa nyid du rtogs/ dbye ba can du// mi dmigs pa yi tshul gyis
128b1(1): ni// tshe dang bsod nams dpal dang 'byor pa// rgyas pa chen po gser gyi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // bsal bya'i sgrib pa// nga rgyal 'bar ba'i
128b2(1): ltar skye ba'i mun nag mar me bltams pas mun pa sel ba ltar ye shes shar bas ma rig pa nga rgyal ye shes su shar ro// bsal du gsol// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo kyis// !rang dang !mi 'dra ba thun mong ma yin pa rang gi mtshan nyid la 'ang
128b3(1): ba spyi yi mtshan danyid rnams/ spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid// ma 'dres so sor gsal bar rtogs// ma 'dres pa// gnas pa chen po'i tshul gyis ni// snod bcud dbang du sdud pas// dbang sdud chen mo byu ru'i gzhal yas
128b4(1): su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // 'dod chags 'bar gyis mir skye ba'i mun nag bsal du gsol// bya ba nan tan mthar phyin par grub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo
128b5(1): kyis// bdag gi lus longs su dag sbrul med chos su/ don sku gsum lhun gyis grub// gzhan don gdul bya rnams 'khor ba nas drangs nas/ 'og min kyang 'das kyi gnas su sbyor/ bya ba grub par byed pa snyed yang dngos po dang mtshan ma// ci yang
128b6(1): ma yin tshul gyis ni// mthar phyin chen po g.yu yi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang / phrag dog 'bar ba'i bsal bya lha min du skye ba'i mun nag
129a1(1): bsal du gsol// spros pa med pa'i ngang du sbyor bas// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo kyis// snod bcud gnyis ka dag ma dag kun gyi 'jig rten dang / 'khor ba dang ni byang chub kun/ snod bcud la chos dang gang zag
129a2(1): gi bdag med pas// thams cad stong zhing bdag med de/ nam mkha' ltar/ stong pa nyid kyi tshul gyis ni// kun la phan pas/ byams pa chen po'i shar khro'i gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes
129a3(1): shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang / bsal bya// 'khor ba khams gsum rgyud drug tu 'khyams shing ljongs pa'i mun nag bsal du gsol/ bde ba chen po la snyom par 'jug pas na// 'da' dka' thugs kyi ye shes kyis/ sdug bsngal dang
129a4(1): bden pa dbyer med par// rtogs pa mnyam pa nyid du bzhag/ bde ba thugs thig le sku chags pa gsung // ting nge 'dzin gyi sku gsum rdzogs/ thugs ye shes las// mi 'da' ba yi tshul gyis ni/ kun la brtse bas// snying rje chen po lho nub
129a5(1): tu rin chen gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang / dgos pa/ ting 'dzin gsal du mi ster ba'i sgrib pa bying rgod rmongs pa'i mun pa bsal du gsol// 'khor
