129a6(1): ba thams cad ye shes chen por gsal bas// dbyings su sgrol ba'i ye shes kyis// 'khor ba'i khri mun rab rib las/ btson khri mun dong nas thar pa 'dra bar// sku gsung thugs su lhun gyis sgrol/ 'khor ba nas// pha rol phyin pa'i tshul
129b1(1): gyis ni/ sgrol bas na/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral na dga' bas// dga' ba chen po nub byang bse yi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang / lha spyod la mngon
129b2(1): par zhen par chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid// ma rtogs so sor 'dzin pa'i mun nag bsal du gsol/ bdag nyid chen por gsal bas// klong du gyur pa'i ye shes kyis// snod kyi 'jig rten lha'i gnas gzhal yas khang // bcud kyi
129b3(1): 'jig rten lha'i zla khrag 'thung tshogs/ glo bur du ma byas shing ye nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis ni// bzang ngan dbye bsal med pas// btang snyoms chen po byang shar rdo rje'i gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs
129b4(1): su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang / blta spyod bsgom bslab la phyin ci log tu bskabs na// phyin ci log gi mun pa bsal du gsol// oM ma hA dz+nyA na de ba hUM/ sngags 'di ye shes dgu po re re la brjod par bya'o// sa ma
129b5(1): ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan// de yang mchog mi las phye bas mchog phran dud 'gro las/ phye ba la bsgral bya'i zhing bcu yod de// dkon mchog slob dpon skra dgra dang / dam med dam las log pa dag/ 'dus par 'ong dang yongs la gnod// dam dgra
129b6(1): ngan pa'i ngang tshul can// ngan song gsum zhes pa'i// zhing bcu rA tra'i tshogs rnams bsgral byas nas// sha chen lang ling rkang gi dum bu dang / 'dod chags khrag gis sbags pa'i/ dur sa btab pa'i gnas nas sha khrag gi khrod yod pas na// zhing gi
130a1(1): @/ ras ros dur khrod rdzas chen rnams/ rang gzhan gyi don grub pas na// dpal gyi tha mal pa la gsang ba'i gtsa ba las 'khor gyis bskor bas na dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// srid pa gsum gyi skye ba'i srid pas gdug pa can
130a2(1): du skyes/ na ba'i srid pas nad gtong / 'chi ba'i srid pas tshe 'phrog go// gdug pa kun bsgral te// shes rab zab mo'i yum gyi mkha' dbyings su// mtha' dang dbus med dkyil 'khor rang bzhin te/ chos dbyings mtha' dbus dang bral
130a3(1): bas na dus gsum sangs rgyas 'khor bcas bzhugs pa kho na nyid dkyil 'khor te// phyi nang med par lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzas// chos nyid la phyi nang med pas de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas ye nas lhun grub bo// yid bzhin du 'byung ba'i nor bu rin chen la
130a4(1): dgos 'dod 'byung ba lta tha longs spyod 'dod dgu 'byung ba'i rgyu// ye shes chen po bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags// phrag dog ma spangs zhing gi g.yang gzhi 'di/ g.yang gzhi chos kyi dbyings las yan lag bzhi ye shes chen por bzhi'i rang
130a5(1): bzhin rtags so// dkyil 'khor chen po'i bla re dgram par bya'o// phrag dog che bas na mtshan nyid pa dang sngags pa yang mi mthun phrag dog ma spangs pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rtog/ de rtog pas spang bya blta ba ngan pa spang / blta ba ngan pa spangs pas chos nyid
130a6(1): kun la khyab pa'i bla ro'o// mchog phur bzhi dang lcags phur bzhi/ sgo bzhir mchog phur mtshams bzhir lcags phur sbom phur shar lhor dgod do// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir gzug pa dang // mtha' yang rtsang gi srin rtsang ni srin mo'i phyag rgya
130b1(1): yin te/ srin mos gom pa bsnol nas 'gro bas/ mo 'gros// ba su ta yi rgyu ma'i zhags pas bcing ngo bskor// dpal bshol zla kham rak+ta yis// thig le dgu pa he ru ka'i lha bshos ni dbang du bsdus pa'i las can te 'bul ba dang // rmad
130b2(1): du byung ba'i gtor ma dang / lho nub tu dgod pa// dmar gyis ar+g+haM chen po dang / ni thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bzhi dgod do// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang / byang shar du sman phud dgod// mchod pa rnam pa kun tu rgyu ba/ lnga po dang / tshe nyi
130b3(1): zla dang mnyam par grub pas na// zab mo mchog gi tshe zan dang / rigs kyi yab yum// mda' dang 'khor dar sna sgo ba rgyal mtshan rnams// dbang bskur ma thob pa dang dam tshig med pa la// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' ma bskor/
130b4(1): dung can ma'am pad+ma can nam/ ba glang can nam// ri dgas can lta bu'i// yum ni mtshan ldan dam tshig bkod/ bud med de nyid kyis bsgom shes na legs min na dpal chen po'i yum du bsgom gtso bo'i g.yon du bzhag ste// byin gyis brlab par byas
130b5(1): nas ni// mig gi rten du g.yon phyogs bzhag/ dgyes pa bskang ba gsang ba'i mchod pa/ gsang dbang bskur ba la dgos te// kro d+hi shwa rI nyid yin no// dpal gyi yum dang 'dra'o// mtshan ldan gyi// bu mo mkhas pas legs bkal
130b6(1): ba'i// thags bzang zags kyang bu mo mtshan ldan gyis btags pa/ phra ras gri la skyes pa dar ma grir bsad pa'i shun gos/ ni ro gos dur khrod rdzas so// brgyangs shing yang // dur khrod mgal pas sam ro'i shing gi mgal bas/ brgyangs nas
131a1(1): ni// tshon rtsi sprin med bzang po yis// thod pa lnga yi kong bu'i nang // dpa' bo 'bru lnga mthing ga'i thod pa'i nang du hUM dkar por mo ser por sna dmar por oM ljang gur b+ha/ ye shes kyis/ lha bzo rtsa ba dang yan lag gi/ dam
131a2(1): tshig dang ldan zhing phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob pa'i// lha bzo gzugs dang tshon gyi bya ba la mkhas pas bris pa'i sku/ he ru ka la ke'u ri brgyad kyis bskor ba'i// lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor bzang po ni/ dgos pa ni// sgrub pa po rnams
131a3(1): dgos pa yang // ting 'dzin gsal phyir mig rten dgram/ bas bskyed rim la brten pa ste/ gang zag blo dman rnams las phan gdags pa'i phyir// thang sku'i rgyab tu sku thugs chos sgra dri ma med par sgra longs su/ gsung sbrul sbar byin gyis brlabs pa'o//
131a4(1): gsum gyis// byin rlabs sngags kyang bri bar bya'o// oM ye d+harmA chos he tu r+m+ma pra b+ha wA/ he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ teSh+Thany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA di ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA// chos skur byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags
131a5(1): so// nam mkhas gar khyab par gzugs sku gnyis byung nas don mdzad pa ltar don mdzad pa'o// au sngags sor bzhag badz+ra[:]ku sha smr-i ti[:]dran pa u ta[:]sa/ saM mya ka/ yang dag par/ a ri ti/ i tra sa ya bod[:]a ga N+ya/ Ar+Ya[:]ba ti/ 'phags pa/ u
131a6(1): snan ru phye ni ku ru swA hA/ longs su sa bcu'i byang sems pa'i don mdzad pa ltar byang chub sems dpa'i don mdzad pa'o// longs skur byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra dz+nyA na pany+tsa kA ya/ rdo rje ye shes lnga'i sgra/ gu Na gar+b+ha bu mi tra sha kra
131b1(1): ni ka ru/ sarba dz+nyA na bA ka sa man+ta/ a mo g+hA ya swA hA/ don yod pa'i sku// sbrul skur byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags so// mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi don mdzad pa ltar sems can gyi don mdzad par bsam mo// sgrub pa po// rang gi lus nyid dur khrod kyi
131b2(1): gzhal yas khang / du shes par bya ste// lus nyid dkyil 'khor 'dom gang la/ rang lus mi mnyam pa med pas gru bzhi pa nyid dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi'o// don snying lnga snying nam mkha'/ glo ba rlung / mchin pa me/ mtsher pa sa/ mkhal ma chu/
131b3(1): dang nang rol drug/ nang rol rgyu ma/ long ka/ mabris pa/ pho ba/ spang ba bsam se'u rnams dur khrod kyi rdzas so/ rdzas kyis mdzes par gzhag pa la// mgo brgya dang yan lag brgyad phur pa'o// dkyil 'khor rgyan// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i
131b4(1): kong bu nyon mongs pa'i yi dam lta bur byams pas mar kha/ yum gyi skong bu'i nang // yid ni rang byung gi ye shes chen po me ru gsal// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka yi gal po las// dkyil 'khor du dam tshig sngar ma 'dres pa dang bsre
131b5(1): bsnan bya zhing rdzas dgod pa bstan pa ste/ brtag pa bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po byin rlabs/ dper na sgra ma mkhan gyis yod pa las med pa'am med pa las med par sprul pa'am/ rde'u dang / shing
131b6(1): bu'am rta dang glang por sprul pa ltar byin gyis brlab bo/ 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas 'di gsungs so// mi dmigs chos la blo/ chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid las blo 'byongs par byas nas brtags shing // ye shes can gyis
132a1(1): sbyin stobs kyis/ chos kyi dbyings las cir yang snang ba'i ye shes sgyu ma'i stobs kyis/ gnas dang sgrub pa po la sogs pa// thams cad tshul bzhin 'og nas 'byung ba byin gyis brlabs/ byin gyis brlab pa'i dgongs pa ni thams
132a2(1): cad// nus mthu can du de dag 'gyur// dbang sgyur chen po'i ting 'dzin ni// sgrub pa po// sngon du bla ma las dbang rnams thob pa dang // dam tshig yod pa snying rjer che ba ldan pa yis// gnas khang / ngan pa'i las dri ma rnams
132a3(1): dag byas la/ gnas// dur khrod kyi sar gzhal yas khang du ni byin gyis brlabs// chos dbyings mkha' dbyings yid bzhin 'bar ba'i 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i gnas/ chos dbyings dag pa'i gzhal yas khang ni/ rang skad cig las ltar bsgoms
132a4(1): la raM yaM khaM zhes pas gnas kyi dngos po sbyangs nas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' ltar dag par bsgom mo// mkha' dbyings dag pa ni/ de'i nang du ye shes kyi 'byung ba lnga yum lnga'i mkhar bsgom mo// yid bzhin 'bar ba ni ri rab kyi steng du b+h+rUM las ye shes las grub pa'i gzhal
132a5(1): yas khang bsgom mo// 'jigs byed 'bar ba ni/ phyi dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang dur khrod brgyad dang ldan par bsgom mo// che ba brjod pa// lha dang dam can gnas 'dir 'dus// rnal 'byor bag yang sa bsgrub byin rlobs// dbang sgyur
132a6(1): chen po 'grub gyur cig/ b+h+rUM ka ma la dz+nyA na b+h+rUM// phyag rgya chen po'i ting 'dzin ni/ gnas dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du skal ldan gtso 'khor kun 'dus nas hUM ha zhes brjod pas gartsa ba'i yi ge hA las dpal he ru kar bsgom/ g.yon du hA las
132b1(1): yum bskyed// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs/ ye shes lngas dbang bskur/ spyan drangs la bstim mo// gtso bo rang ni cho ga rdzogs nas 'khor byin gyis rlob pa ni/ 'khor rnams yi ge ha re re las mkha' 'gro ma brgyad du bskyed la sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs/ ye
132b2(1): shes lngar dbang bskur ro// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// skal ldan 'dus pa kun 'tshogs nas/ sgrub pa po rnams cho ga gsum gyis lhar bskyed pa/ ye shes lngas dbang bskur sgra gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab bo// gtso bo yab yum
132b3(1): skur bskyed de// byin rlabs cho ga kun rdzogs nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po ji bzhin bskyed// 'khor rnams mkha' 'gro brgyad du gsal/ ko'u ri brgyad rnams rang rang gi gnas su bskyed do// mkha' 'gro ma spyan drangs la bstim 'khor rnams ma
132b4(1): mo brgyad du 'dab nas bskyed pa ni/ ma mo re re la yang rang dang sprul pa mang po yod pa'o// gsang ba sgrub pa'i mched lcam rnams/ lha'i sgrar// phyag rgya chen por lus ngag yid gsum lha'i sgra gsung thugs su gsal lo/ rdzogs gyur cig/ hUM hUM haHha/
132b5(1): 'byung ba/ 'byung ba sa'i bcud kyi nus pa sde bas grang ba 'joms/ chu'i bzud kyi nus pa mang bas ngoms par byed/ mo'i bcud kyi nus pa rno bas bzhi bar sba/ rlung gi bcud kyi nus pa yang la myur bas spags par byed/ chang gis mi mthun pa mnga' bar byed sdug bsngal
132b6(1): can pad mo 'byin pas 'dza' gad do/ bcud len ting 'dzin ni// dang po chang byin gyis brlab bo/ bag chags sbrang byas te// gnyis pa dngos grub rdzas la dbab/ ni gcig sman phud du gzhag go// gsum pa rgyal ba sras bcas mchod//
133a1(1): ni gcig phud du gtor ba'o// bzhi pa dngos grub blang bar bya/ ba ni gcig sgrub pa po rang btud do// dang por rgyal ba rnams dza gad la spyan drangs pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams/ dag pa lnga'i skad
133a2(1): kyis spyan drang ba// e hi e hi tshur spyon tshur spyon zhes spyan drangs 'khor dang bcas// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa phyag rgya bzhis/ spyan 'dren ma lus gshegs su gsol// ka la ki la ha ha dga' ba'i bzhad mos dga' ba'i 'khor du bsdus
133a3(1): khong / bde ba'i gnas su chud// bde drongs bde mchog a ho su kha sham par// ti ta shi shi slob mar tshud cig bdag cag rnams 'phags pa'i slob mar dag par gyis/ gnang bar mdzod// ro la gtso bo'i zhal du rol du gsol cig dgongs
133a4(1): shig 'dod pa ti sta kha kha khA hi/ rab tu/ sbyin no bskul lo da ra da ra ha ra ha ra zo zhig 'khor rnams la sprin du gsol/ khA hi// ngo mtshar mchog tu bstab kyis kha kha khA hi/ gtso 'khor kun mnyes par mdzod// kye zla ba la sogs
133a5(1): dmar chen snying po lnga/ bdud rtsi// mAM[:]sa[:]la sogs sha lnga tshe 'phel dpa' bo'i bcud/ khrag lnga/ ma tsa me tsa rak+ta ru d+hi[:]ra/ kri yog ltar lam ring ba ma yin te/ tshe gcig lus gcig gis 'grub dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin dang phyag rgyas 'grub pas
133a6(1): na// nye ba'i bsgrub pa'i dngos grub dam pa ma lus rab sgrubs shig/ dri med gzi ldan mchog gi mchod pa dam par sbyar ba 'di// ye shes rgya mtsho rgyal bzhi khro'i tshogs rnams la 'bul lo rab sprul cig/ bzhes tshul lnga
133b1(1): ni/ gzung 'dzin gnyis ma chags par 'bul// ma chags par yang bsnam du gsol/ 'khor 'das gnyis su// ma lus par yang bzhes su gsol/ rab tu dgyes par mdzad pa/ a la la ho/ oM ma ma ki ri ke ri a ti ti sta swa maM/ dza gad
133b2(1): yum mA ma kis bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ snod b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang du bskyed/ bcud yi ge mAM las yum mA ma kI dkar mo phyag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs par bskyed/ 'od zer 'phros pas dngos por 'dzin pa'i rtog pa sbyangs te/ 'jig rten gyi bdud rtsi thams
133b3(1): cad bsdus nas dza gad nang du 'dus pas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsgom mo// de nas tshe gnyis su bcad la dang po la yang gnyis su bgo ste gcig sman phud bzhag gcig phud gtor za ma la yang gnyis su bgos te/ gcig sgrub pa po rang btung / gcig rdzas gzhan
133b4(1): rnams su gtigs re blug go// mi gtsang dag byed ting 'dzin ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las skyes pa// chu gtsang ma dang tsan+dan dkar dmar sbyar la de'i nang du zla dkyil gyi steng du yi ge hriHdmar po las khro mo dbang phyug ma dmar mo phyag na dri'i 'de gu
133b5(1): bsnams pa bskyed pa 'og gi sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad re bzlas pas dri chu nyid khro mo dbang phyug ma dang gnyis su med par bsam mo// chu de rdzas kun la bsang bar rgya'o// de yang sngon bskal pa kun bkod bya ba la khyim bdag rab gtsang gi bu khye'u gtsang ma zhes bya ba sangs rgyas
133b6(1): mas la gtsang mas mchod pa la dgyes nas/ bdag skye ba 'di 'phos nas/ lus tsan+dan dkar dmar gyi sdong por skye bar gyur cig/ sems byang chub sems dpa' sems mar gyur cing sangs rgyas rnams la dris mchod par gyur cig/ ces brjod pas skye ba de'i 'og
134a1(1): ral tu nus pa ban+dan dkar tham sdang bar skye bas/ ban+dan kyang la dri che ba'o// sha khrag bldan dmar par gyur pas pral bzhan cang mnyan pal// sems byang chub sems dpa' bldan dpal dang khram dbang thug mar gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' bldan dpal
134a2(1): gyi sngags phyi kri log la gal che/ khro mo dbang phyug ma'i sngags nang pa la gal che bar gyur pa'o// zhes ting 'dzin rig pa mchog gi rgyud las bshad do// khro mo dbang phyug zhi ba'i chus// bsangs na thams cad dag par 'gyur// A~M chos nyid ye nas
134a3(1): rnam par dag pa la// gtsang dang nyes bral lta ba yangs pa'i chu/ gzung 'dzin dag pas blta ba'i rtsa// mi gtsang zhen chags sbyong ba dran rig dag pa bsgom pa lha yi chu// dri med gtor bas yod med dag pa 'dag pa spyod pa'i
134a4(1): chu// bskal pa bsam rig dag pas bag chags 'khru ba 'bras bu'i chu/ rdzas dang rnal 'byor mtshan ma// gang la phog kyang dag cing gtsang bar 'gyur// oM ye shes lnga kro d+hi khro mo shwa rI dbyings phyug sarba thams cad dra byaM dag pa sho sbyong ba
134a5(1): d+ha ya/ oM AHhUM hriHtha// yid bzhin 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin ni// yo byad cha gsum bgo byas nas// mtshams gcad rol pa'i bros sbyangs shing / rdzas dang yo byad byin gyis brlab pa ni/ bsgrub rdzas kyi yo byad ban+ta la sogs pa dang //
134a6(1): 'tshe ba bzlog pa'i rdzas go mtshon rnams b+h+rUM dang tAM las mtshon cha lngar byin gyis brlab/ mchod rdzas lha dang lha mor byin gyis brlabs/ 'tsho ba'i rdzas dang yo byad la/ cha gsum du bgos la/ dang po sngon 'gro'i rdzas bya ste/ sbyin pa gtong ba/ mgon po mchod pa/ mtshams kyi gtor
134b1(1): ma bya'o// gnyis pa tshogs bya/ gsum pa phyir ston la bzhag go// tAM las yid bzhin rin chen 'bar/ tshogs rdzas rnams dkyil 'khor gyi steng du spangs la gu gul dud pas bdug/ mtshams bcad rol pa'i gros sbyong / tAM rat+na tre lo kya ces pas tI las yid bzhin nor
134b2(1): bu rin po cher bskyed do// rdzas la bkra shis dag pa'i rdzas skye ba bdun pa/ byin rlabs sprul pa'i rdzas zhing chen/ gdul bya zhing gi rdzas zhing bcu/ tshad med snying rje'i rdzas byol song rnams so// tshogs kyi longs spyod ma lus dang / pa tshogs kyi longs spyod du
134b3(1): 'bul// 'khor gyi rgyan ni thams cad kyang / dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan du 'bul// bam ril khog pa stod smad dang / zhing btsos dang ni lhag dum dang // rkang dang lha tsigs tsit+ta'i tog/ so so'i bye brag kun tu dgram/ mchod pa'i
134b4(1): rdzas su 'bul// gzhan yang dur khrod mchod pa dang / rmad byung gtor ma sha lnga dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa' bor bcas// rak+ta spyan gzigs rol mo'i sgra// so sor 'tshams pa nyid du bkod// sman phud mchod pa
134b5(1): gtor mar bcas/ dngos grub rten du 'bul// dngos grub rdzas su bcas par dgram/ lha yi dpag bsam shing chen dang / lha la dpag bsam shing la 'bras bu zas lo ma gos su snang ba// gnod sbyin la bum pa bzang po la dgos 'dod
134b6(1): 'byung ba/ dang // kla yi gtsug na yid bzhin nor bu la dgos 'dod 'byung ba ltar 'bul// traM rdzas dang yo byad rnams traM las rat+na trai lo kya phaT/ ces pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cher byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// sku gsung thugs ni so so'i phyag
135a1(1): mtshan no// kyi ting 'dzin no// zar byed gang dag bshad pa ni/ 'khor bar chags pa las bar bar byed pas raka'o// rags dkyil 'khor bri ba 'i mo gcig pa'i sa tshon no// ri mo gcig pa de bzhin te// yang dag thams cad
135a2(1): ri mo gcig/ 'dod chags nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes gsal bar byed pa'i rten yum mos te kro d+hi shwa rir bsgom pa'o// ba'i phyir// mig gi rten yang mngon par gzhag/ yum mi dmigs pa las yi ge kr-i las// kr-i gi yi ge las byung ba/
135a3(1): yum/ kro d+hi shwa re dpal 'bar ma/ ru bsgom// thang sku hUM las rab rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha dgur gsal/ gtso bo hAM dang 'khor ha las mkha' 'gro ma ste lha dgur gsal bar bsgoms la spyan drangs la bstims la bzhugs su
135a4(1): gsol/ zang sbra la dgos pa bzhi yod do// lha mchod cing dngos grub blang bar dam bca' ba'i phyir bzhag/ mtshan mo'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i phyir bzhag phan gnod byed pa'i lha dang 'byung po rtag pa'i phyir bzhag/ lha med na yengs sla bas spro ba bsang ba'i phyir gzhag go/ des
135a5(1): gzugs ces so// thod ska gsung dang thugs kyi mtshon// zang sku dang thod sku cho ga gsum las lhar bskyed dbang bskur byin brlabs pas// byin brlab rab gnas rdzogs pa'i phyir// gzhi'i lha dang spyan drangs pa gnyis gcig tu 'dres te
135a6(1): dbyer med bsgom/ dkyil 'khor du// brtan par bzhugs pa'i phyag rgyas bcings nas ni// brtan par bzhugs pa de la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa'i 'bral ba cho ga thams cad bya/ 'o// ban+d+ha bde gshegs sku yi sku/ mi zad pa rgyan gyi
135b1(1): 'khor lor byin gyis brlabs// yi ge dang ri mor bris pa 'bru bde gshegs kyi gsung gi gsung / mi zad rgyan 'khor du// mar me ni bde gshegs kyi thugs kyi thugs/ mi zad rgyan 'khor du'o// rtsa ba/ don gyi lha dgu tshang ba yang // don
135b2(1): gyi lha ni brgya rtsa brgyad// gting mtha' med pa'i skye 'gro rnams/ sbal pa khams gsum sems can kun yang dag gi ltar sems nyid ye nas gnas pas na// sangs rgyas sa la dgod du gsol// he ru ka kro d+hi shwa ri ha ha b+h+yo// dbyings
135b3(1): kong bu dang mar me ye shes ting 'dzin ni// kong bu chos dbyings yum gyi mkha'// mar me ye shes yab kyi 'od/ byin brlab ni bzhi ste/ sku gsum du byin gyis brlab pa dang / zabs shes rab byang chub sems su byin brlab pa/ sku gsung thugs su
135b4(1): byin brlab pa/ dkyil 'khor gsum byin gyis brlab pa'o// dang po ni/ mar ni chos sku/ snying po me dang bcas pa longs sku/ 'od sbrul sku'o// gnyis pa ni snying po thabs te/ snying rje 'am thugs rje'i mdzad spyod/ mar ni shes rab stong nyid du gnas pas/ kun rdzob la don dam gyi
135b5(1): rtsis zin pa'o// de gnyis las byung ba'i 'od byang chub kyi sems so// yang na kong bu shes rab yum gyi b+ha ga/ mar me thabs yab kyi rdo rje/ 'od de gnyis las byung bas byang sems bde chen du shar bas/ lhan skyes kyi ye shes bde stong gis kun la khyab pa'o// gsum pa ni/ kong bu
135b6(1): ni sku/ 'od gsung / mar thugs su bsgom/ bzhi pa ni/ mar ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor/ snying po dang 'od ni gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor/ de la rtog pa dang rlung du 'dres pas rnam rtog gi rlung gis mi bskyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ro// de'i dgos pa tshogs
136a1(1): gnyis rdzogs pa ste/ mar mer dgu/ dkon pa'i 'am dka' ba'i don nas sbyar ba ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs/ mar mes bsregs shing mun pa sel bas dngos por ma grub pa ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs so// sku gsum 'gro ba'i don yang
136a2(1): mdzad// chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas nas/ mar me dgod cing 'bral ba ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor los dbyings gzung 'dzin dang bral bar gnas so// ye shes chen po sku gsum gyis/ gzugs brtan gyi dkyil 'khor gdul bya la sgra gsum du
136a3(1): shar ba ni nam mkha' sprin dang char gyi tshul lo// 'khor ba'i ma rig mun bsal nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa sel ba ni 'khor ba nas 'don pa'o// 'bras bu yi ge/ 'khor lo tshogs chen sa la gsal/ 'dren par 'bral
136a4(1): zhing dkyil 'khor du bkod la byin gyis brlab bo// oM A lo ke dza la dI pa hUM hUM/ 'dod yon lha mo'i ting 'dzin ni/ bsgom pa/ gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// 'dod yon ni gzugs kyi lha mo dkar mo me long thogs pa sgra ljang gu dril ba
136a5(1): 'khrol ba dri ser mo dri chab/ ro dmar mo zhal zas/ reg mthing ga na bza'/ chos mthing ga chos 'byung mthing ga gru gsum bsnams pa'o// 'bral ba// bla med theg pa 'og ma las mchog gi mchod pa dam par sbyar ba 'di// nyon mongs du sel yid
136a6(1): bzhin bdud rtsi'i mchog/ chos nyid dag pas rigs lnga'i dam tshig lnga// ye shes me long / mnyam nyid/ kun rtog/ grub pa/ chos dbyings mi gnas pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes so// lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// 'dod pa'i yon tan
136b1(1): gzugs/ sgra/ dri/ ro/ reg bya/ chos/ lnga yis rab brgyan pa/ sngon gsang sngags bsgrubs pa'i rnal 'byor bsnams 'khor nas myang 'das su sgrol bar thugs dam du bzhes pa// thugs dam bzhin du ci bder bzhes su gsol// oM rU pa gzugs shap+ta
136b2(1): sgra hUM dr-i ha ra traM reg hri chos ka ya oM/ shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'bar/ sa mo sgeg mo me long bskams pa dkar mo/ yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba 'bar/ phreng ba mthong ba 'dren pa ser mo// dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog gzi ldan
136b3(1): 'bar/ grA ma pi wang bsnams pa dmar mo// gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo/ gar mkhan ma gar byed pa ljang gu/ hUM sgeg mo tAM phreng hrIHgrA a gar sa ma ya spyir dam tshig gi sngags so// hUM// kun tu tshims byed pro
136b4(1): bsung thim/ bdug spos ma spos khang thogs pa dkar// blta mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro/ me tog ma me tog gi gnong pa thogs pa ser mo// 'od gsal 'chor bas kun tu gsal// mar me ma mar me bsnams pa dmar mo// bdud rtsi bsil dro
136b5(1): 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ dri chab ma dri chab thogs pa sdang // d+hA spos pu me tog hrIHmar me gan dri chab sa ma ya spyi'i dam cheg hUM ho// rig pa'i rlabs las byung ba yi// lha mo tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di/ spyir ni bzhi ste/ byi nang gsang ba/ de kho na cing
136b6(1): chod pa'o// dang po spos/ mar me/ dri chab mo/ nang gi 'od zhing bcu bsgral ba dang gzungs ma dgu la sbyor ba'o// de kho na nyid la gsum ste/ nan tan gyi dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dang / kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'o// dang po ni tha dag gi lus 'bul ba'o// ting 'dzin gyis ni rang
137a1(1): sems rtogs pa'i don las rig pa byang chub sems kyi rlabs las byung ba'o// 'dir yang de nyid 'bral ba'o// gsum pa ni mchod par ma gyur pa gang yang med par 'bral ba'o// gar dang dbyangs su bcas nas kyang // gzungs dang
137a2(1): dbyings su 'bul lags kyis// sbyor chen tshul du bzhes su gsol// gzhan yang thabs tshul mtha' yas pa'i/ 'dod yon nam mkha' mdzod du 'bral ba ni/ chos thams cad mtshan mar snang ba dang / chos nyid mtshan ma med par gnyis yang /
137a3(1): mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa gnyis su dbyer med de mi dmigs pa chos kyi dbyings yin la/ de ltar blo rang rig pa'i shes rab kyis ma nor bar rtogs shing / rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs/ so sor rtog pa'i rtogs dang bsgom pa las byung ba'i
137a4(1): bsgom pa'i stobs kyis ni 'khor ba'i yo byad dang rdzas rnams tshul bzhin byin gyis brlabs la 'bul lo// gang 'bral na// mchod sprin bla med phyogs bcur 'bul/ ji ltar 'bral na// nam mkha' mdzod kyi gter la sogs/ gang 'bral na// bla med
137a5(1): mchod sprin rab 'byams rnams/ stobs gang du ldan pas 'bul na// dad pas dmigs te 'bul lags kyi/ bzhes tshul ji ltar bzhes na// sngon gyi thugs dam rjes dgongs te// dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhes su gsol// oM pU
137a6(1): dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na/ snang ba gzugs kyi sngags yi ge brjod pa sgra'i sngags rlung / 'byung ba gnas kyi sngags lha'i sku'o// sa ma ya hUM/ shes rab/ stong pa thabs snying rje'i bdag nyid ni/ yab kyi sku gsung thugs bstan/ sku'i che ba gsung gi che ba thugs kyi
137b1(1): che ba las sgra rdo rje yab dril bu yum du bsgom pa'o// mi rtog pa// zhi gnas ma 'gags pa lhag mthong dbyer med zung du 'brel/ thugs kyi ched// bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yi// dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen/
137b2(1): don dam kun rdzob mkhyen pa'i thugs/ gsung gi che ba// gsung snyan yi ges brjod pa sgra'i gsung kun la khyab pa yi// spros med gsung du 'jig rten skye med don gyi gsung dbang phyug bzhugs// yum gang dang bzhugs na// mi gsung lha mo
137b3(1): dam bcas 'dul mdzad pa// sku khu ba 'phrul bde ba tshul lnga ldan pa bde stong nyams su mnga' ba'i tshul ma yin pa 'ga' ma mchis// gang du bde chen don lhan cig skyes pa'i de stong rang bzhin rjes chags pa'i/ lum/ na chung dag
137b4(1): dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad de// g.yas kyi phyag gis dang po thabs kyi rdo rje gsor nas kyang // g.yon pa yis ni dang po shes rab dril bu'i sgra snyan sgrogs// lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor gyur pa yis// phyi nang lha mo brgyad kyang
137b5(1): btsun mor gyur pa ste/ rigs gang la mchod pa'i sa mo phram du bya'o// dam tshig rnams kyi bya ba byas par 'gyur// gcig gi lag pas g.yas kyi bar mas sum la 'thud pa'o// kun la 'khyud pa ste/ gnyis pa g.yon gyi bar mas thod pa bdud rtsi'i bde
137b6(1): bas bkang // rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu// gsum pa mi zad g.yas kyi tha ma na me tog phreng bas brgyan pa'i gzhu 'dzin/ me tog phreng ba 'thor// bzhi pa bde ba yis ni g.yon gyi tha ma na rang rig rtog pa'i mda' yang 'phen// gang zhig glu 'di
138a1(1): len par byed pa ni// bde ba rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur// thabs snying rje chen thal// rdo rje gsor ba snying rje chen po yis// dril bu gsil ba ni shes rab stong pa nyid// do// gar gyi mi rtag pazhi gnas
138a2(1): marmongs pa/ lhag mthong mi 'gog pazung du 'brel// bde chen rol pa che la dgongs su gsol// badz+ra d+hA tu ho// sgrol gnas ting 'dzin chen po ni// dpa' bo 'bru lnga rlung lnga'i rta la zhon// a nr-i su tri pre du drug rnams
138a3(1): bsregs// gnas sbyong ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu rnams byin gyis brlab// byin brlab la gsum te/ thang pa 'das par byin gyis brlab pa na/ srog 'dzin pa'i mi ga zu mthing gnam par shes pa'i ta la zhan// sa dang 'dres pa'i rlung gis te ma zhan pas
138a4(1): gzugs kyi phung ba/ ma ga me dkar po/ chu dang 'grogs pa'i rlung gi ta la zhon pa tshar ba'i thang po ga mar ba/ me dang drod ma nyams pa'i rlung gi ta la zhon pa 'du shes phung po sa dmar ba/ rlung gi rta la nan pa 'du byed grang ba ha sdang gum// rigs drug 'khor bar byin gyis brlab
138a5(1): pa ni/ lha'i yi ge a dkar po/ me'i rje sngon po/ lha min gyi sra ser po/ dmyal ba'i tri nag po/ yi dwags kyi bre dmar po/ byol song gi du dud ka rnams so// gnas skyong 'khor 'das dbyer med du byin gyis brlab pa ni// dang por 'khor ba'i gnas sbyangs te/ lha ri rab kyi phyir dang
138a6(1): nga nas yi ge a la bstims// lha min ri rab khong gseng nas su la/ mi gling bzhi nas nr-i la/ byol song phyi'i rgya mtsho nas tri la/ yi dwags grong khyer ser skya nas pre la/ dmyal ba rdo rje gdan gyi 'og nas du la/ rigs drug 'od du zhu nas/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga las rigs lngar gyur
138b1(1): par bsam/ phung po rigs lnga la mchod par bya'o// sdug bsngal lha la ltung ba/ lha min 'thab rtsod/ mi la 'gyur ba/ dud 'gro la mdze thog phol lta bu/ yi dwags la bkres skom/ dmyal ba tsha grang ngo // mang pos gzir ba'i 'gro ba la// snying rje'i shugs kyis sdug bsngal
138b2(1): bzlog pa'i phyir// nyon mongs kun gsal rgyu drug lam bkag nas/ rigs drug sa bon glan bcad pas na// byang chub sangs rgyas sa la bgrod phyir 'phags lam rnam thar bstan// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga dang zhal zas lnga// sku lnga
138b3(1): chos lnga dbyer med rang bzhin mnyam// de phyir dam rdzas dag pas lha dag pa nyid mchod de// chos nyid la yang gnas lugs chos nyid la rtogs tshul chos nyid thim par mchod/ dkyil 'khor la yang mchod rdzas lha mo'i dkyil
138b4(1): 'khor thim par mchod// bdag rnal 'byor pa gsung gi dam tshig la sogs mi 'da' bar bsrung dgos pas na mchod pa lo zlar mi 'da' bar bya'o// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa dam pa 'dis// rgyal ba rigs lnga/ sras sems dpa' sems ma bcas
138b5(1): rigs kyi rang rang gi yum rnams dang // phyag brnyan gtum chen rngam pa'i tshogs la sogs/ phyogs bcun dam la gnas pa'i/ rnal 'byor grub pa'i tshogs dang rig 'dzin dang / gyi sa la gnas pa rnams// rnal 'byor rnam
138b6(1): lnga'i rigs lnga'i skur bsgom pa tshogs la mchod par 'bul// oM g+ha na tsakra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ sbyor ba gnas kyi ting 'dzin ni// gling bzhi phyi yi sbyor ba dang / phyi'i sbyor ba yab yum yan lag bzhi brgyud pa ste//
139a1(1): sab kyig pa ba'i/ yum gyig ma zan byin brlab nan bya'i sbyar bas// sgo bzhin nang gi sbyor ba dang / yab kyi thang zhal 'ag zhal gnyis las steng zhal du spang ba mtha' las bsgom/ 'gazhal rnga rngar byin brlab/ yum gyi snang zhalags dkar mar
139a2(1): bsgom mo/ 'og zhal pad+mar byin gyis brlab/ de ni nang gi sbyor ba'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni gsang ba las/ spyi bo bde chen rlung gis thig le 'bebs/ mgrin pa longs spyod nas me 'bar/ snying ga chos nas chu dang 'grogs/ lte ba sbal pa nas sa'i snod du 'dzin cing
139a3(1): glo ba'o// de ni gsang ba'i sbyor ba'o// bde ba bzhi ni de kho na/ bde ba tsam dang / mchog tu bde ba tsam dang / rnam rtog bral ba'i bde btsam dang / bde ba dang stong pa dbyer med pa'o// do ni de kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba'o// ma lus thams cad bde stong gcig
139a4(1): 'khor 'das ma lus pa bde ba chen po gcig tu gnas par byed pa yum yin pas reg pas kyang de ltar du rtog par bya/ ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang da ltar du bsgom zhing byin gyis brlab par bya ba yin no// shin tu 'gyings pa'i dpa' bo sgeg pa dang / yab rnams la
139a5(1): dmigs nas che ba brjod pa'o// bkra shis mtshan ldan mi mos brgyan pa gnyis// g.yon du dmigs rten yum bzhag pa la dmigs nas che ba brjod pa'o// dpa' bo dgyes pa'i sbyor mchod bde ba yang / yab kyi dbang po yid bzhin nor bu rin po che
139a6(1): lta bu dang lam gyi dbang po pad+ma lta bu la dmigs pa'o// skal ldan rnams la 'bul lo rab sbrul gcig/ sgrub pa po yab yum rnams la dmigs pa'o// shes rab dbyings ma yum gyi gzhal yas su/ yum gyi mkha' la gzhal yas khang b+h+rUM las bskyed la/
139b1(1): der sa bon las// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mchog bkod de// thabs bde ba dang shes rab stong pa ldan pa'i bde stong dbyer med par sbyor mchod kyis/ 'khor ba las ring du song ba'i// 'phags pa thams cad la bde bas mnyes
139b2(1): pa'i mchod pa 'bul// mnyam nyid dbyings su rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis/ chos slar bsgom// bde mchog longs skur bsgom longs spyod rdzogs pa sku yi rgyan// 'dod dgu'i yon tan mdzes pas rab brgyan pa/ sbrul spar
139b3(1): bsgom// rnal 'byor ye shes rgyan rnal 'byor pa'i nyams su len par bsgom du bzhes su gsol// oM a nu rta ra pU dza me g+ha s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM hUM phaT/ ka/ swA hA/ / bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i ting 'dzin ni// bdag nyid
139b4(1): bdud rtsi 'khyil pa che// lag g.yon phyag rgya rta mgrin nyid// gzhal yas snod nang bdud rtsi lnga// bar du byin gyis brlab pa ni/ rang bdud rtsi yab sum du bsgoms la/ lag pa g.yon ta mgrin yab sum du bsgom/ bdud rtsi'i snod 'khor
139b5(1): rtsibs bzhi gru chad la sgo gtod pa'i brgya'i gzhal yas khang du bsgom/ rang bzhin dngos gzhi lnga la/ dri chen la oM/ byang sems la hUM/ mAM sa la sA/ rak+ta la aHdri chu la hA bsgom/ de nas bdag gi spyi bor oM/ mgrin par yaHsnying gar hUM/ de gsal ba dang / oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsas
139b6(1): mr-i ta hUM hrIHzhes brjod pas/ bdag yab yum sbyor ba byas pas/ thugs ka'i hUM/ mgrin pa'i aHla thim/ AHspyi bo'i oM la thim// 'od du zhu nas skal tshigs kyi rta brgyud nas rdo rje'i lam du phyung / yum gyi mkha' la babs/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer phreng thag gsang ba'i lam
140a1(1): // nas brgyad rta mgrin yab sum la phog/ chags pa'i yid g.yos/ ma chags thabs kyi sbyor ba byas brgya'i dngos gzhi la phog/ don gnyis byas nas yi ger gyur// de ltar sbyong ba dgod/ gnyis pas phyag mtshan du gyur/ gsum pas sgrar gyur// bzhi pas 'od du
140a2(1): zhu nas bdag la thim/ bdag rta mgrin la thim/ rta mgrin rigs lnga la bim/ rigs lnga gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba byas nas 'od du ku nas byang chub kyi sems su tig star gnas pa'o// bdud rtsi 'bru gsum gyis byin gyis brlab pa ni/ bdud rtsi lnga'i steng du dpa' bo 'bru
140a3(1): bsgom/ de'i khar rdo rje rgya gram bsams te/ lte ba la hrIHlas rta mgrin ra bzhi la gsang ba'i yum bzhi de'i steng du bdag gi gu h+ya lag gi phyag rgya bcings la/ de rta mgrin sprin mtshams su bdag gi rdo rje gtad de oM aHhUM badz+ra a mr-i ta hUM hrITha zhes brjod pas/ bdag gi byang chub
140a4(1): kyi sems skal tshigs kyi rta brgyad rdo rje'i lam nas byung / phreng ba byang chub kyi lam nas byung ste/ rta mgrin gyi sprin mtshams su phog pas/ skal tshig brgyad yum gyi mkha' la babs nas/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga la thims pas/ de las kyang 'od 'phros pas 'phags pa mchod/ 'gro don
140a5(1): byas slar 'dus pas dngos gzhi lnga 'od du zhu nas/ yig 'bru dang gnyis su med par gyur pas/ oM dkar la dngas pa/ AHdmar la 'tsher ba/ hUM mthing la 'dril ba gsum du gsal ba las yum bzhi nas brgyud nas bdag la thim/ bdag byin bskyed/ de las 'phros te don
140a6(1): gnyis byas/ ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bdag la thims pas/ bdag gi sgrib pa sbyangs/ yang sgal tshigs kyi rta brgyud nas rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas phreng ba nub kyi lam nas byung ste/ rta mgrin la thim/ de yang 'od du yum bzhi dang bcas pa zhu/ yi ge 'bru gsum yang 'od du zhu nas byang
140b1(1): sems mu tig dkar po ltar bsam mo// sbyangs thog gsum pa gsung thugs sku// gnod sbyin phag/ de nas a mr-i ta kuN+Da li'i sngags kyis bdud rtsi sor mo lngas gtor bas khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin lag na phag rgod kyi mche ba thogs pa grangs med pa spros pas
140b2(1): dam sri dmar po la sogs par gcod thams cad thal bar brlag par bsam/ tshur 'dus te 'og phyogs mtshams thams cad khro bos gang bar bsam mo/ rgod ma che ba can// dam sri bar du gcod pa bsreg/ chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa ltar/
140b3(1): d+harma a mr-i ta'i sngags brjod pas rdzas dang mched la gtor bas chos thams cad stong zhing bdag med pa/ chos thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du bsgom mo// dpa' bo 'bru lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'o// gtor byas thams cad dag par 'gyur// oM AHhUM sarba
140b4(1): pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrIHTha/ bdud rtsi sbyor bar bya ba'i sngags dgu pa'i 'dzab la rgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so// nye reg gi sngags so// nye ba ni gzugs brtan gyi dkyil 'khor du bdud rtsi'i snod bzhag pa dang nye la/ reg pa ni rta'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas rdo rje bzung nas rdo rje'i rtse mo
140b5(1): thaMd ma rag la 'thar ban rda rdza mar ma tham pashegs ma gtar la/ 'brang ba na rang byed dang sa grub blang shing 'thung bar bya ba yin na// o a mr-i ta kuN+Da li badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ rdza ba rda rdza gnad byed gyis bdud tsul marnams gcad pa'i rdza
140b6(1): lan bdun bzlas// oM d+harma a mr-i ta bi shud+d+he kuN+Da li d+harma d+hA tu hUM a/ bdud rtsi 'thor ba'i sngags so// bdud rtsi gsang ba'i sngags lan bdun bzlas rang nyid btung ba'i sngags so// khe// sman phud spyir bsdu ba bsdu bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ dang po sman
141a1(1): mod med dri bar skal ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rgyal bzhi khro'i 'khor tshogs mchod pa'i phyir// sman pa'i rdzas lnga sman chen lngar sbyar ba// rgyal ba rgya mtsho mched la mi
141a2(1): mnga' 'am// thugs dam dgongs la rmad grags bskang ba'i phyir// gnyis su rtog pas 'grub par mi 'gyur te// dag pa nyid kyi dag pa nyid mchod na// sgrib pa gnyis byang sku gsum lhun grub 'gyur// dpa'
141a3(1): mchog rdo rje sems dpar zhal 'ches la// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol ba rnams// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rnal 'byor mchog gi grub pa'i rtags kyis gsol// a la la
141a4(1): hoto// de nas sgo sgor bsdu bla mas brjod nas dri ba'o// ba gsungs// sman du sbyor ba gang byed pa// 'chi med bdud rtsi ra swa yan// bre gang phul tsam mi mnga' yang // bag tsam rdul tsam a ti ho// rdo rje slob dpon sman
141a5(1): 'bul ba/ bla ma che ba dang ldan pa la byin gyis rlob par zhu// snyigs ma'i skyon spangs 'khor ba'i mun bral bas// dug lnga sman du bsgyur bas ra sA yan// rnal 'byor yongs kyi thugs dam bskang slad du// gtso mchog rnams
141a6(1): la 'bul lo byin gyis rlobs/ mchod rdzas su bla ma la 'bul ba'o// bde gshegs rigs lnga'i bdud rtsi byang chub sems// 'khor ba'i dug sel zhi khro mchod pa'i mchog/ sems rgyud dag pas mnyam nyid dbyings su
141b1(1): bsdus// bla ma dam pas bzhes mchod dngos grub gsol// oM AHhUM badz+ra a mr-i ta hUM hrIH/ gai wa/ bdud rtsi'i 'jab dgu pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// thugs rje chags pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ snod la b+h+rUM bar+d+ha ka pA la zhes brjod pas badz+ra'i
141b2(1): gzhal yas khang stong gsum tsam du gyur par bsam mo// rak+ta la yi ge ra dmar po gcig bsams la de la sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ oM AHhUM mU la rak+ta hUM hrIH/ zhes brjod pas/ thugs ka'i hUM las 'od zer dmar po 'phros pas yi ge ra la phog pas ra 'od du zhu
141b3(1): nas dngam pa'i log tshogs spangs nas bdud rtsi'i dkar gyur pa'o// snod bsgom pa/ brgya stong gsum 'khor yug na/ bcud bsgom pa// 'bras bu lnga bsgral rak+ta 'khyil/ gzar ba// hUM las gzar bu rdo rje 'bar// zhing bcu bsgral ba rak+ta'i
141b4(1): rgya mtshor 'khyil// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzar bus lan gsum phyar/ gzar bu hUM las rdo rjer gyur pas dkrugs pas rba rlabs phyogs bcur 'phyo ba/ de las 'dod yon gyi lha mo sprin 'phro bar bsam/ dang pos stong gsum rak+tar gyur/ gnyis pas snod du 'dus//
141b5(1): gagasum pas lha la mchod pa'o// dpa' bo phrin las bzhi mi 'grub pa med pas na yab rnams/ dpa' mo yum rnams g.yog/ 'khor bcas pa la// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub gsol phyir 'bul// b+h+rUM ban+d+ha ka pA la rak+Sha b+h+yAM/ oM AHhUM
141b6(1): mU la rak+ta hU~M hriHTha// rmad byung gsang ba'i ting 'dzin ni/ lta ba'i gtor ma la gnyis las/ gnas lugs kyi lta ba ni/ chos nyid gzung 'dzin dang bral ba des/ 'khor 'das la ma khyab pa med pas na/ chos nyid don gyi gtor ma'o// bsgom lugs kyi gtor
142a1(1): ma ni/ ra la khaM gas dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bag chags sbyangs nas chos rnams stong pa nyid du bsgom pa ste/ bsgom pa chos nyid kyi gtor ma'o// rtogs pa lta ba'i gtor ma ni// chos rnams stong pa nyid du gnas// mtshan ma
142a2(1): rdzas kyis gtor ma ni/ la gsum las khyad par dpal gyi gtor ma ni 'dzin gtor te/ bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga las sbyar ba'i gtor ma yin te/ lo'am zla bar mi gtong ba'am zhag grangs su mi gtong bar ltar bsgom pa ste/ thugs su nyal ba de gtong yang nam mkha' la
142a3(1): gtong ste shing bca' ba'o// khyad par dpal gyi gtor ma phugs na nyal// sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma 'ben du bca'/ ni rgyan sha khrag la byas nas dgra bgegs kyi ling ga btsugs nas de la thun gyis brabs nas bsgral ba'i sha khrag 'bul
142a4(1): lo// thugs rjes sprul pa'i gtor ma yongs la khyab/ nang nub gtor chung rgyun tu gtong ba de mkha' 'gro ma lus pa dang 'gro drug la bsngo bar bya'o// rig pa byin rlabs kyi gtor ma rnam pa gsum/ ni phyi ltar 'dod yon du byin gyis brlab/ nang ltar
142a5(1): lha dang / gsang ba ltar byang sems su'o// dang po ni/ gtor gzhong ltar snang ba ni/ b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang du bskyed/ gtor ma ni ha drug gam/ oM drug las 'dod yon gyi lha mo drug tu bskyed pa ste/ gzugs kyi lha mo dkar mo me long thogs pa/ sgra'i ljang gu dril bu 'khrol ba/
142a6(1): dri'i ser mo dri mchog bsnams pa/ ro'i dmar mo zhal zas/ reg bya'i mthing ga na bza'/ chos kyi lha mo mthing ga phyag na chos 'byung gru gsum bsnams pa'o// ba ling ta'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// phyi ltar byin gyis brlab pa ni rin chen khang pa gtor ma'i
142b1(1): snod/ de'i nang du/ bcud ni ha'am yang na au las yongs gyur pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan drug gi lha mor sprul// oM ba li ta/ te dzo ba li ni/ ba la ba ti g+hu h+ya sa ma ya swA ha/ snod ni b+h+yAM las ban+d+ha'i gzhal yas
142b2(1): khang // gtor ma hUM ha yig 'bru phyag mtshan sku// sku ni yang dag don gyi lha dgur gsal// hUM ha// b+h+rUM las gtor gzhong ban+d+ha ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang du/ hUM ha las zhal zas dang dam rdzas su snang ba dpal khrag 'thung gi lha tshogs za byed kyi
142b3(1): dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i zhal hom khung du byin gyis brlabs pa der/ mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma dang sna tshogs kyi gtor ma rnams 'dod yon lngar chos nyid zab mo'i rol pa mnyam nyid du shar te/ mchod pa'i sprin dang bcas pa des mchod par byin gyis brlab bo// gsang ba nyi
142b4(1): ma zla ba'i ga'u nang / snod ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ grwa nyi ga'u kha sbyar thabs shes rab nang du/ bcud oM dkar la dngas pa/ a.a dmar la 'chor ba/ hUM mthing la 'dril ba las sgra gsung thugs kyi gud tshems par byed pa'i byang
142b5(1): chub sems kyi bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab bo// byang chub sems su sha lnga bdud rtsir zhu/ lus khams las byung ba'i bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga yang bdud rtsi nyid du zhu'o// thabs dang shes rab tshogs su lhun gyis grub// oM AHoM/ gtor ma 'bral
142b6(1): zhing dgod pa ni yul gang la 'bul na// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// gnas dang zhing dang dur khrod tshan d+hor gnas// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ rdzas gang 'bul na// 'bras bu lnga bsgral
143a1(1): sha khrag rus pa'i tshogs// rmad byung dam rdzas mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ dgos pa ci'i phyir 'bral na// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i dngos grub gsol// sngags sor bzhag/ oM AHhUM/ su ra ho/ u ma to ho/ ka
143a2(1): ma la ma le/ badz+ra a mr-i ta/ ha ra ma pra ti dza/ b+ha ga bAn/ dzaHhUM baM hoHa la la ho// tAM rat+na tshad med snying rje'i gtor ma ni tAM las rin po cher bsgom pa'o// trai lo kya phaT/ phyag rgya bstan pa ni/ lag pa sor mo bsnol la mtheb mdzub mig tu
143a3(1): srin lag der bcug la mig 'bras bu bya/ gung mo dang mthe'u chung rtse sprad la kha bya'o// thod pa rlon pa'i phyag rgya yis// gnas khang byin gyis brlab par bya// rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya yis/ gung mo gnyis rtse sprad la bsgreng / 'dzub mo gnyis de'i
143a4(1): rgyab tu gtang / mtho'i gnyis sbyar la gung mo la gtad/ mthe'u chung gnyis sbyar la gung mo la gtad/ phrin lag gnyis bsnol lo// 'dus pa pho mo byin gyis brlab// phrin las rnam bzhi'i phyag rgya ste// g.yas kyi mdzub mo g.yon gyi mdzub mo bkug pa la
143a5(1): gtad/ g.yon gyi mthe 'o g.yas kyi mdzub mo'i rtsa bar gtad/ gung mo gnyis rtse sprad/ srin lag mthe'u chung bsnol// rdzas dang sa gzhi byin gyis brlab/ bum pa thal mo stug por sbyar mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsgreng / mthe'u chung gnyis zur du btung // bdud rtsi
143a6(1): bum pa'i phyag rgya yis// dza gad byin gyis brlab par bya// nor bu rin chen phyag rgya yis/ mtheb mdzub so sor mig tu bya gung mo gnyis rtse sprad srin lag mthe'u chung so sor sbyar lag pa phyir bstan no// yo byad byin gyis brlab par bya// ka
143b1(1): pAl dang ka pA la ltar lag pa g.yas g.yon lag khong snyim par bya/ rta gdong rgyas/ g.yas g.yon gung mo srin lag mdzub mo sprad/ mthe bong mthe'u chung bsgreng // bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya// ral gri g.yas mthe bos mthe'u chung mnan la gzhan
143b2(1): gagasum bsgreng ngo // thod pas g.yon snyim pa thod par b+ha rak+ta brlab// dpal bshos thod pas gung mo rtse sprad la lag pa'i nang du bsgreng gzhan snyim pazod pa'o// lag pa rgyab sbyar ro// gtor ma la// kong bu sdong bu lag pa snyim par mthe bong sdong bu ltar
143b3(1): bya'o// mar me nyid// ral gris gros bzhin sgrol la dza hUM sbyor/ sbyor ba la mdzub mo sngags kyus sor mo bsnol ba'o// thun mong phyag rgya rnam pa lnga/ spos la mtheb mdzub mig tu byas la dud pa 'bral ba ltar/ me tog snyim pa 'thor ba ltar/ mar me snyim pa'i
143b4(1): nang du mthe bong bsgreng dri chab bdug pa ltar te snyim par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka yi gal po las/ thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ brtag pa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos
143b5(1): chos nyid zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// mdor bstan// zhi rtags rgyan gyis mdzes byas la/ brda/ sgo dbye brda phyag dang bslab par dam bcas te// gnas lugs rang bzhin gyi zhi khro phung po rang rgud pa'i zhi
143b6(1): gdul bya dang / sprul pa'i zhi khro'o// mthar phyin 'bras bu'i zhi khro yin no/ 'grub par 'gyur byed gces// dbang phyug rig 'dzin mar ldan nas// bgo ba sna tshogs bshad pa ni// tshe yi dam pa grub pa ste/ mi 'khrug na tshe zung la
144a1(1): gos dron tshe ring ba ltar dag pa ye shes ston no// gos tshul khrims kyi gos dang / ye shes kyi dang / sbyin pa'i dang / brtson 'grus kyi dang / shes rab gos dang lngas brgyan no// lnga dag tu bshad pa yin// bdag 'dzin gzhan rtogs bdag gzhan
144a2(1): du 'dzin pa med pas na btang snyoms pa'i// rang bzhin rnam par dag par rtogs/ las nyon// sgrib gnyis kyi nyes skyon rnam par dag pas na dag pas bral ba'o// na/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pas na// ye shes nyes pa thams cad dag pas na zhi ba'i
144a3(1): gos ni dkar po bstan/ sgrub pa po rang rig don gyis// rnal 'byor ma la rig pa dbang phyug/ chos rnams la dbang bskur bas na thug pa'o// na bzar gsol/ ye shes kyi blos// chags bya yul 'dod yon chags byed gang zag spangs nas
144a4(1): ni// thugs rjes sems can thams cad la chags nas 'gro don byed pas/ yul lus khams dang skye gnas dbang du byed par chags pa ste// dbang du gyur yang ma chags te/ sgo gsum sdom pa'i// tshul khrims gos ni 'gro ba dbang du byed pa'i
144a5(1): rtags su dmar por bstan/ dper na rgyal ba shAkya thub pa la dar le'u brgan gyi na bza' gsol ba lta bu'o// rnal 'byor dbang phyug na bzar gsol/ lus dang phung po la/ bdag tu mi 'dzin pa ni byams pa yi// yon tan rgyas pa yid
144a6(1): bzhin nor bu rin po che'i gter chen spro/ sems can ma lus// kun gyi lus ngag yid gsum gyi dgos 'dod skong ba'i phyir/ yongs su gtong ba// sbyin pa'i gos ni rgyas par byed pas yon tan gyis ser por bstan/ de ltar du// rnal 'byor
144b1(1): dbang phyug gi na bzar gsol/ rang gzhan// gnyis med du mkhyen pas bya ba grub pa'i sprul pa mang po spros nas las kyi sprul pa yi/ 'gro ba rnams la// ji ltar 'dul ba ltar ston zhing don mdzad pa// 'gro kun kyang 'das kyi bde la 'god
144b2(1): pa'i phyir/ don du gnyer bas// brtson 'grus gos ni ljang gur bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug na bzar gsol/ bal nag chos kyis mi 'gyur ba ltar// chos nyid ngang las bcos su med pa yi/ mi 'gyur bar mtshon par/ kha dog
144b3(1): mthing gcir yang chos nyid 'gyur ba med/ chos nyid de// mi 'gyur mi shigs rang bzhin pas/ don rtogs pas// shes rab ste chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i gos ni mthing gar bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug na bzar gsol// sku
144b4(1): gsung thugs yon las rnams 'grub// rnam par brjed pas swa/ sna brjod 'byung bas gsung / dran rtog mthen pas grags/ 'dod pa 'byung bas yon tan/ don mdzad pas phrin las so// dbu rgyan ni chos rnam par 'byed pa byang chub kyi yan lag go//
144b5(1): dang ni phyag gdub dang / ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub la chags pa 'gre// dpung rgyan dran pa snyan cha gan tu sbyangs pa do shal dang / ting nge 'dzin// ma mad btang snyoms dang me tog rgyan/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub// byang chub yan lag
144b6(1): bdun du bshad/ sap+ta bo d+hi ga zhes pa/ sap+ta ni bdun/ bo d+hi ni byang chub/ aM ga ni yan lag te/ byang chub kyi yan lag 'di bdun ni mthong ba'i lam la de kho na nyid byang chub pa'i rgyur gyur pas na/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya/ rnam pa gcig tu/ bi b+ha Sha las 'byung
145a1(1): ba ming du bgrangs pa'i grangs kyi rim pa bzhin bshad pa tsam du zad de/ byang chub gsum du 'grub pa'i nye ba'i sgra 'di bdun yin pas bsgoms pa'i lam la byang chub yan lag ces bshad do// dam chos rnam 'byed dbu rgyan rin chen spras/ dang
145a2(1): rgyan gyi chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mtshon pa ste// theg pa so so'i chos rnams ma 'dres par phye nas ston/ pa dang // de yi rtags su rig lnga'i dbu rgyan 'di/ gsol bas rigs ma 'dres par ston to// rnal 'byor dbang
145a3(1): phyug dbu yi rgyan du gsol// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mtshon pa'i mdzes pa'i me tog phreng / don 'gro ba// thams cad ma lus mnyes shing dga' bar byed// de yi rtags su me tog phreng ba 'di/ pa brgyan
145a4(1): pa'o// rnal 'byor dbang phyug me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang ldan par bya'o// chen po'i sku yi rgyan du gsol// snyan cha lus sems bsil byed shin tu sbyangs/ ba byang chub kyi yan lag ste// nyon mongs 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tsha bas gdungs pa
145a5(1): na gyis brdungs pa lta bu'o// gdung sel// de yi rtags su snyan cha ni nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel bar byed pas na sel byed do/ bsil byed 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug snyan gyi rgyan du gsol// do shal ni ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan
145a6(1): lag ste/ dbus mchog phreng ba brgyus// ting 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag sna tshogs 'phro bar mdzad// de rtags su rin po che'i mgur chu rin chen phreng ba 'di/ mu tig gi phreng ba rkang pa'i long bur sleb pa'o// rnal 'byor dbang phyug phreng
145b1(1): paba'i rgyan du gsol// rin chen mchog spras dbu brgyan dra ba 'di// dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag/ 'khor 'das kyi// chos rnams ma lus ma bsnyel sa le mkhyen// de yi rtags su rin chen sna tshogs dpung rgyan
145b2(1): 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dpung pa'i rgyan du gsol// bdag 'dzin sprul pa sna tshogs se mo do/ ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub yan lag go// bdag gi don nang du rtogs nas gzhan gyi don phyir mdzad pa// de yi
145b3(1): rtags su mu tig se mo do// rnal 'a 'byor dbang phyug rang rig don gyi rnal ma la blo rig pa'i ye shes 'byor/ chos rnams ma lus pa la dbang bskur/ zad pa med pas na byug go// chen po'i rgyan du gsol// phyag gdub sna tshogs las mdzad
145b4(1): brtson 'grus ldan// yang dag byang chub yan lag/ dgos pa'i phrin las rnam bzhis rang gzhan gyi don rnams myur bar 'grub par mdzad// de yi rtags su gser gyi gdu bu 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag gi rgyan du
145b5(1): gsol// sku yi rgyan stod g.yogs gsung mchog smad dkris dang // thugs kyi rgyan ze'u ldir yon tan gyi rgyan chos gos dang / phrin las kyi rgyan/ mdzad pa las kyi phu rung na bza' rnams/ bdag nyid chen po che bas
145b6(1): bsgyings par brjid/ pas nga rgyal chen po bdun dang ldan pa lta bur bzhugs so// tshul khrims rnam dag gos kyis brjid pa'i sku/ mos pa chung ba// nyan thos rang rgyal/ dmigs pa phra bas don mdzad de gnyis la stod g.yogs phrag byas pa yod
146a1(1): pa'o// rtags su ni// sku mchog che ba'i brjid tshul gcan gzhan gyi rgyal ba yang ga'i ston la ral pas brjid pa lta bar chos gos 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug stod g.yogs su stod la dar dang ser gyis phrag brus su gsol ba
146a2(1): ltar rgyab gong du bsnams pa'o// rgyan du gsol// 'khor ba'i sems can ma stongs bar du ni// thugs rjes 'gro ba kun la chags pa'i rtags// gsung mchog thugs rjes chags pa'i smad dkris 'di/ dar pa te stug po'i tshi gu
146a3(1): can gyi sham thabs 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sham thabs rgyan du gsol// thugs kyis 'khor 'das ma lus pa// cir yang sal le mkhyen pa'i thugs kyis su// shes bya kun la ma rmongs/ ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don dam la ma
146a4(1): rmongs shes bya ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi kun rdzob la ma rmongs pa'o// rtags su ni// thugs mchog shes rab ldan pa dar gyi cod pa na 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chos gos tshul khrims kyi chos gos gsol bas yang dam tshig gi tshul khrims
146a5(1): dang ldan no// rgyan du gsol// che ba'i yon tan 'gro rnams kun la snang // dpa' zhing gzi brjid che bas bsgyings rtags su// yon tan che ba'i/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan stobs bcu mi 'jigs pa bzhi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
146a6(1): dres pa bco brgyad la sogs pa'i/ gzi mdangs na bza' 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sku yi rkun du 'bul// gsang sngags skrod pa'i 'dod chags can la sbyor ba'i spyod pa/ zhe sdang can la sgrol ba'i dang / nga rgyal can la blta ngan gyis mi
146b1(1): tshugs par ting nge 'dzin sran tshugs pa dang / gti mug can la rmi lam bsgom/ phrag dog can la lta ngan mi shong ba dang / dug lnga lam du spyod pa'o// don mchog zab mo 'di// snod du ma gyur pa la gsang ba'i rtags// mdzad pa'i phrin las gar gyi
146b2(1): gsang gos 'di/ tshad med bzhis nyan rang don mdzad pa dang / bsdu dngos bzhis byang chub sems dpas/ don mdzad pa dang / phrin sngags las bzhis don mdzad pa'i rtags so// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sku yi rgyan du gsol// gsang ba'i brda bsres pa la
146b3(1): gnyis te/ mched lcam la bos pa dang // e ma ho/ ni ngoms shing mtshar ba'o// dur khrod ni ro bzhi bsgral ba yan chad do// gsang ba snod ngan pa'o chen po yi/ ni theg pa gzhan las khyad byas pa'o// rmad byung zhing khams dga' tshar 'dir/ sngon gyi
146b4(1): las// skal ba dang ldan pa dang 'phral rkyen gyi skal ldan no// dbang phyug rgyal ba'i sras// 'dus pa tshogs pa'i rgyal po'i sras rgyal rigs su dbyung ba ltar/ rig 'dzin rnams// e ma ho// bde dga' bde mchog bde chen
146b5(1): grogs// dam tshig srog gi lu gu rgyud// sngags la gu rmad ni gzong gis bral yang mi brel ba ltar gsang sngags kyi dam chog srog la babs kyang mi 'bral lo// sprul pa'i gshog drug gra rgyas pas// chos nyid mkha' la lding bar rigs/
146b6(1): bya rgod gshog drug rgyas pas nam 'phangs gcod pa ltar rnal 'byor pa blta ba/ dam tshig spyod pa ting nge 'dzin dbang phrin las dang drug rgyas nas chos nyid kyi don rtogs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi mkha' la blta bas lding zhing 'gro bar byed pa'o// de ring phan chad rgyal ba'i
147a1(1): sras// dbang phyug yin pas ci bder spyod// lus kyi brda lus dang yan lag gi bya ba// ngag gi brda ngag gi bya ba dang sems kyi brda nang du rigs par bya ba'o// bya ba thams cad brdas bya/ sba ba bcad do// zan la tshe/ chang la smra byed/ tsha la kun
147a2(1): tu rgyug/ tshod ma la bran mo// mar la 'jam des zhes bya'o// rnal 'byor gsang ba ba'i brda sgo phye// bya ba'i las rnams thams cad kun// brda yis smra zhing brda bya'o// gsang mchog lhun grub dkyil 'khor la/ tshad med bzhi
147a3(1): yis sgo phye gcig/ rgyal ba// rigs lnga'i ma rig pa'i gnyid sangs mkhyen pa rgyas bdud bzhi bcom yon tan drug dang ldan mtha' las 'das/ spu phyir la bstan pa'i dus na/ zhi zhing thugs nang du bltas phra la dgongs pa brtag dka' ste// dbang
147a4(1): phyug chen po mchog gi lha/ tshogs gnyis ma bsags bzhin du// rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rig 'dzin 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ thugs sems nyid/ yang dag pa'i don yin la bsgrub par dam bcas nas/ sangs rgyas
147a5(1): zhe gnyis bsgom pa'i// ting nge 'dzin la bdag cag rnams gnas 'gyur ba/ ye shes lha'i sgra// phyag rgya chen por bdag gsal bar gyur cig/ bde gshegs sems kyi snying po la/ sems bskyed pa las/ sems can la dmigs pa ni/ sems
147a6(1): can rnams ye nas bde gshegs kyi snying po can yin yang / bdag tu rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i sems can du snang ba ste/ snang ba de las bzlog nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la dgod pa'i phyis// sgrub pa pos sems can thams cad sangs rgyas yin par shes pa kho na byang chub
147b1(1): mchog tu sems bskyed pa yin no// de la rgyu mtshan nyid lugs kyis ni kun rdzob dang don dam byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa gnyis las/ kun rdzob smon pa byang chub mchog tu dang / 'jug pa sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bsrung la/ don dam spros bral du
147b2(1): 'dod/ 'dir ni kun rdzob byang sems ni sems can rnams rang sems sangs rgyas yin par ma rtogs par 'khor bar 'khyams pa yin la/ don dam byang sems ni/ yang dag bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos/ khams gsum sems can rnams kyi de kho na nyid dang /
147b3(1): dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kyi de kho na nyid la gnyis su med cing tha dad dang dbyer med par rtogs par bsgom par bya'o// ma rtogs 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// sangs rgyas sa la dgod pa'i phyir// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed
147b4(1): do// sangs rgyas 'di tshe bsgrub bya'i phyir// sku gsum sa la goms par bya/ sangs rgyas bslab pa la/ theg pa 'og ma rnams kyis sran ring por bslabs nas/ phyis sangs rgyas su bslab pa lta bu ma yin te/ gsang sngags pa rnal 'byor chen po'i theg pa/
147b5(1): mthong ba'i chos tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la goms par bya zhing / chos sku kun tu 'od kyi sa la sbyang ba dang / kun tu snang gi sa la goms par bya zhing longs sku pad+ma can la goms par bya ba dang / klu'i lam goms par bya zhing sbrul spu 'khor
147b6(1): lo tshogs chen gyi sa la sbyangs te/ skye ba phyi ma'i rgyu dang las la mi ltos par// tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba'o// de ni dmigs pa'i yul te/ lta ba la dmigs pa'i yul la sems bskyed par bya ba yin no// zhes brjod cing sems bskyed par bya'o// bskal pa bye
148a1(1): bar mi 'grub pa/ nyan thos la sogs theg pa 'og ma pas/ grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags nas 'bras bu sgra gnyis 'thob par 'dod pa ni/ chu bsod nams kyi tshogs las 'bras bu ni gzugs sgra thob/ 'bras bu ye shes tshogs las chos sgra 'thob
148a2(1): par 'dod pa'o// 'dir ni lha dgu bsgom pa bsod nams kyi tshogs/ de la rang bzhin med pa ye shes kyi tshogs te/ sgra gsum dbyer med du bsgom pa'o// tshe gcig 'grub pas khyad par 'phags// dang por chos kyi dbyings nyid la// dmigs pa
148a3(1): med pa'i don gyis bsgom/ dang po de bzhin bsgom pa la bzhi ste/ dgos pa/ nges tshig/ thabs/ 'bras bu'o// dang po ni rtogs pa sbyong ba dang / 'bras bu 'thob pa'i dgos pa'o// rtog pa sbyong ba ni/ sems can thams cad ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas/ rtag tu rtog pa'i
148a4(1): dbang gis 'khor ba yin la/ de'i gnyen po de bzhin nyid bsgom pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa'i dgos pa ni gsang sngags 'bras bu'i chos yin pas/ 'bras bu sku gsum yin te/ de bzhin nyid chos sku'i ngang las gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'byung ba'i phyir dang po bsgom/ ci'i phyir na/
148a5(1): nges tshig ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la blo gzhag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// ji ltar sgom pa'i thabs ni/ chos thams cad ni rang gi sems su 'dus las/ sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba/ ji lta bu'i dngos po yang dag ma yin pas/
148a6(1): sems kyis btags pa'i chos rnams kyang dngos po med de/ rang bzhin gyi stong zhing dag pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang las ma g.yos par bya'o// de'i ngang du ma hA su kha hUM zhes brjod de/ rang gi sems nyid yi ge a dkar po gcig tu gsal bar bsgom/ a de las 'od zer 'phros
148b1(1): te/ dngos por snang ba thams cad bsregs nas/ slar 'dus pas/ je chung je phra la mjug sgra tsam du bsam mo// sgra yang mthar stong ste/ cir yang mi bsam/ cir yang mi dmigs pa'i ngang du bsgom mo// 'bras bu ni/ de ltar bsgoms pas sgra chos sgra/ ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi
148b2(1): ye shes thob pa'o// bsgrub med yum gyi b+ha ga la// brjod med sems kyi ngang du gsal// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// thams cad du yang khyab par bya// btsal med ma bsgrubs ji bzhin las// kun snang nam
148b3(1): mkha'i mtshan nyid 'byung // med pa'i rgyu las kun snang bsgom pa la yang de bzhin bzhi las/ dang po ni de bzhin nyid ro la mi chags par bya ba dang / sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung sla ba dang / gzhal yas khang dang lha dgod par bde ba'o// nges tshig ni/ ci'i phyir na//
148b4(1): chos thams cad skye 'gag med pa'i ngang du yang bsgoms la/ de ltar ma rtogs pa rnams la khyab pa'i snying rje yang bsgom/ mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa gnyis bsgoms pas kun tu snang zhes bya'o// thabs ni rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad skye 'gag med pa las//
148b5(1): mas can rnams kyis de ltar ma rtogs pa la/ snying rje chen po bskyed pa bsgom mo// tsit+ta s+pha ra Na phaT ces brjod de/ chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes shing / dngos po med pa yin na sems can thams cad kyis de ltar ma rtogs par/ dngos po la mngon par zhen pa 'di
148b6(1): mas snying rje snyam du snying rje bskyed pa'i rtags su/ 'od dkar po tshon gang ba gcig gsal bar bsgom/ de la tsit+ta s+pha ra Na phaT kyi sgra byung bas/ thams cad 'od kyis khyab ste/ dngos por sbyangs nas/ 'od kyi thig le la 'dus nas shin tu gsal bar bsgom mo// 'bras bu ni
149a1(1): longs sgra dang me longs pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyiye shes zab bo/ mngon gsal ba// sems kyi rang bzhin ye shes gsal// dam pa'i rang bzhin a las ni/ chu'i ting nge la yang de ltar bzhi las/ dang po ni gang zag la bdag
149a2(1): med rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro// nges tshig ni/ gzugs sgra rnams gnyis thob par bya ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o// ye shes ni so sor rtog pa dang bya ba drug pa'i ye shes thob pa'o// thabs ni gong gi 'od kyis gong bu de yi ge a gcig tu gyur par bsgom mo/ badz+ra tset+ta a zhes pas a de la
149a3(1): 'phros 'dus pas dz+nyA na sa twa hUM zhes pas ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po tshon gang ba/ rgyan dang cha lugs spangs pa gcig bsgom mo// 'bras bu ni sku ni sbrul sku// ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar shar/ tshad med bsgoms las khyad par
149a4(1): 'phags// sku gsum rang la gnas pa na/ theg pa'i khyad ni/ theg pa 'og ma pa ni/ tshad med bzhi bsgoms nas sems can gyi don byed de/ 'dir de las khyad 'phags te/ chos sgra las longs spu byung nas sa bcu'i don mdzad longs sgra las sbrul spu byung nas sems
149a5(1): can gyi don mdzad pa ltar/ de bzhi mchog sba/ kun snang longs lha tshwa'i ting sbrul sngar bsgoms nas sems can gyi don mdzad do// de yang kun gzhi chos sgra/ yid longs su/ sgo lnga sbrul sbar rang la gnas pa'o// kun gzhi'i rnam shes stong nyid chos spu dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi
149a6(1): kun tu snang 'od du gsal ba dang / yid rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin du gsal ba dang / sgo lnga las ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar bsgoms pas/ sku gsum ye nas rang la gnas pa'i don rtogs pa yin no// rang la gnas shing gzhan nas btsal du med par shes pas/ tshe gcig lus
149b1(1): gcig la 'bras bu thob par byed pa'o// thugs rje rang byung rang shar sku// kun gzhi nyon mongs yid dang sgo// e las nam mkha' mtha' dbus med// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// baM las chu yi rba klong
149b2(1): khyil// suM las gser gyi sa gzhi chags// yaM las rin chen ri rab steng // raM las ye shes me 'od 'bar/ 'byung ba dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa/ bdag ye shes sems dpa' de/ ye shes kyi rlung gis btegs nas/ bar snang la
149b3(1): gsal ba las/ e yaM baM suM laM raM/ zhes brjod pas/ thugs ka nas yi ge de rnams shar te/ dngul gyi dong rtse brtsegs ma bzhin/ rim pas gnas pa las/ yig 'bru rnams shin tu gsal bar bsgom mo// e a ka sha maN+Da la zhes pa e mthing ga 'od du zhu nas/ nam mkha' chos kyi
149b4(1): 'byung gnas gru gsum pa/ yum kun tu bzang mo'i rang bzhin/ kha dog sngon por bsgom/ yaM karma rak+Sha haM zhes pas/ yaM dud kha las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba kham pa rgya gram pa dam tshig sgrol ma'i rang bzhin/ kha dog dud kha gcig tu bsgom/ baM mA ma ki ti maN+Da la zhes pas/
149b5(1): las bdud rtsi chu'i rgya mtsho zlum po/ lum mA ma kI'i rang bzhin kha dog dkar por bsgom/ su su me glu zhes pas/ suM las gser gyi sa gzhi gru bzhi pa yum sangs rgyas spyan gyi rang bzhin kha dog ser por bsgom/ le tiSh+Tha maN+Da la zhes pas yaM las rin po che'i ri rab kha dog lnga
149b6(1): dang ldan pa/ ga'u ga rting sprad pa 'dra ba'am/ sho btab pa lta bur bsgom/ raM dza la maN+Dal zhes pas/ raM las ye shes kyi me 'od rnam pa lnga 'ja' tshon 'khyil ba/ 'byung ba lnga'i drod snyoms pa/ yum gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin du bsam mo// 'bru lnga'i phra don yum lnga'i rang
150a1(1): bzhin yi ge 'bru lnga las rtags 'byung ba lnga shin tu gsal bar bsgom mo/ bkod yum lnga'i rgyu// mkha' dbyings rnam dag yum lnga'i b+ha ga dkyil 'khor ni// ma bcos lhun grub yum gyi mkha'/ rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas
150a2(1): pa// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i bzhugs gnas/ ke/ rten// ngi/ rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'i rtsa// byi dang nang med kun tu nang // rigs pa'i gdan dang ye shes rgyan// gzhal las khang bsgom pa ni/ b+h+rUM zhes brjod pas thugs ka nas b+h+rUM
150a3(1): @le'u brgan gcig me dpung steng du phog pa las/ s+pha ra Na phaT ces brjod pas ye shes kyi b+hA grangs med phyogs bcur 'phros te/ bde bar gshegs pa mchod/ sems can gyi don byas nas/ saM ha ra Na hUM zhes pas dang po'i b+h+rUM la 'dus te/ 'od du 'bar ba las/ b+h+rUM bi sha bi hu
150a4(1): badz+ra dz+nyA na maN+Da la buM zhes brjod pas rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i zhal yas khang / 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi gru chad glo 'brar dang lha skam dang / sgo bzhi sgo khrud dang bcas pa/ rta babs dang bem skas brgyad dang ldan pa/ chu sna lnga las grub pa/ 'og rgyan// sgo rgyan/ logs rgyan/
150a5(1): mo'i rgyan/ phyi rol gyi rgyan/ bdag po'i rgyan/ ngo bo nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan par bsgom mo// phyi nang med par gsal ba mtha'// dbus med par khyad par bsgom mo// khe// rkang mdo lto ba snying ga skal// rlung me chu sa ri rab can// ge/ 'byung ba lus la chang ste/
150a6(1): rkang mthil rlung / sum mdo me/ lto ba chu/ snying ga sa/ skal tshigs ri rab tu gnas pa'o// de yang rkang mthil rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'og gzhi dang / sum mdo gru gsum me'i dkyil 'khor dang / lto ba zlum po chu'i dkyil 'khor dang / snying ga gru bzhi sa'i dkyil 'khor dang / skal
150b1(1): tshitshogs ri rab kyi dkyil 'khor te/ de ltar na rang gi lus dbyibs 'byung ba rim brtsegs su gnas pa'o// zhes tshogs bcad bsdebs pa'o// kai/ lus khe/ snying gi rkang / de/ migatsi sna che/ so/ je/ lce// kai/ dbyibs khe/ sgo/ gai/ rkang pan
150b2(1): ngi phag/ tsi/ dra ra/ che/ gnas// lus la tshang ste/ lus kyi dkyil 'khor mi mnyam pa med pa gru bzhi/ snying ga'i rtsa bzhi sgo bzhi/ rkang brgyad ka ba brgyad/ mig pany+tsa re kha/ sna rin chen phag gu/ so dra ba dra phyed/ lce dang mchu 'dod yon/ rna ba rta babs so// de yang lus
150b3(1): dbyibs zhes bya ste/ lus 'dom gang gru bzhir gnas pa mi mnyam pa med pas gru bzhi dang / snying sgo ni chos nyid dang yon tan dang / las dang / rang chud dang rtsa bzhi sgo bzhi'o// rkang ka ba naM/ yan lag gi rkang brgyad la dkyil 'khor gyi ka ba brgyad dang / mig pa na ni/ bsku
150b4(1): kha'i brtsigs pa/ sna phag ni rin chen pha gu/ so dra ni dra ba dra byed/ lce mchu 'dod yon snam bu gnas zhes pa rna ba rta babs su gnas pas ni rang lus gzhal yas khang du gnas so// tshigs bcad gong 'og bsdeb bo// ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // seng ge
150b5(1): glang rta rma bya khyung // nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gtso dang 'khor bcas rim par gsal/ gdan bsgom pa ni/ 6/ 6/ a/ ma/ na/ zhes brjod pas mig 'bru de lnga 'khor ba'i rtsibs dang se ba la spos te gsal ba las/ de rnam pa 'od du zhu nas/ dbus su
150b6(1): las seng ge brgyad du gyur par bsam/ haM las shar du glang chen/ aM las lhor rta/ maM las nub tu rma bya/ naM las byang du shang shang rnams brgyad brgyad du gyur te/ steng na rin po che'i khri rkang bzhi yis sems can gnyis gnyis mjug ma dbus su bstan par bsam/ ma sUr+ya maN+Da la
151a1(1): zhes pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ a tsaN+Da maN+Da la bzhes pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ baM pad+ma maN+Da la zhes pas pad+ma'i gdan te/ gtso bo la rany+dza'i khri rkang dang nyi zla pad+ma ste lnga brtseg go// sems dpa' sems ma nyi zla pad+ma sum brtseg go// kun bzang yab yum la nyi
151a2(1): zla pad+ma raSh+Ta'i khri rkang ste bzhi brtseg go// thub drug la pad rkyang re bsgom mo// mngon par byang ni chub pa dang / la mi 'jigs pa// zag pa zad par mkhyen pa dang / la mi 'jigs pa// bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams bstan/ pa la mi 'jigs
151a3(1): pa// nges par 'byung ba'i lam bstan no// pa la mi 'jigs pa'o// don rtags ni bzhi las/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni/ tsan ri ta thA ga ta be sha ra bya zhes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi yin te/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa
151a4(1): phal pa mang po'i nang du byon nas khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyi 'che ste/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor zhing yang dag par seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pas na mi 'jigs pa zhes bya/ de la mngon par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / zag pa zad par mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa
151a5(1): nyis ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyud la mnga' ba'i yon tan yin pas na/ rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa yin/ bar du gcod pa'i chos ngas par bstan pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam bstan pa las mi 'jigs pa gnyis ni/ gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa yin pas gzhan
151a6(1): na te/ rang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bstan pa yin no// sarba d+harmA b+hi saM bo d+hi be sha ra hUM/ zhes bya ba/ chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad phyag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu bzhag pa ltar zugs
151b1(1): su chud de/ mngon par byang chub pa la shes rab brnyes pas/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze'ang rung / lha'i mig dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ lha 'am bdud kyang rung / rdzu 'phrul dang mthu che ba'i tshangs pas kyang chos dang mthun par mngon par rdzogs
151b2(1): par sangs rgyas pa ma yin par brgal ba'i gzhi dang gtan tshigs med de/ brgal gyis dogs pa med pas na/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ste/ mi 'jigs pa 'og ma gsum yang tshig gi mjug 'di 'dra bar bshad do// sarba pra ba k+Sha
151b3(1): ya dz+nyA na be shwa ra dr-i zhes bya ste/ zag pa thams cad zad par mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ zag pa ni nyon mongs pa'i ming ste/ 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang ma bral na srid pa'i rtse mo man chad kyang slar 'dzag cing ltung bas na zag pa'o// nyon mongs thams cad
151b4(1): spangs te zad par mkhyen pa la/ zag pa ma zad par sun phyung zhing don rtags kyis brgal du med de/ mi dogs pas na zag pa thams cad zad par mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa zhes bya'o// an ta ra yi ka d+harmA na n+ya thA tA ni sh+tsi ta bA ka ra Na be shwa ra d+ye zhes pa/ bar du gcod pa'i chos
151b5(1): rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ bar du gcod pa'i chos ni/ bag med pa dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa/ khrel med pa la sogs pa/ 'phags pa'i lam dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar du gcod pa rnams/ bar chad kyi chos yin no zhes lung bstan
151b6(1): bshad pa la thog tu ma bab pa med pas na/ bar du gcod pa'i chos rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa zhes bya/ sarba paM pa da d+hi ga mA ya ne r+ya Ni ka pra ti sat+ta thA tA be sha ra d+h+waM/ zhes bya ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba nges
152a1(1): par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas can thos rnams la/ nges par 'byung ba'i lam/ lung 'das kyi bde ba sran sram tshogs pa thob par 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal mthar phyin par bshad pa la/ nges par 'byung
152a2(1): ba'i lam ma yin no zhes dge sbyong dang bram ze sras kyang brgal zhing gzhan du bskur du med pas na/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba/ nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa zhes bya'o// de phyir na rdo rje sems dpa' la mi 'jigs pa seng
152a3(1): go'i khri bzhugs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/ da sha ta thA ga ta ba laM zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sgrib pa med pas shes bya'i dngos po gang la yang thogs pa med de/ mkhyen pa 'di bcu'i mthu nyan thos la sogs pa gzhan las khyad par 'phags
152a4(1): pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang gi gdan glang po stobs bcu mnga' ba'o// e rA ba Na zhes bya ba/ i ra ni sa/ a ba ti ni srung ba de'i bu yin pas na glang po che sa krung gi pra zhes bya'o// stobs glang po che'i khri dang sbyar
152a5(1): ro// gnas dang gnas min mkhyen pa'i stobs/ s+thA nA s+thA na dz+nyA na pa lan zhes pa gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ gnas ni legs par spyad pas 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba 'grub pa dang / nyes par spyad pas 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong ba smin par
152a6(1): 'gyur ba la sogs pa la bya/ gnas ma yin pa ni legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba dang / nyes par spyad pa'i 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba 'grub pa la sogs pa la bya ste/ srid pa dang mi srid pa la ma nor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir gnas dang gnas
152b1(1): ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/ karma bi ba ka dz+nyA na ba la na zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'das ma 'ongs de ltar gyi las yang dag par blangs pa rnams
152b2(1): kyi rnam par smin pa las kyi rgyu gang gis gnas gang du 'bras bu smin pa mkhyen pas na/ lam gyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs/ nA nA bi muk+ti dz+nyA na pa la na zhes pa ni/ mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/
152b3(1): zag bcas zag med dang / khams gsum la dga' zhing mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pas na de skad ces bya'o// khams ni sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs/ nA nA d+ha tu dz+nyA na pa la na zhes pa khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ khams zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi bag chags
152b4(1): kyis grub pa'i bsam pa'i khams dang / rnam byang la sogs pa'i khams la bya ste/ khams tha dad pa mang po'i rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ma nor bar thugs su chud pas de skad bya'o// dbang po mchog dang mchog min mkhyen/ oMn+di ya ba ra ba ra dz+nyA na pa la na zhes pa/ dbang
152b5(1): mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te dad pa la sogs pa dbang po rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i rig pa dang / rnam grangs ma lus par mkhyen pas na'o// thams cad 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen stobs/ sarba tra ga mi ni pra ti ban+da dz+nyA na pa la na zhes pa/ thams
152b6(1): cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ 'gro ba lngar skye ba'i lam dang / myang 'das su 'gro ba'i lam la sogs pa lam thams cad chub par mkhyen pas na'o// ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs/ sam b+ha ni bi mok+Sha so ma d+hi ma bAkAt+ti si kle ba na l+ya ba da na
153a1(1): b+had+d+hA na dz+nyA na pa la na zhes pa/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam byang dang byang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa bzhi dang / rnam
153a2(1): par thar pa brgyad dang / stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mang po dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sogs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ni blta ba dang / dmigs pa la sogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur pa la bya/ rnam byang ni 'khor bar chags pa
153a3(1): med pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang ldan pas rnam par dag pa la bya/ ldang ba ni lugs dang mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa dang / zod rgal la sogs pa'i tshul gyis ldang ba mkhyen pa la bya'o// sngon gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen/ surba ni bA ga nu smai ti dz+nyA na pa la na zhes bya ba/
153a4(1): sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran la mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ bdag dang sems can sngon gyi tshe rabs grangs med pa tshun chad gnas gar skyes pa dang / byad gzugs kyi rnam pa ci 'dra ba dang / mtshan ma rtags ci yod pa dang / las kyi rgyu gang gis skyes pa mkhyen pas na de skad do// shi
153a5(1): 'pho skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs/ tsu tu pa pat+ti dz+nyA na pa laM zhes bya ba/ shi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ lha'i spyan gyis sems can rnams gang nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye ba ma lus par gzigs pas na/ de skad do// zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/
153a6(1): A pra bak+Sha ya dz+nyA na ba laM zhes pa/ zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad/ bag chags man chad byung zhing zad par gzigs pas na zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// de ltar rnam snang gi gdan glang po che ni
153b1(1): stobs bcu mnga' ba'i rtags su/ glang po che brgyad bting nas gnas so// rin 'byung gi rta rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ ba lA ha ka zhes bya ba/ rta rin po che sngo skya'i ming ste/ sprin gyi shugs ltar mgyogs pas na/ sprin gyi shugs can zhes bya ste/ rta sngon sprin gyi shugs can rin
153b2(1): chen 'byung ldan gyi gdan no/ tsa tA ri r-i d+hi pA da zhes pa/ tsa tA ri ni bzhi/ r-i d+hi ni rdzu 'phrul/ pA da ni rkang pa ste/ 'dun pa dang / sems pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dpyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bzhis nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rten dang / rgyur gyur pa'i na
153b3(1): rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa zhes bya ste// 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang / 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ sems ting nge 'dzin du 'jogs pa la lag par dga' zhing mos pa'i dbang gis rtag tu ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i
153b4(1): nas/ sems rtse gcig tu thob pa ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin no// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ tshe rabs snga ma la bsam gtan bsgoms pa'o// yang na tshe 'di la sngar nas ting nge 'dzin
153b5(1): bsgoms pa'i bag chags bsags te phran ring du sgom pa'i thag kyis rtse gcig thob pa'i phyir ro// brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gang gi tshe sdig pa med dge ba'i chos sra
153b6(1): zhing gnyen pos dge ba'i chas rnams skye zhing 'phel bar bya la/ rgun mi gcod par 'bad pa las sems rtse gcig thob pa'i phyir ro// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'o// dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ dge ba'i bshes
154a1(1): gnyen las dam pa'i chos nyan cing sems pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mi rtags pa dang stong pa la sogs par bzhig cing gtan la 'bebs te/ the tshom med par dpyod dpyod pa las sems rtse gcig zab pa la bya'o// snang ba mtha' yas kyi
154a2(1): dbang rma bya'i gdan ni// tshe la dbang ba ni rang ci tsam 'dod par gnas pa'o// dang las la dbang / ba ni las kyi dbang du mi 'gro ba// yo byad dbang nam mkha'i mdzod la mnga' mdzad pa dang mos pa dbang // ba ni gdul bya gang mos su bskur
154a3(1): 'o// smon lam dbang ni gang btab 'grub pa'o// dang rdzu 'phrul dbang / ji ltar 'dod par bskur ba// skye la dbang sems kyi don du gang 'gyur du skye ba len pa dang chos la dbang / chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong thugs su chud dpa'o// sems la
154a4(1): dbang sems can gang 'dod pa'i don lhun gyis grub pa'o// dang ye shes dbang / so so yang dag rig pa bzhis ye shes lnga thugs su chud pas sems can la thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs par mdzad pa'o// dbang bcu rdzogs pa rma bya'i gdan/ don grub kyi
154a5(1): shang shang ni/ phrin las te/ tsa tA N+ya pra mA Na zhes pa/ tshad med pa bzhi ste/ sems can dpag tu med pa la byams pa/ snying rje/ dga' ba/ btang snyoms khyad par can bsgom pa'o// byams pas sems sems can thams cad bde ba la 'god pas phan gdags snyams pa byams
154a6(1): pa tshad med do// can sdug bsngal bral bar 'dod/ byams pa tshad med ni/ 'jig rten pa dag/ bu tsha nye 'khor la byams pa dang / nyan thos pa dag sems can nyung shas kyi don byed cing byams pa lta bu ma yin te/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar snying rje bskyed
154b1(1): pa'o// de ltar don grub pa'i gdan shang shang / ni tshad med pa bzhi dang yang ldan pa'o// snying rjes tshad med pa sems can thams cad nyon mongs dang bral zhing sdug bsngal bsal bas phan 'dogs so snyam pa'o// de dag pa de dang ldan par 'dod// dga' bas
154b2(1): tshad med pa sems can thams cad la gong ma ltar phan pa dang bde ba byams pa legs so snyam du sems pa'o// bdag don yongs su grub par 'dod// btang snyoms tshad med pa ni sems can rnams bde ba dang grol bar bya ba la/ dgra dang zan du mi 'byed
154b3(1): 'dod// par btang snyoms su phan gdags pa'o// gnod pa nad rnams zhi ba dang / phrin las bzhi dang yang dag ldan te/ shaSh+Ti ka zhes bya ba gnod pa dang nad la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming ste zhi ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang long spyod rgyas 'phel zhing /
154b4(1): paSh+Ti ka zhes tshe dang srid dang longs spyod la sogs pa rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming yin pas na rgyas zhes bya'o// pha ro la sems 'gyur dga' bas dbang / shang ka ra Na zhes pa pha rol gyi sems bskur zhing bdag ci dga' bar bya ba'i sngags kyi ming ste/
154b5(1): dbang du bya ba zhes bya'o// gnod cing phung bar byed pa'o// a b+hi tsa ra zhes bya ba gzhan la gnod cing phung bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming ste drag shul spyod pa zhes bu phrin las shang shang gi gdan no// rin chen sna bdun mdzod mig dang / ni btsun mo/ blon po/
154b6(1): dmag dpon/ nor bu/ rta/ glang po/ 'khor lo rin po che rnams dang ldan pa'o// sa bcu gcig/ kun tu 'od dang mtshon nyi ma'i gdan/ bcu gnyis ma chags pad+ma sma na/ mtshon pa zla ba'i gdan/ 13/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen mtshon pa pad+ma'i gdan du snang ste 'bras
155a1(1): bu'i sa gsum non pa'i rtags su bstan pa'o// rdzogs pa'i gdan/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rig ma dang / khro bo rnams kyi gdan du gnas par bstan pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa// thugs rje che dang ldan
155a2(1): pa yi// dkyil 'khor lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor/ thugs rdo rje'i rigs rdo rje sems dpa' dang / yum dbyings phyug ma'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dbus gnas te/ yab yid kun tu bzang po// kun bzang yab yum chos sgra kun bzang mo yum lha/ !
155a3(1): min/ mi/ byol song / yi dwags/ dmyal ba/ thub drug bcas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o// / rnam snang yab yum sangs rgyas spyan dbus gnas te/ nang gi sems dpa' yab sum// sa yi snying po sgeg mo dang // byams phyi'i sems
