180b1(1): 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu brgyan pa ni 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang mkhan slob dang pha ma phu nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gro byas pa dang / bsgo ba rna lam gzan pa las byung ba ste/ de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so// seng+ge'i ro stod
180b2(1): lta bu la// phrag pa'i lhun ni mdzes par grub// ro stod che bas sa rnal ra stod dang / mgul dang rgud legs par 'brel cing ldan zlum pas phrag pa'i lhan mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni mi snyan pa mi zer zhing mi sgro la mi smod pa las/ snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad
180b3(1): pa mthun par 'dzin pa las byung ba ste/ de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so// phrag so bzhin du rgyas pa dang // ro yang thams cad bro ba'i mchog/ gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pa dang / rlung mkhris bad kan gyis ma nyams shing
180b4(1): rnam par shes pa'i 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa de dag ni nad pa rnams la rtsi dang rim gro dang sman dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang rim gro byas pa las byung ba ste/ de gnyis ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so// n+ya gro d+hA ltar chu zheng 'gapa// da bu yi smi
180b5(1): gtsug g.yas ldan 'khyil// sgra chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas shing n+ya gro d+ha star chu shing 'gab pa dang / spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa de dag ni/ sbed
180b6(1): tshal dang 'khor dang / btung ba dang / rdzing bu dang brgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas 'greng ba'i gnas dang stegs dang gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du btang zhing bdag gis gzhan la byin pa las byung ba ste/ de ni mnga' ba chen po mnga'
181a1(1): ba'i snga ltas so// yangs shing srab pa'i ljags dang ni// gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan// ljags at+pal la dmar po'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs shing zab pa dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang bya ka la ping ka lta ba'i
181a2(1): gsung mnga' ba ste/ de dag ni yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba smras pa las byung ba ste/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa ni yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang mnyan na
181a3(1): dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / gtad mi za zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o// seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang // 'gram pa me long gi dkyil ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te yid du 'ong bas yun
181a4(1): ring po nas tshig 'khyal pa spangs shing dus su smra bas seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so// tshems ni shin tu dkar ba dang // tshems kyang shin tu mnyam pa dang // me tog kun+da dang dung gis bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dka' ba'i
181a5(1): tshims mnga' ba dang / tshems la mtho dman med pas mnyam pa ni rim gro bya ba dang / brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyi 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa las byung ba ste/ de gnyis ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so// tshems kyi thags kyang bzang ba dang // tshems mnyam
181a6(1): zhing grangs bla 'og dgye dgu med par bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / tshems la mtshams ma dod pas zags bzang ba dang / bla 'og dgye dgu med pas mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ni/ yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig smra ba las byung ba ste/ de dag ni 'khor dbyer mi
181b1(1): phyed pa'i snga ltas so// spyan yang da kar nag 'byes pa dang / ba yi rdzi ma lta bu'o// spyan dkar nag gi cha ma 'dres shing shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma g.yogs pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma
181b2(1): 'dzings pas pa'i rdzi ma lta bu ni pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis bltas pa las 'byung ba ste/ de dag ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so// de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa
181b3(1): gaganyis so// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste// sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhes thams cad kyi 'ogo la sbyar ba'i
181b4(1): gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste// sen mo'i mdog kyang snum pa yin// rigs rgyud mthon por byung ba ste// sen mo mtho ba yin zhing tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' bas sen mo zlum/
181b5(1): yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu 'tshogs pa ste// sor mo rgyas la dge rtsa rim gyis grub pa ste sor mo/ rim gyis gzhol/ ba yin/ sgra gsung thugs kyi phrin las dang 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste sgra'i/ rtsa yang mi mngon pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i mdud 'grol
181b6(1): bas rtsa la mdud pa med/ pa yin/ shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' bas// long bu mi mngon pa yin/ mi mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol bas zhabs kyang mnyam/ pa yin/ mi'i seng ge ste// seng ge'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/ mi'i glang po ste glang po'i
182a1(1): 'gros/ sra bzhud pa yin/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste// ngang pa'i stabs sra bzhud pa yin// khyu mchog ste khyu mchog gi stabs/ su bzhud pa yin/ mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste// g.yas phyogs su bzhud cing baH
182a2(1): na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud/ ba yin/ rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ste// mi yo bar bzhud pa yin// tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pas sgra yang legs/ ba yin/ sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu spangs pa ste sra shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ chos rim
182a3(1): gyis ston pas sku rim gyis gzhol/ ba yin/ sku gsung thugs gtsang ba dang ldan pas na// sku ni gtsang ba yin/ rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pas sgra shin tu 'jam pa yin/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' bas spu shin tu rnam par dag
182a4(1): pa yin/ chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa dang ldan pas// dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin la yon tan yangs shing bzang bsten pa ste spra che zhing mdzes/ pa yin/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ste sgra// legs par mnyam pa yin//
182a5(1): mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pas te sba/ shin tu gzhon pa dang / ldan pa yin/ rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste smra// zhum med pa yin/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste spu shin tu/ rgyas shing yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste sgra shin tu
182a6(1): mkhregs/ pa yin/ rten cing 'brel 'byung gi yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste// ya na lag nying lag spa bar mdzes/ pa yin/ gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste// snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/ tshul dang ldan pa'i
182b1(1): slob ma mnga' ba ste// phyal zlum pa yin/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste phyal shin tu/ byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ nga rgyal ba'i de'u bcom pa ste phyal/ ma zhol ba yin/ chos zad pa rnam par bzlog pas phyal phya ma/ mer 'dug pa yin/ chos zab
182b2(1): mo thugs su chud pa ste// lte ba zab pa yin/ mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil/ pa yin/ slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste// kun nas mdzes pa yin/ zugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste kun spyod shin
182b3(1): tu gtsang ba yin/ chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba la mnga' ba ste/ sme ba med/ pa yin/ shing bal ltar yang ba rab tu thob pa'i chos ston pas// phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa yin/ rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal pa la byams pas dge sbyong chen po
182b4(1): brnyes pa ste phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin la shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pas phyag gi ri mo za ba/ pa yin/ bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste phyag gi ri mo// ring ba yin la bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'cha' bas zhal/ ha cang mi ring ba yin la/
182b5(1): gzugs brtan 'jig rten thams cad du bkye ba ste// zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brlan snang ba yin// yon tan pa'i tshogs dang ldan pas te// ljags ni srab pa yin/ 'jam pa sngon du gtang zhing 'dul bas sngags 'jam pa yin// byams pa'i skye bo 'dod
182b6(1): chags pa rnams kyi chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag dka' bas ljags shin tu dmar ba yin// glang po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra dbyangs ltar ba bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bas// glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs/ dang ldan pa yin/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su
183a1(1): bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' bas// snyan cing 'jam pa nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pas/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pas// tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ skye ba rno ba rnams 'dul bas tshems mche ba/ rno ba yin/ chos dang
183a2(1): 'dul ba shin tu dkar bas tshems mche ba/ dkar ba yin/ sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste mche ba/ mnyam pa yin/ rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pas tshems mche ba/ rim gyis gzhol/ ba yin/ shes rab kyi ri mthon po la bzhugs
183a3(1): pas// shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' bas shangs shin tu gtsang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba// spyan ring ba yin/ gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa spyan/ rnam dag pa yin/ sems
183a4(1): can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang spre bu dang na chung mchog mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byas pa ste spyan// dkar nag 'byes pa pad+ma'i 'dab/
183a5(1): ltar 'dug pa yin/ rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste// smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pas smin ma 'jam pa yin/ skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste sprin ma'i sgra mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ dag pa'i rtsa ba'i sngam gyis sems sdum par gyur pa'i
183a6(1): skye bo 'dul ba ste smin ma snum/ pa yin/ chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pas// snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin// nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal bas// snyan mnyam pa yin/ sems can bsam pa nyams pa 'dul ba ste snyan gyi/ dbang
183b1(1): po mnyam pa dang ldan no// lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang bas// zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa yin/ phas kyis rgol ba 'dul ba ste zhal/ 'phral ba yangs pa dang / ldan pa yin/ smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pas// dbu shin tu rgyas pa
183b2(1): yin/ yul gyi bung ba rnam par bzlog pa ste dbu bung ba ltar gnag cing mthong ba dang bsgoms pas spangs pa'i bag la nyal zad par byed pas dbu/ stug pa dang / ldan pa yin/ thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pas dbu// 'jam zhing rtag tu ma
183b3(1): 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pas dbu mi 'dzings brlang po'i gsung dang yongs su bral bas dbu mi rtsub la/ pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bslab pas// dbu yi dri ni zhim pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
183b4(1): ni// phyag dang zhabs dpal be'u dang bkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil/ pas brgyan pa yin no// de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis phrin las cho 'phrul chen por bstan pa 'di dag gsungs so// cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum nyid
183b5(1): de// kun brjod pa yi cho 'phrul dang // rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang // rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin// phrin las rnam pa bzhi nyid de// gnod pa nad sogs zhi ba dang // tshe ring longs spyod rgyas pa
183b6(1): dang // pha rol dbang du bya ba dang // drag shul spyod pa bya ba'o// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po drug tu sgom pa 'di gsungs so// dpal/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum
184a1(1): @/ dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar/ brag drug gi dang po gnyis na// rdor dril g.yas 'bar thod pa mtshan khung na kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon par na/ ral gri g.yas tha ma na cang te'u g.yon tha ma na mgo bo 'chang / yum// phag mo
184a2(1): zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yon thod pa g.yas gri gug sku mdog dmar/ mo// yab/ rnam snang dang yum gshin rje gshed mo ya yum gnyis ka sku mdog ser/ mo// yab/ rdo rje nyi ma dang yum skrag byed ma sku mdog ser po dmar/ yab/ pad+ma gar
184a3(1): dbang dang yum rmongs byed ma gnyis dmar/ po// yab/ rta mchog rgyal po rdo rje dang yum gtum mo gnyis ka ljang gu 'o yin/ yab khrag 'thung dang yum skyod byed ma gnyis sku mdog sngon por gnas/ yab lnga po// dpa' bo zhal gcig
184a4(1): phyag bzhi pa// g.yon tha ma na// thod pa dang ni g.yas dang po na kha TaM ga/ g.yon dang po na/ rang mtshan dril bu g.yas tha ma na cang te'u bsnams// dpa' mo yum lnga po zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas gri gug g.yon thod/ pa'o// oM ha/ rdo rje
184a5(1): sems dpa'/ na maHhi/ rnam snang / swA hA hUM/ pad+ma gar dbang / baM shad ho/ khrag 'thung / hUM hUM ho/ rdo rje nyi ma/ phaT haM/ rdo rje rgyal po rta mchog don grub/ oM baM/ phag mo/ haM yaM/ ya mi ni/ hri maM/ rmongs byed ma/ hri hriM/ skrod byed ma/ hUM hUM/ skrag byed ma/
184a6(1): phaT phaT/ gtum mo// oM badz+ra ha badz+ra sa twa yab rdo rje sems dpa' hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM baM badz+ra baM ti yum phag mo hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hi badz+ra bai ro tsa na rnam snang hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM haM yaM/ gshin rje ma ya ma ni hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM
184b1(1): swA hA hUM pad+ma gar dbang pad+ma nir+t+ti shwa ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hri maM mo ha ni rmongs byed ma hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM baM shad he he ru ka khrag 'thung hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hri hri saM tsa la ni spyod byed ma hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hUM hUM ho badz+ra sur+ya rdo rje
184b2(1): nyi ma hUM hUM phaT swA ha/ oM hUM hUM saM skrag byed ma hA sa ni hUM hUM phaT swA ha/ oM pad haM pad d+haM pa ra ma sha rdo rje rgyal po rta mchog hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM phaT phaT tsan+ti gtum mo ka hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ gzugs phung rnam snang / tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma/ 'du
184b3(1): shes pad+ma gar dbang / 'du byed rta mchog/ rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid dpal khrag 'thung ngo // phung po lnga dang thams cad kun// dpa' bo drug la yang dag gnas// mig gnyis gti mug rdo rje la mi ni/ rna ba
184b4(1): zhe sdang rdo rje phag mo/ sna ser sna rdo rje skrag byed ma/ kha 'dod chags rdo rje rmongs byed ma/ reg bya phrag dog rdo rje gtum mo// skye mched thams cad dbang phyug rdo rje bskyod byed ma'o// dbang po dpa' mor gnas pa yin// lus rnam snang rdo rje dang ngag dpag med rdo rje
184b5(1): yid mi 'khrugs pa zhes so rdo rjer gnas// de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ba 'di gsungs so// zhi ba'i lha tshogs mchod pas mnyes par bya ba dag ni// yan lag mchod pa'i las la mkhas pas dbul bar bya//
184b6(1): ba'o// chos sku yul/ dmigs pa med pa'i dpe ni mkha' ltar dag pas 'khor 'das kun la khyab pa'i sku/ 'das pa'i thugs dang sems can gyi sems dbyer med pa'i chos sgra las/ rnal 'byor pas// spyan 'dren pa dang ye shes kyi lha gshegs su
185a1(1): gsol bar gnyis su mi dmigs kyang / chos lha de'i// thugs rje'i ma 'gags pa ngang nyid chos sku dag pa las/ gdul bu'i don la// ye shes sgyu masa'i sgra snang la rang bzhin med pa rol cing chu b+ha ltar/ gshegs su
185a2(1): gsol/ skyon zhes pa'o// thugs rje tshad med pa'i lcags kyus rta mthur sngar bzung nas thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul zhing // byams pa'i tshad med pa zhags pas rta mthur mdas bkris pa ltar mi gtong bas gnas nas spyan yang
185a3(1): 'dren// dga' ba'i tshad med pa lcags sgrog pho nyas rta mthar dam du bsdom pa ltar bsdams nas gnas stobs la// btang snyoms tshad med pa'i dril bus rnam grol rgyal po rta zhon pa la dga' gtam zer ba ltar dgyes pa bskyed/ de// chos
185a4(1): nyid zhi ba/ rang snang ba dang dbyer med pas na dkyil 'khor la// thugs rjes ma 'gags pa rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'dra ba las mgon gyur ma lus rnams/ chos nyid dang ye shes dbyer med pa'i ngang du dgongs la// mi phyed dbyings la 'god mdzad
185a5(1): pa'i// bdag rnal 'byor pa la dam tshig gis dgongs pa lus ngag yid la dgyes shing thim par bzhugs// rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la bzhengs pa dang bzhugs pa mi mnga' yang // ye shes dang du ye shes lha dang bdag dang chos nyid rnams
185a6(1): dbyer med par rgyud gcig pa yin pas na/ mi gnyis gcig pas na// thabs yab dang rang bzhin med pa'i shes rab yum ma 'gags pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor 'dir/ chos nyid kyi ngang las/ mi g.yo bar dgyes shing brtan par
185b1(1): bzhugs su gsol/ mu mtha' dang bral ba// dbyings kun rang bzhin 'khor ba'i chos kyi nyes skyon rnam par dag pa las/ ma 'gags pas sems can gyi don la/ thugs rje'i dbang gis sprul pa'i skur bzhengs pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi
185b2(1): lha tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// su snang ba de yang glo bur du byas pa ni ma yin no// sgrib med/ rang snang gi lha tshogs mang po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs so gdul bya'i yul las sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das// rgyal ba rgya
185b3(1): mtsho'i ye shes kyis// srid pa rgya mtsho dbul gyi'i rdzas mtha' yas kun// 'bral lugs// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol/ byi ltar dri chab nang bdud rtsi/ snang zhing / srid pa'i rtsa ba chos kyi dbyings su shar ba'i phyir ma 'gags par
185b4(1): mchod rdzas te/ snang srid// de nyid ma bcos pa'i ngang las gsal ba ltar/ yum gyi thig ler pad+ma rak+ka ltar shar// chags yul bde ba'i 'od phung nang ltar thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su rak+ta/ dmar po la 'khyil/ 'gro ba'i/ nyon
185b5(1): mongs pa rnams chos kyi dbyings su bstim phyir phye bdud rtsi'i nang rak+ta gsang ba byang sems ar+g+haM ba zhes/ zhes so// 'byung ba sam lnga nyid kyi ngang las dbyings nas ye shes bcud shar ba/ ni gsang ba rnam shes tshogs brgyad ye shes su gsal
185b6(1): lo// snang srid kyi mdangs ldan rang rig pa'i me tog ni rang sems mi rtog pa ste nang rang rig pa lta bu gsal// gnyis sra med pa'i ngang las ma 'gag pa'i phyi me tog kha dog cir yang gsal/ ba'o// me tog/ 'bras bu'i bcud dang ldan
186a1(1): me tog kha dog 'od phung dang ldan par 'bul/ chos nyid/ ma bcos pa'i ngang las ma 'gags par shar ba'i rang byung dam rdzas spos mchog 'di/ dud pa'i kha dog chos dbyings nam mkha' gsal dris sgra'i dbang po tshims
186a2(1): par byed pa// stong gsum dri bsung nang ltar gsur chen gyi dud pas/ gsang ba byang sems bdud rtsi'i dris/ gang ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// 'bral gnas ye shes/ 'bar ba'i lha'i shangs la mchod pas mnyes gyur cig/ snod sum bcud yab
186a3(1): gnyis med yab yum dag pa la/ yab kyi khu ba gsang ba'i mar me/ nang ltar rang byung ye shes kyi rtags su// 'bras bu rang byung ye shes me shar nas/ kong bu dur khrod gzhal las khang mar khu tshal chen me ye shes kyi rang bzhin no// mtha' dbus
186a4(1): med par gsal ba'i 'od 'bar ni/ phyi kong bu stong gsum rtsi mar rgya mtsho tsam me stong gsum/ dgongs pa// 'khor ba'i ma rig pa'i mun khang sra ba gzhom phyir bzhes su gsol/ gsang ba ltar yab yum gnyis su dri chab khu ba dkar dmar// gnyis med
186a5(1): mkha' dbyings dag pa'i pho brang du/ nang ltar// nyon mongs pa lha mor dag pas skon bral dag pa lha mo mang po tsan+dan gyi 'de gus byug pa ni/ byang chub sems// phyi ltar tsan+dan la sogs pa'i dri// cir yang 'char phyir dri yi 'od dpung
186a6(1): 'bul// zhal gyi dbyings su thim ro bro ba'i mchog yin pas na dgos pa la sgra nyams su brtas pa'o// nas mnyes gyur cig/ gnas gang nas byung na// nam mkha' kun bzang dbyings nas cir yang 'byung / gsang ba byang sems yid bzhin nor
186b1(1): bu rin che// 'bras bu gang 'byung na// 'byung ba'i 'bras bu nang ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga/ phyi ltar zhal zas ro mchog brgya ldan gyi// lha bshos rin chen yid bzhin longs spyod 'di/ phyi zhal zas// sku nang 'dod yon gsung gsang ba
186b2(1): byang sems thugs kyi ngang du thim par bsam/ dang po rna ba'i yul du/ sgra yi dngos por snang ba yang / sgra'i dngos po rdos bcas su// yod pa ma yin rna bar shin tu grags// sgra yis phyi sgra snyan gyis yid rab tu tshim gyur kyang // sgra nyid
186b3(1): rang bzhin gang yang med/ nang ltar sgra rang bzhin med par rtogs so// sgra 'byung gsang ba chos thams cad la sgra brtan ltar shes pas rang bzhin mchod par 'bul/ phyi/ sku nang gsung gsang ba thugs kyi dngos grub stsol/ bdud rtsi lnga rang gi
186b4(1): lus las byung bas na// rang byung de yang ye gdod ma nas dag pa'i rdzas// bdud rtsi lnga re re las sbas pa nang gi bzhi// rtsa mngon pa phyi'i bzhi ste brgyad/ brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// yan lag phyi'i ming gi yin pas na yan lag stong gi sman// ra[:]swa
186b5(1): yan la sogs rdzas// rigs lnga dri can nam snang byang sems rdo rjeg chen rin 'brang bam mapa' yas dri su dan thab/ dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs dri can chos dbyings kyang sems ma yang / sha mnyam cad rang kun cig/ tre cu bya ba grub pa/
186b6(1): grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud drug dri chen dud 'gro/ byang sems dmyal/ sha chen lha/ rak+ta mi/ dri chus lha min dang yi dwags/ sems can kun sgrol ba'i// dug lnga sel dri chen gti mug sel de bzhin sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi 'di/ sangs rgyas rnams la 'bul ba
187a1(1): sa// bcom ldan rig lnga yab yum dang / thal bas grang ba dang 'brang ba lnga dag par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' lham dral dang // rnams la bral ba rang thud dag par mdzag// kun bzang yab med dang yum cas dag thub
187a2(1): drug dang / can mongs drug/ sgo skyong yab yum lus kyi khams dag mtha' bzhi las grol/ mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas bstan pa dang 'khor bcas la/ rdzas gang 'bral na// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul/ de sar bas
187a3(1): nas// thugs rjes bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzod la// dngos grub gang zab na dam tshig nyams pa rnams// tshangs pa nas 'phrul dang 'dra ba'i gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// lce yi dam dngos grub len pa'i dam tshig kyi rdo rjer bsam/ tshig
187a4(1): rdo rje la// rdo rje khong seng can gyi nang du 'dren pa'i hUM bsgoms te/ thabs/ mthe bong dang ni shes rab srin lag rtses// thabs yab zla dkyil dang shes rab yum gyi dkyil 'brel pa yis/ yin no// rang gi lum khams// bdud rtsi rnam lnga
187a5(1): sbyar ba la/ spe la ro mchog tshor ba// myangs na sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rdo rje gsum 'thob 'gyur/ chos nyid la// dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i dpenam mkha'i rang bzhin las/ 'phral du byung ba'i dpe// log rtog mtshan ma
187a6(1): mang po sprin phung bzhin/ sprin rlung gis gtor ba'i dpes// ye shes nyi zer 'od kyis rab sprin dang bral ba'i nyi ma shar ba ltar log rtog dag pa'i ye shes shar/ bsal phyir/ sgrib pa// dag pa'i don du gsang nan 'bral lo rtogs nas mchod
187b1(1): par bgyi/ sha lnga'i gtor ma// rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dang / gtor ma// 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi lha mo rnam pa lnga// chos nyid skye ba med dbyings las/ ye shes ma 'gags par 'char bas/ rang gang 'dod pa'i gsol ba btab cing phul
187b2(1): pabs// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin grub 'bul// bzang ngan che chung med pas// mnyam nyid rtog pa'i rlung gis/ mi g.yo bzang ngan che chung med pas// mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid yon tan can/ gzhan don/ thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro
187b3(1): ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar mdzad/ bde gshegs kyi// yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan pas gdul bya la dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ thugs gzung 'dzin gyi// dri ma med cing chos nyid las mi g.yo bar 'gro ba so sor mi
187b4(1): 'byed pas mnyam med dam pa'i dngos grub mchog chos can/ nyid ster bas na/ longs sgra'i// yon tan shin tu brtag dka' bas na phra ba'i cha la yang tshad gzung du med de// dpe ni nam mkha' mtha' yas pa ltar dang yang yon tan mtha' yas
187b5(1): pa 'gran du mnyam pa yod ma yin/ mchog thun mong gi/ dngos grub rnam gnyis gzhan dang mnyam pa med dpe med bzhin nor bu dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i dpebs skrag pa'o// dang bral ba rnams/ dngos grub de gang la sbyin na// sems can
187b6(1): khams las can la mchog gi dngos grub mchog rnams sems nyid chos skur gsal bar ston nges par stsol/ dus/ rtag tu gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa las thugs rje'i shugs las byung / ba ni nyi ma shar bas sems can la
188a1(1): 'od byung ba ste tha'o// smon lam gang btab pa de grub pa ste thugs la gang yang 'gag pa med pa'i nam mkha'i chos nyid can/ cir yang snang ba'i yon tan gang yang ma 'gags par 'char ba'o// 'gro ba'i don mngon mtho ngas legs grub
188a2(1): rab tu brtson pa ni mtha' yas pa/ 'don 'grub pa'o// can rang ltar min pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid dus rtag tu nam mkha' sngar 'gyur ba med par dus rtag tu bzhugs rnam par snang / 'jig rten na yon tan/ tshad med pas tshad
188a3(1): gzung ba dang bral ba chos nyid shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i/ rnam rtog gi zug rngu dang bral nas// bde bar chos slar gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang / pas gdul bya'i don mdzad bya mdzad byed kyi
188a4(1): rtogs pa mi mnga'/ 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams gsum rnams la phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub mchog stsol zhing ster bar mdzad de rang sems chos spu dri med du gnas pa'i don rtogs par/ mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i chen pos
188a5(1): sems can gyis don mdzad pa spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yongs mi 'gyur// zhing mi 'gag ste yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'gro don 'gag med du mdzad do// e ma[:]ho ni ngam zhing mtshor ba'o// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis chos spyi dang rang gis tshan nyid mkhyen
188a6(1): pas na/ shin tu bzang ba'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ pa'o// mchog sbyin pas sgrub pa po la dngos grub rnams kyi nang nas mu stegs kyi dngos grub las khyad byas pas na go 'phang mchog chos sku brnyes pa/ 'o// khams 'dod khams
188b1(1): gnas rigs nyi shu gzugs khams bcu bdun/ gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi gang bsgrub pa byed la chos sgra ston pa'o// gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ 'gro ba'i// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par me long dag
188b2(1): pa'i byad ltar gsal ba rab mkhyen pa'o// dam tshig mchog spu'i dam tshig sgra mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i mtshon nas de bzhin du gsung thugs la yang sbyor/ gsung dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ cig/ bstod pa/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams
188b3(1): cad kyi/ spyir bstod pa ste// yang dag pa ye shes kyi sgo nas yon tan rgya chen te/ bo la bstod pa/ bstod pa 'dis// lan cig tsam ni brjod pas kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub nas dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur/ ni mang du bstod na
188b4(1): ci smos zhes so// de nas rgyal ba thams cad gnyis su med par sgrub pa 'di gsungs so/ ye shes lha// bsnyen pa'i don du bzlas pa 'di dag bya// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ gdon mi za// rdo rje sems
188b5(1): dpa'i thugs ka nyid/ bdag rdo rje sems dpar gsal ba'i thugs ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang du/ nyi dkyil rgya long tsam cig bsam/ de'i steng du dz+nyA na satwa hUM zhes pas ye shes sems dpa' dkar po tshon gang ba ral pa'i thor tshugs can cig bsgom/ de'i thugs kar zla
188b6(1): dkyil gyi steng du rdo rje nas tsam gyi bum pa la hUM nyung 'bru tsam cig bsgom/ de'i tha mar hUM badz+ra d+h+r-ika/ ces pas bskor bar bsam// gsang ba'i sngags don bsgom par bya// de bzhin yum la'ang yum gyi thugs kar ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar dril bu muM
189a1(1): gyis mtshan par bsgom/ de'i tha mar mA d+ha ti shwa ris bskor bar bsgom/ bsgom pa dang // rigs bzhi yab yum bsgom pa dang / de bzhin rigs bzhi yang yum la rang gi phyag mtshan mtshan sa bon sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom// sems
189a2(1): dpa' zla ba'i 'od dang bcas// sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs kar zla dkyil re de'i steng du 'ad dkar po chen gang ba ro'i rtse la rang rang gi bslad sngags rtsa sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom// kun bzang yab yum sngags don bsgom// gca ba dz+ra
189a3(1): sems dpa' dang mthun no// thub pa rnams thugs kar pad+ma'i steng du 'od ser po mtheb long tsam re la sngags kyis bskor ba dang gser gyi 'od// sgo ba rnams la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor re la 'od mthing ga'i 'od/ mthe bong tsam re la sngags kyis bskor ba dang /
189a4(1): lha rnams kyi dung khang du zla ba la/ oM dang ljags steng du pad+ma la AHste thugs kar hUM sogs gong ltar ro bcas/ bdag dam tshig sems dpa' dang lha ye shes sems dpa' gnyis med me long nang gi gzugs dang byad 'dra ba'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyis tshul bzung
189a5(1): bsgom/ ye shes lnga// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+hA tu AHbyang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po ye shes kyi dbyings/ de nas hUM bi shA bi shud+d+he phaT dzaHzhes brjod de/ de las mar me gcig las gnyis su bye ba ltar mdun gyi nam mkha' la dkyil 'khor gnyis su phye
189a6(1): las 'phro 'du bya zhing bzlas pa bya rtog tshogs sbyang / sku gsung thugs mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo// mchog dang grub chen brgyad la sogs pa/ thun mong gang 'dod pa/ rnal 'byor pas 'dod pa'i don la// smon lam rab tu gdab par bya// ye gdod ma na
189b1(1): nas 'khor 'das mnyam nyid chos sku'i ngang du dag par gnas pa la/ de ltar du/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis yod pa la sgo dang med pa la skur btab ste// de bzlog don phyir rgyal ba'i dam mnos nas// sgo slar gzung 'dzin gyis bsags pa'i lus
189b2(1): ngag yid la gnas pa'i sgrib pa rnams bzlog par bya ba'i don du rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas dam tshig mnos pa las/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs kyi thugs dang ci 'gal ba/ bgyis pa rnams// sangs rgyas thugs rje'i
189b3(1): bdag nyid yin pas// thugs rje che mnga' khyed la rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig dang 'gal ba rnams/ bzod par gsol// ye shes rgyal po sangs rgyas sku rnam snang gsung snang mtha' thugs/ mi bskyod pa/ rin 'byung // yon tan phrin las don
189b4(1): grub de re re la yang snga po tshang bas na/ rmad po che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba// dus da lta nyid du lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs dang mnyam par sbyor ba// de nyid du ni[:]sku gsung thugs kyi sid+d+hi[:]bdag la stsol// zhes sangs
189b5(1): rgyas thams cad kyis ched du gsungs so// dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis 'od min du gsungs pa las gsang bdag gis dam pa'i rigs can lnga la gsungs so// de nas gsungs so zhes sbrel gang gis gsungs na/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de
189b6(1): bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa ma lus shing ma byon pa lus pa med pa da ltar ba thams cad kyis/ gang gi don du gsungs na// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dam pa rnams kyi don/ la gsungs so// gang gsungs na/ yang dag pa rgyun gyi rnal
190a1(1): 'byor bsgom pa 'di gsungs so// dbang brnam pa snang bzad datshas thams cad da khan cad kyang bzad pa// da gang zhen// mi dmigs chos dbyings de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin 'od gsal kun tu snang // kun tu
190a2(1): zhing khyab pa'i sring rje'i 'od kyi kun tu gdal ba'o// kun la snang ba sring rje lha ma'o// a nyid rgyu las dkyil 'khor 'byung // chu'i ting nge 'dzin la dkar por bsgom mo// gzhal las khang gzhung dang lha tshogs 'byung ba'i chu'o// nam mkha'/ e yaM rlung bai rba suM
190a3(1): laM ri rab raM me b+h+yAM/ khang pa'o// b+h+yAM las rin chen gzhal yas khang // dbus 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi gru chad blo 'bur bar khyams sgo dang bcas pa bskyed do// gdan ni rdor sems// seng ge rnam snang glang rin 'byung rta mtha' yas rma bya te'u/ don grub shang
190a4(1): shang // dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/ sangs rgyas zhe gnyis rang rang gi sngags gong nas 'byung ba ltar brjod la bsgom par bya'o// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril ba// phyag rgya bzhi yis spyan drangs nas// rang snang bzhi bcu
190a5(1): phyag 'tshal zhing // phyag 'tshal ba'i se gol dkrol la brda dang bcas pas/ dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la ma 'gags pa'i sgo nas phyag 'tshal zhing ma skyes pa'i sgo nas gnyis su med par bya'o// sems can don phyir nan tan mchog
190a6(1): bskyed cing // spyan drangs pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs// ye shes thugs rjes chen po bdag la dgongs nas kyang / chos nyid// mi dmigs pa bsgrub pa'i don du mchog gi dngos grub rnams// chos sku thob par bya ba// bdag la stsal
190b1(1): zhing dngos grub ma thob bar du brtan par bzhugs su gsol// sku mdog zhal ni rnam par bsgyur/ rang zhal phyag gsal bar bsgom zhing // phyag rgya pad skor g.yas g.yon dbus dang gsum du bskor lha rnams yud tsam gyis yid la gsal bar bya// sku
190b2(1): nigar thabs glog 'gyu ba// rtsa ba'i lha zhe gnyis su gsal ba mnyes pa'i lha rnams// phyag rgya'am gar gyi mchod pa 'bul// mchod pa bzhes dbang dang dngos grub stsol// spos kyi lha mo ser/ dang me tog mtho mar me ma dmar dri//
190b3(1): chab ma ljang gus mchod pa'o// bdud rtsis mchod la dngos grub blang // rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi// rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dngos// dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// bcom ldan rigs lnga yab yum dang // byang chub lcam
190b4(1): dral thub pa drug/ kun bzang yab yum 'khor bcas la// bla med bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bral// thugs rjes cher dgongs dbang dang dngos grub rtsol// ar+g+haM me tog bdug spos dang // mar me dri chab bshos dang sgra// ting nge 'dzin gyis re re la gong du bshad
190b5(1): pa'i// phyi nang gsang bar sbyar ba rnams// bdag gi phung po khams skye mched dang mnyam pa'i lha tshogs la 'bul// rgyal ba'i rigs lnga'i sras sems dpa' rnams kyi dang thugs kyi dpal be'u nas/ ye shes lha la/ dngos grub stsal
190b6(1): ba dang dang stsol bar sgrub pa pos len par don dam par mi dmigs kyang // sngon gyi sems can la dngos grub sbyin par thugs dam du bzhes pa'i dbang gis dngos grub rtsol/ cig/ tshogs 'dod yon drug dang gtor ma dang bdud rtsi
191a1(1): pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ dang // ta na sgrol ba dang ga Na la sogs ci 'byor pa/ sa mchod do// ting 'dzin yid kyis mchod pa mang por spros nas/ dmigs pa'i mchod pa 'di/ 'khor ba las// rgyal ba dgongs pa rgya mtsho
191a2(1): gnas pa rnams kyis bzhes su gsol/ gzhi// chos kyi sku skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin las/ bzhugs pa/ 'gro don du// gzugs kyi sku sgyu ma'i ltar snang la rang bzhin med pa skye ba'i skur ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi// thugs rjes sems can
191a3(1): kun la khyab pa don byed pa// rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su snang ba la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas gnyis med sgrub don du// sngags bzla bar bya ste sgom thabs ni gong ltar byas la/ 'jab bo d+hi tsita dang // spyi dang khyad par ba ga
191a4(1): la sogs pa bsnyen 'dzab dbul// de nas zhugs mar gtsigs pa yi// sgrub pa zab mo yang dag bshad// de bzhin nyid dang ni o yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid// dang por chos kyi dbyings nyid las// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis
191a5(1): bsgom// dmigs med chos dbyings de bzhin nyid// oM ma hA su kha hUM zhes pas chos nyid stong par bsgoms te/ lung 'di nyid nas tshig bsdus nas bsgom mo/ kun tu snang // oM sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// thams cad kun 'dus
191a6(1): khyab par bya// rang bzhin 'od gsal kun tu snang // tsit+ta pra be sha s+pha ra Na phaT/ lung 'di nas bsdus snying rje sgyu ma bskam mo// rgyu yi ting 'dzin rab ldan pas// oM rnam 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs// med pa'i rgyu las mngon gsal ba'i// sems kyi rang bzhin ye
191b1(1): shes gsal// chu mi yi ge ya dkar gsal// zhes bsgom mo// me ya be gr-i ma raM lnga las bskyed// yi ge 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du las// e a ka sha maN+Da la zhes pas nam mkha' gru gsum bsgom/ oM karma rak+Sha haM gis rlung zla kham/ bai ma ma kI ri maN+Da la zhes pa bdud rtsi'i rgya
191b2(1): mtsho bsgom// nam mkha' rlung dang bdud rtsi mtsho/ laM tiSh+Tha maN+Da la zhes pas// rin chen sa gzhi suM su me ru muM gyis rin po che'i/ ri rab steng / raM dz+nyA na dza la maN+Dal la zhes pas// ye shes me 'od kun tu gsal// b+h+rUM b+h+rUM tsir yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru
191b3(1): bsam zhes brjod de gzhal yas khang dbus zla kham sgo gcig pa gru chad kyi sgo dang ngo // 'phro 'dus rin chen gzhal yas khang / dbus rat+na'i khri// seng ges btegs pa nyi ma zla ba pad+ma'i gdan gyi steng / gzhal yas khang // yid bzhin rin chen
191b4(1): gyis rgyan dang gdan rin po che'i khri gang gi rgyan gsal// nam mkha'i dkyil la ye shes sems dpa' rlung gis btegs pa bab/ nas ye shes shar// 'phros bskul don byas 'dus gsal bar cho ga gsum gyis bskyed do// gyur pa las// rdo rje
191b5(1): sems dpa' yab zhal gsum phrag drug yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis gong ltar/ bsgom// ye shes lnga yi dbang oM ma hA shu n+ya ta la sogs/ bskur zhing / oM sarba ta thA ga ha la sogs// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/ de bzhin kun tu chu'i/
191b6(1): ting 'dzin gsum po gsal gdab/ brtan byas zhing // rtags kyi yab yum dam tshig gi phyag rgya/ mkha' gsang las kyi phyag rgya// sbyor ba chos kyi phyag rgya/ phyag rgya gsum bcings nas/ yab// chos kyi spu phyag rgya chen por bzhugs par bsgom/
192a1(1): rdo rje sems dpa' lab sum bsgom pa ni// lam kun ma nor bar gsang sngags kyi/ kun bsgom yin/ sram chos dbyings ye shes las spyan drangs// stong nyid ye shes me long las// ngab chos sra// ma skyes pa las gzugs su/ mi
192a2(1): 'gag par gzugs skur snang ba/ dpe chos nyid nam/ mkha' la ye shes 'ja' tshon 'dra bar snang ba ji bzhin du/ chos kyi/ dbyings nas ye shes kyi sku'i/ phyag rgyar spyan drangs pas gshegs su gsol// dbyings nyid rang bzhin rnam par dag
192a3(1): pa las// thugs rje'i dbang gis sprul pa'i sgrar bzhengs pa// zhes mgo la gdags// sangs rgyas kun 'dus mi skyod yab yum gtso// rang snang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// legs par sems can don phyir nan tan mchog cing // zhes//
192a4(1): bzhugs su gsol nas ni// mi bskyod mthing ga dkar dmar zhal/ rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen g.yas// dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon// zhes mgo mnan no// yab yum gnyis su med pa la// gar dbyangs mchod pa 'di 'bul gyis// ye shes dang
192a5(1): las dngos grub stsol// bdud rtsis mchod rang byung gdong nas rnam par dag/ rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman// ye shes lnga rdzogs sgrub rdzas 'di/ la dngos grub blang // gsang dri med rnams dag gi nan sbrengs la sngags kyis gtor ma
192a6(1): dbul// bde gshegs rgyal ba yab yum la// bdag cag dad pas 'bul lags kyis// thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol// bzhes nas kun tu dgyes mdzad la// 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes bya'o// chos sgra skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin las// gzugs sku
192b1(1): sgra ma'i skyes bu'i tshul bstan nas// thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i don mdzad pa// yi dam rgyal ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstod cing 'dzab badz+ra d+h+r-i ka bzlas bshags pa bya// tshogs mchod dang dam tshig bskang bshags nyin gung mtshan gung tshig
192b2(1): gi tshogs mchod/ pa bya'o// rang gzhan don du chos sku theb par// smon lam yongs su gdab par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung gi ga la po las/ chos nyid zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ brtag pa dgu
192b3(1): pa'o// // de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnga' bdag gi khro bo 'byung ba'i rA tra chen po 'di dag gsungs so// rtag pa rang rgyud rU tra ni// mos pa rjes su bzhag shes la// skyes bu yul gyi
192b4(1): 'dod pas gdungs/ pa lta bu'o// log pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs lnga// dang po log pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa lngar brtags pa'i rang rgud pa ni/ dngos po thams cad rang gi ngo bo phyogs dang bral ba la/ rig pa'i rkyen dang bral bas don ma mthong zhing /
192b5(1): dngos med la dngos por bzang bas rig pa la dngos por zhen cing brtags pas rang klad par snang ngo // brtags pa'i dbang gis gzung 'dzin du// brtags pa'i rang rgud pa ni/ gang la de dag med pa la/ de dang der zhen cing chags pa ni/ gzang 'dzin no// yul
192b6(1): dang shes pa tha dad du gyur pa'i phyir ro// brtags pa ni dngos po bzhi la don ma shes pas dngos po gsum du brtags pa'o// zhen pa'i dbang gis 'dod yon lnga/ brtags pa'i rang rgyas pa ni zhen pa ste// med pa la brtag pas gnyis su 'khrul la phyi rol rang dang
193a1(1): mthun pa'i yul lngas glo bur rang rgud par kun du skye zhing 'jug pa'i phyir rtags pa'o// brtags pas ji bzhin de bzhin pa ni thams cad du khyab par gnas kyang / rgya mtsho zas sgrib pa'am/ long ba rang la shes pa ma skyes pa ltar gzhan las byung ba ma
193a2(1): yin no/ don la bsgribs/ pa de yang gong ma gsum po ma shes pas lan no// nyon mongs 'dod dang gzung 'dzin skyon// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas na/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i grong khyer brgyud// nam mkha' dang chu la
193a3(1): dngos por zhen pa ltar/ rig pa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin la/ nga'am bdag ces 'dzin pa'i phyir bdag tu mthong ba'o// de'i dbang gis phung po bzhi dang / khams dang / dbang po 'khor dang / longs spyod la bdag zhen mngon par brtags so// de dag kyang chu las rlabs bzhin
193a4(1): no// ji skad bshad pa yang bdag tu 'dzin cing brtags te/ mngon par zhen pas bdag gis khams gsum du yang 'khor ba'i grong khyer brgyud pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i 'gro ba rnams/ khams gsum du skye zhing grong khyer du brgyad do// brgyad pa gang zhe na// sngon tshe
193a5(1): dus nam byung na/ 'das pa'i dang po la/ gzhi gang las gol na// sangs rgyas srid pa'i sgron mar byung / bla ma gang las dam nyams na// slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo yi// slob ma gang yin na/ dge slong nag po la// gsang sngags ba6
193a6(1): ba dam tshig/ spyod pa/ ting nge 'dzin/ dbang / phrin las/ mtha' drug bstan pa las/ gsang sngags zab mo'i// don de gdeng du ma gyur cing / mgo bar/ srog gcod ma byin len mi tshangs spyod rdzun dang bzhi rang rgyud par// log pa'i lung du spyad pa
193b1(1): yis// dmyal ba tsha grang yi dwags phyi nang sgrib pa can/ kha 'khor te// tha mar las kyi srin por rA tra ma skyes/ khams gsum 'khrugs pa'i bdud du gyur// dang po gang las byung ba med// tha ma gang du 'gag med
193b2(1): la// gzhi las 'khrul pa rang rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa de dag gi rang bzhin ji lta bu zhe na/ gang gi phyir dngos po'i snying po de kho na nyid thogs tha mar med pa'i ye shes yin pa de'i phyir/ de las byung ba'i 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i chos ni nam
193b3(1): mkha' ltar dang po gang las kyang 'ong ba med/ bar du gang na'ang gnas pa med/ tha ma gang du'ang 'gag cing 'dzin pa med cing chu dang rlabs bzhin no// de'i phyir 'khrul pa'i chu dang ngo bo dang 'bras bur bcas pa ni ji ltar snang yang rang rgud pa med de/ de dag gi rang bzhin ma
193b4(1): spangs par de dag las ma 'das pa ni/ rang bzhin nam chos nyid do// bdag gzhan 'dzin pas sngon smin te// ngo bo ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis bdag gzhan du 'dzin pa la/ brtan zhing yun ring bas/ sgrib pa dang las nyon gyi 'bras bu du kha zhen pa dang bcas pa nyid
193b5(1): sngon du smin te 'khrul pa'i 'gro ba de dag gi ngo la/ zhen pa ma log cing bden pa mngon du ma byas kyi bar du skad cig ma tsam du'ang bde ba med la/ thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i skal ba yang med ces bya ba'i don to// skad cig bde dang thar pa med// ma rtogs
193b6(1): zhen pa'i 'gro ba dag/ dper na sems can gyi don ma rtogs pa rnams kyis ma shes par zos pas dug gi na ba lta bu dang // zas la dug gis btab pa'am/ skom gyis gdungs pas// ri dwags smig rgyu la chur 'khrul na smig rgyu la/ bsnyegs pa ltar/
194a1(1): rigs drug 'khor ba'i// sdug bsngal nyid las thar pa med/ de khams gsum 'khor bar 'byams par gyur pa'o// des brtags pa dang rang klud kyi rwa tha bshad zin to// sprul pa 'dod pa bskang ba'i rA tra yis// bsam pa yid
194a2(1): dang 'thad shes pa// sna tshogs me tog gling phyin pa 'dra/ gdul bya'i las dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje slob dpon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis/ slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo ste rdo rje snying po dang / slob ma dge slong nag po sngon byung la snang la/ da
194a3(1): slob dpon dang slob ma rnams kyang / las dang smon lam gyis phrad pa'i phyir ro// dngos dpal chen nyid sprul pa 'dod pa skong ba'i ru tra yin no// las dang smon lam mthun dbang gis// byin rlabs gang zhus bla ma la// gdug pa rA tra 'dul ba'i
194a4(1): phyir// gang sprul pa ni brgyud pa rang thabs kyi byin rlabs dang / cho ga 'am man ngag gi byin rlabs dang dam tshig/ blta ba/ dgongs pa/ nyams kyis bstan pa'i brtags pa'i snang ba bral zhing ye shes kyi snang ba 'char bar nus la de ni ting nge 'dzin dang tha mi dad do// 'dis ni
194a5(1): 'dul byed de// sangs rgyas rnams 'dus nas rA tra 'dul bar bka' bgros bcas/ pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi// cho 'phrul gyis 'dul bar bskul ba byas nas ni/ phrin las bzhis 'dul bar// las bzhi rdo rje bskos la btab// da ltar gyi
194a6(1): ni man ngag dang ldan pa'i slob dpon la bya'o// rigs nges dang ldan shes rab can// las dang thugs rjes phrad rung la// 'dir sngon byung du rA tra nyid la bya ste/ lha spyod zab mo la gnas shing / bla mas byin brlabs pas rigs nges pa dang lus kyi phyi nang
194b1(1): gang la yang ma chags par rtogs pas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas zhal mthong zhing skad cig mas bden pa mthong bas shes rab can no// sngon nas sbyangs shing bsags pa'i las dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rjes btul nas sa la bzhugs pas phrad rung la zhes
194b2(1): so// gzhan du na bla ma dang theg pa chen po'i rigs su nges pa dang / dad pa dang dam tshig dang ldan pa snying rje che ba/ yid mi spro ba shes rab che ba/ gtong phod cing brtson 'grus che ba/ rang gi las dag pa dang / bla mas de ltar rtogs pas thugs rje skye ba'i yul du gyur pas phrad du
194b3(1): rung ba'o// rang bzhin dag pa'i las dbang gis// dug gis dug nad bsal ba ltar// dug lnga gzung 'dzin 'dod pa lnga// de'i phyir na thog ma bar dang tha ma'i rang bzhin la brtags pa dang / bde ba chen po la brtags pas/ dug lnga gang nus
194b4(1): pas chos nyid du 'gyur ro// dngos po gang btab pas gzung ba'i yul nub/ de'i ngo bo mthong bas 'dzin pa'i sems nus ste/ chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar gsal bar 'gyur ro// spyod yul lha'i rang bzhin la brtags pa dang / dbang po de bar nus pa la brtags pa dang /
194b5(1): 'dod pa lnga snga mar sme ba'i thabs kyi grub kyis// man ngag dang bral ba'i rtog pas ni ma yin no// ma lus pas na spyod yul gyi chos thams cad do// bshad thabs des 'dul bar 'gyur ba ni chu rlabs zhi ba bzhin no// rlabs chur rtogs na/ rlabs la nyam nga ba med pa ltar/ skang
194b6(1): ba sems nyid ma bcos par shes na dran rtog dang snang ba gang la yang dgag bsgrub dang bral ba'o// ma lus thabs kyis 'dul bar 'gyur// rang nyid gang zhen cing dag pa ni// chags sdang lnga dang / 'dod yon lnga dang / gzung 'dzin dang gang la zhen pa dag go/ des
195a1(1): bskur ba'i sgo gsum gyi bya ba na/ las dbang gis nas sa// thabs ni de dag cad da// de dag gis ji sar grol zhe na/ drug gi dug nad bsal bstar te/ blan pa 'chi bar byed pa'i drag nad da/ dug la sngags kyis btab pas sal ba kar/ theg pa rung ba nang
195a2(1): kyi gzir ba'i chags sdang la sogs pa ni thabs khyad par can de nyid/ ye shes su rang grol bar 'gyur ro// sprul pa'i khrag 'thung cir yang snang // cir yang snang bar sprul pas te/ thugs kyi rigs gcig pu'i khrag 'thung ma nges par cir yang snang ba ni/ ru tra 'dul
195a3(1): baba'i phyir khro bo 'dul byed kyi tshogs su yang snang ste// la la 'di ltar snang bar 'gyur// skra mdog dang zhal dbus/ mthing nag g.yas dkar dang g.yon dmar ba'i dbus/ phyag g.yas dang po na// rdo rje bar ma na zhing mchog gi dbyug pa ba ma na kha
195a4(1): T+wAM ga/ g.yon dang po// dril bu bar ma na b+han+d+ha tha ma na ba su'i zhags/ pa'o// yum yab kyi sgra dang mthun pa dang gnyis su med par 'khril/ ba'o// yang ni thugs kyi he ru ka rA tra'i tshogs 'di ltar yang snang bar 'gyur/ te/ gnas/ bskal
195a5(1): pa 'jigs pa dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar ba'i me dpung gi dbus na yi// 'od zer 'du bas dngos grub ster 'phro'i klong dkyil na/ gnas kyi sems can gyi don mdzad pas/ thugs rje 'byung ba'i phyir/ skra ni 'dul ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i phyir/ dud[:]ka
195a6(1): gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir chen po ste/ s+tha gsum bsgom pas// zhal gsum grub po la phyag drug po// phar phyin drug gi don mdzad pas/ zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir// gnag/ dud ka dang g.yas gti
195b1(1): mug 'dul mthing dang g.yon 'dod chags 'dul dmar ba'i dbu// g.yas pa gsum na thogs pa ni// g.yas dang po na dgra bgegs la brdeg pa'i dang ma mo mkha' 'gro 'bod pa'i g.yab mo// ti ra'i dbyug pa chen po dang // g.yas par
195b2(1): // rdo rjes g.yon zod khrag dkrug cing zhal du gsol ba dang / ba ma na khyung gi khra chen dra bya'i tshogs la spor zhing 'gyed pa'o// g.yon gyi gsum na thogs pa ni// ti ra'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang / thams cad 'ching ba/ bar ma/ zod
195b3(1): rlon dmar gyis bkang ba dang / gsol ba/ tha ma// ti ra phra mo'i chung rnga khog pa nas// glo snying nang grol phyung nas 'byin cing za/ gti mug gnas su dag pas spru la// glang chen gyi ko rlon gos su gon/ 'dod chags ma spangs gnas su dag
195b4(1): pas// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs can/ sprul pa mang po 'gyed pas// zod rlon phreng ba rgyan du byas/ kro d+hI shwa rI sku la thabs shes rab mi 'bral bas 'khril/ phrin las drag pos/ gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar
195b5(1): byed// yang ni sprul pa'i he ru ka gdul bya la 'di ltar snang ste/ zhal g.yas/ dkar dang dbus mthing ga g.yon dmar ba'i mdog/ g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni/ dang po na gnyis med mtshon pa'i// rdo rje zhing bar ma na sgrol ba mtshon
195b6(1): pa'i dbyug za ma na zod gtong mdzad pa'i/ khyung khra spor/ g.yon dang po// thod khrag bar ma na dug gsum 'jom pa'i kha T+wAM dam nyams 'ching ba'i rgyu zhags bsnams/ pa// yum dang gnyis su med par sku la 'khril/ ba'o// yang ni sprul pa'i he ru
196a1(1): ka 'di ltar gdul bya ba/ snang bar 'gyur// g.yas dkar gsal ba'i nyams g.yon dmar bde ba'i nyams spug nag dbus/ mi rtog pa'i nyams// g.yas kyi dang po ti ra la/ zhing dbyug/ bar ma rdo rje
196a2(1): b+han+na tha// g.yon gyi dang po 'ching ba'i rgyu zhags la// bar ma dam nyams gdug par 'gyed pa'i khyung gi khra chen po// tha ma ti ra'i glo snying nang rol 'dren/ cing za// yum dang gnyis su med pa'o// yab ni sprul pa 'di ltar
196a3(1): snang // g.yas longs skra dkar dbus chos sgra smug g.yon sbrul spa dmar zhal/ g.yas dang po/ rdo rje bar kha T+wAM tha ma cang te'u g.yas/ dang po// dung dmar bar rgyu zhags za ma khyung khra g.yon// yum dang thabs shes gnyis su med pa
196a4(1): la// dur khrod chas brgyad rnams sku la rdzogs// yang ni sprul pas 'dod pa skong / nyes pa dang bral bas// g.yas dkar thugs rje chags pas/ g.yon dmar mi 'gyur bas dbus mthing nag dang po/ rdo rje bar khyung khra zam zhing dbyug
196a5(1): g.yas/ dang po// dung chen bar zhing dbyug tha ma rgyu ma'i zhags pa g.yon// yum dang gnyis su med par 'khril// gdug pa rA tra'i tshogs thams cad dbang du bsdus nas zhabs kyis gzir/ te ma lus par 'dul ba'o// yang ni 'di
196a6(1): ltar sprul pa 'dod pa skong ba'i ru tra dpal chen po'i tshogs/ snang ba yang // g.yas dkar ba stong nyid dbus smug mtshan ma med pa g.yon pa dmar/ smon pa med pa/ g.yas dang po// zhing dbyug par rdo rje tha ma khyung khra ni spor/ dang po/ zhags pa bar
196b1(1): dung chen te thod pa za mar ro dbyug g.yon// yum dang thabs shes gnyis su med pa la// gdul bya rA tra'i tshogs 'dul ba'i he ru ka/ yang ni sprul pa 'dod pa skong ba'i khrag 'thung snang ba yang // sku mdog dmar khams gsum dbang
196b2(1): dusdud pas smug zhal gsum la// g.yas pa thabs dkar la g.yon pa shes rab mi 'gyur nag/ phyag bzhi g.yas g.yon dang po na/ g.yas// rdo rje g.yon thod khrag dkrug cing gsol/ zhal du/ g.yon/ 'og ma dril bu
196b3(1): g.yas kha T+wAM ga/ yum dang bde stong gnyis su med pa ste/ he ru ka la// rdo rje rU tra zhes te gdul bya'i ming 'dul byed la btags/ bsam yas snang // stong gsum gyi 'jig rten khams rnams kyang thugs kyi he ru ka/ sa gang ba'i dpe// nam
196b4(1): mkha'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i grangs// ting nge 'dzin ye shes tha langs pa ni/ 'i rAH// sna tshogs dang po rang gi nga bo nyams dang ldan pa ste/ 'i shes pa// rgya mtsho rin chen sna tshogs kyi gling / la byin pa ltar// phyin na rin
196b5(1): tshe rigs pasam yas pa/ ltar bshad pa khyed la bstan// sngon nas zhen pa'i bag chags dag/ rA tra de'i thog ma med pa nas da lta yan chad kyi skye ba sna tshogs las gyur pa'i bag chags dang sgo gsum gyis spyod pa dang khyad par gsang ba log par grol ba te/
196b6(1): de dag gi bag chags dag pa'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// 'das pa ni sngon yang rA tra nag po gsang ba las gol bas/ dang po rang rgud pa la zhen cing nyon mongs pa la spyod pa ste/ dngos po'i don ma rtogs par nor bar gyur to// p+la mas gsal byas
197a1(1): gsal gyur pa'i/ gang de ltar log par gol ba ste tshar bcad pa'i phyir/ phrin las bzhis rim par btul zhing tshar bcad nas/ mthong lam skyes shing dbugs phyin pa'o// de la sbyor ba byas pas sngon gyi las ci spyad dran zhing gsal bar gyur to// nor
197a2(1): pas yid ches 'gyod pa nyid// de phyir sngar ldan gyi las dang / lha spyod log pa la log par shes shing the tshom za bas gdung ba dang / 'gyod pa drag po skyes te/ sngar rang gi las spyad pa rnams nor bar shes pas/ dpal gyis sgrib pa sbyangs pas/ sngar las la 'gyod
197a3(1): pa'o// gang de phyis 'jug med pa'i sems// gal te sngar gyi bya ba log par shes nas de'i nyes pa khong du chud pas 'khrul pa phyis mi skye bas// skye ba dang las shes/ skye ba sngon du gyur pas phyis der mi 'jug pa'i sems skyes pa'o// gdung bas zhen pa mngon bsal
197a4(1): nas// gang gi shugs kyis gdung ba ni/ gdung ba de sngar gyi las nyon dang sgrib pa'i bag chags yun ring por bsags pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de mngon du bsal ba ni/ rtogs pa dang ting nge 'dzin spyod pa'i gdung ba drag pos nyes pa bsal bas zhal mthong ste// bla mar
197a5(1): drin bsab lus gdan phul// de ltar zhal mthong bas bag chags phra ba sbyang ba'i phyir/ bla ma la drin bsab pa'i ye shes bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ lus gdan du phul nas dgongs pa bsgral bas thugs rje'i byin rlabs shar te/ chu drangs pa dang zla ba lta bu'o// rang
197a6(1): sems snying po mthong ba'i rgyu// de yang skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / dus dang sngar gang du skyes pa'i du kha rnams mthong bar byed pa'i rgyus ni dang bas rang lus gdan du phul ba'o// da lta nyid du mthong bar snang / zhal mthong zhing sgrib pa dag nas/ ting nge 'dzin
197b1(1): g.yon du bya ba ni// 'dzin pa'i rba rlabs rengs pa nyid// rnam thar smon pa med pa'i sgo// de bzhin dbu mar sbyangs byas pa// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi rba rlabs rengs// rnam thar stong pa nyid kyi sgo// 'bras bu
197b2(1): gsum la sbyangs pa ni// thabs rgyud dag par byed pa'o// de bzhin shes rab rgyud la yang // g.yas g.yon gnyis nas 'phro ba med// dbu mar song nas tshangs pa'i sgor// sgro dang bsdu ba rab tu bya// rba rlabs
197b3(1): gsum dang rnam thar gsum// thabs dang shes rab rnam pa gnyis// so sor dag par bya ba'i phyir// yab yum gnyis kyi dbu ma nas// lus khams bdud rtsi'i dngas ma nyid// 'od zer gtsug tor mchog
197b4(1): tu thim// yab yum sku lnga lhun grub dran// nyams ni gang skyes nges pa med// ci skyes byung rgyal gtang bar bya// rgyu mthun pa yi 'bras bu ni// lus kyi skra dkar 'joms pa'o// rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu
197b5(1): ni// lus kyi stobs kyang ster bar byed// skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yis// lce dang dpung pa rnam par 'phel// dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu ni// nyi zla tshe mnyam 'chi med 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde
197b6(1): ba chen po'i rgyud las/ lam gyi bdud rtsi bsgrub pa las// de nyid rigs lnga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku gsang chen rigs gcig 'di gsungs so// snod rnams tha
198a1(1): snang de dag nyid// dug gis dug nad gso ba ltar/ nyon mongs lngas dbang bskur ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab pa'i skye bo gang la re dogs chad pa'i dus su/ chags pa lnga'i brda gang snang ba de dag nyid yongs su byin gyis brlab par mdzad pa'o// dang po
198a2(1): bar dang tha ma nyid// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gi phyir chos thams cad rang gi sems su gsal zhing / de nyid nam mkha' ltar mthong bas dang po yang chos nyid do// de la brda chen pos dug lnga nyid gsal ba ngo bo stong pas de nyid chos nyid du mthong ste de yang de nyid du rang
198a3(1): grol bar 'gyur ro// de dag gi dpe chu las byung ba'i chu lngar bzhin no// ro gcig ma skyes rang bzhin gsal// de ltar nyon mongs chos nyid du gsal ba ltar dran rtog ci byung / gang skyes thams cad chos nyid bde ba chen por ro gcig par 'gyur te rang bzhin gyis
198a4(1): gsol lo// phyin chad kun kyang de bzhin no// de ltar rtogs pa bstan par skyes nas/ phyin chad nyon mongs lnga dang / spyod yul dran rtog gang snang rnams ma lus pa de kho na nyid du gsal bas/ zag pa la sbrul 'dzin gyi zhen pa log pa'am/ rlabs dang chu bur ngo shes pa la
198a5(1): sa gsum du bsal du med pa bzhin no// phyi nang 'tsho ba'i yo byad lnga// rig pa ma skyes pa nyid phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa lngar rang bzhin shar nas/ longs spyod rgyas par gyur pa dang // nang thabs shes yab yum la bde ba chen po'i longs spyod gcig la
198a6(1): lnga rdzogs pa gsal ba ni/ kha cig gi ni spang bya yin yang / 'dir ye shes chen por mtshon cing nyams chen po yin no// bya byed ma skyes rang bzhin mthong // de ltar gang gis ston ces na rig pa nyid ma skyes pa las/ yul lnga ji ltar shar yang / de nyid bde ba chen po
198b1(1): sa mi gzhan par mthong la de nyid kyang gnyen pos ma bcos pas rang grol zhing stong par gsal lo// nang gi lnga yang bde chen gyis gzugs la sogs pa ste/ bde ba chen po nyid lngar snang la de yang tha mal dang / lha'i rang bzhin dang / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang stong pa'i cho 'phrul
198b2(1): las gzhan ma yin par gsal ba'o// nges par mthong bas ngo bo med// de dag kyang ji ltar mthong zhe na/ ji srid du man ngag dang thabs kyi nges pa'i shes rab skyes pa'i tshe/ tha dad dang rang rgud pa'i zhen pa log cing / rig pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal la ma 'dres pa ngo bo
198b3(1): stong par mthong ba'o// chu bur sprin dang chu ris ltar// de'i nyams dang dpe ni/ chu drangs pa la chu bur skyes nas/ yang chu nyid du grol ba dang nam mkha' la sprin byung nas de nyid du grol ba dang / chu la rkyen gyis ri mo ji ltar bris kyang chu nyid yin la de yang chur grol ba
198b4(1): bzhin no// nges med rang sems dbyings la gtugs// de ltar chos thams cad rig pa nam mkha' ltar mtha' dbus med pa nyid nyon mongs lnga dang / 'dod yon lnga/ dran rtog gi 'du shes su rang gi sems ji lta bar shes te/ de nyid chos dbyings thog mtha' med
198b5(1): pa'i ngo bo la gnas shing grol lo// snang ba sems la gang zhugs pas// de bas na ji snyed pa'i snang ba rang bzhin gyis sems nyid ma bcos pa'i thig le la rtogs pa'i nyams kyi ngang du zhugs pas sgo gsum gyis bya btsal med par rig pa gang ltar gsal yang / 'du
198b6(1): shes kun las grol bas de bzhin nyid do// yul sems bden pa'i 'du shes med// de la yul nyid rig par snang ba dang / snang ba nyid sems su 'dus par gsal bas/ yul la bden pa'i 'du shes med la/ sems la sems kyis bltas pas/ ngo bo gang yang
199a1(1): mthong ba med par bstan pa dang / sems kyang bden par ma grub cing med de gang du 'du shes dang bya ba zad pa de ni chos nyid ma bcos pa ste/ de la ni bsgom mi bsgom gang yang bdag tu med do// dus gsum ma bcos snying po'i sems// gang du
199a2(1): lung dang bla ma'i man ngag gis/ snang srid byang chub sems nyid ma bcos pa'i bde ba chen por gtan la phebs nas de dag nyid la nges par gnas pa'i tshe/ dus gsum du gzung du med pa'i rig pa ma skyes pa la gnyen po dang thabs kyis 'thos su med de snying po byang chub kyi sems
199a3(1): sra rang gsal ba'o// dngos su bltas pas 'du shes med// de nyid la gnas par bya ba ni/ lnga rtse spangs pa'i bde ba chen po la gnas pa'i dus su rang rig cing dran pa dang / bran mong dang gzhan dngos la bskas pas kyang / 'du shes kyang med la rang gi nga bo la bsas
199a4(1): kyang 'du shes thams cad las gros par 'gyur te chu dang nam mkha' bzhin no// snga phyi rtog pa'i ris mi gcad// de la rig pa'i gnas lugs ni snga phyi spangs pa'i bde ba chen po la gnas pa'i dus su dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo la/ rigs snga ma'i rjes mi bcad phyi
199a5(1): ma la yid mi 'jug/ da ltar rang gi ngo bo la blo mi gnas te rang bzhin gyis gsal ba'o// phyi rol gang mthong yul nyid de// gal te rtog pa chung ngam yun ring nas yul du ston pa byung na gang gi tshe don mi gsal bas shes pa yul lnga la g.yo ba byung ba'i tshe shes pa la gang
199a6(1): snang ba de nyid yul nyid do// de nyid brtags pas nang la thug/ yul de nyid gang la byung brtags pas/ gzhan las ma byung ste/ nang gi sems nyid la thug go// gnyis ka sems nyid dben pa ste// 'o na phyi nang gnyis kar snang ba'i sems de gang yin zhe na/
199b1(1): bshad pa'i phyi rol gyi snang ba dang nang rig pa'i snang ba gnyis ka sems nyid kho na yin la/ de la ni phyi nang du rgyu ba'i 'du shes kyis dben pa ste/ phyogs su zhen pa ma lus pa zad pa'i phyir ro// brtags pas stong pa'i ngang la thim// de'i tshe yul dang shes pa cir snang
199b2(1): zhing mthong ba la bltas pas gnyen po med par rang nyid stong ste/ phyogs kyi zhen pa zad pa la bya'o// dran rig gang byung bltas pas 'jig/ 'o na lta byed kyi rig pa de yod dam zhe na/ gang du phyi rol gyi zhen pa ma lus par zad kyang myong ba dang tshor ba dang zhen pa dang
199b3(1): yid la byed cing snyam du sems pa de ni dran rig ste/ de lta bu sna tshogs gang byung yang / ngo bo la bltas pas rang bzhin du 'jig par 'gyur te/ de ni rang byung rang zhi'o// de 'dra'i nyams ldan dbang bskur bya// nam mkha' nas yum rnams kyis tshogs su bcad pa'i
199b4(1): dbyangs brjod/ lha mo rnams kyis mchod pa 'bul byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bkra shis brjod/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bum pas dbang bskur bas/ rA tra'i rnam shes la gnas pa'i las nyon gyi bag chags ma lus pa dag nas me long lta bu'i ye shes su gyur to// de yang
199b5(1): nyon mongs zhe sdang dag/ rnam shes kyi phung po gnas 'gyur/ me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis bag chags bdag gi rgyud la bzhag pas lus mi bskyod pa'i rdul phra rab kyis gang ba'o// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi/ sku gsung thugs kyi// gsang gsum gnas
199b6(1): las byung ba yi/ khams gsum sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa'i// rdo rje'i sems dpa'i bum pa dbang bskur chen po sbyin// sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ sngags kyis dbang bskur/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rin po che'i cod pan
200a1(1): bdag gi spyi bor bzhag nas dbang bskur bas nyon mongs pa nga rgyal dag/ tshor ba'i phung po rin 'byung du gnas 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis bag chags bdag gi rgyud la bzhag pas rin 'byung gi rdul phra rab kyis bdag gis lus gang bar bsam
200a2(1): mo// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi/ sku gsung thugs kyi// gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yis/ khams gsum sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa// rin chen 'byung ldan cod pan gyi dbang bskur chen po khyod la
200a3(1): sbyin// sngags kyis bum pa bzhag pa// sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ sbyar mkhan// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang / bskur ba'i bya// de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de/ lam duH
200a4(1): dngos// 'bras pa// shin tu grub phyir rdo rje long // lag g.yas su rdo rje byin nas dbang bskur bas nyon mongs 'dod chags 'du shes so sor rtog pa rA tra'i rgyud la bzhag pas/ lus snang ba mtha' yas kyi rdul phra rab kyis gang ba'o// oM badz+ra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM badz+ra
200a5(1): sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sngags kyis brtan par bya ba/ lag pa g.yon pa dril bu byin nas dbang bskur bas nyon mongs pa phrag dog dag bya ba grub pa'i ye shes/ 'du byed kyi phung po/ don yod grub par gnas 'gyur/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes/ rwa tra'i slad la bzhag pas don grub kyi rdul phra
200a6(1): rab kyis lus gang ba'o// 'di ni rdzas gang shes rab dril bu ste// de ring slob ma gang khyod la dbang bskur bas/ rigs kyi lha gang / las kyi rigs su bdag gyur te/ ji ltar bskur na// chos nyid grub phyir dril bu long // oM badz+ra
200b1(1): sngags kyis byin brlab pa/ a ti du ma sa ma ya haM haM/ gang gis bskur na// rnam par snang mdzad ston pa yis/ gang la bskur na/ khyod la rdo rje'i ming de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ming gi dbang bskur nas ming btags pas/ gti mug/ gzugs
200b2(1): rnam snang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ btags pas// gang nyid bskur na// 'di nas sangs rgyas sar 'gro ba// rdo rje'i ming 'di gzung bar bya// oM badz+ra sa twa a b+hi Shiny+tsa sngags kyi ming btags pa/ saM badz+ra a b+hi She ka/ ga ming btags nas
200b3(1): bod pa// kye kye dpal ldan rdo rje che ge mo// hUM oM ya/ lag pa g.yas par rdo rjes dbang bskur bas thabs rdo rje las snying rje ma 'gags par rdzogs par gtang ba ni// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de// phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug/ rtag par khyod
200b4(1): kyis kyang lag pa'i srin lag la rtag tu bcir bzung ste/ lag na rdo rje'i brtul shugs dang ldan/ par bya'o// ye shes lnga/ oM sarba thams cad ta thA ga ta sarba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ta thA de bzhin sid+d+hi grub pa badz+ra rdo rje sa ma ya hUM/ dam
200b5(1): tshig/ rdo rje'i de kho na nyid brjod pa// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' ni sgra gsung thugs 'khor ba'i nyes pa dang bral nas kyang 'das kyi/ bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu bzang po bzang ste dang du mi len ngan nye dor ba med
200b6(1): pas kun bdag nyid// bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu la'o// oM ma hA badz+raHhUM/ rdo rje chen po/ lha gang gang bskur// 'di de rnal 'byor ma shes rab dril bu skye ba med par mkhyen pa'o// kun gyi/ don gang
201a1(1): bskur// shes rab dbyangs kyis rjes 'gror bshad/ khyod kyis kyang ni lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag la dril ba/ rtag tu bcing / pas sgrib pa bral te nyon mongs lnga dag/ byang chub mchog tu ye shes rgyas te mkhyen pa ma lus pa
201a2(1): dang ldan rgyal bas bzhed/ d+harma d+hA tu chos dbyings skye med a/ dril bu'i de nyid brjod pas// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ srid pa rang ga nga ma stong pas na// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas srid bral stong par gnas byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i
201a3(1): sems 'khor ba ngo bos dag par rtog pa dang ldan na// srid pa dam pa mo'i nang na dgongs pa can/ byed par 'gyur/ spu ltar bsam/ oM AHgsung dril ba hUM/ thugs rdo rjer bsam/ ka ya bA ka tsit+ta sa ma ya/ dam tshig sbyin pa/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/
201a4(1): dbang bskur ba// bcom ldan thugs chos sgrar gnas pa zhi ba chen po kye/ gzugs sgra dang dbyer/ mi phyed phyag rgya rab tu bsgrub/ bla ma'i bde ba dang slob ma dbyer med// rdo rje'i sbyor bas yab yum sbyor ba las skye med kyi don/ yang dag
201a5(1): byung // bdag nyid chen po dpal chen po yab yum khyod ji bzhin/ ltar/ srid pa gsum gyi// mnga' bdag ru tra bdag la'ang de bzhin dbang bskur mdzod/ ru tra la sogs// 'khor ba'i dpe 'dam rdza ba lta bu'i gyi tshogs kyi nang
201a6(1): du// bying ba bskyab med bdag la rgyal ba'i thugs rjes skyobs// ji ltar rgyal ba ston pa sangs rgyas kyis/ 'khor/ byang chub sras la dbang bskur ltar// bdag gis yab yum sbyor ba byas pa'i byang sems lce thog tu bzhag pas gsang
201b1(1): paba'i dbang gis ni// sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro// nam mkha'i he ru yum snyoms 'jug gi sgras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba bskul nas yab kyi thugs kar zhu/ yab yum sbyor mtshams na thig le mu tig gi phreng ba lta bu/ ru tra'i lce thog
201b2(1): tu thim pas mgrin pa'i rtsa mig tshim par byas/ gsang ba'i dbang thob par bskur ba'o// he ru ka nyid// mgon po sprul pa'i rA tra ste gdul bya'i ming 'dul byed la/ khyod// mtshan ni[:]he ru ka dpal nyid// bde ba mchog bde/ bral ba de/ lhan skyes kyi bde
201b3(1): ba/ bzhi dang rab ldan pa'i// shes rab ye shes bdag la zhu// dga' ster gnas ster lha mo ni// sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ma// zung zhig zung zhig sems dpa' che// zung la mchod pa rtag tu gyis// yum
201b4(1): reg rdo rje mar sprul nas rA tra'i lag pa g.yas su yum gyi lag pa g.yon pa gtad de// gzugs la blta/ sgra la nyan/ dri la mnam/ ro la myang / reg bya'o byed/ skad cig ma bzhi la dga' ba bzhi nyams su myong nas lhan skyes kyi bde bas khyab pas ting nge 'dzin khyad par can skyes
201b5(1): mo// zhabs kyi 'khor mo spyi bor btegs nas/ khyed zhabs pad+ma'i bka' drin gyis// gtso bo dbang bskur sgra bum pa/ gsung gsang ba/ thugs shes rab ye shes/ rnam gsum thob// de ring lus ngag yid gsum dbyer med pa/ rnam pa bzhi po
201b6(1): yang // gtso bos dag la bka' drin stsol// ye shes 'di ni rtsa srog shing gsum las byung ba'i ye shes 'di ni phra zhing phra bas phra ba ste/ zab mo rtogs par dka' bas so// ches phra zhing // rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil nam mkha' stong kyang rtogs par
202a1(1): dka' ba lta bu/ rnam tog gi/ rdul dang bral bas de bzhin nyid du mtha' ste zhi ba nyid/ do// draH/ khyod nyid kyang ni da las skyes pas na khyod kyi pha/ yang na yin no// zhes pas lus ngag yid dang ni// gsum ka'i
202a2(1): dri ma dag par rig/ bum dbang lus kyi dri ma dag/ gsang dbang gis ngag gi dri ma dag/ shes rab ye shes kyis sems kyi dri ma dag/ bde ba chen pos gsum ka dag go/ de yan chad ting nge 'dzin ye shes su langs pa'i ru tra'o// rig pa rnal 'jog rU tra
202a3(1): ni// rang gsal phyogs dang bral ba'i shes pa// skyes bu rang gi mtshan dpe la blta/ ba bzhin no// rang zhal rang gis mthong bar 'dod/ pha'o// rtogs nas rang bzhin ma bcos te// lung chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
202a4(1): sems nyid ye nas phyogs zhen med pa la mkhas pa rnams kyis lung la brten pa'i man ngag gis snying gi mun pa bsal nas/ snang ba dang dran rtog thams cad de kho na nyid du rtogs nas/ rig pa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin la blo ma bcos par gzhag pa'o// chu yi rlabs ltar tha
202a5(1): da med// de nyams kyi dpe bstan pa'i phyir/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs sna tshogs byung yang / ngo bo chur gcig pa ltar/ mthong ba dag pa dang ma dag pa'i khyad par gyis/ nyams dang snang tshul ji ltar snang yang / rig pa'i ye shes mtha' dbus med par gcig cing gsal
202a6(1): lo// cir snang rang sems skye med nyid// rnal 'byor pa yi dgongs pa la skyon dang yon tan dang / mtshan ma dang / drod rtags cir snang yang / de'i ngo bo sems nyid du gsal bas nyams la dgag bsgrub med de gcig tu gsal ba'o// ngo bo mi 'gyur bcos su med//
202b1(1): dper na chu'i rlabs dang kha dog ro'i khyad par dag rang bzhin dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis ngo bo mi 'gyur zhing bcos su med pa ltar/ rig pa ma skyes par rtog pa'i ngang las mtshan ma dang byung tshor gang shar yang / de nyid du gcig pas na/ nyams la dgag bsgrub med de gcig tu
202b2(1): gsal lo// mthun dang mi mthun byung tshor ni/ ma ltos par rnal du 'jog par bstan pa ni/ rig pa'i mtshan nyid rgyu rkyen la ma ltos shing / gnyen po med par gsal bas rig pa ma skyes pa nyid/ rig pa la mthun zhing dga' ba dang / mi mthun zhing mi dga' ba gnyis ka
202b3(1): rig pa ma skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal ba'o// chu rkyen gnyis po dang bral bar// de'i phyir dngos po gang la 'dus pa'i rkyen med par de la ni 'jig pa'i gnyen po med de/ ma skyes shing ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro// gang la ngo bo med par mthong zhing gsal ba la gnyen po brten
202b4(1): mi dgos par shes pa'o// ngo bo mthong bas ye shes gsal// de ltar chos thams cad rig pa ma skyes par 'dus la/ de nyid ji lta bar ngo bor gsal bas/ de las ci byung ba thams cad kyang ye shes su gsal ba'o// de las bcos 'dzin thams cad la rnam par grol
202b5(1): ba'o// snga phyi khyad med de bzhin nyid// ma bcos lhun grub rA tra ni// dngos pa rtogs pa la dus lnga phyi med de/ rgya la ra mo bris kyang rang zhig pa sar/ dus la 'dzin pa med par de bzhin nyid rang gsal bas/ sa shes dus thams cad pa'o// des na chos bsas
202b6(1): cad ji bzhin par rang gsal bar dus gsum dang rnam par rtog pa gang yang ngo bo skye ba med par rang bzhin gsal ba'o// rig pa rnal du 'jog pa'i ru tra'o// klong yang sa snying por chub shes pa/ thams cad/ nam mkha'i ngang du gnas shing 'byung 'jug
203a1(1): byed/ bas tham// dang po der byung tha mar thim// rig pa ji ltar gang gsal kyang // nyam nga med par rang bzhin gnas// dang za dajam tha' ltar gnas pa'i dan na ji sar brgyad pa'i man ngag gis chags nas/ rdo dan la
203a2(1): phyin ci ma log par rnal du bzhag pas// goms nas mthar phyin pa'i dus na rig pa'i gzugs brtan sna tshogs pa nam mkha'i cho 'phrul dang rgya mtsho'i gzugs brtan ltar dngos po sna tshogs ji ltar shar zhing gang ltar gsal yang nyam nga med par rang bzhin gnas pa'o// rang
203a3(1): byung rang snang de bzhin nyid// de nyid rig pa ma bcos par snang bas/ snang tshul ma bcos par lhun gyis grub pa ni bshad pa ltar yang ye nas yin pa la/ thabs kyis ma nor bar rig pa la/ sgo gsum dang spyod lam bzhi dang rig pa rang byung zhing rang snang ba yang ngo bo de
203a4(1): bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'o// mthong rtags goms pa'i skyes bu la// man ngag la brten nas rang gi sems ji bzhin pa'i lkog nges par mthong zhing chos thams cad ma bcos par rtogs nas shes pa shin tu goms shing mthar phyin pa ni rgyal ba nyid dang 'dra bas
203a5(1): skyes bu zhes so// sgo gsum mdzad pa phyogs ris med// de lta bu la dgongs pa nyams pa dang tha mal gyi 'du shes nyams pa dang zhen rtog mi 'byung ba dang / sgo gsum gyi mdzad pa la phrogs ris med pa ste/ de'i phyir na rang don du yang nyam nga ba dang / mi mthun pa'i re
203a6(1): dogs kyi chos med la/ gzhan don du yang mos pa mtha' yas pa la/ gnang bkag med par ched du ma byas par gang ltar yang 'char ba la/ gang ltar yang phyogs ris med pa'o// des na lung thob byin rlabs ldan// gang du btags pa'i zhen pa zad de/ mi gnas pas
203b1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i lung mngon du thob cing / sku gsung thugs de bzhin nyid du/ rdo rje dbyer med par byin gyis brlabs la rang nyid kyang byin gyis brlabs la gzhan dag pa rnams la byin gyis brlabs shing grol bar mdzad do// de phyir gdug byed rA tra yi// sgrub
203b2(1): pa phyi rabs rnams don bshad// gru gsum rtsangs thod me dpung 'bar// thod pa'i nang du ling+ga gzhug/ dang po dkyil 'khor bya ba ni/ grir shi ba'i sa la gru gsum sum brtsegs byas la/ 'og ma la rtsangs/ bar ma la thod pa/ steng ma la me dpung
203b3(1): bri/ gru gsum nang du thod pa mtshan ngan gyi nang du dgra'i leng+ga gzhug/ steng nas 'khor los kha gcad par bya'o// rdzas rnams kyis mtha' ma legs par bskor ro// bka' srung gi bcas so// dbus la// gru gsum nag po la ling+ga zla gam la dgra'i lha/ wa// mu khyud la
203b4(1): yang yum gyi sngags gling drug 'khor/ gyi sngags/ mu khyud gling // nyer bzhi la las sngags phyi ris la zod phreng ngo / pad gri thod pas mdzes/ lha/ gang gi las bsgrub pa lha de'i yi lto bar 'khor/ lo bca' 'o// rta lug bya khyi nag po yab/
203b5(1): kyidzas// mon dang nal snying sna yum gyi rdzas gta'/ gtsa ba la/ gtor ma dpal bshos dar nag mda'// bdud kyi ni re nag sgrub pa'i rdzas/ gri mda' bshos bu nag/ srog bdag rgyal ba 'ad sa dkar po'i rdzas bshom pa
203b6(1): mda' dar dkar// ma mo rdo rje bde chen gyi rdzas sme sha 'bru drug dug/ klu gnyan nag po srog gcod// klu sman sna tshogs dkar gtor klu// btsan btsan rje dmar po lag ring la gri mda' bshos bu dmar// za 'og mda' dar ging
204a1(1): chen rdo rje legs/ ba'i rdzas so// mgon po g.yas bing gson thod pa mdog nag pa thag la bcibs/ pa'o// ma mo// nag mo dre'u la zhon pa thod pa thogs pa can// bdud nag po g.yas khram shing g.yon zhags pa rta nag po la
204a2(1): bcibs/ pa'o// srog bdag dkar po g.yas 'khor lo g.yon gri rta dkar/ zhon pa'o// ma mo bong zhon nag mo dre'u rta g.yas kha T+wAM g.yon thod// klu ldang nag g.yas sbrul g.yon sbal pa chu srin zhon// btsan dmar dar dmar po g.yas mdung dar
204a3(1): mdung g.yon sbrul rta dmar/ po la zhon/ rdo rje legs pa g.yas// rdor g.yon snying mdog ljang ser dgra bla yin/ e badz+ra hri la rngubs dpal phyag na rdo rje gtum po'i sngags kyis gong mnan pa/ nI laM pa sa a ne u ne hr-i da ye/ badz+ra yak+sha
204a4(1): ka la/ dpal mgon po nag po'i/ ma hA g+ha Na g+hu tri hr-i da ya/ badz+ra ging ka ra rak+Sha ka li/ ma ma mu khram ma mo dral na gzhon pa'i khrag la mu shi hring / du na ru tra ru thum b+ha ti/ bdud ri nag spangs pa'i/ ra tsa tsa pa la rgyal po 'ad sa dkar
204a5(1): po'i/ a shug me/ ma trag rak+Sha nag mo mkha' 'gro rdo rje bde chen gyi/ ti lam b+h+yo/ na ga hu daM na ga du ru/ klu gnyan nag po srog gcod kyi/ shu la ra tsa tri shaM dza yaM/ btsan rje dmar po lag ring // badz+ra tri na sA d+hA kha bruM tri/ ging chen rdo rje legs
204a6(1): pa'i/ srog la thum ri la/ gong ma rnams la las sngags skra gri gdags pa/ rtsa la bred shag/ tsit+ta thun rmugs/ khrag thibs rbad/ ling shag rbad/ nr-i hur thum dza khr-i rbad// pho lhog gtong na dgra lha'i lto bar bcas mtshon cha
204b1(1): dang // gri rgod 'dod na btsan gyi lto bar bskor ba'i rim pa dang / mdze nad 'dod na klu yi lto bar gnas// rims nad dal yams khrag gi ma mos 'debs// 'thib nad kyis myos par 'dod na drag po bdud yin la// smyo
204b2(1): 'bog gtong bar 'dod na rgyal por lto bar bskor ro// shes pa nyid/ de dag nag po yab yum gyi lto bar bskor zhing sngags kyang gang byed tha mar gdon// kun gyi rtsa ba rA tra nyid// yab dang yum la yang dag gnas// mun nag dmag 'dren
204b3(1): yab yum mgon gyi rtags/ zhu ba can 'ong / mgon po nyid kyi rtags// ban+de g.yag dre'u mon nag bdud/ bdud mgon gyi rtags// skyes pa skya shar seng ge ging / rgyal mgon// bu med ma sring ma mo nyid/ ma mgon// sbal lcong mtsho
204b4(1): dang sbrul ni klu/ mgon// rta dmar khra lug skyes pa btsan/ mgon// zhang blon sgra skrag sbyang ku gang mgon rdor legs// snying po gang yin rtags gang byung des las byed pas las la sbyar/ brda dang sbyar// dpal mgon po nag po yab wam
204b5(1): lha srin sde brgyad du gnas pa'i gnas/ yum bzhag pa'i bdun sum dang brgyad// dur khrod pho brang lcags mkhar nas// rA tra nag po yab yum gtso// 'khor drug 'khol bar byed pa nyid/ yum gyi/ khrag yab kyi dug thun dang bcas pas
204b6(1): brabs// bdud mgon gyi yul kha rag sgo dgu nas// bdud mgon gyi ming ri nag spangs pa yis/ las 'thib nad sna tshogs bdag po yin/ rgyal mgon gyi// rgyal yul nam mkha' phyad phyod nas// rgyal ming mgon 'od
205a1(1): lha dkar po yi// shel mkhar nang nas las sgro 'bog bdag/ ma ma mo'i mgon po'i yul byang shar mtsho gling nas// ma mgon ming rdo rje bde chen gyis/ las rims dang da la yams bdag mor
205a2(1): gnas// klu mgon gyi yul na rag sing sngon na// klu gnyen ming srog gcod mgon po nag/ las/ mdze dang shu ba pho 'bras mkhyen// btsan gyi mgon po'i yul zangs thang dmar po nas// btsan mgon ming btsan rje
205a3(1): lag rings kyis// glang thabs las gri rgod las rnams yin// shar ging mgon pa'i yul lhor rin chen thang dkyil nas// ging ming mgon rdo rje legs pa yis// nad kyang las gzir thabs pho lkog mkhyen// dpal
205a4(1): ldan ma ha ka la ni/ gtso ba 'od sa 'khor ging sde brgyad do// de'i nang na yum bzhugs// g.yas ser g.yon ldang mthing nag dbus// wa'i dmag dpon byed cing zhwa'i ded dpon ka ru btul nas// g.yas kyi dang po bing chen la/ phyag rdor gyis
205a5(1): dbang bskur bas// bar ma rdo rje rtse mo lnga/ las mkhan du mnga' gsol bas// tha ma gnam lcags phur pa 'dril/ bdud rtsi kye thog tu bzhag nas dam la btags pas so// g.yon gyi dang po dung dmar gsol/ srin po rnams dang gshin rjes phul bas// bar ma dbyug
205a6(1): tos myos par byed// tha ma dug klu rnams kyis byin pas sbrul zhags pa 'phen// oM phyag na rdo rje'i sngags badz+ra pA Ne a d+hi pa sngags sor bzhag ta ye/ badz+ra ma ha dpal mgon po'i sngags ka la dun ke/ ya/ king / khe/ ka ra tro ta ni hring // ga/ g+ha
205b1(1): na g+hA ti pa tra dun// ngi/ badz+ra yak+ka tri rna d+ha sha wam sngags sa// ci// ma ma thag nyid nag mo shaM/ che/ tig+ha ka li tsa mun ti// dzaM/ yak+ka nag mo tsiny+tsa sham/ bsad pa sgra gro'i sngags/ ke/ dgra bo'i srog la breng shag rbad/
205b2(1): khaikhe/ tsit+ta phyung rak+ta thems rbad/ snying 'byin khrag dang bag chags// gai/ rtsa la zang zang thum ril zad/ rtsa chen bzhi bcad pa// ngi/ nr-i hur thums dza dun dun shag/ srog rang dbang med par 'phrog pa/ ce/ srog rtsa dun rmugs myangs khram
205b3(1): rbad/ rtsa phran brgyad bcad pa// che/ tsi ta ro myags ling shag rbad/ dngas ma lnga bcad pa// ngi/ snying khrag tshal pa yi ling zad/ rtsal dbugs kyi thig le bsdub/ thum ri li li dun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ bor gyi dus su gdags// staM b+ha dza nan/ mnan
205b4(1): pa'i dus su gdags// 'bru bdun nyin dril mtshan gtong yab yum sngags/ snod ngan la ma spel bar// rab tu gsang bar bya ba'o// de yan chad rgyas pa'o// ru tra rnam pa bzhir 'dod de// gnas lugs rgyu yi rA tra dang // gsang ba'i
205b5(1): smras gsang sngags nang pa la gnas pa ltar thabs lam gang zag 'ga'i spyod yul du byung bar gnas so// gol rkyen lam gyi rA tra dang / ngo bo nyid kyi sgra ni lam ji ltar snang yang ngo bo sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gro 'dod rA tra ji ltar snang yang ma rtogs pa'i gol sa
205b6(1): yin// gol ba sngon byung rA tra dang // ni longs sgra ste rA tra skyes dus na gsang sngags kyis btul te/ gsang sngags longs spu'i chos yin pa'o// gol 'gro rjes 'jug rU tra yin// sbrul sgra ste sbrul sgra'i bstan pa la chos ma gol bar phyogs ris med par bslab
206a1(1): dgos pa yin pas so// rgyu yi ru tra rnam pa gnyis// grol lam blta ba dang sbyar ba dang / thabs lam dbang / dang sbyar ba'o// de yang gang zag dbang po rab bas pa rtogs na sangs rgya ba dang / 'bring bas pa dang dbang gnyis ka la
206a2(1): brten pa'o// thabs lam grol lam dbang po 'bring gis zung du 'brel bar byed pa'o// dang po kun kyang rU trar skyes// pha ma bla ma g.yog dang bcas// rang nyid rU trar skyes pa'i lus// grol lam chos sgra dang sbyar na rang gi pa ni slob dpon rgyal
206a3(1): ba'i 'khor lo// legs pa slob pa'o// ma ni g.yog po ste byams par byed pas so// rang nyid rA tra dge slong nag po ste/ pha ma gnyis ka la sdang ba'o// lus rA trar skyes pa dang 'dra ste/ dge ba bslabs kyang mi byed la/ sdig pa ma bslabs kyang byed pas so// de bas na rgyu'i rA tra yin
206a4(1): no// mi dge bcu spyad ngan song gsum// lus kyi sgo nas gsum/ srog gcod ma byin len mi tshangs spyod/ ngag gi bzhi rdzun phra ma ngag 'khyal tshig rtsub/ yid kyi gsum brnab sems gnod sems// log lta/ dngos po bzhi la spyad pas dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gro skye ba
206a5(1): ngas so// las smin thams cad rkul bas 'dren// mi dge bcu zad nas/ dge bcu'i gnas su skye ba ni sangs rgyas kyi lam la zhugs pa yin te/ rU tra ngan song gi las zad nas rA trar skyes pa dang 'dra/ skyes nas btul ba ltar dge bcu la zhugs so/ dbang
206a6(1): bskur sangs rgyas sar 'dren no// dbang bskur bla mas dbang bskur nas theg pa la zhugs nas/ bskyed rdzogs bsgom pa ni rA tra dkyil 'khor du bcug ste sangs rgya bar lung bstan pa lta bu'o// grol lam bsdus nas zhar la bstan pa'o// thabs lam gnyis po
206b1(1): steng 'og sgo// thabs lam gsang ba'i sku dang sbyar ba la gnyis te/ steng sgo yab dang sbyar ba ste/ snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo dang kun tu bzang po/ 'og sgo yum dang sbyar ba ste lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang kun tu bzang mor gnas so// d+harma tsakra chos kyi gnas// steng sgo
206b2(1): ni snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na rtsa ni rtsa ba gcig la bzhir gyes te/ de la yan lag brgyad du gyes nas gnas pa ni 'khor chos 'byung ba'o// de bas na chos kyi 'khor lo zhes btags pa yin no// dbus kyi snying po rgyal 'khor nyid// dbus kyi rtsa rtsa ba gcig 'dus pa'i
206b3(1): nang na byang sems chos slar gnas pa ni/ slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo dang sbyar ro// zhar byung dpon g.yog nyon mongs sgo// rig pa chos sbar ma rtogs pa'i zhar la byung ba ni/ nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni dge slong nag po ste dpon no// de las con can gyi yid byung
