206b4(1): ni 'i g.yog go// rtsa bzhi gdams ngag gol ba yis// ye shes kyi rtsa dang / chos nyid kyi/ yon tan gyi/ rang rgyud kyi rtsa bzhi ni gdams ngag ste/ rtsa bzhi la yid rnam 'gyu yang kun gzhi'i ngang du sprin dengs pa ltar gnas so// lta ba rtogs na dngos po bzhi la gnas
206b5(1): bcas kyang nam mkha' la sprin lngar 'gyur ro// rigs drug sa bon lus la 'khyams// a r+the swa tri pre du drug ni dge slong sta ba ma rtogs te 'khor ba ltar 'gro drug tu 'gro ba'i bag chags bde drug la bsags nas 'khor bar kha chud pas so// rang gnas bde
206b6(1): gshegs phung po lnga// rA tra rgyal bas 'dul ba ltar rang la gnas pa ni/ yum chos kyi dbyings su phung po lnga rigs lngar 'dus pas/ 'byung ba lnga yum lngar 'dus/ rnam shes sems dpar 'dus so// bka' bgros rtog tshogs sangs rgyas bcad// bka'
207a1(1): bgros pa ni phung po sangs rgyas yin min du bgros/ bka' bgros bcad pa ni rtog tshogs ye nas sangs rgyas sar bcad pa'o// dug lnga ye shes rang du bsad// rArwa tra bskal ba ni babs shes so so la btang bas la bral bas ma thul/ thabs shes sbyar
207a2(1): zhi gnas lhag mthong zur du 'brel ba'i sras kyis ma rig pa rang sar bsad do// rang gnas dkyil 'khor dbang thob ste// ma rig pa sangs pa dang / rang lus rigs lnga'i dbang bskur te thob pa ni ru tra dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur ba dang sbyar
207a3(1): ro// bde gshegs yi ge 'bru gsum po// oM sgra mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo// A gsung / hUM thugs su gnas te 'bru gsum gyis rigs drag gi yi ge mnan pa ni/ rA tra bstan pa bsrungs nas sangs rgyas so// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor mthong // ba ni rA
207a4(1): sangs rgyas zhal mthong ba'o// der srog snying phul nas bstan srung du khas blangs so// steng sgo dang sbyar nas kun tu bzang po bsgom pa'i man ngag go// ni ra ma tsakra'i pho brang na// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste/ phyi'i dbyibs ar gnas pa chos kyi dbyings nang na yi ge
207a5(1): rnams gnas pa chos kyi dbyings gnas kyi nang na 'khor 'das dang rnam shes gnas pa'o// yang na b+ha ga snod yi ge rnams bcud do// snying po a ni rkul 'khor nyid// slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo dang 'dra bar/ thams cad nas thams cad du ma bcos pa'i rnal 'byor
207a6(1): du gnas pa'o// k+Sha ni dge slong nag po ste// lte lkog na srin po'i yi ge k+Sha gnas pa ni ru tra'i sa bon te/ slob ma dge slong nag po'o// de yi drong ni g.yog por 'gyur// k+Sha'i drod ni lte ba na me dang mnyam pa'i rlung yod de/ des yi ge k+Sha'i g.yog byed pas g.yog
207b1(1): po dang sbyar ro// bde ba bzhi ni brtan pa'i lam// ru tra la bla mas gdams ngag gsungs pa ltar/ bde ba/ mchog bde/ bde bral gyi bde ba/ ldan skyes kyi dang bzhi gsungs pa las/ mgo bas gol ba ni/ srog gcod/ ma phyin len/ rdzun/ mi tshangs spyod bzhi las
207b2(1): 'byol thog tu spyod pa dang sbyar ro// ma rtogs rigs drug yi ge 'khor// lte ba na lha'i sa bon a dkar/ lha min gyi su ser/ mi nr-i sngo/ yi dwags bre dmar/ byol song du dud ka/ dmyal ba tri nag rnams 'dod khams kyi sa bon te/ rA tra de ngan song gsum du ltung ba dang
207b3(1): srin po dang lha dbang du bsdus pa dang sbyar ro// bsam gtan IM dang gzugs med a// yum gyi b+ha ga na au gnas pa ni bsam gtan gyi oM ste gzugs khams kyi lha'i sa bon no// lte ba sprul pa'i b+ha ga na a gnas pa ni/ gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi gnas
207b4(1): pa'o// rdo rje pad+ma'i sangs rgyas rnams// yab kyi rdo rje rigs lnga'i rgyal ba/ yum gyi pad+ma rigs lnga'i yum/ de rnams rtsa gnas chos kyi dbyings su tshogs nas bka' bgros pa ni/ nyon mongs lam du byed par bka' bgros pa'o// 'byung bzhi rlung 'dul bka'
207b5(1): bgros bcad// bde ba bzhi yang mdus par bka' bgros bcad/ dang po b+ha ga la rdo rje rig pa'i dus su sra bas/ de nas gsher ba rba/ dro ba me/ g.yo ba rlung gi thig le 'bebs pa'o// bde ba mchog bde bral bde dang // rnam rtog che la bde ba rung ba bde ba/
207b6(1): ba che la rnam rtog chung ba mchog bde/ de nyid tha mal dang 'jig rten pa la yod pas na 'khor ba'i mtha' yin no// 'khor ba nas 'dren pa dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'o// bral ba de ni rtog pa med pa bde bas 'das pa'i mthar zhen te/ lha la me tog phog dbang bskur
208a1(1): pa'o// lhan cig skyes pa de'i dkyil 'khor bcug/ sab gram rdo rje pad+ma phrad pas lhan cig tu skyes pa'i bde ba ni 'khor 'das kyi mabs ma rig pa ste dkyil 'khor du bcug nas rig 'dzin gyi lam la bgrod pa'o// zung 'jug hUM gi sar
208a2(1): gnas so// rlung sems gnyis 'brangs na rdo rje pad+ma grang 'jug bde bas/ yul pad+ma chos kyi dbyings/ yul can rdo rje ye shes kyis zhugs pa ni/ dbyings ye shes gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas gnas mir gnas kyang sangs rgyas par lung bstan pa ni/ rA tra lung bstan pa
208a3(1): bu'o// gol rkyen lam gyi rA tra ni// ngo bo nyid kyi sgra dang sbyar te/ gti mug kun la khyab pa dbang phyug chen po/ 'dod chags dbang du sdud pa gu la nag po/ zhe sdang sgrol bas ma hA de ba/ de gsum mu stegs pa'o// phyi pa mu stegs lam song ba// sngags kyi lta ba ma
208a4(1): rtogs na yang mu stegs par ltung bas rA tra yin ru tra kho na gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rgyu'o// mtshan nyid kyi lta ba ma rtogs na yang mu stegs su ltung ngo // mu stegs kho na mtshan nyid 'byung ba'i glu'o// sngags dang mtshan nyid ma rtogs pas// thams cad rU trar
208a5(1): go la bar 'gro// des na sngags mtshan nyid thams can ma rtogs na rU tra'i rgyu yin te/ lha dang / ting nge 'dzin/ spyod pa ma nor bar bya ba'o// lha chen la sogs chung ba dang / 'dod chags lha chen/ gti mug tshangs pa/ zhe sdang drag po zhe sdang ba ni sngags phyi pa la snang
208a6(1): ba ste/ bgegs dang log 'dren tsam du snang ba las/ bar gcod yin min du snang ste/ gtor ma cha gsum byin na srung ma'o// rgyu mtshan nyid kyi lam la// lha sbyin la sogs pa bdud bzhir snang ngo / 'bring po dang // gsang sngags nang pa la// rA tra thar pa nag po la
208b1(1): sogs par snang bas na sangs rgyas pa'i theg pa kun la gol rkyen lam gyi rA tra re snang ngo // gnas so/ rab tu bshad// gol ba sngon byung rA tra la// longs spu dang sbyar ro// kaM/ 'dod lugs rang rgyud dag par 'dod// sprul par 'dod/ gnyis dang
208b2(1): bshad/ khe/ thabs gnyis/ ge// nyams su blang lugs rnam pa gnyis// mthar phyin dbyer med lam cig car ba dang lam rim gyis pa/ de thams cad sems shes ma shes dang / rtogs ma rtogs yin te sems gcig tu gnas/ gcig tu
208b3(1): gnas// dam pa'i rigs can lnga la sogs pa khyed la phyag rdor gyis gsal bar bshad// ke// rang rgyud phyi yi rA tra 'di// bden pa yin na ma rA tra la spyir lugs gnyis su bzhed de/ gsang sngags sgra ji bzhin par spyad pas rgyu 'bras mi bslu ba la
208b4(1): dgongs te rang rgyud dam/ phyi'i rA tra dang / bdag tu 'dzin pa la dgongs te sprul pa'am nang gi rA tra'o// gal te de ltar min te gang rung gcig bden na/ sprul par bden na/ sems can dmyal ba drang don sdigs ri yin/ yang dag par mi bden par 'gyur ro// rang rgud par
208b5(1): bden na/ mdo sde las/ de'i tshe na lha sbyin ni gzhan yin snyam du ma rtogs shig/ ces pas sangs rgyas kyi che bar dbyung ba'i phyir sprul pa'o// 'di nyid nas kyang 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon 'byung ba zhes pa dang / dgongs 'dus las/ de nyid bdag rtogs yin pas na/ zhes pa dang /
208b6(1): sde brgyad pa'i 'khor/ rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i dran/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag yin pas/ zhes pas na lung dang 'gal lo// de'i phyir gnyis ka ltar ro// gzhung 'di ltar bzhed pa ni/ blo che ba dang lta ba can la sprul par snang / chung ba la rang rgyud par snang ste/ don 'khor ba
209a1(1): yang mi bden pa ltar ro/ bden pa min// sprul pa nang gi rA tra 'di// bden nam mi bden dpyad pa dang / gang rung gcig tu grub ma grub// gnyis ka bden par blo dang sbyar/ bshad thabs phyi phyi lam rang
209a2(1): rgyud pa dang nang ltar bshad pa/ nang gnyis po yang // phyi yi rU tra rang rgyud pa/ sgra ni ji bzhin bshad pa ste// ka/ rgyu dang / khe/ rkyen dang / ge/ 'bras bu gsum// de// bka' bgros/ bkas bcadame/ btul ba gsum//
209a3(1): dzaM// sgrib sbyangs/ 9dbang bskur/ te/ lung bstan gsum/ slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor los/ slob ma dge slong nag po la chos bshad pa'i// ke// rgyu ni gsang ba'i bka' bsgo log/ ji bzhin nyid de ma bcos na/ blta ba chos thams
209a4(1): cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs na ma byin len mi tshangs spyod rdzun srog gcod pa bzhi spyad// dngos po bzhi la gnas byas kyang // nam mkha' la ni sprin gyis mi gnod par/ dengs bzhin// rnal 'byor lta ba'i don rtogs pa la gnod byed med pas/ de
209a5(1): nyid dam pa'i lam// slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor los bshad// khaM/ rkyen ni slob ma dge slong nag po/ yang dag don ma rtogs// spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig bsrung ma shes te// sgra bzhin rnam par sprad gyur pa// ngag rtsub rdzun smras
209a6(1): ma byin len pa dang / chags pa rang dgar// mi tshangs spyod sems can rnams kyi srog bcad pa'o// ga/ 'bras bu ngan song kha brgyud nas// tha ma las kyi srin por skyes/ rA tra'i yon tan gyis/ khams gsum ma lus dbang du
209b1(1): bsdus// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams chos dbyings su 'dus nas bka' bgros nas// phrin las gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur/ ba'i mdun ma byas so// zhi ba'i las/ dang rgyas pas las kyi mi thul bas// dbang gi las dang drag
209b2(1): posa'i las kyi 'dul bar bka' bgros bcad/ rA tra lings la song ba dang byung gis dogs pa'i// che// ngag gi dbang phyug rta mgrin so la btang / he ru ka nyid sprul nas ru tra'i yum dang sbyor ba mdzad de// srin mo'i lhums su sras 'dul byed
209b3(1): bcug/ sprul pa'i sras bskyed nas rA tra btul lo/ bltams dug gsum bcom/ rA tra'i dug gsum gyi// ji// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa sbyangs// rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas mang po sku yang mthong zhal yang mthong nas/ 9// dbang
209b4(1): bzhi bum pa/ gsang ba/ shes rab/ ye shes bde ba chen po/ bskur nas skye ba phyi ma'i tshe/ sangs rgyas/ thal ba'i dbang pos lung yang bstan/ tshe 'dir// srog snying phul nas sangs rgyas kyi/ dkon mchog bstod pa'i dpal// bstan srung ma hA
209b5(1): ka la nyid// lha srin sde brgyad dpung gi 'khor dang bcas/ dbang phyug/ ma dang mkha' 'gro lang ka'i tshogs dpa' bo dang bcas// dpa' mo rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyi grogs su bskos/ nas grogs mdzad do// dngos su rA tra rang rgud pa yang yod de dam
209b6(1): nyams pa'i 'bras bu'o// sangs rgyas mdzad pas na// rang rgyud phyi yi rU tra yod// sems can gdug pa gang gis kyang mi 'dul bas// sprul pa sprul nas nas 'dul bar gyur pas na// sprul pa'i rA tra yod ma yin/ de yang sprul
210a1(1): @/ pa'i rwa byas sems can rnams kho na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yin no// nang gi rA tra rnam bshad pa/ rang gi/ sems nyid bla ma rgyal ba'i 'khor/ la'o// bdag tu 'dzin pa ni slob ma dge slong nag/ po yin no// dug lnga la
210a2(1): rtogs pa snga phyi long btags pa mang po ne dra tras/ phyi yi skye ba blangs// smad 'tshong ma yi bu ru skyes/ ma shi nas tha/ ma ro dang chas pa shing nal gyi sdong nag zhes pa'i rtsa ru bu bzhag cing / bsdad pa ni// rang lus dug gsum ni shing bu la/ nal
210a3(1): gyi sdong nag yin no// nga bdag ni rA tra yin/ nga bdag rtsal drag pa ni/ dA[:]bu rtsa la drag pas// kun gzhi ma bag chags bu yin bus ma sha za/ ba ltar bag chags za'o// rA tra'i kha nas/ tsha ba'i sna nas grang nad dang sngags byung na de'i gzer
210a4(1): gyis// ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdus/ pa ni rang gi sna nas rlung tsha grang rgyu ba'o// bdud kyi rgyal po nga rgyal skyes// pa ni bdag 'dzin gyi mgo langs pa'o// lang+ga'i yul gyi ri la babs// pa ni rang gi lus khog pa la bdag 'dzin
210a5(1): bas// srin po'i rgyal po dbang du byas// yul la bdag 'dzin gyi dbang byas so// lte ba'i lang+ga'i ri k+Sha yig srin po gtum mo spor/ bde ba dbang du byas so// lha yi ded dpon ka ru Na bde bas sdug bsngal zhi btul/ ba'o// srin po btul
210a6(1): ba// tshogs dang lha btul bas mthong ba'i lam du sbyar/ gsum pa mthong // lam sbyangs pa dang rang lus bam ri thod pa'i mkhar/ dang bstun te rang lus spyad pa'o// lam du bka' sangs rgyas bka' bgros bgros de bcad do// pas sbyor lam
210b1(1): mo// de bzhin bya ra so pa ni/ rta mgrin bya ra so la btang bas de las// mthong lam du ye shes mthong bas shes rab skyes pa'o// sras lhums su bzhag pa bzhi pa bsgom lam sras bltams 'dam 'thung ba/ bsgom lam rtog pa byang ba// sbrul
210b2(1): pa dngos po rnam rtog ye shes su langs pa/ bdud rtsir ro la/ rnam shes brgyad// bu mo brgyad yul brgyad mgo brtan brgyad/ la sogs log par bsgyur// tshogs ma mo brgyad yul phra men brgyad phyin ci log/ bzhi sgom/ gsang ba'i yum bzhi
210b3(1): ni bag/ chags bdag 'dzin dang nga rgyal dang bdag tu rmongs/ pa'o// lnga pa mthar phyin lam// rten gyi stobs gnyen po'o 'gyod pa'i dang gzhan gyis spro ba byas pa yis// stobs bzhis rgyud sbyangs te/ sdig pa spungs par byas// de
210b4(1): dag thams cad tshogs las la sogs lam lnga las/ mtshan nyid dang sgo bstan nas ni// ji ltar gnas pa 'dir rtogs bya// de ltar bstan pa'i rU tra des// btsan thabs dag tu sangs rgyas sam// 'on te rim 'jug sangs
210b5(1): rgyas yin// ji ltar yin pa nges shes byos// langs rtog tshad phral ba lta bu'o// blo chung ba rnams rim gyis sangs rgyas pa yang yod/ dkyil 'khor du bcug dbang bskur sgrib pa sbyangs lung bstan pas so// rgyud 'di ni rA tra spyir dris pa yin la/ sangs rgyas kyis stong
210b6(1): gsum gyi rA tra dus gcig la btul bas/ blo che ba rnams cig char sangs rgyas pa yod de// zhes pa lang+ka'i bdag po blo gros thabs ldan dag gis dris/ ston pa// gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pas bshad// gol 'gro rjes 'jug rA tra gsum/ dang
211a1(1): zhes ni ston pa gang gis gdams na gsang ba'i bdag po yis/ 'khor gang la gdams na// dam pa'i rigs can lnga po la// lung gang gdams na// khrag 'thung gal po'i lung 'di rba// man ngag gang gdams na// rU tra'i spyi yi gdams
211a2(1): par gsungs/ lus ngag yid gsum la bdag tu 'dzin pa de 'joms pa rA tra spyi'i man ngag bshad rjes// de nas lus ngag yid gsum la// bdag tu blta ba'i rA tra gzhom// de nas dur khrod bdag po dag/ gnan bya ma hA yin// phyag rgya
211a3(1): Ne dang ldan par ni// rnal 'byor dpal du bskyed pas/ lta bas mnan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyis mnan pa/ spyod pas mnan pa// ci rigs su ni las rnams bya// de yang rang gi rnam rtog bdag 'dzin las gyur pa// thar pa kyang 'das kyi gegs/ las kyi rA tra rnam pa
211a4(1): sum yang / rang gi lus ngag yid gsum la gnas te/ bgegs thams cad kyi bdag po'o// lta bas gzung 'dzin rtog pa 'joms/ blta bas mnan pa ni gzung 'dzin gyi rnam rtog ste/ gnyis med kyi ye shes chen po blo la dran cing yid la gnas par bya'o// ma hA ka
211a5(1): tra tra ni/ de yang phyi'i yul dang lus dngos por 'dzin pa byang chub kyi sems su rtogs te/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems su rtogs pas snod dang lus la rang bzhin med par gnas so// des lus la bdag tu 'dzin pa ma traM rA tra mnan pa'o// yul du snang ba chos kyi
211a6(1): dadabyings// sems su snang ba ye shes nyid// dag gi bdag 'dzin kha T+wAM ga rA tra ni/ nang gi sems la bdag tu 'dzin pa yang / sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes snang ba chen por rtogs par byas nas// mnyam pa chen po'i dpal nga dang bdag med pa'i chos nyid la gnas
211b1(1): par byas la mnan pa'o// snang dang ma skyes phyogs ris med// sems la bdag tu 'dzin pa a kaR+ka rA tra ni/ snang ba dang ma skyes pa thams cad gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// phyogs ris med par rtogs par bya ba ni/ chos kyi dbyings ye shes su snang / mi snang na
211b2(1): ni sems dngos por rang mtshan mar ma skyes/ gnyis su med pa ni lus sems rang bzhin med par chos nyid spong pa'i ngang las mi g.yo bar gnas pa'o// des na yul du snang ba dang sems ma skyes pa yang / yul phyogs su dang / sems ris su bcad pa med pas mnan
211b3(1): no// stegs bu'i steng na chos 'byung na// stegs bu'i steng du e gru gsum bris pa'i nang du ma trang gi gzugs thal chen gyis byas la che ba bskyed pa dang // thal bas gdong gsum sna yon po/ kha TAM bya rog spyang ku g.yas/ g.yon na// sdigs
211b4(1): mdzub khra dang 'ug pa can// bdag nyid phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan// bdag gtso bo'i sgra phyag rgya chen po// g.yon du yum dam tshig gi phyag rgya/ 'gro 'dul las kyi phyag rgya/ de thams cad chos nyid las mi 'da' ba chos kyi phyag rgya'o// hUM gsum gyis che ba'i
211b5(1): nga rgyal bskyed pa can// nga ngas dkrug pa// ma tri gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ bdag kyad thabs dang ldan pa chags bu'i phyag rgya bcasaH/ sar+b+ba ba ma'i sngags brjod pa sa dur zad kyi bdag pa mthag sa dang gsam pa/ thal pa'i mdag rdza sum gams ca
211b6(1): phyag g.yas gsum na rim pa bzhin/ kha T+wAM/ bya rog/ sbyang ki/ g.yon gsum sdigs mdzub khra 'ug pa thogs pa/ lus ri rab tsam du che ba gcig bkug ste/ bdag gi mdun na e gru gsum/ mtha' dbus med pa'i nang du tshud par bsam la/ gzugs la bstim mo// de ni ma
212a1(1): // traM ga ru tha'o// kha T+wAM ga rA tra ni de'i ngag rtsub mo'o// a kaR+sha rA tra ni de'i sems de dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'o// lus ngag yid gsum la bdag tu blta ba de gzhom na phyi nang gsang ba'i ru tra 'dul bar 'gyur ba yin no// phyag rgyas dgug pa// lcags klu'i phyag
212a2(1): rgyas bkug la bstim// sngags kyis dgug pa/ dzaHhUM baM hoHlus dgug pa ma traM ka rA tra dzaHdzaHhUM/ ngag kha TaM ga rA tra/ yid a kaR+YA[:]rA tra/ che ba'i nga rgyal ni rU tra'i skye gzhi dang rgyu bstan pa ni/ rig pa la 'char nub dang thog mtha'i phyogs dang
212a3(1): bral bar gsal ba ni/ sems nyid mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten te/ kun dga' ba'i 'jig rten du gyur pa'o// hUM shar phyogs lam sgo'i 'jig rten na/ de ltar ma rtogs pas 'khor bar 'thams la gzhan yang 'khor bar 'thams du 'jug pas na// yang dag pa thar pa'i
212a4(1): lam gcod par byed pa/ 'o// 'byung po gtum po nga rgyal can// ma rtogs shing mnyam pa nyid dang mi ldan pa dag la// nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / dran rtog phra rags te/ nges bar du gcod cing mthu che ba'i las la 'jug pa'o// khyod ni
212a5(1): sgrib pas kun nas bsgribs// de'i mthu dang nyes pa ni dngos po rang bzhin gyis stong pa la zhen cing blo yis gzhi med pa la yang dag par bzung bas/ rang gi nyes pa byas nas/ de bzhin nyid mthong ba la gol zhing sgrib sgrub pa'i don la sgrib bo// yang dag shes
212a6(1): rab ye shes kyis// de'i 'dul thabs ni rgyal ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyis mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi shes rab zab mos gzigs na/ khungs bcad rtsad bcad bdag las byung // nyon mongs pa la sogs pa de yang gang las byung / ngo bo
212b1(1): ji lta bur brtags pas/ sems nyid las byung ba'o// las nyon ma lus pa rnams skyed par byed pa'i rtsa ba rang sems yin pas so// bdag 'dzin bdag gir rtog pa de// shes pa dang yul ji snyed pa rnams kyang bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa yin te/ rang sems las
212b2(1): ngar 'dzin pa'i bdag yin la/ yul la bdag gir 'dzin pas gzung 'dzin can no// bdag med stong pa'i stobs kyis gzhom// phyi rol thams cad yul drug tu 'dus la/ de yang bdag nyid kyi rig pa yin pas yul med pas rig pa nyid ji lta bu yin pa mthong bas//
212b3(1): bdag 'dzin med de/ phyi nang gi chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar mtha' dbus las 'das pa'i phyogs ris bral bar rtogs pa'i stobs kyis gzhom par bya ba'o// bdag 'dzin thabs stobs brtson 'grus kyis// gnas ngan len pa'i ded dpon
212b4(1): byed// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i thabs kyis yi dwags su skye ba dang / bdag 'dzin gyi stobs kyis dmyal bar skye ba dang / bdag 'dzin gyi brtson 'grus kyis byol song du skye bas na/ dper na ded dpon ni tshong pa'i tshogs mang po'i kha lo sbyar ba ltar/ bdag dang 'khor du bcas pa
212b5(1): rnams ngan song gsum gyis kha bskrad par byed pas na// de nyid brtags pa yin pas na// bdag 'dzin de nyid rtsa bas rtags pas na/ rtag par bas pa yin la/ de'i rtsa ba gang len brtags pas bdag med pa stong par shes pas na/ dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa
212b6(1): ste/ mi rtog pa stong pa nyid kyis 'joms pa ni// bdag med stong pa'i tho bas gzhom// dper na sa rdo sra ba'i gnyen por zo ba shar ba lta bu'o// IM sa man+ti ma hA shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra mung+ga ra a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ kho'i// lag cha phrogs pas gzi
213a1(1): // byin bral// nas 'dug par bsam mo// de nas lag pas/ kha T+wAM rtse gsum phyag rgya bca'o// ste/ rA tra'i ming nas bod pa// ma traM bya ba sdig can khyod// sngon byung yang dpal chen he ru kas// bsgral nas dur khrod chen
213a2(1): por gnas brgyad du bslab gnas/ mdzad do// da yang rnal 'byor dbang phyug ngas// pa'i las bus byed pa ltar/ rA tha// bsgral nas dur khrod chen por bsgrub gnas bya'o// dzaHhUM baM ho \u0f7fshrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+TAM/ sa ma ya mu tra
213a3(1): pra ba na tsakra ha na ha na hUM phaT// sngags 'di brjod de kha T+wAM ga sked par brgyab pas e gru gsum gyi nang du nyi zla rbab tu ltung ba'am/ tsan+dan gyi sdong gog zab tu bskur ba bzhin gre zil gyis 'gyel bar bsam mo/ kha T+wAM brgya pa las e nang du// nyi zla sdong
213a4(1): rgan ltar 'gyel pa/ phyag na rdo rjes// rjes su 'jug la ma tra 'di ltar gnon cig ces/ gdams par gnang // ro bdag dur khrod chen po ni/ rA tra nyid/ 'gyel ba'i/ ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te/ he ru ka yi// g.yon gyi zhabs
213a5(1): kyis rA tra bzung // rol pa'i stabs kyis mnan nas ni// mgo bo srin po'i yul yin pas/ lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa bgegs kyi gnas yin pas/ byang shar mtshams su bstan// sgrol ging gi/ ta gi zhabs kyis g.yas
213a6(1): pa yi// ma ma tr-i gi mtshan ma traM ling+ga mnan nas kyang // mthar byed chen po'i g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa'i/ 'gyings stabs kyis// ma traM gi ni snying gar mnan// lag pa g.yas pa'i ru tra rang gi phyag mtshan rgod gtong yin pas//
213b1(1): mkhrig ma la/ khra dang sbyang ki 'ug pa gnas// lag pa g.yon pa'i rA tra rang gi phyag mtshan rgod gtong du 'gyed pa/ mkhrig ma la// kang ka bya rog sre mong wa// oM he ru nas bsgral ba'o// shrI he ru ka hUM/ dr-i sh+ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dpal
213b2(1): gyi// zil gyis mnan nas gzi byin phral// lag pa g.yon pa// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas sgo phye nas// badz+ra khat+pas khog sbubs dral// badz+ra khang+ga zhes kha T+wAM gis kho'i khog pa phug nas ma rig pa'i khog sbubs dral nas/ kho yi rnam par shes pa
213b3(1): tri/ dud ka gcig tu gnas pa de/ bdag gi shangs kyi rlung sgom nas// a hUM A~M du byin brlabs la// a de yang hUM du byin gyis brlabs pa thugs kar bsdus la hUM de bdag gi srog tsa'i gsang brgyud/ de bdag gi byang sems dang 'dres nas/ rdo rje'i lam
213b4(1): las byung // yum gyi mkha' la hUM du gsal// sngags 'dis sras bu bskyed la// ma hA d+ha ba rA tra dza dza hUM// sgo byang la// sgo srung traM bstims la sgrub pa thon pa dang gnas sbar ro// de nas ma tri gi/ khog pa b+h+rUM b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he maN+Da la ces pas las
213b5(1): gyur pa yi// bsgrub pa'i gzhal yas khang dur khrod kyi gnas su byin gyis brlab/ pa ni/ de nas rdo rje rgyal pos snga drangs pa de rnams kun gyis// phyag rgya dpung mgor bsnol te/ sdigs mdzub sgreng / namaM/ sngags 'di brjod cing gzhal las khang
213b6(1): gi/ b+h+rUM badz+ra kha ti pra be sha phaT/ sgo phye la hUM hUM zhes 'bar ba'i blta bas sgrub pa po kun zhugs// yum kun rim pas bgegs kyi bdag po'i khog par zhugs pas bgegs phra mo'i bar chad kyi mi tshugs so// rdo rje rgya gram gyi sgo bcad nas/ badz+ra a ha sgo
214a1(1): // bcad nas// hUM hUM stong gsum thams cad thugs khengs par bsam zhing gzhal las khang dbang du/ 'dus pas rdo rje ma ra gyur te/ khang pa me dpung gyur/ de nas// bdag gi smin mtshams nas b+h+rUM brgyad spros/ 1// ma traM gi
214a2(1): gnas brgyad dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad/ du gyur par bsam// rang byung gi mchod rten chen po brgyad dang bcas/ par bsgom mo// mkha' 'gro// ma brgyad spyan drangs gnas srung bar las bcol/ lo// rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi// spyod
214a3(1): pas phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i// bro yis yang dag par sbyang bar bya'o// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ zhi ba la// shar rgyas pa 'o/ dbang nub/ drag po byang / phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// dngul lam gser ram ser po la/
214a4(1): zangs sam dmar po'i/ lcags sam nag po'i/ dkar po'i shing rnams la// rtse mo rgya mdud rtse zlum po// bzhi zla kham zur gsum// sked pa rgya mdud gzhal yas khang / ngos la zhi rgyas pa'i/ dbang gi drag po'i/ ba'i lha bkod
214a5(1): de// mkhas pas bsgom zhing btab gyur na// zhi bar mang rgyas par/ dbang du/ drag por/ gyur gang yang med// zhi mdzad rgyas mdzad/ bang mdad / drag mdzad/ lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// rgyas pa lho zhi bas 'gre shes par bya'o// ste
214a6(1): gser dbang nub// zangs te drag po byang lcags su// mkhas pas rim par sbyar phrin las bzhis par bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung gi gal po chen po zhes bya ba'i lung las/ dur khrod bdag po ma traM rU
214b1(1): tra'i man ngag bshad pa ste brtag pa bcu pa'o// // de nas dpal khrag 'thung chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par/ sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor los
214b2(1): 'gengs par byed pa 'di gsungs so// theg pa 'og ma kri yog kun la med pas// lhag par dur khrod kyi rtags kyis kun mtshan nas/ srin po rA tra'i sha khrag rus pa dug gsum sku gsum du sgrol bas na/ khrag 'thung chen po bsgrub par
214b3(1): bya// slob dpon yi dam lha la nod// dang po slob dpon gyi rtags yi dam gyi lha la nod pa dang / yi dam gyis gnang nas/ de nas// slob ma rnams kyis rtags slob dpon la nod/ pa'o// de nas rab tu gdab bya ba// las kyi mkhan
214b4(1): pos mnga' dbul gdab// de nas las mkhan gyis slob dpon la dpal gyi chas brgyad mnga' dbul lo// bla mas 'khor la rtags gdab bo// glang po'i rgyan ni// bdud 'dul stobs chen theg pa mchog gi rgyan/ 'joms byed// stobs bcus pa
214b5(1): rol bdud dpung 'joms/ can thos kyi thang ba lta ba'o/ pa'i rtags// smad pa zag pa 'og ma pas skad kyang don mchog gi dngos grub thob pa chos sgra'i phyag gyur gsal te mi 'byed pa'i gti mug go/ mchog rnams don gyi phyag rgyar gsal// lha
214b6(1): ba'i gzhung tshugs bden pa lta dgongs mi 'gyur ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sku la zang ba ni glang chen gyi ko rlon no// phul ba yis// mi 'khor byang sems kyi rgyan du bzhes// zhing chen g.yang gzhi rlon pa'i stong g.yogs
215a1(1): 'di/ dpe nyan thos la chos gos yod pa ltar khra bo'i chos gos ni// tshul khrims gos chen g.yang gzhir brjod pa ste// yan lag rnam lnga snod lnga yum gyi dbang // mgo bo sangs rgyas spyan/ lag g.yas dbyings drug ma/ g.yon ma ma
215a2(1): kaM/ gang g.yas gos dkar mo// gson rgol ma'o// mi 'khor byang chub sems kyi rgyan du bstan/ tshul khrims zhing gi g.yang gzho'o// dpa' brtul za byed stag gi smad g.yogs 'di// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' mtha' gnyis rtag chang
215a3(1): 'joms pa/ brjod las 'das// gdul bu'i don// yal bar mi gtong bar ye shes dang thugs rjes dbyings su sdud/ pa'o// gdod mtha' med par sgrol zhing zhag dpa' ba dang / rtul phod pa dang / za ba ste/ thugs rje dpa'/ ye shes rgyal
215a4(1): dbyings su za ba'o// za bar byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sku la dpa' rtul stag gi shams pas so/ sham thabs bsnams// dpa' brjid mnyen lcug sbrul gyi chun po 'di// rgyal rigs che zhing brjid pas dbu la brgyan/ bram ze drag sngags rno
215a5(1): bas mgur bu/ rje rigs dpung bzang la lag bzo bas phrag gdub/ dmangs rigs bya ba mang bas rkang gdub/ gdol pa zhe gnag pas lus kyi tshangs smad byas so// dpal brjid che bas bdud dpung zil gyis non/ gnyen lcug yan lag 'khril
215a6(1): bas sbrul gyi tshul// dug lnga dbang bskur 'jigs tshul du rigs lnga 'joms par byed pas sku'i rgyan du bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sku la brgyan par bya// thod pa skam rlon ra ri'i phreng ba 'di// thod skam dbu la brgyan pas
215b1(1): chos sku ste gti mug can gnas su 'dren/ gsang sngags nang pa'i theg pa gsum 'chad par mtshon// ra ris snyan cha longs sku ste zhe sdang gnas su 'dren// gsang sngags phyi ba'i theg pa gsum 'chad pa mtshon/ rlon pa'i do shal sbrul sku lte 'dod chags can 'dren/ mtshan nyid sde
215b2(1): gsum 'chad pa mtshon/ khro bo sku gsum thob pa'i dbang rtags yin// theg pa gsum gyi chags pa'i dbang rtags te// dug gsum sems can bla med sgrol ba'i dbang / rang rig pa// rnal ma la ye shes kyi blos 'byor
215b3(1): dbang phyug chos rnams la chos zag pa med pas/ chen po'i sku yi rgyan// chags pa'i tshul gyi sems can rnams la thugs rjes chags pa'i rtags/ rak+ta'i thig le 'di/ snying rjes sems can la rol pas// s+thu la rol pas don du don gyi rtags/ sku
215b4(1): la thig le bzhag/ ma chags pad+ma can gyis mnan te// de phyir zugs rje chags pa'i spyan du bstan// sems can gyi don la thugs rjes chags nas don mdzad kyang sbyor sgrol gyi skyon gyis ma gos pas na pad+ma can gyis sa non pa'o// rnal 'byor
215b5(1): dbang phyug sku la brgyan par bya// gdug pa can ma lus pa rnams 'dul ba'i rtags ni/ phrin las bzhis thal ba bzhin rdul bran du brlag par byed pas na// 'dul byed phrin las rgyan gyis btab pas ni// 'jigs par byed pa'i phrin las
215b6(1): rgyun du bstan// yi ge A li kA li las lha'i dkyil 'khor zhi khro'i lha tshogs mang por sprul nas 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don la cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa'i sa non pa yin pas na// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa mnan te// 'khor lo cho 'phrul gcod pa'i sa
216a1(1): yang yin// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'i sku yi rgyan// gzi brjid don dam bcud kyi rgyan 'di ni// bcud du gyur pas yon tan gzi brjid 'bar// thugs la chos kyi sgra don dam pa'i bcud ma nor ba rtogs par
216a2(1): byas nas mnga' bas/ dper na nang na sman yod na phyir sgra brjed pas na// rgyan du bkra bas sku la rgyan du che/ rang sems ma bcos pa'i/ rnal rang rig pa'i blos 'byor pa'i dus nyid na phyi nang gi chos ma lus pa la/ dbang byas nas chos nyid la zad pa med pas
216a3(1): phyug pa'i sku la rgyan du bzhes// kro d+hI ni la ka a b+hi Shiny+tsA ma hA ya/ thal chen gyi thig le ni// bla mas mched la rtags gsum gdab// phyogs bcu na bzhugs// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // phyogs mtshams brgyad la// dur khrod sa
216a4(1): brgyad mnan pa dang // de dag tu 'gro ba'i// rdzu 'phrul thabs kyis sgrub pa dang // rang sems nyid he ru kar shes par byas nas// dpal chen thabs kyis bsdu bar bya// thal chen chos sgra mtshon pas// he ru ka dang gcig pa'i phyir/
216a5(1): dpral bar// thal ba'i thig les tshom bu gsum gyi mtshan pa 'di/ rtags// 'di yang sngon gyi tha tshig la/ dam tshig yin da lta'i rtags mtshan// 'di yang rtags kyi phyag rgya ste// 'di yang rang nyid ltar shes pa'i bdag nyid chen po'i
216a6(1): rgya'o// au sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+ra garba staM pa si ho// rak+ta'i thig le dang thal chen gyi tshig gnyis mgo mjug gnyis mthun pas// de bzhin tshul mchog gdab pa yang // mkha' 'gro kun dang gcig pa'i phyir/ phyi nang mkha' 'gro ma dang
216b1(1): mched lham gcig par bya ba'i rtags ni// rak+ta'i thig les mthur chos la gdab bo/ mtshan pa 'di// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rak+ta si ha// ging chen bco brgyad dang mched lham dral/ kun dang dam tshig gcig pa'i phyir/ na// zhag gi zo ris
216b2(1): 'gram du gdab pa ni don dam bcud kyi rgyan no// mtshon pa 'di// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta staM pa si ho/ mched lcam kun la rtags gsum gyis mtshan pa yis/ mkha' 'gro ging // lha dang rnal 'byor gnyis su med/ dper na/ dmag gi
216b3(1): khrom du ba dan nam// ru dar ltar rang gi rigs ngo shes pa'i// lug gi sgra mtshan bcag btab pas lug khru nas ngo shes pa/ lta bur rtags gdab pas/ gsal/ ba'o// slob dpon la dpal gyi chas brgyad dang ldan// slob ma rnams la 'khor gyi
216b4(1): rtags/ rnam gsum gyi rtags kyis mtshan/ te gdab bo// 'jig rten khengs pa'i dpe// bskal pa'i me dpung 'khrigs pa bzhin/ khro bo// 'bar ba'i tshogs ni rnam par bsam// ye shes las grub pa gal po 'di nyid nas bshad pa
216b5(1): bzhin// grub pas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du/ khro bo'i lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog so so'i phyag mtshan dang // sku'i dbyibs// phyag rgya dang sku'i rgyan dang cha lugs dag/ bskyed pa'i dus na rdzogs par 'grub pa ni chos sgra gzugs su dbyer med
216b6(1): do// bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i lha dag bsgom/ zhi ba// rdo rje dbyings kyi khro bo dpal gyi skur gyur pa// sarba ta thA ga ta'i sngags brjod pas zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od du zhu nas hUM las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par lhag gis bskyed de spyan drangs
217a1(1): // mchod pa'i rim pa bya'o// de ni rnal 'byor pa blo rab kyi spyod yul te/ lung a nu mo ga'i dkyil 'khor bskyed lugs ma nor ba yang yin la zhi khro gnas bskur gyi bya ba yang yin no// zhi ba'i dpe ni// dngas pa'i mtsho la khro bo'i dpe/ rlabs chen
217a2(1): 'khrugs pa'am/ zhi ba'i dpe// mkha' la khro bo'i dpe/ dbyar gyi sprin dag mched pa ltar/ sku'i rgyan// sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang // kun kyang mi zad pa ste gdan/ rdo rje'i brag steng gnon// bskal pa'i me
217a3(1): ri srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar// mi bskyod spyan gzigs thugs kyi hUM ring las// bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod par gsal ba'i ye shes thugs rje'i spyan gyis srid pa gsum la lan cig gzigs pas gdug rtsub dang dug lnga me ltar 'bar ba de zhi
217a4(1): sa mi 'dul bar mkhyen nas/ thugs ka nas hUM ring po bzhi dbugs dang drangs te/ spyi bor gsal ba las bskul don gnyis byas nas slar 'dus pa las/ a sha sid+d+hi'i sngags kyis 'od du zhu ba las rtsa sngags brjod dpal he ru ka'i skur bsgom/ de'i thugs ka nas yi ge b+h+rUM
217a5(1): gcig 'phros pa las/ zhi ba'i sngags kyi gzhal yas khang 'od du zhu nas/ b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he'i sngags brjod pas zhi ba'i gzhal yas khang de dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang du gyur par bsam/ thugs ka nas hUM ha ho phaT ces brjod pas hUM las rigs lnga yab yum bcu 'od du zhu
217a6(1): nas dbu rgyan du bya/ ha brgyad kyis sems dpa' brgyad ke'u rI brgyad du bsam/ he brgyad kyis sems ma brgyad phra men brgyad du bsam/ hUM gis sgo ba yab rnams 'od du zhu nas yum la thim pas sgo ma bzhi bsgom/ kun bzang yab yum thabs shes rab kyi rang bzhin thabs shes
217b1(1): rab la 'dus pas yum la thim/ shes rab dbyings la 'dus pas chos kyi dbyings su bsam/ dbang mo rnams rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus/ thub pa rnams 'gro ba'i don la gshegs/ yang na phra men ko'u rI la thim pas 'gro don la cir yang snang / sgo ba bzhi yab yum
217b2(1): sbyor ba mdzad pa'o// zhi ba'i las ni khro bor rim gyis bsgyur// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs bsdus nas/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// thugs ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom zhing gsal ba gal tshe'o// dang por chos sku dri
217b3(1): med las// chos sku'i don bsgom pa de bzhin nyid do// gnyis pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// longs sku'i don bsgom pa kun tu snang ngo // gsum pa sprul pa'i sku yin te// sbrul sgra'i don bsgom pa rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba
217b4(1): bsgom pa'o// sku gsum ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom// ting nge 'dzin gsum po sku gsum gyi don bsgom// zhe sdang dbyings gsal nam mkha' ni// nyon mongs pa zhe sdang 'byung ba na// yum badz+ra kro d+hi ma nyid 'byung ba'i rgyu yin
217b5(1): phyir// bsgom bu'i yul nang du b+ha ga'i kha dog/ mthing nag b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ dbyibs// gru gsum rang bzhin na me long ye shes gsal bar shar/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni 'byung ba na// rlung nag 'chubs ma gtams pa'i dkyil
217b6(1): 'khor ni// nyon mongs pa na// phrag dog mkha' la yum na karma kro d+hi sgrol mdzad yum/ byed pa'i las// 'degs pa'i shugs ldan dbyings gzhu 'dra/ rang bzhin bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang // thogs med brtan pa'i dkyil 'khor che//
218a1(1): nyon mongs pa na// 'dod chags dbyings dag khrag gi rgya mtsho/ 'byung ba na/ chu'i rang bzhin/ rak+ta ni/ nyon mongs pa'i// chags pa med pa'i chags pa yum pad+ma kro d+hi'i mkha' ste pad+ma'i klong // dbyibs dang rgya khyon no// mtha' dbus
218a2(1): med pa'i rgya mtsho ni// rba klong 'phyo ba'i rang byung so sor rtog pa'i/ ye shes yin// sha chen sa gzhi ni 'byung ba na sa gzhi// 'khor ba dar ba'i sa gzhi ni/ nyon mongs pa na// gti mug chos nyid gsal ba'i phyir// gser 'gyur bsgom
218a3(1): zhi ba'i dus kyi gser gyi sa gzhi de khro bo la/ mchog phran sa gzhir brdal// thams cad skye med chos kyi dbyings kyi/ ye shes gsal/ ri rab bsgom pa ni nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu khu ba/ srid rgyu ye nas dag pa'i phyir// rin chen ri rab keng
218a4(1): rus gsal/ dbyibs// tshad med rgyan ldan kha bad che/ rgya mtsho'i/ klong nas keng rus shar bas phyed rgya mtshor nub pa phyed gyen du sbags/ me dpung bsgom pa ni/ rgyu'i gnas gang na// dur khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// nga rgyal nyon
218a5(1): mongs pa na mkha' la sgrol mdzad yum// rat+na kro d+hi/ 'byung ba na me/ las ni// rmongs pa'i mun nag gtan nas sel/ ye shes na mnyam nyid/ me'i las// thams cad smin cing brtas par byed// zla kham dbang chen maN+Dal la// dur
218a6(1): khrod yon tan tshogs kyis brgyan// phyi nang med par kun tu snang // b+h+rUM me dpung steng du gnas pa las s+pha ra Na phaT kyis b+h+rUM grangs med pa spros/ don mdzad 'dus nas dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang dbang drag tshul du spug nag kham sgo gcig pa b+han+ta tshar
218b1(1): gsum las grub pa gru chad dang sgo bzhi sgo khrud dang ldan pa dur khrod kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyis che ba'i yon tan du brgyan pa/ zhag khrag gi rgya mtshor 'khrugs pa khyon nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ dpangs tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa/ phyi nang shin tu mi bsgrib pa zhig bsgom mo// ye
218b2(1): shes gzhal yas nam mkha'i rgya// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas su// dregs pa khyo shug pho mo dang // gzhal yas khang gi dbus su nyi ma'i steng du dbang phyug chen po yab yum bsnol zhing khyu mchog gis brdzis pa'o// de'i steng du nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan
218b3(1): // tshogs kyi gzung bzhi la// zhing chen bsnol dang mtshams kyi gzung bzhi la zhing rgyang ba'i gdan// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs ka'i hUM// gsal bar byas te// he ru ka yi snang glu ni// hUM ring dbugs kyi rlung bzhi las// hUM bzhi
218b4(1): sngags kyi dgongs pa ni// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi mdangs 'bar/ khro bo thams cad 'byung bar byed// he ru ka'i snang gAs hUM bzhi khong chud nas drangs te/ g.yas me'i rlung las hUM dmar po dang / g.yon rlung gi rlung las hA nag po dang / sna brag gnyis
218b5(1): ka nas chu'i rlung gi hUM dkar po/ gnyis ka na sa ba'i rlung thar du chu ba'i hUM ser po ste/ dbugs dang sbags nas skra'i rtser gsal ba las hUM dang po 'od zer dang bcas te phyogs bcur 'phros te dug gsum gtan nas spang / srid pa'i bre kha bzlog/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams
218b6(1): 'od du gyur nas thams cad hUM du gsal lo// hUM gnyis pas shes pas zin pa dang ma zin pa thams cad hUM du dir gyis song ngo // hUM gsum pas hUM thams cad slar gyi li li 'dus te/ dang po'i hUM la thim pas nyi ma 'bum pas gzi byin che bar bsgom mo// hUM bzhi pas hUM de
219a1(1): bdag la thim pa dang bdag nyid 'od du 'bar ba las ye shes sems dpa' dbab pa'i sngags kyis gdan steng du bab ste 'od du zhu bas khro bo 'byung ba'i gleng gzhi brjod do// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// de la drag po chen po byung ba'i lo glus la bzhi
219a2(1): ste/ dus nam byung ba dang / de byung bar khungs gang gis bstan pa dang / tshul ji ltar bstan pa dang / don gyi ngo bo gang bstan pa'o// de la dang po ni/ de la 'das pa zhes pa ni/ da ltar gyi dus la ltos na 'das pa'am 'gags par gyur pa'i dus te/ de la yang gsum ste/ dus 'das
219a3(1): pa/ sems can 'das pa/ bstan pa 'das pa'o// dang po ni/ je ring je ring gyur pa las/ de yang snga ma snga ma 'das shing phyi ma phyi ma 'byung bas long btags nas/ bar du rdzas mang pos bcad pa'i/ tha ma'i mtshams nas bzung ba phan chad de/ de yang ji ltar zhe na/ dang po skad cig/
219a4(1): dang de 'das pa las de'i skad cig dang / de'i skad cig brgya nyi shu la zang gcig dang / zang gcig las yud tsam dang / yud tsam bgrangs pa las chu tshod dang / chu tshod 'das pa las nyin par dang / de 'das pa la nyin mtshan sbrel ba ste nyin zhag dang de bgrangs pa las zla ba dang /
219a5(1): grangs pas lo dang lo bgrangs pas bskal pa dang / de bgrangs pa las bgrang ba las 'das pa ste/ de lta bu grangs med pa dag thal zhing 'gags par gyur pa ni dus 'das pa zhes bya'o// sems can 'das pa ni/ gang dag phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyis bsdus shing
219a6(1): rigs dang gnas dang khams tha dad par skyes shing / las dang las kyi bgo skal rnam pa mang po la so so nas spyod pa'i 'gro ba rnams rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyis bskyed cing / shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du bar mtshams dang / gdod mtha' med par 'khor bas dang po
219b1(1): dang tha ma 'di zhes 'khor ba spyi'i dbang du tshad nges par gzung bar mi nus kyang / khyad par gyi dbang du byas na shin tu khro zhing gdug par gyur pa'i sems can 'byung bar gyur pa'i dus de nas mtshams nye bar bzung na/ de dag dang de dag gi bu tsha dang / bu tsha'i rabs bdun dang /
219b2(1): brgya dang stong la sogs pa nas da ltar gyi bar du grangs bgrang ba med par gyur pa dang / de'i rgyud las 'grib pa dang 'phel ba dang 'gags pa bgrang zhing tshad bzung du med par gyur te/ de lta bu'i rdzas mang po bar du gcad pa ni sems can 'das pa'o// bstan pa 'das pa ni/
219b3(1): gang de'i dus na byon pa'i 'jig rten gyi sgron me dag/ dga' ldan gyi gnas nas gshegs pa dang / 'dzam gling 'di nyid du skye ba bzhes pa dang / gzhon nu rol pa mdzad cing khab bzhes pa dang / khab nas mngon par byung nas sangs rgyas pa'i tshul bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo
219b4(1): bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das shing ring bsrel bzhag pa dang / bstan pa gnas pa des sems can 'dul ba dang / bstan pa nub pa dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas rim par byung ba yang grangs 'di tsam zhes tshad gzung du med pa du mas bar du bcad pa ni bstan pa 'das
219b5(1): pa'o// de lta bu'i dus na sems can dang bstan pa grangs med pa dag 'das pa'i dus kyi sngon du byung ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa la ni/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba zhes bya'o// de ltar dus dang sems can dang bstan pa grangs med pa 'das pa'i sngon rol tu byung ba yin na/ skad
219b6(1): cig ma la sogs pa'i rdzas mang pos bar du bcad pa de'i gtam da ltar gsal bar brjod par 'dod pa de gang zhe na/ bdag nyid ces brjod pa'o// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// tshul lam thabs gang gis rig cing shes par 'gyur zhe na/ de la don drug ste/
220a1(1): 'khor 'das thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen por bzhugs pas/ rang bzhin gzhan du mi 'gyur bar rtag pa dang / gnyis pa dbyings ye shes gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen por bzhugs pas sku gsum gyi ngo bor rtag pa dang / gsum pa thabs shes zung 'brel gyi
220a2(1): bdag nyid chen por bzhugs pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' mdzad pas rtag pa dang / bzhi pa mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen por bzhugs pas sku rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i ngo bor bzhugs
220a3(1): pas rtag pa dang // lnga pa spu gsung thugs rdo rje ltar 'dus ma byas shing dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid chen por bzhugs kyang / sgo gsum nas spyod pa snga ma lta bu rgyun mi chad par ston pas/ yon tan dam pa dang ldan pa'i phrin las kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs par mdzad pa'i
220a4(1): dgongs spyod rtag pa dang // drug pa mtshan ma med pa'i bdag nyid chen po'i ngang du bzhugs kyang / mtshan ma'i rnam pas gzhan la phan 'dogs par mdzad pa rtag pa'i phyir na'o// de dag la yang rtag pa kho nar bzang ba las byung ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
220a5(1): rab la// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis te/ phyi ni de kho na nyid du song ba'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings ji lta ba bzhin du ma bcos pa'i ngang du rig pa'i ye shes de bzhin du gshegs pas chos nyid ji bzhin pa'i don de bzhin du rtogs pas na// de bzhin
220a6(1): gshegs pa'o// nang gi ltar na dper na 'jig rten pa'i lam 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i khu khrag dang // rgyu dri za nye bar 'khor ba phrad pa las phung po nye bar 'grub pa dang 'dra la/ yab yum thabs shes gnyis su med par ldan pa'i byang sems dkar dmar tshogs pa las/ tshogs
220b1(1): gnyis rdzogs pa'i rgyal ba ma lus pa'i sku 'khrungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya/ gsung rab ni mtshan nyid sde snod gsum dang / sngags phyi ba gsum dang / sngags nang pa gsum la sogs dpal khrag 'thung gis rig cing rtog par bya ba de las so// la zhes pa ni de bzhin
220b2(1): gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor los gsung rab chos bshad pa las// slob ma dge slong nag pos bdag nyid chen po rtag par bltas pa las so// de yang nam byung ni 'das pa'i dus na sngon du byung / gang zag gang byung na dge slong nag po byung / rgyu gang gis
220b3(1): byung na bdag nyid chen po rtag par blta ba las byung / rkyen gang gis byung na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la bka' bsgo log pa las byung ngo // 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad kun/ tshul ji ltar byung na/ dpal khrag 'thung gi
220b4(1): gsung rab kyis 'dul ba de'i tshe na/ sems can thams cad kun zer yang 'gro ba ni de'i bstan pas 'dul ba'i 'gro ba rnams so// 'gro ba de'i tshul ni don la 'jug pa'am don gyi thog tu phebs pa ste/ 'gro ba de dag gis lta ba ji lta bu'i mtha' la zhen pa dang / spyod pa ji lta bu
220b5(1): 'chang zhing spyod pa'i tshul de ston par byed pa'i gtan tshigs sngon du byung ba de ston par byed pa'o// sems can kun zer yang shas che ba la gdags pa ste/ bdag tu rmongs pas bsgribs nas las dang las kyi 'bras bu ngo mi shes pa'i ru tra kun gyis sems can thams cad kyang de
220b6(1): ltar du gyur pa'o// don gyi ngo bo gang kho na bzhin du byung na sems can du byung ba'o// shin tu khro gtum gdug par gyur// rA tras shin tu gsang sngags log par spyad pas ngag khro bas pha rol zher 'debs pa'i tshig sgra/ lus gtum pas pha ma dge sbyong bram ze la sogs
221a1(1): pa la brdeg par byed/ sems gdug pas sems can thams cad la rngon pa ri dwags gsod pa ltar byed pas sems can kun yang de ltar byed par 'gyur ro// shin tu gdug cing khros pa yis// des 'bras bu gang yang zhe na gsang sngags shin tu log
221a2(1): par spyad pas/ sems can log par blta bas sems can la bsod sems dang ldan pas gdug cing / ngag gtum skad 'byin pas khro bo yis zhes bya ste/ sems can thams cad de'i nus pas de ltar du gyur pa'o// 'o dod 'bod cing ltung bar gyur// las dang nyon
221a3(1): mongs pa'i skad ngan la lA zhes pa'i 'o dod 'bod cing dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/ de las thar nas byol song du ste/ de las thar nas yi dwags las kyi srin por skyes pa ni rA tra nag po zhes bya bar gyur pa'o// shin tu gdug cing khro ba la// dang po de zabs ji lta bus
221a4(1): 'dul ba ni lus shin tu rid pa sems shin tu gdug cing ngag shin tu khro ba de sa bu'i sems can dang tshul ran pa de dag la ni// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang rnam snang la sogs pa'i sgra phyag rgya chen po zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor du bstan pa'i sgo nas
221a5(1): don mdzad kyang gdul bya khro bo rnams mtha' yun du 'dul zhing sbyor bar mdzad kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur bas so// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas// gnyis med kyi don 'brel ba'i bdag nyid gnyis med kyi ye shes kyis chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'am rang bzhin
221a6(1): med par shes pa ni shes rab kyi ngo bo yin la thugs rje chen pos pha rol la phan 'dogs pa'i don du sgyu ma lta bu'am/ rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo las lha'i sku phyag rgya chen po mtshan ma'i rnam par gsal ba ni thabs kyi ngo bo ste/ de lta bu'i thabs shes rab kyi sbyor ba rtse gcig tu
221b1(1): gnas pa'i ngo bo de las/ khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ khro bas khro ba gzhom par bya ba'i don du dpal khrag 'thung gi phyag rgya chen por phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dper na til gyi gang bu ltar dpal khrag 'thung gi sku la bsdu bar mdzad pa'o// khro
221b2(1): bopo'i tshul can khros pas kyang / khro bo'i tshul can rA tra nag po khros pa zhes kyang bya/ de yang 'jig rten pa'i khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang ste/ drang srong chen po ser skya'i slob ma pur sangs khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na/ khams gsum
221b3(1): mam/ srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams kyi lus ngag yid gsum sreg par byed nas lus la nad kyis 'debs/ ngag la ngan sngags gtong / sems la dug mda' 'phro na/ phyogs bcu dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad nyon mongs pa dang gnyen po'i
221b4(1): dbang du dgongs nas thugs rje/ khros pa yis// ni sems can ma lus pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa la 'god pas na/ khams gsum ma lus kyi sems can thams cad kyi rgyu'i nyon mongs pa sbyong zhing 'bras bu'i du kha 'joms par byed pa/
221b5(1): smos ci dgos/ te 'dul nges pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid khro bor gyur nas se gol gyi sgras sangs rgyas thams cad dpung la bzhugs pa des so// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// rtsa ba dang yan lag
221b6(1): gi dam tshig ma srung na ngan song gsum du ltung ba de mnod par sbyong ba'o// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyas gsal// phyag rgya'i cha lugs de ltar 'thon na/ dper na gcig las mi 'dra ba zlos ra mkhan lta bu ste dur khrod bdag po 'dul ba la cir yang snang ba gar mkhan ltar
222a1(1): skra sprul pa'i sgrar gsal ba'o// he ru ka ni dbu gsum las dbus mthing nag sku// ces pa dang dral bas zhal// g.yas pa dka' la thugs rje'i chags pas zhal/ g.yon pa dmar// phyag drug gi g.yas// dang po gser gyi 'gyur ba med
222a2(1): rdo rjer bstan/ rdo rje g.yas// ba ra ma dug gsum 'joms pa'i/ kha T+wAM rtse gsum pa// tha ma stong gsum mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud pas/ mi mgo'i cang te'u rde'u chung 'khrol// g.yon pa dang po chos nyid zab mo sgrog pa'i/ dril bu 'dzin// bar
222a3(1): ma dug gsum gtan nas sbyong ba'i thod pa khrag gis bkang // tha ma chung drug 'khor ba mi gtong bas/ chu ma'i zhags pa bsnams// chad med pazhi dang ldan pas// zhabs bzhi babs la shes rab sbyor bas yum gyi sgra la 'khril/ galas/ rdo rje
222a4(1): g.yon gyis/ rak+ta dkrug cing 'dren// dpal he ru ka ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag po ste// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ khro rgyal glo bur du
222a5(1): lam gyis byas pa ma yin te/ ye nas yin pa'i phyir// phyag rgya chen po ye nas mngon rdzogs nas/ pa mkhyen pas na byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur bar byas/ de yang tshig 'dis dbang bskur// sku gsung thugs su dbang lnga bskur// de nas
222a6(1): sna yi rtse mo las// ye shes lngas dbang bskur ba ni rang gi sna'i rlung gis spyan drangs// yid ni rlung lnga rigs lngar rgyu ba la sems btags/ brtan par yang dag gzung // sna yi dbugs ring 'gro ba las// rlung lnga nam mkhar spros nas rigs lnga nam
222b1(1): mkhar spyan drangs// rgyal ba'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgya gsal// bdag la ye shes lngas dbang bskur bas dbang rtags rigs lnga ste bor bsam mo// thugs ka'i rlung las sna yi pra gar drangs nas bskyed pa dang / rlung 'phyo bas// rgyal ba'i 'khor yang
222b2(1): gsal ba dang // yab yum mkha' gsang bsnol ma ru// byin gyis brlabs nas bskyed pa dang // byin brlab yum gyi b+ha gar yab kyi ling+ga gzhag/ byang sems las sa bon// ha brgyad las ni shar du dkar mo dang / lhor// rkun mo dang
222b3(1): ni nubs rmongs mo dang / byang du/ zal byed ma dang shar khyor spos mo dang / ma nub tu// ma tshogs nub byang sme sha byang bar/ gtum mor lha mdag phyag mtshan drug rgya gsal/ 2/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo gsung gi dkyil
222b4(1): 'khor 'di phyung ngo // ma hA su kha hUM/ de bzhin nyid/ tsit+ta s+pha ra Na phaT/ kun tu snang / badz+ra tsit+ta hUM/ chu'i ting nge 'dzin/ oM badz+ra sa twa hUM/ ye shes sems dpa' nam mkhar bsgom/ b+h+rUM s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ sprin mtshams su b+h+rUM las r+b+ba
222b5(1): bsngarba ba/ e yaM ra baM ke raM/ 'byung ba'i mngon/ e a ka sha maN+Da la/ nam mngal yaM karma rak+Sha haM/ rlung nag/ rak+ta dza la sa mu dra/ thag mam/ baM smin+ti dza la maN+Da la/ gachen mg-iH/ ko ni ri ti dza la maN+Da la/ dras pa'ir rab/ raM dza la
222b6(1): maN+Da la/ bskal pa'i me dpung / b+h+rUM bi shra bi shud+d+he badz+ra b+hany+dza dz+nyA na maN+Da la b+h+rUM/ gzhal las khang / ma hA de ba/ gdan lab/ u ma de bi/ gdan lam/ ti ra baM/ dregs pa khyo brag gi gdan/ ma sUr+ya maN+Da la/ nyi ma'i gdan/ a tsan+da maN+Da la/ zla ba
223a1(1): gdam pa pad+ma maN+Da la/ bad+ma ma rtag ga gdan/ ti ra ba/ ra gdan/ n+yAn+na r+dz+dza ts+tsha/ d+ha rang ba ban khang nas blang ba la// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga tA na/ da bzhin gzhags pa thams cad kyi dbang / aHsad+d+hi nA/ yang dag grub pa'i dab
223a2(1): sarba ta tha naM/ thams cad kyang bar dbang bskur/ sarba shud+d+hA naM/ thams cad dag par dbang bskur/ trAM swa b+hA ba naM/ yon tan 'byung gnas kyi dbang / sa ma ya ba tI nAM/ dam tshig gi dbang gi 'gro don la sems dpa'i dbang / oM ma hA shri he ru ka/ ga#
223a3(1): bskyed pa/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI sa ma ya/ yum bskyed pa/ de bI ta na sho d+ha ya ha na hUM phaT/ b+h+rUM bi shra bi shud+d+he pad+ma d+ha ra tsan+da AM/ sum gyi mkha' dbyings byin gyis brlab pa/ hUM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ yab kyi gsang gnas byin gyis brlab pa/ rat+na sUr+ya oM/ yab
223a4(1): yum sbyor ba'i brdas bskul ba/ sa[:]ma ya stAM/ dam tshig khyod/ sa ma[:]ya ho/ dam tshig la gyes pa/ ra[:]ho[:]haM/ dam tshig la dga' ba/ rA[:]ga yA mi/ chags pas mnyes pa/ dzaHhU~M baM[:]hoHphyag rgya bzhis rol/ hU~M hUM hUM/ pad+mar rdo rje lan gsum phul lo// sku
223a5(1): gsung thugs mnyes pa/ badz+ra go rI ha/ shar du dkar mo/ badz+ra tsau rI ha/ lhor rkun mo/ badz+ra pra mo he ha/ nub tu rmongs mo/ badz+ra be ta lI ha/ byang du thal byed ma/ badz+ra puk+ka/ sI ha/ shar lhor spos mo/ badz+ra g+hasma rI ha/ lho nub ma tshogs ma/ badz+ra sma sha
223a6(1): ni ha/ nub byang sle sha can/ badz+ra tsaN+Da lI ha/ byang shar gtum mo/ dzaHhUM baM hoHphyag rgya bzhi/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje/ a gar+b+ha ya a gat+ta ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ b+han+na ya b+han+na ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/
223b1(1): bka' can/ badz+ra DA ki nI hr-i da ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bsdus spros/ g+ha wa/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+TAM/ rdo rje dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i rdo rjes ma rungs pa thams cad/ sa ma ya mu dra/ dam cheg phyag rgya/ pra b+hany+tsa kra hUM phaT/ rnam par
223b2(1): 'jigs pa'i 'khor los/ oM badz+ra e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ mur sgron tshur sbron bcom ldan 'das/ dzaHhUM baM hoHru lu ru lu dpal chen po'i swa/ dr-i sh+ya ho/ gzigs shig/ sa ma ya ho/ dam tshig dgyes/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dam tshig gi dus la bab/ dzaHhUM baM hoH
223b3(1): lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril ba/ shrI he ru ka e h+ye hi dr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya ho/ dam tshig la dgongs/ sa ma ya stAM/ dam tshig dus la bab/ au e drag po badz+ra rdo rje A ra li ho/ 'das pa'i mkha' 'gro dpal chen po mnyes par mdzod/
223b4(1): hrihUM hrI hrI/ thal mo gsum brdab ste bod/ dzaHhU~M baM hoHbadz+ra shrI he ru ka/ ru lu ru lu/ grog nas drang / pra be sha ya phaT/ 'byed par byed/ A be sha ya a/ bzhugs par bstim/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI he ru ka ha ha/ yum chen mo khro mo dbang phyug khrag 'thung
223b5(1): ma/ ru lu ru lu thog nas drang pra be sha phaT/ ye shes pa bstim mo/ A be sha ya a/ ye shes pa bstim mo/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+TaM/ ma rungs pa'am sdang ba/ sa ma ya mu dra/ brag gya/ sgo dbye ba 'am thobacig/ pra be sha ya phaT/
223b6(1): shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ sarba duSh+TAM/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pra b+hany+tsa kra hUM phaT/ rnam par 'jigs pa'i 'khor lo/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya ho/ sarba duSh+TAn sa ma ya mu dra/ pra b+hany+tsa kra rdo rje
224a1(1): dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje dam tshig la dgyes pas sdang ba thams cad/ dam tshig phyag rgya/ rnam par 'jigs pa'i 'khor los/ hUM phaT/ ka ya bA ka tsit+ta/ sku gsung thugs/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ brtan pa'i rdo rje/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra sarba
224a2(1): duSh+Tan/ sa ma ya daM Sh+ya dam tshig mche ba can gyis/ a ba staM ba ka hU~M phaT/ IM badz+ra gu h+ya dr-i sh+ya sa ma ya staM/ rdo rje gsang ba ltos shig dam tshig dus la bab/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya dr-i sh+ya sa ma ya ho/ rdo rje gsang ba gzigs shig dam tshig dus yin no// au
224a3(1): badz+ra gu h+ya dr-i sh+ya sa ma ya phaT/ dzaHhUM baM hoHphyag rgya bzhi/ shrI he ru ka/ ma ha sarba duts+tsha/ sa ma ya mu dra pra b+hany+tsa kra/ rab tu 'joms pa'i 'khor lo can/ bak+Sha ya/ gshog pa/ pak+Sha ya/ rab tu gshog pa/ bi taM sa ya/ gdengs pa/ bi taM sa ya rab tu gdengs
224a4(1): pa/ he b+ha ga wAn/ kye bcom ldan/ bud+d+ha k+She tre/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing la/ pra ti stam+b+ha ka ya zil gyis gnon pa/ hUM phaT/ oM shrI badz+ra ka ra mu ka shwa rA yA ya na maHdpal gyi lha mo mda' gzhu 'gengs pas mi gtong ba'i yum des phyag bya'o// oM shrI badz+ra ra
224a5(1): gas ma yA ya na maHdpal gyi lha mo thugs rje chags pas mi gtong ba'i yum ces bya ba/ oM shrI badz+ra kha T+wAM ga pra tsa la yA ya na maHrdo rje kha T+wAM bdud bzhi 'dul bas mi gtong ba'i yum zhes bya ba/ oM shrI badz+ra g+haN+De pra tsa la yA ya na maHgsung rab rgya
224a6(1): mtsho sgrogs pas mi gtong ba'i yum zhes bya ba des phyag 'tshal lo/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ban+d+ha nAM ka ro yA mi/ phyag 'tshal lo ma hA yo gI nI/ rnal 'byor ma/ a ti pu ho// shin tu dgyes sam/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ mchod par bzhes/ a la la ho/ kha raM bo kha raM
224b1(1): rab tu bo kha raM myur du zo kha raM 'bar bar po// badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ badz+ra kro d+hI shwa rI/ khro mo dbang phyug ma/ ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha ho/ a r+g+ha mchod yon/ kha raM kha hi/ gsol gsol cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho// mchod pas dgyes so// oM sarba
224b2(1): ta thA ga ta ka ya sid+d+hi au/ sku'i dngos grub/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wa ka sid+d+hi AHgsung gi dngos grub/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta tsid+d+hi hUM/ thugs kyi dngos grub/ dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI he ru ka/ i dan/ puSh+pe/ me tog d+ha pe/ spos/ dI pa/ mar me/
224b3(1): gan+d+he/ dri chab/ ba lin+ta/ gtor ma/ pra tits+tsha ho/ mchod par ral/ shrI pany+tsa/ bdud rtsi/ kha kha kha/ zaza bo/ kha hi kha hi kha hi/ rab tu gsal/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ A be sha ya A be sha ya/ brtan par byed rab tu brtan par byes
224b4(1): pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ dgyes par byed rab tu dgyes par byed/ pra tits+tsha ho// mchod par 'bral/ shrI pany+tsa kha kha kha khA hi khA hi khA hi/ dpal lnga gsol rab tu gsol// dz+wa la raM/ sgrol ma/ sa ma ya ho/ sbyor ba dam tshig la dgyes/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dam
224b5(1): ga dus bab/ a nu ra ga ho/ rjes su chags pa/ ra ga ya mi/ chags pa la sbyor// hUM hUM/ bad+mar rdo rje bstan/ byang chub sems/ bo de tsiH/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra A bi sha ya/ pad+ma la 'byed par bstim/ A be sha ya/ rab tu la 'thad par bstim/ pra
224b6(1): be sha ya dbye ba/ pra be sha ya/ rab tu phye nas/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ mchod pas mnyes/ shrI pany+tsa kha kha kha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ sarba duSh+TAn/ sa ma ya mu dra/ ma raM/ gsod pa/ kha kha kha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ hr-i da ya/ sring
225a1(1): po can/ pi pa hUM phaT/ mnyes par \u0f7f/ dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya/ ma hA mAM sa/ sha/ ma hA rak+ta/ khrag/ ma hA tsit+ta/ sbeng / ma hA ba su ta/ d+ha ma/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ bdud rtsi wa/ ma hA ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha
225a2(1): ho// mchod yon/ rab tu bzhes shig/ kha kha kha/ gsol/ le le le/ mnyes par tshim par/ hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo/ sku gsung thugs 'khor bcas/ d+harma ka ya na maHchos sba la bstod pa/ sam+b+ho ga ka ya na maHlongs sba la bstod pa/ nirmA Na kA ya na maH
225a3(1): sbrul sgra la bstod pa/ dz+nyA na pany+tsa na maHye shes lnga la bstod pa/ ka ya bA ka tsit+ta gu Na karma hr-i da ya na maHsku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las snying por gyur pa la bstod pa/ sarba ta thA ga ta na mo na maHhUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal
225a4(1): lo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis he ru ka thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gsungs so// dbus kyi gtso bo'i phyag rgya ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// chos sgra la nyon mongs pa ma
225a5(1): gos pas// rdo rje nyon mongs pa 'joms/ kha thAM sku gsung thugs kyi dug gsum 'joms/ rnga chung chos sgra sgrogs shing shes rab bskyed/ g.yas// dri la bu bsam gtan/ b+ha na dmar ye shes thugs rjes chags/ rgyu zhags g.yon/ 'khor ba gnas nas
225a6(1): 'dren// dpal chen ye shes snying rje yab/ thabs kyi rgya// shes rab stong pa yum dbyings ma'i phyag rgya ni/ chos dbyings/ zhal gcig zabs shes phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing / mi 'gyur ba// g.yas pa shes rab thabs la ye shes rdo
225b1(1): rjes 'khyud brten// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la dbyings kyi chags pa stob// kro d+hi shwa rI dbyings kyi rgya// gnas kyi mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya ni/ dkar mo/ go rI phyag g.yon b+han dmar g.yas byis dbyug sku mdog sngo/ rkun mo tso
225b2(1): rI phyag mtshan mda' gzhu 'gengs ma skra mdog ser// rmongs mo pra mo phrag gnyis kyi chu srin rgyal mtshan 'phyar/ sku mdog dmar/ ro langs ma'am thal byed ma// be tA g.yas byi za g.yon rdor 'phyar sku mdog nag/ spos mo/ puk+ka s+tha mdog
225b3(1): dmar ser zhing rgyu 'dren/ sle sha can/ g+hasma g.yon dung dmar khrag g.yas rdo rjes dkrug cing 'thung sgra mdog ldang / dur khrod ma'am ma tshogs ma/ sma sha spu mdog mthing nag/ phyag mtshan byi snying za/ gtum mo// tsan+d+ra sgra mdog ser skya phyag mtshan
225b4(1): mchog lus 'dra la/ me dpung // 'bar ba'i nang nas zhing gi gdan/ gdan la bzhengs nas kyang / rnal 'byor pa'i// mchod bzhes dam tshig skongs 'dir mthu dang phyi mar dngos grub stsol// thugs kyi phyag rgya zab mo
225b5(1): bca'// dang por bzhengs su gsol ba ni// lag pa se gol dpung mgor bsnol// snyan gsan dbab pa 'dus ma byas/ mtshon pa/ bca' thabs// mkha' dbyings phyag rgya gnas smin mtshams bca'// spyan drangs
225b6(1): sor mo nang du bsnol// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su dbab// bzhugs gsol mthe bong rtse sprad thur// 'dus ma byas mkha' dbyings kyi phyag rgya kho na'o// mdzub mo gnyis ni mdud par bya// gung mo rtse sprad gzhan ma
226a1(1): brkyang // srid pa gsum na gnas pa bstan// brtan bzhugs phyag rgya sor mo bsnol// mthe bong so sor bsgreng bar bya// mi gam sor mo gzhan bskum la// mthe bong mthe'u chung gnyis bsgrengs te/
226a2(1): kha 'gram g.yas dang g.yon du bcas// dam tshig bdar ba'i phyag rgya ni// thod pa tshar gsum phyag rgya bya// mdzub mo mthe bong nang du bkug/ gung gnyis mthe'u chung rtse bzhi sprad// srin lag bsnol ba thod skam
226a3(1): rgya// zod skam chos sgra'i phyag rgyar bstan// srin lag mdzub gung nang du dbyung // thod pa rlon pa'i phyag rgya yin/ zod rnon sbal gA'i phyag rgyar bstim// snyim pa lta bur byas pa ni// thod pa tshal bu'i longs su phyag rgya'o// gzhog pa'i phyag
226a4(1): rgyas/ zil gyis mnan pa mthe bong sbyar// dpung mgor gshog pa sor mo brkyang // phyag 'tshal phyag rgya lha mo bzhi/ thams cad bde bas// rgyas 'debs ma dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs/ bde bas nyon mongs pa// rmongs
226a5(1): par byed pa dmar mo khu tshur 'khyud/ rnam rtog bde bas// za byed ser mo kha T+wAM ga/ bde bas// tshe ring zhing 'phel bar byed ljang gu dril bu thogs// mtheb srin rtse sprad e yi rgya// bdud rtsi phul na dngos grub blang // gtor ma
226a6(1): rin chen 'bar bas 'bul// mtheb mdzub zlum po gung mo sprad gzhan so so// ral gri'i phyag rgyas bsgral bar bya/ mdzub mo gnyis// lcags kyus ltar dgug rig ma bkug la sbyar// thod pas snyim pa bkan nas dam rdzas bstab par
226b1(1): bya// dug gsum mchod par 'bul ba ni/ gti mug/ mi rtog 'dod chags bde dang zhe sdang gsal ba yi// gti mug/ sha zhe sdang rus 'dod chags khrag la bza' bar bya/ phyag tu/ rdo rje dril bu'i 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya mthe bo be'u chung sprad
226b2(1): gsum po sbreng / 'dzin// yang na dril bu dang cang te'u bsnams pa'i sgras/ bstod pa mang po ni// sku la bstod pa dang gsung la bstod pa thugs la bstod pa yon tan la bstod pa las/ la bstod pa// che ba'i khyad par la bstod pa rnams kyis
226b3(1): babastod// thugs kyi man ngag zab mo rnams// rtsa rlung bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsgom// thugs kyi man ngag zab mo bsgom par bya na/ gnas pa rtsa 'khor lo bzhi/ g.yo ba rlung bskyod pas/ khams bdud rtsi 'bebs/ sngags yi ger gyur nas slar gsal bar byed
226b4(1): pa ste/ snod ngan la rab tu gsang ba'o// rab tu gsang bar bya ba nyid// de yang snyoms 'jug bsgom pa ni// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo'i nang // dar dkar skud pa sangs rgyas spyan// stong pa chen po'i ye shes gsal// snying
226b5(1): ga na sa'i dngas ma rtsa dar dkar gyi skud pa 'dra ba ni gdod ma nas phung po'i rten byed pas 'byung ba'i dngas ma ste/ de ltar snang ste yum sangs rgyas spyan du gsal lo// don stong pa chen po'i ye shes te thams cad kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngang du 'gyur ba med pa'i rten byed
226b6(1): pa'o// dar dkar gyi sbud pa de la khrag gi dwangs ma mtshal lhog pa ma'i khu ba 'dra bas gnas pa ni/ khrag gi dngas ma rgya mtshal 'dra/ gdod ma nas phung po cong 'dogs pas 'byung ba'i dngas ma ste/ chu ltar snang ste yum mA ma ki'o// chu nyid mA ma ki yin
227a1(1): la// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sdud// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes de thams cad bkod pa med pa'i dbyings gcig tu sdug pa'i bdag nyid do// dbugs kyi drangs ma sa 'og gser// de la dbugs kyi dngas ma gser sa le skams 'ag na
227a2(1): yod pa'i rlangs pa tsam gnas pa ni// rlung nyid dam tshig sgrol ma la// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin// gdod ma nas phung po yang zhing g.yo ba'i rten byed pa'i 'byung ba yang rlung ltar snang ste/ yum dam tshig sgrol ma'o// drod dngas me long nyi ma'i
227a3(1): nga // de la drod kyi dngas ma me long nyi ma la bzhag pa'i ngad tsam gnas pa ni/ dper na me long nyi ma la bzhag pa'i ngad sba ba la btang na me 'bar bar nus pa'o// smin byed me ni sgron me'i gos// de nyid ni gdod ma nas phung po smin par byed pa'i rang bzhin te/
227a4(1): 'byung ba me ltar snang ste kha dog sna lnga'o// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te// thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings su rtog pa'i sgron ma lum gos dkar mo'o// thig le nam mkha' gsal bar byed// de'i dkyil na thig le chen po byang sems bzhugs pa ni drangs ma
227a5(1): chen po ste/ gdod ma nas phung po gsal bar byed pa'i rten byed pa ste/ 'byung ba'i dngas ma ste rtsa de nam mkha' ltar snang ngo // dbyings phyug ma nyid me long gsal// de ni theg pa chen po'i ye shes te yum dbyings phyug ma thams cad yang dag pa'i dbyings su gsal bar
227a6(1): go skabs 'byed pa// me long lta bu'i ye shes su yang gsal ba'o// thig le de spyir/ khams gsum kun la yod pa de la/ khyad par rnal 'byor pa thabs shes snyoms 'jug byed pa la brod de byang sems kyi rang bzhin de la rgyun du/ blta/ zhing dgug par bya'o// de
227b1(1): la bltas nas bsgoms na tha dad med// de las de nyid kho na'i thig le sems// yi ge 'od du zhu nas rang bzhin med// de ltar bsgoms na ci 'ong na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de las 'ong ste/ nam mkha'i gzugs su skye ba 'ong ste rnal 'byor
227b2(1): chen po khams gsum thams cad tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur ro// gang las 'byung na thig le chen po de rgyun ma chad pa las 'byung ngo // de byung na ci yod na/ thig le byang sems las su rung ste 'od can du gyur tsa na au gyi gong dang 'og na a dang nr-i/ A'i gong dang 'og na su dang tri/
227b3(1): hUM gi gong dang 'og na bre dang du gnas pa sod du rung bas te/ thig le rang bzhin med par 'gro/ de bas na oM AHhUM bzlas pa/ a mr-i su tri pre du 'khor ba ste/ 'khor 'das dbyer med par gyur nas rang bzhin med par bde ba 'char ro// dar dkar skud pa rgya mtshal
227b4(1): lcog la tsam// dbugs kyi dngas ma me long nyi ma'i drod// thig le chen po gser zhun 'dra ba dang // thig le rang bzhin med pas rtsa dar dkar gyi skud pa 'dra ba rta rnga bcu tshal tsam la mtshal lcog la ma'i drangs ma gnas pa bde ba chen po 'char
227b5(1): bar byed pa yin te/ de 'od du 'bar bas de la dbugs kyi drangs ma gser sa 'og na gnas pa'i rlangs tsam zhig gnas pa ni/ bde ba chen po g.yo bar byed pa ste/ de 'od du 'bar/ de la drod kyi dngas ma me long nyi ma la bzhag pa'i ngad tsam gnas te bde ba chen po'i dbyings su
227b6(1): bskyod pa'i rang bzhin no// de'i dkyil na thig le byang sems theg pa chen po'i ye shes yum kun tu bzang mor snang ste/ de yang thig le gser zhun ma 'dra ba ni shes rab ste/ yum thams cad kyi ngo bo yin no// de ltar na 'byung ba lnga'i dwangs ma yum lnga'i rang bzhin gyis gdod ma
228a1(1): @nas phung po bskyed par byed par gnas so// de la// rin chen ze'u bcug pa 'dra ba'i/ ni// thabs kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang / bo la sogs pa lab rnams kyi nga ba'o// de yang // rin chen ke ke ru gdar btags/ pa 'dra ba ni
228a2(1): memo long lta bu'i ye shes so// me long lta ba'i ye shes byang chub sems la bltas mthong med/ pa'i tshul du mthong ste// yum nyid gang yin yab nyid de/ yab gang yin pa yum ste// tha dad ma yin pa 'od can du mthong ngo // thig le dwangs ma rang
228a3(1): bzhin med// nam mkha'i gzugs su khams gsum kun// de gang la yod na thig le la mod de/ dngas ma chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin med par song ste nam mkha'i gzugs su skyes tsam nas khams gsum thams cad so so ma yin pa/ ye shes su ldan gyis grub
228a4(1): pa nam mkha'i gzugs su byung ba la/ de ltar nam mkha'i gzugs su skyes pa nyid thig le byang sems yin te chos kyi sku'o// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa 'di dang / gong du dpal chen po'i rang bzhin bstan pa nas gnas tshul rnal 'byor zab mor bshad pa gnyis 'brel te
228a5(1): rgyud rgyud kyis bshad par bya'o// lung lung gis bshad par bya'o// man ngag man ngag gis bshad par bya'o// chos kyi sku la rab tu gnas// gang na gnas na lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus na nyi ma la gnas/ gang la gnas na yum kun tu
228a6(1): bzang mo gsang ba shes rab kyi rang bzhin thig ler gnas te de kho na chos kyi gnas sam dbyings yin no// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo nyid// drug cu rtsa gnyis kun bzang mo// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin bzhugs// rang bzhin ji lta bu
228b1(1): yin na/ shes rab dang thabs te thig le las byung ba thams cad mtshan nyid 'dzin pa ni yab rnams te thabs so// thig le rang bzhin med ste/ chos kyi dbyings yin pa ni shes rab ste yum rnams so// khams gsum slar yang rgyas btab pas// de ltar thabs shes dbyer
228b2(1): med pa'i thig le la bzhugs pa la/ thig le de las gzugs dang khams gsum thams cad 'byung ba yin te/ 'byung ba de thams cad zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor du ma gyur pa med do// dkyil 'khor du gyur pa de thams cad kyang slar thig le chos kyi dbyings yin pas kun tu rgyas btab
228b3(1): bo// de la// ye shes lnga ni lhun gyis grub// skye gnas pa la ye shes lnga la blta zhing bsgom mo// chos 'khor dngas ma'i drod phab nas// kun tu bzang mo thur du 'phro// de'i drod mar la phab ste kun tu bzang mo'i rang bzhin thig le 'og ma la thim
228b4(1): la zur du 'phro zhes bya/ kun tu// bzang mo drod kyi rang bzhin gyis thig le gyen du 'bar// te snying ga'i drangs ma chen po la thim pa la gyen du 'bar ba zhes bya/ gong gi drangs ma chen po la 'od can du gyur nas// dngas ma gser sbram rgyu ba med// des drangs
228b5(1): ma chen po gser sa 'og na yod pa'i rlangs pa tsam gnas pa de 'od du 'bar nas thig le 'od can du gyur nas dbugs kyi gzhi med pa des je zhan je zhan nas rgyu ba med de med na de'i 'bras bu rgyu ba med de/ bde ba chen por gnas pa las/ bde ba chen por mched pa zhes
228b6(1): bya'o// bde ba mched bskul thig le mnyam// bde ba chen po'i drod des gong gi thig le la thim pas thig le 'od du 'bar ba la bsgrub par byas pas thig le gong 'og mnyam par sbyor ba'o// mgrin pa longs spyod bcu drug dkyil// mnyam sbyor drod
229a1(1): kun bde chen ro// dpal chen tha' 'od des mgrin pa longs spyod la mnyam par sbyor te/ de gang la bzhugs na mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo rtsa 'dab bcu drug gi dkyil na pad+ma'i ge sar la bzhugs pa'i thig lo'o// de'i 'og gi drod kyis bskul
229a2(1): bas 'od du 'bar ba de bde ba chen po la gnas pa la/ bde ba chen po'i ro zhes bya'o// dgyes stobs bde ba'i phrin las 'phro// shes bya byung zad gzigs mor rol// des bde ba chen por lhun gyis grub ste de las phyir mi g.yo ba la dgyes pa chen po
229a3(1): zhabs par bya zhes rba/ shas bya phral min na blangs rtogs pa yin te chad pa thig le yin te ci 'od skar thig le des rnam par rtogs zad pa'i ye shes zhes bya/ thig la de nyid rang bzhin med de bde ba chen po nyid snang ste/ bde ba chen po de'i 'od la rol mo zhes bya/ rol mo la
229a4(1): gzigs mo zhes des bde ba chen po'i gnas dang thig le bzhugs pa la phog go/ spyi bo bde ba chen po na// sum cu rtsa gnyis nam mkhar song // chos sku phyogs dus sku gsung thugs// gnyis 'dres kun dngos bdag gyur pa// skur
229a5(1): gyur zhal mthong dbang bskur grub/ mgrin pa nas nam mkhang mang bas rgyasam pa rtsa gces kyi dkyil na zla ba la thig la byang sams gnas pa// theg la de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngas pa yang yin/ den chos kyi su lhagam ze'i phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du
229a6(1): rdzogs sangs rgyas yang thig le de nyid yin/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyang thig le de nyid yin// 'di dang mgrin pa'i thig le'i 'od des bde ba chen po'i thig le la phog pas 'od du zhu nas spyi blugs su gyur pas bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du gyur nas khams
229b1(1): gsum thams cad so so ma yin par gyur te/ ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs su skyes te chos skur gyur pa la/ kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur pa zhes bya'o// ye shes ting 'dzin tshogs gnyis rgyan// de ltar 'byor pa chos skur gyur nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal dus
229b2(1): gcig tu mthong ba ni rnal 'byor gang ltar las su rung phyin chad tshe la dbang ba la sogs pa gang dga' ba la dbang bskur/ de ltar grub pa de yang gzhan ma yin/ bdag nyid ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du gnas pa de la lhag pa'i ting 'dzin de lta bu dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'o// de la
229b3(1): gas gnyis su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su lhun gyis grub pa des thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du gyur pas de'i longs spyod du ma gyur pa'am rgyan du ma gyur pa med pas rgyan du che zhes bya'o// ro rkang kun 'dar 'khor 'das rtsa// srog shing rnam pa
229b4(1): gsum po la// sems can gyi don yang mdzad pa ni g.yas ro ma gzung ba'i rtsa g.yon rgyang ma 'dzin pa'i rtsa ste/ de gnyis 'khor ba'o// dbus kun 'dar ma gzung 'dzin spangs pa ste rtsang ngan las 'das pa'i rtsa thig le chud pas so// gnyis rdzogs sangs
229b5(1): rgyas thugs rje yis// thig le las su rung na chos slar gyur pa de ni/ tshogs rnams gnyis rdzogs pa las blang ba ste ye shes tshogs las chos slar byung bsod nams tshogs las gzugs slar byung nas de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pa des ni// sgyu ma'i sems can sbyor sgrol
229b6(1): 'dul// snying rje chen pos phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sems can thams cad la rmi lam sgyu ma lta bur don byed de zhing bcu sgrol gzungs ma la sbyor sems can rnams 'dul lo// 'du 'dzi g.yeng ba rab spangs nas// man ngag 'di la rnal 'byor pas phyi nang 'du 'dzi'i
230a1(1): gzang ba rnams grangs nas dus rtag tu ma mangs par brnams pas na// thig le 'di la bsgom par bya// rang sras la zag la kyang sams gnas pa la gnas par gas par byas nas bskams na rang rig pa'i dan mngan du gyur nas sangs rgyas /
230a2(1): sems can gyi don byed par 'gyur ro// des ni sgrub pa po de la dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de'i sras// byang chub sems dpas thams cad kyi/ byin gyis rlob/ mkha' 'gro yab// dpa' bo dpa' mo mkha' 'gro ma yum kun/ gyi
230a3(1): lus la// bde ba chen po'i bskyed par byed mchog thun mong gi dngos grub ster/ bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi khro bo ma lus pa thams cad rnams/ dpal badz+ra he ru ka'i tshogs su gyur pas na he ru ka'i yon tan
230a4(1): las gdul bya la sgra cir yang snang ba dang / 'khor mang po dang / ru tra la sogs pa'i dbang mo dang / gnas bcu dang / dur khrod brgyad du yang snang ba'o// yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor du ma gyur pa med pa 'di gsungs so// dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po
230a5(1): ni// g.yas dkar rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid mtshan/ g.yon dmar mtshan ma med pa mtshan mthing ga'i zhal/ smon pa med pa// dang po rdo rje rtse dgu g.yas/ khams gsums dgu'i sgrib pa ma lus pa 'joms pas// ba ra ma rtse lnga ye shes lngas
230a6(1): rgyud lnga'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pas/ tha ma zhing / dbug gi ma mo dbang du sdud// dang po dril bu chos sgra sgrogs pas thod khrag ba ra/ bdud rtsir rol pas// tha ma 'jig rten g.yon pa na// 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pas gnas spor bas/ khro mo
230b1(1): dbyings phyug sku la 'khril/ yum chos kyi dbyings yin pas dbyings ye shes la chags pa'o// rdo rdze sa 'joms g.yas dug gsum bcom nas gsol bas/ la thod pa g.yon// de yi 'khor gyi sgra sangs rgyas la dbu byol song du sprul pas na/ phra men ma/
230b2(1): seng ge'i dbu// sing ha phyag gyen du bsnol te kha na ro 'dzin/ kha ro bsnol sku mdog ser seng / stag gi dbu// bya g+h+ri ga nan lha phyag gnyis mkhrig ma thur du bsnol bsnol sku mdog dmar stag/ wa'i dbu// sri la sku mdog nag mo zhing gi khog pa kha phye nas ldag
230b3(1): sbrang ki'i dgra// bA na zhing gi log pa 'dral nas lha sku mdog mthing ga khyi/ sbrang yang / bya rgod dam// gre b+ha g.yas gri g.yon thod pa dmar rgyu ma 'dren kha dog dkar/ 'dren rgod/ dur bya// kang ka'i dbu zhing phrag sbra mdog bya/ snar khrag chos 'dra
230b4(1): mgo ring // bya rog/ ka ka kha na ro phyag na b+ha na d+ha dang ral gri mdog nag/ 'ug pa// u lu spu mdog sna tshogs pa khra mo phyag na/ dung lcags ku'o// 'ug/ 'di gzhan na// mu lha mthing ga rdo rgyu 'ug/ byung ba brtag/ lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor dpal chen
230b5(1): po la phyogs bzhin mche ba can/ mtshams bzhin gzhog pa can no// gsal bar shar/ ye shes pa// spyan drangs la mchod pa la sogs dang bstod pa 'bul// yang na gdul bya'i ngo snang la// dbus kyi khrag 'thung sbra mdog mthing nag chos
230b6(1): sku// chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa la mnga' brnyes pas chos kyi sku dang sbyar/ nyes pa dang bral ba// g.yas pa dkar la longs sku g.yon pa dmar// thugs rjes chags pa sbrul sku// g.yas kyi dang po kha TaM ga/ dug gsum gtan nas 'joms pa// bar ma rdo
231a1(1): rje ma rig pa gtan 'joms rje'u chung zad byung chos sgra sgrogs pa'i dril ba 'ob// g.yon pa ma mo las la 'bod pa'i ting ri'i shing gi dbyug pa 'phyar// bar ma dug lnga drug gsum bdud rtsi chen por longs spyod pas na/ dung chen rak+ta
231a2(1): gsol// tha ma chud drug 'khor bar gnas nas 'dren par mdzad pas ba su ta yi zhags// zhabs bzhi yab thabs la yum ni shes rab sbyor bas sku la 'khril// dur khrod chas kyis rab tu brgyan// de yi 'khor na gnas pa ni/ shar gyi
231a3(1): nidagra// rta gdong sgra mdog sngon mo phyag na lcags kyu 'dzin/ pa'o// lho na// phag gdong sgra mdog nag mo phyag na mche zhags can/ nub na spre'u'i dbu can phyag mtshan// lcags sgrog sgra mdog dmar mo nyi zla'i spyan/ byang na sbyang gdong
231a4(1): ma// thal byed phrag mtshan dril bu skra mdog sna tshogs pa'i mdog/ shar sngon lcags kyu ma// 'tsho byed sgra mdog dkar mo aM ku sha/ 'gugs ma/ lho nub na// 'ching byed sgra mdog ser mo pA sha hUM/ 'ching ba/ nub byang na// rlag byed sgra mdog
231a5(1): dmar nag s+pho Ta baM/ lcags sgrog/ byang shar na// rlung 'byin sku mdog ljang gu g+haN+De hoHdril bu dgyes pa bskyed do// dpal chen lha dgu rnam par gsal// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bskyed byas la// grol lam gyi dbang du na ye nas rgyal
231a6(1): ba'i rang bzhin yin par shes nas// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor 'og min gnas nas spyan drangs pa/ gzhug par bya// gdul bya sems can rnams kyi don/ 'dul phyir 'di ltar snang / zhal// dbus ma mi 'gyur ba kyi he ru ka ni sngo// g.yas pa
231b1(1): nyes pa dang bral bas dkar la g.yon pa dmar/ snying rje chags pas// phyag drug pha rol phyin drug dang ldan pas/ phyag na bsnams pa ni/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ kha TaM thod pa sbyin pa gtong dri la bu dang / shes rab bo// cang te'u tshul khrims snyan
231b2(1): zhags pa bzod pas 'ching lcags klu bsam gtan gyis 'dren thogs// yab thabs snying rje chen po// yum shes rab stong pa/ dang gnyis su med par 'khril/ g.yas/ rdo rje yab la 'khyud g.yon thod pa yang dag ldan// shar du go rI dkar mo
231b3(1): gags ser dbus sngo gson ldang / ma mo brgyad po 'di dag zhal gsum phrag drug pa ste phyag mtshan thams cad gtso bo dang mthun pa'o// lho ru be tA bal byed ma g.yas dkar dbus sngong g.yon ldang // nub tu pra mo rmongs mo g.yas sngo dbus ser gson
231b4(1): ljaldang // byang du tso rI rkun mo/ g.yas ljang dbus ser g.yon dmar// shar lho puk+ka sbos mo g.yas dkar ser dbus ldang dmar g.yon sdug nag sna tshogs mdog/ lho nub tsaN+Da gtum mo g.yas ljang dbus sngo g.yon ser// nub byang g+hasma sle sha
231b5(1): can g.yas dung dbus sngo g.yon ldang // byang shar sma sha dur khrod ma g.yas dmar dbus sngo g.yon ldang // lha dgu dam tshig dkyil 'khor la// thabs lam dbang du dam tshig lha bla ma'i thugs la bstim pa'o// ye shes dkyil 'khor gzhug
231b6(1): pa'o// ye shes kyi lha 'og min gnas nas spyan drang ba'o// yang ni gdul bya la snang ba// zhal bzhi phrin las kyi bzhi mdzad pa ste/ mthing ga drag po dbus kyi sku// g.yas pa dbang gis dmar la g.yon pa zhi ba dkar// steng gi zhal ni rgyas
232a1(1): pa ser por bzhugs// phyag brgyad g.yas dang g.yon pa na// 'khor ba las rgyal bas stong 'khor los sbar ba'i pags pa phyag gis brgyangs pa'o// rgyal ba'i pags pa 'dzin pa la/ gson gnyis pa// thod pa dang ni
232a2(1): g.yas gnyis pa/ kha T+wAM 'dzin/ g.yas gsum pa// b+han+d+ha g.yas bzhi pa rdo rje g.yon gsum pa zhags pa dang / g.yon pa/ tshangs pa'i mgo bo brgyad pa'o// de 'dra'i sku la yum phag mo dmar mo 'khril// yang ni 'dul phyir he ru ka/ tshad
232a3(1): med bzhi/ zhal bzhi phrin las phyag bzhi rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs bzhi pa// g.yas dkar byams pa/ g.yon ldang snying rje steng ma dkar/ dga' ba/ dbus ma sngon po btang snyoms sku dang mthun/ ye shes// rdo rje dbyings dril bus yum la
232a4(1): 'khyud/ g.yon 'og ma/ thod pa dang ni g.yas 'og ma kha T+wAM 'dzin// yang ni gdul bya 'dul ba'i phyir// zhal brgyad pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bcu drug phyag dga' ba bcu drug/ dbus sgra dang mthun par sngo g.yas pa zhi dkar rgyas ser
232a5(1): dbang dmar/ ba'o// g.yon zhal zhi dkar dang drag sngo dang rgyas ser// steng gi zhal ni dbang du byed pa dmar po yin// na ra'i na ra mi la 'jug pags pa steng du ste// glang po'i ko rlon rgyangs nas 'dzin/ g.yas/ rdo rje g.yon dril bu'i
232a6(1): phyag rgya can/ g.yas// thod pa dang ni g.yon kha T+wAM 'dzin/ g.yas/ ral gri g.yon lcags kyu rnam par 'chang / ba'o// g.yas/ sdigs mdzub zhags bcas g.yon 'khor lo dang / g.yas// yid bzhin rin chen g.yon tho ba dang /
232b1(1): gas// mdung zung dang ni g.yon ra la ra gri dang / g.yas/ mgo dang g.yon cang te'u rnam par bsnams/ sba la/ rdo rje yum dang gnyis med 'khril pa la/ shar na 'khor/ 'dod pa'i khro bo thod pa sngo// lhon/ stobs ni dud ka rdo
232b2(1): rje gtod/ nub/ mi g.yo ngur smrig sdigs mdzub can/ byang / rdo rje mdog dmar kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhal nas sum+b+ha'i gsang sngags 'don// yang ni gdul bya dag la snang // zhal bzhi pa la bcu drug phyag/ g.yas shi
