232b3(1): dkar g.yon dbang dmar dbus drag sngo ba// steng gi zhal ni rgyas ser po snang / g.yas/ sdigs mdzub dang ni g.yon rdo rje gsor/ g.yas/ dril bu dang ni g.yon zhags pa dang / g.yas/ bum pa dang ni g.yon ral gri dang /
232b4(1): g.yas/ mdung thung dang ni g.yon dgra sta dang / g.yas/ thod pa dang ni g.yon lcags kyu dang / g.yas/ gzhu dang g.yon kha T+wAM ga yang bsnams/ g.yas// mda' ni gsor zhing g.yon tho ba 'dzin/ g.yas/ 'khor lo bsnams
232b5(1): dang g.yon skyabs sbyin mi 'jigs phyag/ sems can thams cad// 'chi ba slong bar byed para'i las mdzad par ro// bshad// de dag bka' yi las mkhan ni// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad yin/ shar gyi drug ni/ srin po'i chung ma'i
232b6(1): ming // srin mo smug nag g.yas rdo rje g.yon thod rlon 'chang / sa tshangs pa'i chung ma'i ming / spu mdog dmar ser g.yas rdo rje g.yon pad+ma bsnams// lha chen gyi chung ma dkar ljang rdo rje tri shU la// gtogs 'dod kyi chung ma sngon mo rdo
233a1(1): rje 'khor lo 'chang // gzhon nu dmar ser g.yas rdo rje mdung zung 'phen// brgya byin dkar mo g.yas rdo rje g.yon in dra ni la'i rdo rje gdengs/ lho'i drug/ rdo rje ser mo rdo rje tsan+da gyi chung 'thung ba bdud rtsi'i rdza
233a2(1): ma dmar mo rdo rje pad+ma bsnams// zla ba'i chung ma dkar mo rdo rje me tog pun+da ri// be con ldang nag rdo rje dbyug tho 'phyar// srin mo dmar mo rdo rje thod khrag 'thung / lha za byed kyi chung ma// za ba ljang nag rdo rje ba su 'dren//
233a3(1): nub kyi drug/ dga' byed kyi chung ma ba dkar mo rdo rje ka ta ra ba dan no// 'chang // stobs chen dkar mo rdo rje gshol 'dzin ma// rdo rje ser mo rdo rje spu gris gcod// 'dod pa dmar po rdo rje mda' gzhu 'gengs// nor
233a4(1): srung dmar mo rdo rje bum pa 'dzin// rlung lha sngon mo rdo rje ba dan 'phyar/ byang gi drag/ gsod byed nag mo g.yas rdo rje g.yon ral gris so// me lha'i chung ma// mi mo dmar mo rdo rje gsal shing 'chang // g.yon shing bus ro phrag
233a5(1): // phag mo nag mo rdo rje mche zhags bsnams// rgan byed dkar mo rdo rje zhing chung za/ bi na la ka'i chung ma glang po sa// sna chen dkar mo rnga rje zod khrag 'thung // chu lha sngon mo rdo rje sbrul 'dzin ma/ lha nag pa'i chung ma
233a6(1): rdo rje nag mo rdo rje g.yas lcags kyu g.yon 'dzin/ lha gdong gi chung ma lho sgo ma// rdo rje ser mo rdo rje ra mgo zhags/ lha dmar po'i chung ma// rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom// lha za byed kyi chung ma rdo rje skra mdog ljang nag g.yas
233b1(1): rdo rje g.yon dril ba 'khrol dgyes// dpal chen rdo rje he ru la/ go ri la sogs/ ma mo brgyad kyis bskor ba dang / sid+d+ha la sogs// phra men brgyad kyis bskor ba dang / rta gdong la sogs// sgo ma bzhi yis bskor ba rnams// lha
233b2(1): mo go re brgyad si brgyad dang bcu drug sgom bzhi dang nyi shu'i 'khor du 'dod// de'i bzhin dbang phyug ma nyer brgyad tshogs kyis bskor/ de rnams dril bas 'khor// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad gtso po lab sam dang rtsa dgu/ gdul bya rnams la
233b3(1): snang bar 'gyur// he ru ka yi gnas bcu ni/ phyogs bcu pa gdul bya ste skad mi gcig pa bcu ni/ ka'i skad du// gnas bcwa dang lha ma yin gyi skad du/ nye ba'i gnas bcu dang gnyis dang / srin po'i skad du// yul ni rol pa dri ba'i skad du/ 1
233b4(1): yul ro la/ pa bcu/ gnod sbyin gyi skad// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing bcu dang ni// klu'i skad du// 'du sa bcu gshin rje'i skad du nye ba'i 'du sa bcu dang / mi 'am ci'i skad du// tshan+do bcu lto 'phye'i skad du/ nye ba'i tshan+do bcu yin// dur khrod chen
233b5(1): po'i gnas brgyad ni// yul gyi ming ni rgya gar yul// ma ga d+ha/ mkhas shing snying stobs che ba'i bral/ mchod rten bde byed brtsegs/ go ra'i gnas/ dwagra'i snying las byung ba'i// dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal// yul gyi ming ni sing+ga la/
233b6(1): gling phran/ mthong zos rdzu 'phrul can gyi yul/ mchod rten ri bo ta la/ tsau rI'i gnas/ mgo las byung ba'i// dur khrod chen po sku la rdzogs// yul gyi ming ni kha che'i yul// bde skyid ldan pa'i yul/ mchod rten ka ni ka pra mo he'i gnas/ rkang g.yon las byung
234a1(1): pa'i// dur khrod chen po he chen rol// yul gyi ming ni tho gar yul/ mthu dbang che ba gyad kyi yul/ mchod rten mgo mang / be nya mo'i gnas/ lag gson las byung ba'i// dur khrod chen po gsang chen rol// yul gyi ming ni
234a2(1): o rgyan yul// longs spyod 'byor ldan dngos grub 'thob pa'i yul/ gzi'i mchod rten d+harma tsakra/ g+ham+ba ri'i gnas/ pho mtshan las byung ba'i// dur khrod chen po pad+ma brtsegs// yul gyi ming ni bal po'i yul/ zas kyi longs spyod che ba'i yul/ mchod rten
234a3(1): bya ri kha shor/ puk+ka sI'i gnas/ lag pa g.yas pa las byung ba'i// dur khrod chen po lhun grub brtsegs// yul gyi ming ni za hor yul// 'byor ba'i longs spyod ldan pa'i yul/ mchod rten bde byed gzhon nu/ swa sha ni'i gnas/ nang grol las byung
234a4(1): ba'i// dur khrod chen po khu byug klong // yul gyi ming ni li yi yul// me chu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul/ mchod rten de'u shan/ tsaN+Da lI'i gnas/ rkang g.yas las byung ba'i// dur khrod 'jig rten mngon rdzogs yin// de nas yang dag par rdzogs
234a5(1): pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i chos nyid du thugs su chud pas tshogs nyid ma bsags par rdzogs nas sangs rgyas pa ste/ dpal chen po'i tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas nas kyang rang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sems la dbang bskur nus
234a6(1): pa'o// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi don ma lus par grub pa/ phrin las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gsungs so// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// bzhugs dang brtan dang mi g.yo dang // dper na
234b1(1): 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa la dbang byed pa'i rgyal po chen po'am/ de las gzhan pa'i dbang che ba dag la rag las pa'i phyir/ zhu ba gsol zhing bkur sti bskyed par 'dod na/ dang por gnas yid du 'ong bar byi dor dang chag chag bya/ de ltar nyid kyi bzhugs
234b2(1): gnas dang rang gi grong 'dab tu byon zin gyis kyang / yo byad phun sum tshogs pa sta gon la gnas par byas nas/ dang por rang ngam rang dang mtshungs pa'i pho nya btang nas/ bdag gi mgron du gshegs 'tshal lo zhes snyan gsan phab cing zhu ba gsol dgos so// de tsam gyis kyang
234b3(1): byon pa ma yin pas de'i rjes la spyan 'dren gyi pho nyas yang dag yang du bskul la gshegs su gsol zhing spyan 'dren dgos so// der bzhugs su gsol ba ma yin gyis rang gi mdun du gshegs su gsol dgos der gshegs nas bdag la gzhug pa yang / bdag gi khyim du
234b4(1): shegs nas kyang bzhugs su gsol ba yang phal pa ltar 'greng nas bzhugs pa ma yin par brtan par bzhugs su gsol dgos so// de ltar bzhugs kyang yun zung bas bya ba mi 'grub pa thugs rings kyang bya ba ma grub bar du sku gsung thugs gzhan du mi g.yo bar bzhugs su
234b5(1): gsol ba'o// bzhugs nas kyang thugs yal bar mi 'dor bar gdul bu'i 'dod pa la thugs gtad nas le lo yal yol phyed pyod ma mdzad par thugs la dgongs nas bzhugs pa ste/ spyan drangs pa'i dam tshig la dgongs pa dang / go skabs kyi rim pa mkhyen pas gzhan ji ltar
234b6(1): 'dul ba la dgongs pa nye bar 'jog par mdzad pa'i phyir las kyi phyag rgya bstan no// dam tshig zil gnon phyag byed dang / de ltar bzhugs su gsol zin yang / gzi byin med cing go skabs mi mkhyen pa ma yin te/ gzi byin dang ldan pas ni gzhan zil gyis
235a1(1): gnon cing go skabs kyi rim pa mkhyen pas ni/ gzhan ji lta bu 'dul ba'i dgongs pa nye bar 'jog par mdzad pa'i phyir las kyi phyag rgya bstan no// de nas phrin las kyi go skabs bstan pa de yang phal ba'i bsam pa ltar tshad med mi mdzad pa'am/ mdzad na yang
235a2(1): yun zung ngur mdzad pa ma yin/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i don ji bzhin du zhus pa'i don de mi mdzad du mi rung zhes nan tan bskyed pa'o// de ltar nan tan bskyed nas/ gang spyan lam du mi mdzes pa dang / gdul dka' ba'i 'gro ba thabs kyis 'dul ba'i dgongs par 'jog cing phrin
235a3(1): las brtsam par mdzad pa dang / ji ltar mdzad pa'i dgongs pa nye bar mdzad pa'i rjes la/ gdod gus pa bskyed nas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i rjes la// mchod dang zhal zas la sogs pa phyi nang gsang ba'i yo byad ma lus pas sku gsung thugs la mchod par
235a4(1): 'bral ba dang / de yang zas kyi rim pa mang du 'bul bar byed pa ni mnyes par bya ba'i phyir ro// stob dang mchod pa de nyid kyang / thugs tshims par bya ba'i phyir yang nas yang du drangs te// de nyid zhal du stob par bya ba dang / de yang sri zhu dang gus pas zas chud ma zos par
235a5(1): gnas su stob par bya'o// za ba dang / ji ltar rgyal po la mchod nas mchod pa zhal du stob pa de bzhin du 'khor rnams kyang gcig la gcig zar gzhug dgos pas na chos thams cad la mnga' mdzad pa'i chos kyi rgyal po chen po la mchod nas/ 'khor rnams la yang ster bar
235a6(1): byed pas na za ba'o// tshul rig de ltar rgyal po'i chos brgyad kyis rgyal po la sngon 'byung du mchod dgos pa'i lo rgyus sam/ dngos su mthong ba'i tshul yang rig la/ goms pa'i blo dag gis// rang gi bla mas nyams su blang ba'i man ngag gi don la lag tu blang bya'i cho
235b1(1): ga'i rim pa la goms par bya ba'i blo dag gis// ci rigs su ni bstan par bya// don khong du chud par byas nas mchod pa rgyas pa dang 'bring dang bsdus pa rnams 'gro ba gang la gang 'dul du ci rigs par bstan par bya'o// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa
235b2(1): dang // dmar gyis ar+g+haM ni sngon gyi dam tshig gi mchod pa yin/ mchog gi mchod pa bdud rtsi yin no// skul tshig dbyangs kyis de dag mnyes// thugs dam sbal tshig bstod pa dang / glu dbyangs snyan pos lha de dag mnyes par bya ba'i phyir glus bstod par bya'o// rdo
235b3(1): rje'i se go la gtogs pa yis/ lab yum thabs shes gnyis med rol pa mdzad pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje se gol gyi sgra dang lag pa gnyis kar bskur la dpung 'go g.yas g.yon gnyis dbus dang gsum du se gol lan gsum brdab pa'i sgras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yab
235b4(1): yum sras bcas khro bo khro mo'i tshogs thams cad chos sku mtshan med kyi ngang la gnas pa las gzugs sku mtshan ma'i rnam par gsal bar bzhengs su gsol zhing gsal bar bya ba ste/ dpe nam mkha' la sprin 'dus pa ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang
235b5(1): du 'dus nas bzhengs par bsam mo// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// thal mo legs par sbyar ba yis// thal mo lan gsum brdab par bya// gang nas spyan drangs na// ye shes can gyi spyod yul nas// lhag pa byang chub sems
235b6(1): da zer las lha mo lcags kyu can gyi tshogs mang po dang / lag pa se gol gtogs pa'i srin lag dang / mthe bong gi bar nas khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pa lcags kyu thogs pas gdan la bzung nas/ chos sku rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i spyod yul
236a1(1): nas spyan drang ba'o// gong ltar spyan drangs na// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// bran mong gi dpal sems can gyi don mdzang / khyad par gyi ngang la rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub ster/ zab mo'i dpal lha mo brgyad la longs spyod pas chen
236a2(1): po/ dug gsum sha khrag rus pa zhal du gsol bas khrag 'thung / 'khor lha mo brgyad dang bcas pa'o// gang gi phyir spyan drangs na// sems can don skad dam tshig dgongs/ khams gsum srid gsum na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las grol bar
236a3(1): bya ba'i don du 'khor ba las bskal bar bya ba sngon gyi dam tshig de la dgongs la/ gang du spyan drangs na// gnas 'dir ma lus gshegs su gsol/ spyir snod kyi lo ka gzhal las khang khyad par du ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas 'dir/ 'khor bcas ma lus pa rnams rang
236a4(1): bzhin grub pa'i gnas 'og min gyi gnas nas gshegs su gsol lo// de yang thun mong gi gnas 'jig rten gyi khams/ khyad par can gyi gnas 'og min/ phrin las kyi gnas dur khrod/ gsang ba'i gnas yum gyi mkha' 'o// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// bdag dang
236a5(1): ba dang ldan pas spyan 'dren na/ lha thugs dam la gnas pa ni gshegs su gsol zhes pa ni/ sngon gyi thugs dam dang 'phral gyi rkyen gyis spyan drang ba'o// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka/ rang bzhin grub pa'i gnas nas ye shes byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i
236a6(1): gnas 'dir tshur gshegs/ bdag dam tshig par sgom pa'i gnas 'dir tshur gshegs/ te dgyes pa/ ru khrag la dgyes pa/ ka pa lar khrag 'thung ba'o// chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las kyang // chos sgra las sprul pa ni/ chos sgra sgrib par gyur pa ma lus pa dang bral bas na
236b1(1): zhig/ de yang theg pa kun chos sku thob par 'dra yang theg pa 'di'i lugs kyis nyon mongs pa ye shes su zhi ba'i ngang nas/ gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol/ gzugs skur bzhengs par bskul ba ni gzugs sku la gnyis te/ longs sku dang sbrul sku'o// de la
236b2(1): gnyis te zhi ba dang khro bo'o// de las 'jigs byed chen pa khra bo'i tshul du sgra bstan du gsol ba'o// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pa// de yang gzugs sgra 'jigs byed chen po'i tshul du bstan kyang de'i so la gnas par mi mdzad de/ mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen
236b3(1): po'i yon tan gyis 'gro ba ji ltar 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i phrin las kyis// gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs pa gdug pa dug dang dgra bo lta bu ste/ rang gzhan gyi lus sems la gdug cing ma rungs par byed pa ste/ de gdul zhing zhi
236b4(1): bar bya ba dang / ru tra 'dul phyir gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal dang ldan// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ched du dgongs nas spyan drang ba ni/ mi'i srin mo la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi rje/ go rI la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi bdag/ 'jig
236b5(1): rten dang 'das pa'i lha mo rnams la nye bar spyod pas na dpal dang ldan no// tshogs kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol/ 'jig rten pa'i lha mo dbang ma'i tshogs dang / 'das pa'i lha mo go rwa'i tshogs kyi slob dpon du gyur pa ste/ 'khor ba dang ngan song du rang chud kyi
236b6(1): brlag pa'i dpon mdzad pas na'o// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las// 'jig rten pa'i rgyal pos 'gro ba rang dbang med par dmag tu bsdus pa lta bu ma yin te/ dbyings ye shes rtogs pa'i skabs nas 'bras bu sku bzhi ye shes lnga thob pa'i khyad par las// sprul
237a1(1): pa mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs su gsol// de'i khyad par las ye shes kyi skal pa dang / skal ba'i cho 'phrul mang po ni zhar la rang bzhin gyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ye shes kyi sbal pa phram dang rol pa las/ sras mang po cir yang sbal zhing
237a2(1): gshegs su gsol/ bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// gzhal yas khang du spyan drang ba ni/ rig pa'i ye shes kyi chos kyi dbyings rtogs nas/ chos kyi dbyings su rig pa bde blag tu gshegs pa la de kho na nyid du song ba zhes bya/ rang bzhin gyi pho brang /
237a3(1): ting nge'i pho brang / dam tshig sems dpa' lus ngag yid las brgyad pa'i pho brang ngo // 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// ting nges bskyed pa'i pho brang 'dir gshegs pa yang bdag gcig pu'i don ma yin te/ phyogs bcu'i nam mkhas khyab pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa 'khor
237a4(1): ba nas bsgral ba'i phyir ro// don gyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang / khams gsum 'khor ba'i 'gro ba ma lus pa bsgral nas kyang 'bras bu mi gnas pa'i byang 'das kyi sa la 'god par bya ba'i don gyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang / 'khor bcas rab 'bar
237a5(1): gshegs su gsol// dbus kyi gtso bo 'khor mkha' 'gro dang bcas pa/ ye shes kyi me dpung 'bar bas las nyon gyi bag chags rab tu bsreg par mdzad pa sems can don du gshegs su gsol/ zhes pa bar 'dir brtan par bzhugs su gsol bas sems can don
237a6(1): phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing zhes pa yang sbyar ro// gong du zhi ba'i brtag pa na gsal lo// che mchog mnyam sgor 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'jig rten pa'i lha chen po dang / 'das pa'i lha chen po rnams kyi nang nas chen por gyur pa mtshan nyid kyi theg
237b1(1): pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams dang sku gsung thugs mnyam zhing dbyer med par sbyor zhing ye shes kyi me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs pa/ de lta bu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'dis// gdug pa 'dul
237b2(1): mdzad thugs rje khros pa yis// las kyi ru tra dug gsum gyi mthar ltung bas des bskyed pa'i 'bras bu khro zhing gdug pa'i cha lugs 'chang bas gzhan la gnod/ de 'dul ba yang zhe sdang gis ma yin te/ thugs rjes khros pa'o// gsang sngags rmad byung drag po'i
237b3(1): phrin las rnams// rdo rje theg pa snod ngan la gsang ba/ nus pa khyad par du bsngags pa de lta bu las ni las rnam pa bzhi gsungs kyang drag po'i phrin las te/ bsad pa dang / skrag pa dang // 'du shes bskur ba dang / gnan pa la sogs pas so// lhun gyis grub par
237b4(1): byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de lta bu'i phrin las bdag cag bgyid pa la/ bar gcod med cing rang la ye nas lhun gyis grub par gnas pa de la/ rno la ngar gyis btags pa ltar/ byin gyis rlob cing nus pa bskyed du gsol zhes gsol ba btab cing lam la gzhug par
237b5(1): bya'o// dam tshig pa la bzhengs pa yi// 'gro ba thams cad sgra gsung thugs rdo rje rnam pa gsum gyi dngos grub bslab cing thob par 'dod pa rnams la de sbyin no bar thugs dam du bcas pa de'i ngang la gnas pa ni dam chog pa de nas bzhengs pa'i sgra ni// dpal chen
237b6(1): khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// zab pa dang rgya che ba'i dpal dang ldan/ rang gzhan dpal phun sum tshogs pa'i ngo bor bzhugs thugs rje dang ye shes chen por ldan pa'i dpal chen/ sems can gyi dug gsum gyi nyon mongs pa 'joms shing zad par bzhes pa na khrag
238a1(1): @/ 'thung / 'khor mkha' 'gro dang bcas pa// dam tshig tshul bzhin ma gshegs sam// sngon ji ltar dam bcas pa'i tshul bzhin du gnas 'dir ma gshegs sam/ gdul bu'i rgyud la zhugs par mdzad pa'i phyir ma gshegs sam/ sems can gyi glang
238a2(1): la byin gyis rlob cing dbang bskur du ma gshegs sam// dngos grub mchog dag ma stsal na/ gang dag 'dod pa'i dngos grub thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub bdag sgrub pa po la ma stsal na ni sngon gyi thugs dam ltar sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas dngos grub gnyis sbyin
238a3(1): par zhal gyis bzhes na// sku gsung thugs dang 'gal bar ro// nyid kyi thugs dam du bcas pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dang 'gal ba yin pas/ de las mi 'gal ba'i phyir/ bdag sgrub pa po la mchog thun mong gis bsdus pa'i dngos grub dam pa stsal du
238a4(1): gsol/ zhes pa'o// sku gsung thugs dang bdag sbyor bas// bde bar gshegs pa khyed kyi sgra gsung thugs dam tshig sems dpa' gnas te lus ngag yid gsum mnyam par sbyor bas// pho brang dkyil 'khor rang las sbrul// spyod yul du gyur pa thams
238a5(1): cad kyang ye shes rang snang la ma gtogs pa gzhan gud na med pas bdag nyid gzhal yas dang 'khor thams cad rang nyid las sprul pa'o// nga ni bdud kyi bdag po ste/ dpal he ru ka da ni bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i nus stobs dang ldan pas na sems can gyi bdud ru tra/
238a6(1): de'i bdud bdag nyid du gyur pa'o// bdud kyi bdag por gyur pas na ru tra stobs kyis zil gyis mnan pa'o// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas ngas bsdus so// bdud byas te dbang mo rnams chung mar byas te 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro dang bcas pas he ru ka ngas dbang du
238b1(1): bsdus pa'o// bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing // chos la bdag med par rtogs pas gzung ba'i yul ma skyes pas ni bdag gi phyogs dang bral la/ gang zag bdag med par rtogs pas 'dzin pa'i sems med pas ni gzhan gyi phyogs dang bral
238b2(1): la/ des chos thams cad stong nyid du mnyam par thugs su chud do// byams dang snying rje dgra zin mi mnga' yang // rgyu'i dus na byams snying rjes gzhi bzung ba'i tshad med bzhi bsgoms pas dgra zan med par byams pas sbyor/ snying rjes sgrol te/ byams pas bdag gi
238b3(1): yum la sbyor/ gzhan thugs rjes bzung nas sbyor/ snying rjes rtogs pas bdag sgrol thugs rjes gzhan sgrol bas dgra zan med do// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i// zhi bas mi 'dul ba'i gdug pa can rnams yongs su gdul bar bya ba'i phyir
238b4(1): 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs su bstan/ khro bos 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen pas khro bor sprul pa las mi 'da' ba'o// 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// ma rungs pa thams cad 'jigs shing skye bung bar byed pas 'jigs byed/ he ni dgyes par ma
238b5(1): rol pa/ ru ru d+hi gnyis ni khrag/ ka ka pa la ni thod pa ste/ dgyes pa chen pos thod par bcas pa'i khrag la rol pa'o// mi gnas mi dmigs chos skur dag pa las// dbu'i rigs snga la phyag 'tshal pa ni/ mtha' la mi gnas/ kun rdzob tu mi dmigs/ chos tha
238b6(1): dri ma med par dag pa'i ngang nas gdul bya shar ba ni/ bdud rA tha 'dul ba'i phyir 'jigs byed khro bo mchog tu gyur pa ye shes kyi khro bor gi skur sprul pa// gzhan las khyad par du gyur par bstan te// thugs rje gzi ldan gdug pa bdud ma traM ka ru tra la
239a1(1): sogs pa gsang sngags thabs kyis 'dul// bar mdzad pas na// bcom ldan khro rgyal la yang phyag 'tshal lo// dpral bkod pa rigs lnga khrag 'thung rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'am/ yang na gang ma rang dan du phyag bya ba/ 'di gzhan ngan du
239a2(1): phyag 'tshal ba'o// khro mo dbang phyug sku la nyer gnas shing // yum la phyag 'tshal ba ni/ yum khro mo dbang phyug ma ni yang dag par na chos kyi dbyings skye ba med pa yin la/ kun rdzob tu ni khro mo'i slar bstan nas spru la 'brel ba ste// thabs snying rje chen po las yab
239a3(1): dang shes rab stong pa nyid yum de gnyis ni stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid du 'brel ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// mkha' 'gro mi bzad 'bar ba'i sprin 'phro ma// don chos nyid skye ba med pa ni nam mkha' 'dra la/ rig pa rten med 'gro ba ni nyi zla 'dra
239a4(1): ste/ yon tan khyad par du gyur pas na mi bzad pa ste/ dbyings stong nyid las snying rjes bzhengs pas gnas dang bdag po'i bar nas 'khor gyi tshogs spro ba ni/ dper na me 'bar ba las dud pa 'phro ba 'am nam mkha' stong pa'i ngang nas sprin tshogs mang pos byung zhing phyogs bcur
239a5(1): 'phro ba ltar ro// gdug pa 'dul mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal lo// yum gyi b+ha ga las khro bo mang po spros nas/ rA tra la sogs pa'i gdug pa can 'dul bas na de la phyag 'tshal ba ste// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing // 'khor mkha' 'gro ma la phyag
239a6(1): 'tshal ba ni/ dpal lha mo go rI la sogs la phyag 'tshal ba/ dper na nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyis ni ma khyab pa med pa ltar lha mos nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gdul bya la khyab la/ bgrod mi dgos par gar yang phyin pa'o// 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can
239b1(1): 'phrul mo che// nam mkha' la rang bzhin med kyang sprin dang char gyis sems can la 'dod pa bsgrub pa ltar mkha' 'gro ma nam mkha' lta bus rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa char ltar 'bebs pa'o// ma sring byams ma'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad
239b2(1): ma// rnal 'byor pa blta ba dang ldan pa rnams la/ ma ltar byams la/ tshul shes shing gdung bas ni sring mo ltar dgongs nas stong grogs mdzad pas na// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// phyi ni 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro ma ste/ dbang mo nyer
239b3(1): brgyad/ nang ni 'das pa ste/ dkar mo la sogs pa'o// phyag ni gdul bya gnyen po'i phyag lus kyis bya/ dbyangs snyan gdung ba'i phyag ngag gis bya/ rtogs pa don gyi phyag yid kyis 'tshal bar bya'o// rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi/ sgrub pa po rang gi lus las byung ba'i
239b4(1): dam rdzas lnga ni/ dri chen/ dri chu/ sha chen/ rak+ta/ brang sems dang lnga yang gdod ma nas dag pa mi gtsang bar mi bkra// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// bdud rtsi lnga po re re la sbas pa nang gi bzhi/ mngon pa phyi'i bzhi ste rtsa ba brgyad/ de'i spobs dang phrad du sman lan
239b5(1): lag rnams kyang don chos nyid skye med dang sbyar bas// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshigs dngos ni byang sems rnam snang gi dri chen snang mtha' pad+ma raka/ rin 'byung gi sha chen don grub kyi dam chog dngos dri sa// ye shes lnga rdzogs sgrub
239b6(1): pa'i rdzas// dri chen la chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rdzogs pas rnam snang gi sgrub rdzas yin/ byang sems la me long / sha chen mnyam nyid/ pad+ma rak+ta so sor rtog pa/ dri chu bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rdzogs pas don grub kyi'o// rgyud lnga sems can kun sgrol ba'i// dri chen
240a1(1): gti mug grol song sgrol/ brang sems zhe sdang dmyal ba/ sha chen ser sna yi dgas/ rag 'dod chags mi/ dri chu phrag dog lnga dang lha ma yin sgrol ba'o// dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// gti mug dri chen gyis chos dbyings ye shes su sel/ zhe sdang
240a2(1): byang sems kyis me long / nga rgyal sha chen gyis mnyam nyid/ 'dod chags rak+ta so sor rtog phrag dog dri chus bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rtsa sel lo// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rgyu mtshan nyid dang 'bras bu sngags phyi nang ste rgyud so so nas sangs rgyas pa'i phyogs
240a3(1): bcu dus bzhis bsdus pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyis// phyi phar phyin las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / nang kri yog ye shes las skyes pa dang / gsang ba yab yum gyi byang sems las skyes pa'i khye'u dang / bu mor snang ba'o// thugs dam
240a4(1): dbyings nyid skul ba'i mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ye shes dang thugs rjes sems can dang chos nyid la dgongs pa yang gzhan du me 'dor ba rin po che dbyig lta bur rab tu dag pa des re ba bskang bas na sems can don la bskal lo// 'di ni sngon gyi tha
240a5(1): tshig go/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sems bskyed pa'i dus na yang dam bca' lce thog tu bzhag pa'i dam tshig go// sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid 'di/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid dam dam par
240a6(1): gyur pa'i bdud rtsi 'di ye shes lha la dang ba'i dad pas 'bral/ bla ma la 'dod pa'i dad pas/ chos la yid ches pa'i dad pas 'bral ba zhes bya'o// dam tshig sems dpa' sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bdag cag ces phyis 'byung dang sbyar la dad pas 'bul lags
240b1(1): kyis// bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzod la// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha la lha thim par bzhes la sku gsung thugs dgyes par mdzod/ mnyes shing tshim par mdzod/ mchog thun mong gi bsdus pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi ra bar ma
240b2(1): phul du gyur pa sku gsung thugs mi zad brgyan gyi 'khor lo sbal du gsol zhes sbyor 'bral ba'o// 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// bdud rtsi so sor 'bral bas yab la 'bral ba// dpal chen badz+ra he ru dang // yum la 'bral ba// yum chen kro d+hi
240b3(1): shwarI la// dam rdzas gang 'bral na// rnam dag bdud rtsi lnga 'bral ba'o// dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje che dgongs byin brlabs gang zhun slob ma la dbang dang rang la dngos grub stsol// 'khor ma mo brgyad la 'bral
240b4(1): ba// mthing ga'i mchog rnams rdo rje gsang ba'i yum// go rI la sogs khro mo brgyad rnams la/ rnam dag thugs rje// gzhan yang mkha' 'gro ma lus la// bdud rtsis mnyes par bya ba'o// sna tshogs gdod can pa byed mche
240b5(1): gshog can// sid+ha la sogs phra men brgyad rnams la// rnam dag/ thugs rje/ sgo bzhir rab parnams rdo rje sring 'gro ma// lcags kyu la sogs sgo ma bzhi rnams la// rnam dag/ thugs rje/ nam mkha'i bde sbyor ci bgyi'i bka' nyan tshogs// dbang phyug chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad la/
240b6(1): ma dag/ thugs rje// ma bdun srid bzhi 'bar ma dgu la sogs// mkha' 'gro skal gang 'khor bcas thams cad la// rnam dag/ thugs rje// zhes pa'am/ yang na dpal chen mi 'am rdo rje dang // ma tshogs dbang thug 'khor gyi gyen// go re la sogs brgyad rnams dang /
241a1(1): #sita la sogs brgyad rnams la// dbang phyug gi bu rtsa brgyad dang // sgo ma chen mo bzhi rnams dang // ma mo chen mo bdun rnams dang // sring mo chen mo bzhi rnams la// zhes kun la 'bral lo// bde chen dbyings nas rgyal ba'i skur chos nyid bde ba
241a2(1): chen po'i ngang nas rgyal ba'i slar bzhengs pa bzhengs pa// dpal chen khrag 'thung thugs ni ma skyes rin po che/ dpal he ru kar snang yang thugs chos sgra med bzhin nor bu skar snang ba/ thugs ka nas dngos grub kyi rtsa ba sngags kyi phreng ba dang ldan pas// ru
241a3(1): lu ru lu'i phreng bas 'khor lo bskor// lha ye shes pa dang dam tshig pa gnyis su med par za mi dad par mnyam par sbyar na// rtse gcig ting nge 'dzin la ma yengs par bsgrub pa'i ting 'dzin zab mo'i mthus// deng bdag la sra
241a4(1): gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dus 'di/ nyid du bdag la stsal du gsol/ gnas gang nas spyan drangs na// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad gong du bshad zin/ nas// gang spyan drang na yi dam gyi lha// dpal chen
241a5(1): 'khor bcas spyan 'dren te// gnas gang du spyan drang na// dur khrod mchog gi bsgrub pa'i gnas 'di ru// mchod rdzas gang gnas su stob na// zhing chen sha chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas// dmar gyi khrag gi ar+g+haM rgya mtshor
241a6(1): bskyil// 'khor gang dang bcas pa la 'bul na// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyis// 'bral tshul ji ltar 'bul na// ma lus bzhes nas bsnams su gsol/ gang gis za bar byed na// nga ni za byed chen po ste// gang la za bar byed
241b1(1): na 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med/ khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba dang // gdul dka' khams gsum gyi gdug pa can rnams zhi bas mi 'dul ba rnams ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// gti mug dag pa// sha zhe sdang dag pa rus la sogs/
241b2(1): 'dod chags dag pa khrag bza' bar bya// sems la las dkar nag gi bag chags sogs pa'i cha nas kun gzhi yid rang byung gi ye shes// kun gzhi'i glong nas rang byung ye shes shar// ji ltar snang ba de las shar ba thams cad/ lha yi dkyil 'khor
241b3(1): du// de ltar ma rtogs pas 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i// nongs pa'i las su gyur pa'i sdig pa thams cad kun// 'khor ba nyid mya ngan las 'das par gnas pas na// gnyis su med pa'i ngang du bshags par bgyi// chos sku ni dbyings ye shes gnyis
241b4(1): su med de/ mnyam nyid ngang las ma g.yos kyang // ye shes// thabs dang dbyings shes rab zabs yab/ dbyings yum/ 'brel ba'i byin rlabs las// 'gro ba'i ma lus 'dul ba/ don du khro bo'i skur sprul pa// dpal chen
241b5(1): ya khabs ye shes chen por gsal ba dang / yum shes rab chos kyi dbyings su gsal ba'o// sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ 'khor la bstod pa// yab yum gnyis med thugs las sprul pa'i sras// tshe 'dir thun mong dngos grub grub chen
241b6(1): brgyad/ dngos grub rnam gnyis ma mo mkha' 'gros grogs mdzad nas myur du ster bar mdzad pa'o// phyi mar phyag rgya chen po mchog la sbyor// grogs mdzad mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bde bar gshegs
242a1(1): pa thams cad kyis zhugs mar gcig pa 'di gsungs so// bsam du med do sems nyid nam mkha' che// de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin rang gi sems nyid nga bor rang gis stong pas na nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'o// sems nyid
242a2(1): nam mkha' bsam pa kun dang bral// rang sems nam mkha' lta bu la rang gi rang la bsam du med de stong nyid kyi stong nyid du blta ba dang bral// bsam du med pa'i sems nyid nam mkha' ni// 'o na sems dran rig tu snang la/ nam mkha' bam ska
242a3(1): zhe na/ rig stong gis gang rig na chos kyi dbyings rig/ rig pa'i dus na bsgom bya dang bral// nam mkha' mi dmigs par yang dmigs su med// nam mkha' stong nyid yin pas mi dmigs so snyam du yang bsam du med pa'o// des ni chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs
242a4(1): pa'o// rang bzhin ye shes dbyings kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin 'od dmar skrag shar yang chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos/ las ma g.yogs kyang // stong khams yongs la khyab pa'i thugs rje 'byung // ye shes de
242a5(1): nyid sring rje lha ma'i 'od kyi sems can kun la khyab pa'o// sa le gsal zhing phyogs med mtha' dang bral// 'od dmar sdug pa las snying rje snga mar gsal yang grogs char 'dzin pa med pas na mtha' bral lo// dbyibs med dang kha dog med dngos po
242a6(1): med pa'i ye shes 'od// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid dag pa la/ rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ rang sems gzhi rtsa bral ba'i chen po'i de la ye gdod ma nas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs par gsal// sems kyi rang bzhin yi ge sangs rgyas thams cad
242b1(1): kyi thugs hUM du gsal// bzung bas mi zin de bzhin chu zla'i tshul// hUM de yang gsal la bzung du med pa'i dpe chu nang gi zla ba ltar ro// thig le'i dbyings nas rang byung sku ru shar// chos spu thig le chen po las lha spu'i ngo bo ye shes sems dpar
242b2(1): gagasal lo// 'byung ba chen po lnga ni bcom ldan 'das// rigs lnga'i yum du gnas pa rnga ba nyid kyi sangs rgyas so// 'gro ba kun la ye nas rang bzhin gnas// 'gro ba sems can gyi lus sems 'byung ba lngar ye nas gnas pa'o// phyin ci log tu
242b3(1): ltar ma rtogs par rnam par brtags par gyur kyang // 'gro ba rang grol rang byung gzhan las min// sangs rgyas nas 'byung ba lnga sangs rgyas kyi yum du lngar grol ba las gzhan nas 'byung ba med do// rang sems// kun gzhi byang chub kyi sems
242b4(1): ni sangs rgyas sems can/ thams cad kun gyi gnas/ so// de'i gting blos// dpag cing tshad gzhal du med pas rig pa byang chub kyi sems/ yin pas so// sems nyid chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngang la// dus gsum bde gshegs
242b5(1): bzhugs pa'i gnas sems pho brang du gyur pa ste// phyi sems can nyid nang kun gzhi gsang ba sum gyi b+ha ga rnams// 'du 'bral med do yum gyi mkha' la rdzogs// bde gshegs sems nyid sangs rgyas su rang gi ngang gis rab tu gsal ba'i pho
242b6(1): brang du// thabs kyi sku'i/ bye brag mang po gdul bya rnams la cir bstan kyang // gnyis med 'bras bu khams gsum rgyas btab nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad thugs ye shes chen po thig le chos kyi skur gcig/ sems can thams cad sems nyid
243a1(1): du gcig/ sems dang ye shes gnyis sems la ye shes kyi rgyas btab/ 'khor ba la myang 'das kyi rgyas btab// mi 'gyur yum gyi klong na rdzogs pa che// chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang du slar rdzogs/ thig le'i chos sgra dbyings nas rang
243a2(1): byung mngon sangs rgyas// sems nyid rang byung ye shes ltar mngon sangs rgyas// snang srid ma bcos dpal chen he ru ka/ he ni yul du snang ba snod 'byung ba bzhi yang he ru ka/ yul la dgyes pa'o// ru ni srid pa bcud du snang ba yang he ru ka ste chags pa'o// ka
243a3(1): niyul sems gnyis med rtogs pa'o// snod bcud// kun la khyab pas gzugs sku dpal chen te// zhal phyag can du snang / don la// kun tu bzang po thugs kyi ma 'gags pa'i/ rol pas spros med chos kyi sku// thugs chos spu'i rang bzhin no// ye
243a4(1): shes chen po b+haM lba/ b+h+yAM lnga bsgom pa ye shes/ lnga'i dbang bskur/ gsang dbang // sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/ pa'o// de bzhin nyid sgom pa'i sngags// au sarba d+harmA bi shud+d+he[:]sarba bi shud+d+heHhaM/ kun tu snang ye shes sgyu ma lta bur sgom pa'i
243a5(1): 9sa/ oM swa b+hA ba shuH pra b+hA ba ma hA shwa n+ya tA dz+nyA na sa b+hA yat+na kon+daH/ chub kyang nga ba na sag zugs pa'i chags tra sarba krAd+ha ma hA mra kha Sh+Ta/ rnalam sa gas thams dpa' rnam pa rnam pa dz+nyA na sa twa kro d+har+N+Na ya~M/ gags pas pang gad
243a6(1): bcas pa'i// b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he d+harmA d+hA tu a a/ gdan steng du ye shes sems dpa' dbab cing bzhu ba/ dz+nyA na satwa kro d+ha hUM a a/ he ru ka'i sgrar bskyed pa/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ lum khro mo dbyings drug ma'i/ oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI s+t+waM/
243b1(1): rang bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang du spyan drang ba'i/ oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka dz+nyA na gar+b+ha su kha saM ha ra na hUM/ dam tshig pa la ye shes pa bstims nas bzhugs su gsol ba'i/ oM shrI he ru ka d+harma d+hA tu pra b+ha ba ma hA su kha
243b2(1): hUM/ ye shes dkyil 'khor spun drangs te/ pa skyes pa chos dbyings nas bos te spyan drang ba'o// he ni bod pa dang po'i sgra// ru ni sems can don la sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings su 'dus pa'o// dbyings su sdud pa'i don// ka ni byang chub
243b3(1): sems chen po/ snang la rang bzhin med pa'i sgra chu zla ltar gsal ba'o// zla ba gsal bar shar ba la/ snang stong dbyer med kyi sgra mtshan ma las grol ba ni// mkha' la mtshon du med pa bzhin// sems nyid ye nas rang sems ye nas sangs rgyas kyi
243b4(1): bdag nyid la he ru ka'i/ skur gsal bas/ rnal 'byor pas// spyan 'dren pa dang sangs rgyas gshegs su gsol bar mi dmigs te/ skyes kyang chos nyid du skyes la shi yang chos nyid dang du shi bar shes pa ni// skye shi med pa'i lam zhes
243b5(1): bya// sangs rgyas las kyang / yang sangs rgyas pa'i sa la phyin// bsam du med rdo stong gsal rig pa chos sku nam mkha' 'dra// brjod du med do rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin dngos por brjod du mi btub pa grags pas bu ram thos pa 'ang/ rnam
243b6(1): shes gzugs dang bral/ sems nyid lha dang // 'du 'bral med do yum gyi mkha' la b+ha ga chos kyi dbyings su/ rdzogs// rig pa rtogs pa'i dus na gar skyes kyang gnas las 'pho ba med/ mtshan ma 'dus byas kyi// spros pa med pa rnam
244a1(1): rtog dang bral ba yul gyi mkha' chos kyi dbyings dag pa la// skye med de las 'gyur med rdo rje'i sgra snang ba/ rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs mnga' ba// 'gro ba sems can rnams kyi/ mgon po rang byung bcom ldan thugs rje'i
244a2(1): lha/ rtogs pa'i dus na// 'du 'bral med pa'i chos nyid kyi klong du grol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi/ sku gcig gis 'khor 'das kun la khyab pas gdal ba'i chen po sku// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// chos sgra dri ma med
244a3(1): pas// g.yas dkar dz+wal snga brags rje chags pas/ g.yon dmar chos snga mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sra/ dbus mthing nag/ rdo rje ma long ma shes kha D+ha ma sor rtog pa/ rnge'u chung mnyam nyid g.yas// dung dmar chos dbyings rgyu zhags bya grub/ khrung khra
244a4(1): 'da' ka thugs kyi ye shes g.yon// yum ni lus dang grib ma ltar 'du 'bral gnyis su med par 'khril/ btags pa'i// ming dang bsam pa'i rtog pa la ming dang tha snyad las 'das pas mi gnas pa'i/ sgra phyag rgya chen po chos spu las dgongs pa// mi
244a5(1): g.yo ba ni sku yi rgya/ mchod pa lha gang la 'bul bar bya na// dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa gang 'bul na// dngos su 'byor pa rdzas dang yid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa sprul pa yis// mchod pa bla
244a6(1): na mchis pa phyi nang kun dang mthun pa dang ma mchis pa// gsang sngags nang pa la yod pa/ rdzas la ser sna// ma chags dgongs pa ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo ba'i ba lta ba'i/ stobs dang ldan pa kyis mchod par 'bul/ kun gyi// dpal chen he
244b1(1): ru zabs yab shes rab yum la/ smyon/ rnam par dag pa 'chi gso'i rkyen/ nad gso'i sman/ bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// la/ thugs rjes brtse bar dgongs dbang bskur dang dngos grub stsol// bde
244b2(1): gshegs thams cad mnyam nyid thugs sangs rgyas thams cad thugs chos sbyar dbyer med kyi ngang / skye ba med pa'i don rtogs pa// ma skyes rdo rje kun tu bzang po ni/ klu'i dus na// thabs snying rje la mkhas pa'i khro rgyal lam gyi dus na dbang
244b3(1): bskur snang / 'bras bu'i dus na ye shes kyi/ skur bstan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad dbyer med pas na spang blang dang bral ba'o// kun bzang he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod/ yum ni chos kyi sra// rnam dag sku la tha mal gyi zhen chags dang bcas pa'i/
244b4(1): 'dod chags mi mnga' yang // dgyes byed lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes la dgyes pa chags pas dpal chen sku la 'khril// yab yum gnyis med bde chen rdzogs pa'i sku// yab kyi bde ba yum la shar/ lum gyi bde ba yab la shar bas zung
244b5(1): du 'jug pa'i sgra// yum chen dpal 'bar ma thu'i dus na stong pa shes rab lam gyi dus na lum 'bras bu'i dus na chos kyi dbyings/ la phyag 'tshal bstod// thog ca kun 'dar ma las srid pa ni// rtsa srog tsiSh+Na lus ngag yid gsum po// gu h+ya
244b6(1): gsang chen sku gsung thugs kyi mdzod// sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i rtsa srog shing gsum gtso bo'o// kun gzhi'i chos nyid kyi klong nas yid rang byung ye shes shar// shes rab zhan pas dbyings ye shes de ltar ma rtogs te/ kun gzhi yum
245a1(1): chos nyid yid rang byung gi la shes rab tu rtags pas na// don dam thig le gnyis su med par bshags// ji ltar snang ba snod lab dang brgyad yum du thams cad lnga yi dkyil 'khor du/ shes pas// snying po brjod pas
245a2(1): dper na mcho dngas pa las ca 'bar ba ltar sngags brjod pa tsam gyis slar gsal ba'o// thams cad rdzogs pa'i tshul// kun gzhi sum chos nyid dang mid rang byung gi ye shes yab gnyis/ dbyer med ngo bo nyid kyi skur gyur cig/ thabs la mkhas
245a3(1): pas bdag lha gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i ngang du/ bshags// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rim pa lnga'i dgongs pa 'di dag gsungs so// oM ahAM// rdo rje'i ke/ bzlas dang sems / khel dmigs// rang lus
245a4(1): kyi sems dang sems las byung ba// gai/ bdag byin brlab ltar bsgom pa/ dang 'od gsal sems nyid la blta ba/ dang // snang stong 'dres pa/ tsi/ zung du 'jug dang 'di lnga la/ lnga'o// re re la yang za mal pa/ lam du khyer ba/ 'bras bu/
245a5(1): gsum gsum yin// kaM// tha khe/ ma la sems can kun la yod/ dang ni lam du 'khyer/ rnal 'byor pa la yod// ga/ 'bras bur sangs rgyas la yod/ 'khyer ba rnam gsum la// re re la yang lnga lngar bshad/ de gsum rim pa lnga po re re la
245a6(1): yang khyab par gnas so// ngi// tha ma la rdo rje'ika/ bzlas pa ni// 'gro ba rnams kyi dbugs 'di ni// 'gro ba mtha' dag la rlung lnga rigs lngar gnas pa las/ phyir 'gro ba o ste lus gnas/ nang du 'ong ba hUM ste thugs yid du gnas/ khong du gnas pa
245b1(1): aHste ngag tu gnas/ nyin zhag phrugs gcig la rlung nyi khri chig stong drug brgyar rgyu bas rdo rje bzlas pa nyi khri drug brgyar gnas pa de ma shes pas tha mal pa zhes so// phyir 'gro nang 'og gnas pa dang // lus ngag yid du gnas pa ni// rdo rje'i bzlas
245b2(1): pa tha mal te// de ni ma rtogs zhes su bya// gong ma'i don rtogs nas lam du 'khyer ba ste/ 'jug pa hUM la sogs// khe/ lam du 'khyer ba'i bzlas pa ni// 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba la// yan lag drug tu tshad bsgom pa// rdo
245b3(1): rje'i bzlas pa lam du 'khyer// phyir ldang ba oM la spro bsdu gnyis nang du 'jug pa hUM la spro bsdu gnyis nang du gnas pa A la spro bsdu gnyis so// go// 'bras bu rdo rje'i bzlas pa na// yi ge gsum po rnam dag nas// sku gsung thugs su gnas
245b4(1): pa'o// oM sgra mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo// gra gsung / hUM thugs su gsal mo// 9// tha mal sems kai/ la dmigs pa ni// 'dod bde bar shar chags zhe sdang gsal bar shar gti mug mi rtog par shar ba/ dang // rnam shes tshogs brgyad/
245b5(1): gzugs la rgyu'i gzugs bzhi 'bras bu'i gzugs bcu gcig/ tshor ba gsum/ 'du shes gsum/ 'du byed sems dang ldan pas lnga bcu'o// rang bzhin brgyad cur shar ba dang / thabs rdo rje// pho dang shes rab stong pa mo dang thabs shes dbyer med ma ning
245b6(1): ni// tha mal sems la dmigs pa'o// kha// lam du bsgom pa'i dmigs pa ni// lus skur bde/ ngag gsung du sems thugs su// bde ba gsum dang dga' ba mchog dga' dag 'bral gyi dga' ba lhan skyes kyi/ chad dga'
246a1(1): ba bzhi// 'od kyi snang ba gsum me long 'od kyi snang ba zhal phrag me long nang du blta/ nyi ma 'od kyi snang ba thugs rje nyi ma la blta/ mar me 'od kyi snang ba dgongs pa mar me la bawa/ me long nang gi bzhin ltar gzugs gsal ba mar me ltar dgongs
246a2(1): pa gsal nyi ma ltar thugs rje gsal/ bcas pa// de ltar bsgom pa lam yin no// 'bras bu'i sems la dmigs pa ni/ rnal 'byor pa gang zhig lha yi nga rgyal 'chang byed pa de la lus sgrar gsal khams bdud rtsir bde sngags dang bdud rtsis byin
246a3(1): gyis rlob pa'o// mi// sku rang lus rtsa las lha sgra'i dbyibs grub/ dang khams bdud rtsi las bde ba sngags dang rlung gis byin gyis rlabs gsum/ rtsa slar gsal/ ngag sngags/ rlung thugs su gsal ba ni// 'bras bu'i sems la dmigs pa'o// gai/ tha
246a4(1): mal pa yi bdag tokaM/ byin brlab// snang ba rang lugs sems can lus/ khams gsum gyi sems can rnams kyi snang ba la rang lugs su 'byung ba lnga'i rigs lnga rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'o// mi lus grub sogs tha mal pa// de'i nang nas mi
246a5(1): lus khyad par can thob pa ni rdo rje'i theg pa'i chos dang phrad pas so// de khi las lam du khyer tsam na// rdo rje'i lus nyid dag pa ni// dang por blta bas rang lus rdo rje sngags kyi theg pas sangs rgyas su gtan la phebs pas ye nas dag pa'o// rang nyid
246a6(1): dmigs shing yid 'jog pa// de ltar phung po khams skye mched rnams yi dam gyi lhar dmigs shing bsgom pa las 'jog pa'o// spyod lam nyid kyang sgyu mar blta// spyod lam dus bzhi'i yang lha'i sgra phyag rgya sbra mar blta ba'o// de ni rab tu bsgom
246b1(1): pa'o// lam bu bsgom pa yid la 'jog spyod pa dang ma bral ba'o// 'bras bu'i bdag byin brlab pa ni// sU ma dang lha spus don mdzad cing lha sgrar snang yang sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'o// ni chu zla dang / snang la rang bzhin med pa chu zla 'dra/ gsal ba rtog pa med
246b2(1): pas// 'ja' tshon bzhin du dngos med pa// de ltar dpal he ru ka'i 'bras bu'i skur snang ba// mtshan khro bo'i gar dgu dang dpe byad chas brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan// de ni gdul bya la spu zhi khror snang ba/ 'bras bu'i rim
246b3(1): pa'o// sems nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar grub nas gnas pa de// 'od gsal ba yi mtshan nyid ni// tha mal las grub rang bzhin stong // tha mal la sems rang gis ma bcos la yongs kyis 'od gsal bar grub pa'o// lam yang rang
246b4(1): bzhin sems rang gis 'od gsal bas mkhyen pa ma 'gags/ med pa ste// sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal nyid// ngang gis ma bcos pas rang bzhin stong // 'bras bu yang ni 'od gsal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku ye shes kyi skur
246b5(1): gnas pa sangs rgyas so// de ni theg pa thun mong thams cad kyang de ltar/ sangs rgyas par 'dod pas so// tha mal zung du 'jug pa ni// thog ma'i dus dang tha ma'i dus// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// gnyis su med
246b6(1): pas ye sangs rgyas// thog ma sems can du gnas pa'i dus na yang sems nyid bde gshegs snying po yin la/ tha ma sangs rgyas su gnas pa'i dus na yang sems nyid bde gshegs nyid sangs rgyas pas gnyis med du zung 'jug go/ ye sangs rgyas pas blang dor
247a1(1): med// sems can la ngan par bstan nas dor du med sangs rgyas la bzang por bltas nas blang du med do// blang dor med pas lam du khyer// zung du 'jug dper na rmos slang gnyis gshibs nas zhing rmod par nus pa ltar yab yum gnyis
247a2(1): bsdebs pa de lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'grub par blta ba'o// pas gnyis su bsdeb// 'bras bu nyid kyang dbyings yum la ye shes yab la 'jug pa'o// zung du 'jug/ zung 'jug go 'phang la gnas na/ chos sku'i dgongs pa la gnas par 'gyur
247a3(1): papas na// slar zhing gang yang mi slob bo// slob ma'i thang 'jug dang mi slob pa'i thang 'jug las stong nyid chos sgra las yar la gshegs pa'i dgongs pa gzhan yod pa ma yin pas na// dgung las slar gshegs don ma mchis// he ru ka'i gal po
247a4(1): las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gtan la phab pa ste/ brtag pa bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsnyen par gnang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su bsnyen pa'i//
247a5(1): dbang thob nas// bla mas slob ma la// bsgom pa'i rim pa dang dbyangs kyi rim pa dang yi ge 'bru brgyad kyi don bstan/ nas/ phyir bskyed rim bsgom pa'i dus su ni dpal chen po// 'khor dang bcas pa'i mchod pa rdzogs nas kyang // bsnyen pa
247a6(1): 'jug pa'i dus su ni// bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin ru lu spros pa'i brtan pa 'di la/ brtson par 'bad// nas bzlas pa'o// rgyud lung man ngag shes pa// yon tan ldan pa'i bla ma la// bsnyen pa'i dbang bskur gyi// dbang lung man ngag ma thob
247b1(1): par// ji ltar rang dgar 'jug par byas nas/ bzlas brjod brtson 'gyur yang // rang gis 'bad rtsol byas kyang // ngal ba don chung zhing slar gol bar te ltung ba'i gnas su/ 'gyur/ ro// 'bru brgyad bzlas brjod sbra ma dag pa tshig mi
247b2(1): gsal ba la sogs pa'i/ skyon spangs te// yid bzhin rin chen gter rnyed dgos 'dod 'byung ba la dang ba bzhin// ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa la sogs// cir yang bsgyur du btub pa'i phyir// mchog thun mong gi dngos grub// yon tan
247b3(1): mtha' yas mchog tu bstan// sngags kyi ngo bo lha yi sku// yin te dngos su grub rna ba'o// lha'i sku ma rtog/ mtshan ma las dben pa dang / smra ba dang bsam pa las 'das/ pas brjod bral du gnas so// don dam rang gi rig pa/ byang chub kyi
247b4(1): sems las gzhan du mi 'gyur/ ba'o// yang dag kun rdzob dkyil 'khor gyi lha/ tshogs rnams so// des tshig shes pa dang skyobs pa dang ldan pa ste// ngan song gi gnas ngan len las skyob/ pa dang // sku gsum 'bras bu thob
247b5(1): par byed pa ste shes stobs dang ldan pas na gsang sngags kyi nges tshig grub pa'o// shes// mtshan nyid sku gsum dang ye shes lnga// sku rnam par brjed pas/ gsung sgra brjod 'byung bas thugs thams cad mkhyen pa/ dang yon tan bya ba byed pas/ zin
247b6(1): las// mchog sku gsum thob pa/ dang thun mong chu las mi 'byid pa la sogs/ dngos grub ldan// dbye ba shes rab gsal ba/ rig sngags zabs shes che/ gzungs sngags dang // thabs shes cha mnyam pa// gsang sngags dag tu gsungs
248a1(1): @#pa yin// rig sngags ma rig mun nag sel// bud med gzugs dbyibs phyag rgya sgra// lha ma shas che / rnal ma/ 'ad zer can/ sar 'brang la chags ma// 'bar yang l+h+wa ma gas che ba dang / cung yang shes rab shas
248a2(1): tshe'o// gzungs sngags mtha' rig pas mtha' sel/ yul gyi rtags mtha' sel/ gnyis ltung ba 'dzin// lha mo shas che ba thabs rkyang pa gtsor ston pa// skyes pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul 'gyur ba yin/ no// slob ma// gsang sngags snod ma
248a3(1): yin la gsang // shes rab stong pa na// don dam par snying po chos kyi sku/ ra 'dod pa dang / zabs snying rje las// yang dag pa'i kun rdzob lha dang sngags kyi sa bon yig 'bru// dang sbed gyen gyi sngags las// lha yi dkyil 'khor du gsal
248a4(1): paba'o// rang snang ba/ de ltar// sngags kyi byin rlabs bstan pa ni// 'bru brgyad las yang dag lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor du gsal zhing byin rlabs ni// mi 'jigs seng+ge'i sgra dang mtshungs// seng+ge dang chos mtshungs pa ni se nas sgra bsgrags na ra
248a5(1): dwags phran rnams skrag pa ltar ru lus ru tra skrag go/ gzi byin che bas nyi zla dang rgyun mi 'chad pas rgya mtsho'i rgyun/ dang 'dra ba// nam mkha'i dang chos mtshungs te/ sprin bzhin mkha' las cho 'phrul sprul// au ni sku dang ye shes nyid// dpal
248a6(1): chen 'bar ba seng ges brjid// ru lu nyi zla dang mtshungs te nyi zlas 'od gzhan zil gyis gnon/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs te dngos por ma grub par sprin sogs 'byung ba ltar mkha' 'gro 'byung / rgya mtsho'i gling la rin chen yod pa ltar re ba skong / ma mo nam
248b1(1): mkhar 'phro// ma tshogs sprin dang skar ltar 'phro// hUM chen nyi zla'i tshogs rgyun 'dra// ma nor re skong mkha' la 'gro// sngags kyi yon tan khyad par 'phags// ru lu 'di ni las nyon gyi sgrib pa ma lus pa sbyong // las kyi
248b2(1): sgrib pa sbyangs nas sbrul sku'i zhal mthong / dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sbyangs nas longs sgra mthong shes bya'i/ bag chags sbyangs nas chos sku mthong / 'joms// ru lu 'di ni rang sems sgra dang ye shes gsal bas/ rtogs pa skye// bsgom nyams
248b3(1): sems la rnam par 'phel/ lA sgra'i zhal phrag gsal ba/ rnam pa bde ba/ nga ba stong pa/ rang bzhin rig pa'o// ru lu 'di ni phrin las bzhi 'grub pas na/ ya mtshan che// bdud dang bar chod/ mu stegs rA tra 'dul/ bsal mtshan che/ phyi nang gas
248b4(1): ba'i// drod gsum blta sgom spyod pa'i tshad gsum/ gzugs sgra dri'i rtags gsum 'byung // phyi'i drod lus yod du mi tshor/ nang gi drod dbugs rgyu ba mi tshor/ gsang ba'i drod dang bde ba sems la 'bar ba/ ldan/ dang por/ mar me ltar gsal ba blta
248b5(1): ba'i chad par du/ rgya mtsho ltar migs bsgom pa'i chad pa ma/ shing bal skar yang bskyod pa'i/ tshad// brtag pa gsum ni rab pa'o// gzugs dang 'bring sgra gsam dang bam dri zhim po yang ston// sngags kyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// 'jigs
248b6(1): byed he ru ka 'bar ba'i rang bzhin ni// kun tu bzang po he ru ka/ yin/ de'i// dpal be'u thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// ye shes gsang sngags snying po 'bru brgyad du ldan/ bar snang ba'i// rdo rje sngags kyi sgra bshad pa//
249a1(1): ni// oM ni dpal chen po/ ye shes sgra phyag rgyar gsal// ru ni ye shes 'bar ba log pa'i 'dod chags/ bsreg yang dag pa'i bde stong la/ chags pa'i dang / ngo // lu ni lum bi ni'i tshal dang 'dra bar kun skye ba'i gnas/ kun
249a2(1): bzang yum gyi tshal// hUM ni 'khor 'das/ dbang du sdud pa yang thugs hUM las sbrul/ ba byung nas dbang du sdud pa'o// b+h+yo ni ye shes kyi lha mo rnal 'byor ma ru nyer brgyad kyi thog bstan// hUM ni tshad med bzhis 'gro don mdzad pa'i/ ta na ga Na
249a3(1): mchog/ dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ rang byung gi ye shes su bstan pa/ ye shes lha'i// srog gi snying po zhes bya ba/ 'bru brgyad spro// 'bru brgyad dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams kyi/ thugs su bstan pa dang // srog gi snying
249a4(1): po bye brag tu brgyad spyir dril bas dgu/ tshang bar yod// de ni[:]ru lu dang ye shes kyi lha dbyer med du gnas pas na/ dkyil 'khor rang bzhin yin// dkyil 'khor dbyings ye shes gnyis su med par/ rig pa'i ye shes kyis/ snod/ dbyings
249a5(1): dang bcud ye shes gnyis su med// 'bras bu sku gsum dngos grub thob// ru lu'i bye brag bsam mi khyab// dbyangs drug blangs pas don drug 'grub/ dbyangs// sha ta pa yi glu sngon byung dpal chen pos dur khrod so so'i gling du
249a6(1): blangs/ rA tra kha T+wAM gas sprul cing blangs/ rjes 'jug dus thams cad du blang / g.ya' gseb nas chu 'bab pa bzhin 'bru mi gsal bar blang ngo / blangs pas/ dpe/ rdo rje srin po'i ngur skad kyis/ 'bras bu dgos pa/ gdug pa thams cad swa yang
249b1(1): bkong / glu gang blangs/ gardza pa yi glu ri ma la ya'i rtse mo la phyin dus su blangs/ rjes 'jug dus drug gi tshogs dang nyu le ma zlog dus su blang / blangs pas/ dpe ji ltar// zab cing 'brug ltar sgra sgrogs pas/ 'bras bu gang 'grub na/ gtum po gdug
249b2(1): pa lhan ner 'gyur// glu gang blangs na/ cang de'u yi gU rjes 'jug gso ba dang mtshams sbyor gyi dus su blang / rang gi thog tsam tshig gsal bar bzlas/ blangs pas// mkhur ba dbugs kyi rlung 'byin gyis/ khro bo khro mo'i sbrul pa
249b3(1): 'gyed// pang ka de'u gyi glu bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bsgo nas ri ma la ya'i byang phyogs su blangs/ rjes 'jug tu grod la blang ma chu cung zad bcum la rnga mo bu stor ba'i tshul du blang / blangs pas// 'khun cing gdung ba'i sgra 'byin gyis/
249b4(1): gnod byed ma lus dbang du sdud// breng nge ba yi glu rA tra gnas sbar ba'i don du blangs/ zo rangs/ blangs pas// sngags kyi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pas// des ni dkyil 'khor lha rnams bskyed// thugs ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rang
249b5(1): bzhin med par gsal// dung nge ba yi gU rA tra'i gnas su byas te/ blangs pas/ rjes 'jug zo rangs blang // tshangs pa dbyangs kyi 'dren zhi ba'i skad gdangs la 'dril zhugs kyi de'u dang bcas par blang / tshul gyis/ dam can bsten par shes
249b6(1): pas// 'khor rnams thams cad dbang du sdud// ru lu'i dkyil 'khor dag tu shes/ yum gyi b+ha ga/ gsang ba'i mkha' la lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin// kun bzang mkha' dbyings yangs pa'i
250a1(1): gzhal yas spyir bram kun tu bzang mo'i thag su/ bye brag tu// 'byung lnga yum lnga'i thag rnams 'dus pa'i gzhal las 'ang / dkyil 'khor gyis// sra dang ma shes nga bar rang gsal bas na// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes
250a2(1): pa'i mchog bkod nas// rak+ta'i rba klong 'dod chags khrag mtsho 'khyil cing 'khrugs pa'i 'byung ba rim brtsegs/ dbus/ zhe sdang / keng rus gsar rnying brtsigs pa'i ri rab steng / nga rgyal// rdo rje'i brag chen gtams pa'i sa
250a3(1): gzhi la/ dkyil 'khor gyi sra// b+han d+ha gsar rnying brtsigs pa'i gzhal yas khang // yon tan che rgyas dbyibs gang na/ gru bzhi lham pa'i dbyibs/ gzer gang gis btab na// gnam lcags dur mo'i gzer chen ta la la// ka
250a4(1): ba du yod na mchog brgyad ldan pa'i re'u cha dgu/ rgyan gang dang ldan na// rab 'jigs dur khrod chen po'i rgyan dang bcas/ 'od gang 'phro na// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro// chags bcas dbus kyi dbyings gtso
250a5(1): bo'i gnas/ zla kham pad+ma dbang gi tshul/ 'khor gyi bzhugs gnas// rin chen 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rgyas pa'i dbus/ gdan gang // pad+ma 'dab brgyad dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du/ gdug pa gang / dregs pa khyo shug bsnol zhing
250a6(1): gdan gang bting zhing rkyang bting // rab gsal nyi zla 'bar ba'i gdan bshams pa/ lha gang bskyed na// bsod nams mthus grub ye shes kyi lha dang ting 'dzin stobs kyis bskyed/ pa dam tshig lha// ye shes rang snang yul du snang ba
250b1(1): 'di kho na/ dkyil 'khor dam pa las// bdag dam tshig dkyil 'khor gi rnam sbrul ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi mthus bzhengs shig/ dang ba'i mchod sprin gsal ba'i nam mkha' bzhin/ don dngos po'i// mtshan ma gtan
250b2(1): spangs rnam dag dri ma med pa'i thugs mnga' ba// thugs rje 'char tshul// ye shes chos kyi dbyings chos sba/ las mi g.yo yang // zas rje byang tshul/ smon lam dbang dang 'phral gyi dus mkhyen pas// mtsho las rdzis bskyod nas
250b3(1): rlabs dang mkha' las gsal ba rten med du 'gro ba/ nyi zla bzhin/ slar snang ba dngos ni// lus dang phyag zhabs stong khams rdul snyed kyi/ sgra nga bo ni// 'jigs byed khro rgyal 'bar ba'i skur ston pa/ kwa'i mdzad pa// zhi khro la
250b4(1): sogs tshul dang rngom brjid bcas// dur khrod rgyan chas ni// thod sbrul g.yang gzhi la sogs rgyan chas ldan/ phyag mtshan// rdo rje dung chen kha T+wAM la sogs bsnams/ gnas ni// rab 'jigs dur khrod bskal pa'i me dkyil
250b5(1): na/ 'khor ni// dkar mo la sogs tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mdzes/ dbang mo la sogs// bka' nyan mngag gzhug pho nya g.yog 'khor bcas/ gdul bya la snang tshul ni gdul bya'i yul/ dus ngan tha ma'i gdul bya'i rgyud sbyong
250b6(1): ba'i// dpal chen dpa' bo yab yum 'khor bcas la/ 'bral byed kyi sngags ni/ gsang tshig 'bru brgyad legs pa'i mchod pa 'bul// skyes dang skyes len gyi tshul du// bdag la dgongs shing byin rlabs dngos grub
251a1(1): stsol// gnas gzhal las khang dang brten sa du bcas pa yi// 'bar chen klong gi lha'i dkyil 'khor du rdzogs// ru lu lhar ni shes pa yang // 'bru brgyad lha ma mo brgyad he ru ka dang dgu rnams phyag rgyar
251a2(1): gsal// rtag chen g.yung drung nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// ngo bo nyid kyis rtag pa// thugs mchog ye nas gsung yig 'bru hUM las thugs phyag mtshan rdo rjer gsal// sku dngos ni kun tu 'od chos sku pad+ma can longs sku yi ge 'khor lo sprul
251a3(1): swa// sku gsum sa non yon tan phrin las rdzogs// zad med ye shes nor ba rin chen 'dra ba'i chos sgra las dbyings kyi gter// de nyid las ni sgra dngos longs su dpal chen sku ru bskyed/ kwa'i cha lugs// rab 'jigs khro bo'i
251a4(1): cha lugs cir yang ston/ rgyan bstan pa ni// nyi zla thod phreng sbrul nag g.yang gzhis rgyan// kun bzang chos nyid rnam dag chos kyi dbyings yangs pa las// gzugs ma chos kyi dbyings mtshon shes rab yum gyi skur bstan nas//
251a5(1): gdul bya la snang tshul// gang yang thogs med cha lugs tha dad cing // gtso mchog thabs kyi sku la dgyes par 'khril// zhi khro'i yum zhi ba'i dus dang khro bo'i dus na/ tshul ston spyod pa bsam yas kyang // rang bzhin chos kyi
251a6(1): dbyings las gzhan du mi g.yo bar// gsang ba'i yum gyi b+ha ga dkyil 'khor de ltar 'don pa'i 'byung gnas mdzad/ sras ston pa yang ma mo brgyad la sogs pa// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'i yum rnams la/ mchod pa
251b1(1): gang gis 'bral ba na// sngags tshig 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bul// rtog pa'i skyon bral mtshan ma gtan spangs kyang // gzung 'dzin gyi chags pa med/ yab/ ye shes yum chos kyi dbyings las mi 'bral zhing /
251b2(1): yab// thabs kyi sku la yum shes rab dgyes par 'khril// rnam thar brgyad ldan pad+ma yum gyi b+ha ga pad+ma 'dab brgyad du gsal ba'i/ ge sar la// chags med ye shes lab kyi rdo rje ye shes lngar mnyam gzhag nas// nyi ma dmar
251b3(1): po yum gyi byang sems/ zla ba dkar po yab kyi byang sems/ dkar dmar 'khrugs pa'i 'od zer gyis// gzung 'dzin skyon bsreg 'gro la gsang ba'i dbang bskur zhing // rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga nas/
251b4(1): gsal bar bskyed mdzad pa/ de rnams gang gis byed na// sngags tshig 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bul// lha sgra gcig la kun tshang bas na// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar gsal/ yab// thabs dang yum shes rab zung du
251b5(1): 'brel// ru lu spyan drangs shes pa ni/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor nas spyan drang ba ni// 'og min grub pa'i gnas nas dgug/ brjod pa sngags kyi phyag rgya bzhis spyan drang ba// dzaHhUM baM hoHgsang sngags phyag rgya bzhis/ bsam pa'i rtsa
251b6(1): 'dzin phyag rgya'i lha mo bzhis spyan drang ba// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu ma/ bca' ba'i/ dam tshig phyag rgya bzhis rab tu bcings nas ni/ mtshon pa dpe'i phyag rgya bzhis spyan drang ba ni// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bru brgyad
252a1(1): sngags kyis dgug/ rgyal po spyan 'dren pa sa bu'o// ru lu mchod par shes pa ni// sngags kyi ru lu zer// ting 'dzin las sa mo// spros pas mchod pa'i gter/ mchod pa bzhi ni// me tog bdug spos lha bshos mar me
252a2(1): bcas/ dar gyi rgyalas grub pa'i mchod pawa/ bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' 'phan dang gdugs// sil snyan dza d+ha'i mchad pa dang nor bu pra tig phreng / ba'i mchad pa// gzugs sgra dri ro reg sogs 'ad can drug lha mo'i
252a3(1): tshogs// bde chen byang chub sems kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod sprin rnams/ byi rdzas kyi mchod pa/ dngos su bshams shing nang nying nge'i mchod pa/ sems kyis mngon sprul te/ gang la 'bul na// ye shes rang snang zhi khro'i dkyil
252a4(1): 'khor la/ gang gis 'bral ba// 'bru brgyad 'phro 'dus 'bul na mchod par bzhes/ sbal bzod pa// sku mchog gang 'dod gzugs su de bzhin snang / gsung la bstod pa// gsung mchod rnam dag sngags kyi yig 'brur
252a5(1): gsal/ thugs la// thugs mchog ye shes dam tshig phyag rgyar gsal/ yon tan la// yon tan rin chen bdag gzhan dgos 'dod bskang / phrin las la// phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro drug rnam par sgrol/ spyir bstod
252a6(1): pa// legs pa mchog rnams yon tan mnga' mdzad la// brjod mkhan gyi tshul// dang bas rab bstod 'bru brgyad drags pas mchod// mchod dang bstod pa'i mchod pa yang / rang gi/ ting 'dzin gyi mthun/ sprul pa
252b1(1): mchod pa'i gter// ru lu phyag rgyar shes pa ni/ chos dam tshig las chos nyid// phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi dang ldan/ ba'i// gtso bo chos sku phyag rgya chen por gnas// dam tshig gi phyag rgya yum ni sku la 'khril/ las kyi phyag rgya ni
252b2(1): mkha' gsang 'khor rnams bskyed// zhi ba chos nyid phyag rgyas rang bzhin med// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i gtso 'khor rnams rdzogs pa'i sku/ rgyas btab pa ni// rnal 'byor lus la 'debs byed ni/ lha skus rgyas btab
252b3(1): gsal// ru lu phrin las shes par bya ba ni// thugs kyi 'od zer phrin las mchog/ thugs las phrin las bzhi'i 'od 'phro ba'o// stong gsum phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten na// shar zhi ba lho rgyas nub dbang byang drag po// 'bru brgyad yon
252b4(1): tan bsam mi khyab// dpal chen yab yum 'khor dang bcas// yun ring dus nas bsnyen bsnyen pa// nye ba'i dus su mchod mchod pa// bsnyen mchod 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin
252b5(1): phob la// spyir ni phrin las ba'i// bdag cag rnams la dngos grub stsol// byams mgon shes nyal/ thugs la bya btsal mi mnga' yang / sgrub pa po// bdag cag re sgron 'grub par mdzad slad du// phrin las rnam bzhis
252b6(1): 'dul thabs zhi ba la yig 'bru kha dog dkar/ rgyas pa ser/ dbang dmar/ drag po nag po bsgom/ ji bzhin pas// gdul bya ra ba ru tra la sogs gdug pa can/ 'bring rgyal blon tha mar mi phal pa/ gyur pa rnams/ lha dang bgegs 'gro drug/ bzang
253a1(1): ngan phan gnon rtse gcig sems pa yi// lha bgegs dang por lan gnod byed pa dngos gang yin na/ legs la nyes bgegs byed pa gang yang rung // sbyor ba ngan pa'i bag chags de'i nus pa ji ltar bzhom na/ gtan
253a2(1): spangs nas/ za mar gang la 'god na// byang chub sems mchog skye bar bsgrub pa dang // thugs rje'i zhing gyur 'gro drug sems can rnams// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' ring mtsho las bsgral slad du/ gang gi phrin las byed
253a3(1): na// bzlas brjod 'phro 'dus bskul nas phrin las mdzod/ 'byung ba rim brtsegs dang 'dod chags// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho chen po 'khyil pa'i dbus/ zhe sdang / keng rus chen po'i ri rab brtsegs pa'i steng / gti mug/ rdo rje'i brag
253a4(1): chen gtams pa'i sa gzhi la// rab 'jigs rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/ lha'i sgra dngos ni// dpal chen 'khor tshogs mtha' yas bzhugs pa ni// ye shes tshad
253a5(1): med thugs rje'i mdzad pa/ sprul pa'i thabs mnga' bas/ gdul bya// gang mos dag la de bzhin skur snang zhing / 'dul tshul// ci la cis 'dul bzhin du cha lugs ston/ thugs kyi 'dul thabs ni// thugs mtshan sna tshogs mtshon
253a6(1): cha'i char 'bebs shing / gsung gi 'dul thabs ni// ru lu sngags kyi sgra sgrogs 'brug stong ldir/ skus 'dul thabs ni// gzi brjid spyan bzlog me stag tsha tsha 'phro// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs dug gsum gti mugs sha/ zhe sdang
253b1(1): rus/ 'dod chags khrag zhal du rngub// 'khor gyi 'dul thabs ni// mngag pa'i pho nya mgyogs byed glog stong 'gyu/ mchod tshul ni// bdud rtsi dmar gyi ar+g+haM rgyun gyis mchod/ bskul tshul ni// 'dzab dbyangs sngags kyi phreng bas rgyud
253b2(1): bskul nas/ gdul bya gang yin na// 'dul 'os bsgral ba'i zhing du 'gyur ro 'tshal// phrin las dngos gang gis 'dul na// byin rlabs tsham rngams drag pos gdug pa bsgral du gsol// thugs kyi phrin las bzhis bdud
253b3(1): bzhi 'joms/ pa'o// dang por thugs dam bskul ba// bskul dang bar du las bzhi bcol za ma/ drag pos bcol// ru lu sgrar ni shes pa ni/ ru lu// sgra dbyangs drug dkyil 'khor lta bar 'phro tshur 'du gsal// oM ni dpal chen
253b4(1): po'i sa bon rtsa ba la srog sngags/ sku gsung thugs// ru lu ma mo brgyad kyi sa bon ni srog sngags/ gnas kyi phyag rgya yin// ru lu phra men gnas kyi yul yang yin// hUM ni thabs kyi sgo ma bzhi/ 'i sa bon nam srog sngags// b+h+yo ni ma sring rgya
253b5(1): mtsho'i dbang po tshogs// hUM ni 'khor 'das dbang du byed/ thams cad sdud par byed// zur brgyad snying yul brgyad kyi logs la 'bru brgyad gsal// 'bru brgyad dbus na rdo rje'i ste bcu 'bru gcig gsal/ de la 'bru brgyad kyi/
253b6(1): sngags kyi 'phro 'dus bcol bskul mchod// IM ni sku mchog go rI ma/ dkar mo// ru ni yon tan tso rI ma/ kun mo// lu ni gsung nyid pra mo he/ rmongs mo// ru ni phrin las be tA lI/ zal byed ma// lu ni zhi byed puk+ka sI/ spos
254a1(1): mo// hUM ni rgyas mdzad g+hasma rI/ sbe sha can// b+h+yo ni dbang sdud sma sha nI/ dur khrod ma// hUM ni drag po tsaN+Da lI/ gtum mo// yig 'bru brgyad po// kun 'dus dpal chen nyid kyi ngang // dkyil 'khor dbang mo brgyad dpal
254a2(1): yab lam dang lha dgu nyid du gsal// dug lnga rnam par dag ste ye shes lngar gnas 'gyur ba'i/ mnga' brnyes shing // sku lngar ldan pas zhe sdang rdo rje'i sgra gti mug chos sgra rnam snang nga rgyal longs sku rin 'byung 'dod chags sbrul sku 'od dpag med phrag
254a3(1): dog mngon par byang chub spa don grub tu sbyar ro/ dug lnga'i 'gro ba sgrol// rab 'bar cha lugs 'jigs pa kun 'dul ba/ khrag 'thung yab he ru ka yum kro d+hi sha ri gnas ma mo/ yul phra men phyag rgyar bcas// sgo ba la don gyi khyo yod
254a4(1): pas/ stangs dpyal dbang phyug ma nyer brgyad 'bangs yang bran/ dang g.yog/ yang g.yog/ bka' nyan khro bcu yab yum/ sbrul pa khro bo khro mo la/ sngags gang gis mchod par 'bul// 'bru brgyad rags pas 'phro 'dus mchod par
254a5(1): 'bul// gsang dbang lab yum gyi sku gsung thugs su byin gyis rlob pa// byin gyis rlabs dang mchog thun mong gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// kwa'i 'gro 'dra'i lha ni// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// sku yi sprul pa bsam yas kyang /
254a6(1): he ru ka yab yum 'khor bcas kyi// bla med sku mchog rdo rje la// 'bru brgyad gsal ba'i mchod pa 'bul// gsung gi 'phro 'dra'i sgra ni// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// gsung gi sprul pa bsam yas kyang / he ru ka yab yum
254b1(1): 'khor bcas kyi// bla med gsung mchog rdo rje la// 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bul// thugs kyi 'phro 'du'i sgra ni// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// thugs kyi sprul pa bsam yas kyang // he ru ka yab yum 'khor bcas
254b2(1): kyi// bla med thugs mchog rdo rje la// 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bul// stong gsum phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// sku'i ngo bo gang sprul na// ye shes sprul pa bsam mi khyab// yang dag lha dgu'i// thugs kyi dkyil
254b3(1): 'khor 'od zer 'bar/ gsung gi gnas gang nas sprul na// gsang ba'i mkha' las 'bru brgyad 'phro// gdul bya gang na/ khams gsum 'od spros pas sems can sdug bsngal bsal// 'od chur 'dus pas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i sku
254b4(1): la thim// par 'phros pas rgyal ba la// bla med mchod pa dam pas mnyes// tshur 'dus pas dang po'i gnas su thim// sgrub pa po'o// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa sbyang // ye shes pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos
254b5(1): grub thob// gas nasas/ 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bral// rba tsamams paka dang // rtogs pa'i ye shes 'bru brgyad kyis// nyon mongs ma lus bdud bzhi zang par bdud na gcan mangs pa'i bdud na lag/
254b6(1): bdud par chod dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud ste shi 'joms// yid bzhin nor bu ltar 'dod pa 'byung ba/ 'khyil ba'i 'od zer 'di// gsang bar 'khor 'das/ kun la khyab pa dang // ru lu las cir yang snang ste sems las 'khor 'das su snang ba
255a1(1): ltar// cir yang bsgyur du btub pa dang / thugs ka'i// ye shes sems dpa' sku mchog rin po che// bstod chog gi sgra dang // 'bru brgyad 'di ltar ru lu 'phrul che ba'i 'phrul po che// dus gsum sangs rgyas yin pa dang
255a2(1): rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs// phrin las bzhis gdul bya'i// las rnams thams cad byed pa yin// dngos grub thams cad sdud rnal 'byor pas pa yi// bsams pa tsam gyis gang 'dod 'phel// bsam 'phel 'bru brgyad mkha' la
255a3(1): sbrusprul// 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho nam mkha' stong pa la sprin sngar 'dra ba ltar sdud// dngos po rtag par ma grub pas// rang bzhin sgra tshig brjod las 'das// ru lu chos nyid shes pa ni// chos thams cad le 'dod ma nas stong pas na// skye med
255a4(1): gdod nas spros dang bral// sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs ni mtshan ma med// 'khor ba snod bcud du// snang la spros bral chos kyi dbyings// ru lu dngos grub shes pa ni// sku dang gsung thugs mkha' spyod kyi gnas la 'gro
255a5(1): bas na/ mkha' la 'gro// ji ltar 'khor 'das sa/ snang ba thams cad kun// 'khor ba thun mong / dngos grub 'das pa mchog gi dngos grub ci gter du gyur// 'bru brgyad kyi ni phreng ba dag/ rin chen sna lnga'i gser ser dngul dkar
255a6(1): zangs dmar lcags nag ma rgad ldang / do shal bzhin// sna lnga'i 'od zer gsal bar 'gro/ tsa sran ma nyung dkar tsam pa na ka yi 'bru tshad tsam// yig 'bru yang na til 'bru tsam thugs mtshan phyag rgya'i tshogs/ kha dog/ gsal 'od
255b1(1): 'tsher ri brag la sogs la/ thogs pa med 'khor 'das kun tu khyab// phar 'phros pas ni 'gro ba'i sgrib pa sbyong / gzhan don rdzogs// tshur 'dus pas ni sgrub pa po la dngos grub ster/ bdag don 'grub// rnam par mchod pa'i
255b2(1): dngos por/ spros pas D+ha bsod nams tshogs/ rang bzhin// stong par rtogs pas 'bras bu ye shes tshogs// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas sgra gnyis su/ mngon sangs rgyas// 'bras bu smin pas chos longs sbrul sku
255b3(1): gsum thob// bsdus pas sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya che/ sgra gsum gyi// dngos grub mchog gi gter du 'gyur// de nas gsang sngags ru lu yi// 'dzab bsnyen 'phro 'du bstan pa ni// phra mo'i ting 'dzin rig
255b4(1): pa yid// gsal bas rang gi gnas sbyang ba// rang gi thugs la ting 'dzin rtsal sbyangs te/ de la rang gi/ gnas bsnyen zhes ni bya ba 'di/ gnas gang du bsgom na// bcom ldan dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// ye
255b5(1): shes sems dpa' gang bsgom na/ sku mchog tshon gang rin po che// tshul ji ltar bsgom na thugs gsal ba'i chad// dran dang srog chags gsal ba gsung gsung lha// klu'i rgyan gsal ba'i chad// snyan cha mgur chu yan lag 'gul 'gul
255b6(1): 'dra/ ye shes sems dpa'i thugs la ji ltar bsgom na// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ dpal chen snying dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad pa'i steng // bzhin la dpal be'u'i dbus su zugs/ rdo rje gsung yig 'bru
256a1(1): 'bar 'bar lta// zur brgyad steng na ru lu 'bru brgyad po/ zhu 'bru tsam/ yi ge gsal ba'i tshad// gug skyed klad kor tsheg par zur phyin te/ ye shes sems dpa'i thugs rdo rje yig 'bru// rnam gsum dus gcig yid
256a2(1): la gsal sems te// spyir gsal ba'i tshad dam dpe// ra ri khal khol med par dran gsal rig/ sku chos sgrar gsal bas// chos kyi rdo rje'i chos nyid stod pa nyid kyi ngang las ltar gsal ba ru lu'i/ glu blangs pas// sems nyid gsung gi
256a3(1): rang bzhin la/ gsung sngags nyid/ thugs gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin// yid la gsang sngags brjod pa ni// gsang sngags dag cing yig 'bru gsal// sku gsung thugs gcig nas gcig tu mi 'dren par rang rang gi gnas nas 'phro 'du gsal ba'o//
256a4(1): dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ bdag he ru ka'i thugs kar nyi zla la// ye shes sems dpa'i tshad/ tshon gang he ru ka ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka/ dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad ni// srog zar brgyad la gi snying po 'bru
256a5(1): brgyad po// gser gyi ba zag gzings pa bzhin/ mdog ser po skar khung gi rdul 'dra ba'o// nyi zer gyi rdul// phar spros pas ni sangs rgyas kyi thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus rnal 'byor pa'i rin chen dpal be'u bskang // bdag dang
256a6(1): // gnyis pa med pa byang chub sems su thim/ mgrin pa pad+mar// dpal chen gsung gi dkyil 'khor nas// srog gi snying po pad+ma 'dab brgyad la 'bru brgyad pa// gsang ba gnas kyi lam du byung / thugs ka nas byung ste ljags las
256b1(1): dkan du shar// gsang ba mgrin sgo nas spros pas/ dbugs kyi rlung gis bskyod/ pad+ma'i lte bar gsung gi rigs lpags la// snang ba mtha' yas thugs dam bskul/ sna skrag nas spro ba// shangs kyi rlung sgrom chen por bsdams/ mgar ba'i
256b2(1): sol mal nas zhun ma'i// lcags kyi tsha tsha brdabs pa bzhin// phar 'phros pas ni phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i gsung la thim// slar 'dus rnal 'byor pa bsgom pa'i/ ljags kyi pad+ma bskang / bdag dang lha// gnyis su med pas 'gag med
256b3(1): gsung // dpal chen sku yi spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ zla ba la gnas pa'i/ ru lu 'bru brgyad 'od zer 'phro/ mgrin pa nas spyi bor 'od rlung gi rta la zhon nas// gsang ba ye shes rlung gis bskyod// slar 'dus spyi bor klad pa/
256b4(1): dung khang gzhal yas su/ spu'i rigs// rnam par snang mdzad thugs dam bskul/ rnam snang thugs ka nas// ru lu 'bru brgyad 'od du 'phro/ tshangs pa'i bu ga nas hUM mgo thur du bstan pa gnas pa las// rdo rje hUM ring sgra yis
256b5(1): drangs// spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i bu ga nas/ 'di la dbugs ngom nas 'khor ba khyod phrin las tshangs pas na/ 'od kyi 'phro 'dra// mgal me glad la bskor ba bzhin/ phar 'phros pas ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas/ sku la thim// slar 'dus rnal
256b6(1): 'byor pa rang gi sku yi dkyil 'khor gang // bdag dang lha'i dngos grub// gnyis su med par 'gyur med sku// tsit+ta snying sul brgyad yid bzhin rin chen zur brgyad kyi/ rig pa nyid dkyil 'khor du gnas kyang rtogs dka' bas// gsang
257a1(1): chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// ru lu 'bar ba'i yig 'bru brgyad/ rin po che'i thugs ka na gnas pa las// mgrin pa gsung gi pad+ma'i lam du phyung / rlung lnga sangs rgyas yin par rtogs dka' bas// gsang ba
257a2(1): dbugs kyi rlung gis bskyod// rin chen 'khor lo'i rtsa thugs yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i rtsa kun 'dar ma dang la lan dang ra sa na/ nas drangs/ dbu thod pa dung wa tha// klad pa dung khang gzhal yas su// yig 'bru 'od thugs kar 'od
257a3(1): mthing ga gtso che mgrin pa dmar spyi bo dkar de re re las 'od lnga chad pa'o// kyi 'phro 'du gsal// snga nas rlung lnga rang bzhin gyi zla bas na// shangs kyi rlung sgrom chen po nas// rdo rje sngags kyi las rnams hUM gis byed pas hUM ring sgra las drangs/
257a4(1): gsung thugs rang sa na gnas// yi ge mi 'gyur 'od zer gyi/ phreng bar 'gyur// dril bu'i sgra ltar rgyun mi chad/ dpal gyi thugs// dpal be'u thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes sems dpa' he ru ka'i// 'bru brgyad ye shes
257a5(1): sems dpa'i thugs/ gsang ba'i lam brgyud de/ 'od zer rnams// slar 'dus dpal be'u nyid la gsal// bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin 'phro 'du ni// dung khang dkar po'i sgra ni dbu'i gnas gzhal yas khang / gsung sa/
257a6(1): gnas// mgrin pa pad+ma'i gnas chen las/ thugs kyi gnas// thugs ka gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ sku gsung thugs// rang sems byang chub 'bru brgyad nyid/ 'gyur ba med pa// ru lu gser phreng dgos 'dod 'byung ba/ rin po
257b1(1): che// gcig las ma spros 'bru brgyad dbus dang dgu ru ldan/ gang bsam 'byung bas// bsam 'phel 'bru brgyad yid bzhin rin po che/ 'dra/ dus gsum gyi// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs kyi dbyig/ gdod nas dri ma med pa'i ye shes rang
257b2(1): shar bas/ ye shes snying po bas/ ye shes lha'i thugs kyi// byin rlabs 'bru brgyad phyag rgyar gsal/ lus la// drod tshad sems la rtags rab 'bring tha ma gsum dang ldan pa yi/ chos nyid spros bral// de bzhin nyid du shes par
257b3(1): bya// 'bru brgyad ye shes mkha' la 'phro/ bzlas brjod bkren pa'i 'gro 'dus ye shes kyi lha nye bar bsten pa'i// sku gsum sgra mi 'gyur ba/ gsung mi 'gag pa/ thugs ma skyes pa/ 'bar ba'i rgya mtsho ni// srog gi snying po 'bru brgyad gsal/
257b4(1): bdag dang lha// gnyis med sku gsung thugs kyi ngang // dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad las// ru lu 'bru brgyad 'phro 'du spro/ sku'i 'od 'phro 'du ser po// gser gyi ba zag gzings pa bzhin// phar 'phros pas ni sku
257b5(1): la thim// tshur 'dus pas ni dpal be'u bskang // dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad las// ru lu rin chen 'bru brgyad 'phro/ gsung gi 'gro du dmar po// mgal me klad la bskor ba bzhin// phar 'phros pas ni skra
257b6(1): la thim// slar 'dus pas ni 'bru brgyad bskang // yid bzhin rin chen zur brgyad las// ru lu rin chen 'bru brgyad 'phro/ thugs kyi 'od zer mthing ga/ lcags kyi tsha tsha brdabs pa bzhin// phar 'phros pas ni ljags
258a1(1): la thim// slar 'dus pas ni dpal be'u bskang // kun gzhi'i rnam shes yul las skur gsal ba// dpal chen yab yum kun gzhi'i yum yin la rnam shes yab ste kun gzhi ni rnam shes kun gyi rtsa bar gnas so//
258a2(1): gnyis med sku gsung thugs// thugs dam mdzad pas na/ kyi yon tan yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// thugs lha ni mchog rdo rje he ru yab yum la// thugs kyi dpal bsgom bya'i sngags don ni/ be'u rin chen zur brgyad
258a3(1): la// ru lu 'bru brgyad 'od zer 'phro zhing 'du/ 'od// phar 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskul// ye shes lha la bsnyen pa 'bul/ 'od bsdu ba// slar 'dus thugs kyi dpal be'u gang // dngos grub mchog gi gter du
258a4(1): 'gyur// rnam shes dbang po gnas 'gyur na khro mo'i skur snang ba// phyag rgya sgra'i cha lugs gcig tu ma nges kyang / sbrul tshul ni// gdul bya'i dbang gis cir yang sprul pa yi/ rnam grangs ni// ko rI la sogs khro mo brgyad
258a5(1): rnams la// yi ge sgom gnas ni// dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad la// lu lu 'bru brgyad kyi 'od zer bar/ 'phro zhing tshur 'du/ 'od zer// phar 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskul// ye shes lha la bsnyen pa 'bul// slar
258a6(1): 'dus pas ni thugs kyi dpal be'u gang // dngos grub mchog gi gter du 'gyur/ lha gzhan la sbyar ba// lha dgu rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar// tshul mchog dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad man chad/ kun la de bzhin sbyar// yul
258b1(1): bzhi dus bzhi gnas gyur na phra men skur snang ba// mgo brnyan tshogs kyis las gang mdzad na dur khrod za mdzad cing / ngo bo gang byung na// rdo rje mche gshog phra men mgo brnyan tshogs// sing+ga la sogs rnam grangs du yod na phra men
258b2(1): brgyad rnams la// dpal be'u rdo rje tshul mchog ni/ ru lu'i sgo bsdu// kun la rab tu sbyar ba'o// gnas 'gyur gyi rim pa ni// phyin ci log bzhi gnas su dag 'byung ste/ spyi'i las gang mdzad na// tshad med bsdu ba bzhi yi dang
258b3(1): tshul can/ khyad par du// 'gugs byed 'ching sdom byed pa'i las mkhan ma/ las dang ngo bo rnam grangs ni// dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i sgo ma bzhi rnams la// dpal gyi spyan sngar dam bcas tshul ni// dpal gyi bka' nyan dam tshig
258b4(1): gnyen bsrung zhing / rnal 'byor pa la grogs mdzad tshul ni// ma sring rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis brtse dgongs te/ phrin las mdzad tshul ni// grogs la blta zhing 'gal ba tshar gcod pa// ma tshogs dbang phyug rnam grangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad
258b5(1): la/ ngo bo// cha lugs khro 'jigs spyod pa rab mdzes pa/ spyir mdzad pa'i las ni// gzhan dag sreg mdzad gtso la mnyes stob ma/ khyad par gyi// mdzad pa rnam dag pha rol sgrol mdzad ma// dkyil 'khor skyong ba'i srung
258b6(1): ma rnam grangs sring mo bzhi 'am gsang ba'i yum bzhi rnams la// gshegs bzhugs mi mnga' bgrod tshul ni gang yang thogs med cing / dgongs pa ni// rtog pa kun bral thams cad sa le mkhyen// bya btsal med bzhin phrin las
259a1(1): ni/ gzhan dag tshar gcod mkhas/ ngo bo ni// bka' nyan mngag gzhug pho nya rdul snyed la// gnas ni// phyogs bcu'i sa dang nam mkha'i 'jig rten na// cha lugs ni/ lha dang lha min phra rags gzugs
259a2(1): 'chang zhing / dgongs pa'i thugs dam ni// gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i gnyer blangs pa/ nga bo ni// rig 'dzin sngags 'chang rnal 'byor thams cad la// gnas// phyogs bcu stong gi 'jig rten na// sna tshogs snang
259a3(1): pab thabs mchog yab// ma skyes pa nyid shes rab yum/ thabs shes rab 'brel bas// gnyis med gcig la zung du 'brel/ thabs shes rab tu 'dus tshul// ji snyed brjod pa'i chos rnams kun// thabs dang shes rab rang
259a4(1): bzhin te/ mchod lugs// ye shes lha dang dbyer med cing // 'bru brgyad sngags kyi yi ge gsung / spro thabs// spros pas bla med mchod pa 'bul// bsdus pas dngos grub bsnga lugs/ byang chub sems su gnas// dngos
259a5(1): grub mchog gi gter du 'gyur// ya ba yum gsang ba'i gnas gang nas blangs na/ mkha' dbyings la/ 'phro 'du gang gis na/ 'bru brgud dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du ni/ bya thabs gang gis na// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbyibs brgyud
259a6(1): de// dngos grub 'bras bu gar rdzogs pa gsang ba'i mkha' la rdzogs// pad+ma rA ga yum gyi b+ha ga rA ga'i mdog 'od kyi ma d+ha la nas// byi ru dmar po dbang gi maN+Dal la/ gsang ba yum gyi mkha'// ge sar stong gis brgyan pa'i
259b1(1): dkyil 'khor nas/ bsgrub bya lha'i thugs// dpal chen he ru'i thugs kyang rin po che// bsgrub mchog bdag gi sgrub byed rnal 'byor pa'i thugs kyang rin po che/ bsgrub pa'i chos// gdod nas ma skyes thugs kyang rin po che/ 'khor
259b2(1): 'das// thams cad ma lus yum gyi b+ha ga/ bde chen dbyings su rdzogs// mtshan med spros bral bde chen dbyings su thim/ dpe bstan pa// ji ltar 'ja' tshon gsal 'gyur yang // nam mkha'i ngang las yongs kyis 'byung //
259b3(1): don bstan pa// phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul gsal 'gyur yang // ma skyes ngang gis 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul yin/ ye shes ni// rang rigs ye shes mnyam nyid rol pa las/ dbyings ni// ma skyes ngang gis rdzogs pas sku
259b4(1): gsung zugs/ dbyings su bsdu// rang rig rtsol dang bral bas dbyings su rdzogs/ sems su badz+ra/ thams cad ye rgyas btab pas byang chub sems/ dbyer med du bsdu// skye med gdod na sa dag pa'i rang bzhin la// 'bru
259b5(1): brgyad phyag rgya cho 'phrul yig 'bras/ cir yang snang // thams cad dbyer med sems cad byang chub sems kyi dang // tshogs las 'das pas brjod bral du gnas ma bcos ldan gyis grub// oM ru lu ru luts+tsha b+h+yo hUM/ yid
259b6(1): bzhin nor bu lta bu yi// a la os na ro brgyan ma gzhi ma'i Sha la/ thig le/ dang bcas/ au s+tha// sku rnams ma lus 'dus pa yin/ ra dang la ni// dbyangs dang gsal byed kun la khyab/ zhabs kyu/ u bzhis smras pa rnal
