260a1(1): 'byor gyi// rnal 'byor ma mo ma rnams kyi srog sngags so// srog sngags zab mo shes pa yin/ gzhi// ha A zhabs khyud thig le tse sgo ma'i don// sde tshan bzhi ka tsaT ta pa'i gsum pa ni bayin las// bzhad byed ha ya
260a2(1): ta na ma b+h+yo ma mo srog spros// gre ba nas byung ba ta U zhabs khyud dang thig le hUM wa'i thugs/ so// sngags rnams btu ba gsang ba ni// blo ldan sngags pas shes nas bzlas// yang na oM adz+dza rdo rje'i bzlas par 'gyur/ lus
260a3(1): bsrung ba// cis kyang mi phyed mi shigs pa'i// stong pa'i nyid du shes pa go cha bla na med// mtshan ma'i yul kun stong pa'i dang bcom nas kyang / bdud bgegs kyi mi tshugs// thams cad kun tu rgyal bar gnas/ sku gsung thugs pa
260a4(1): bgo ba'i sngags// oM oM badz+ra ka la tsa ya man+ta/ yang byung / badz+ra kA ya bA ka tsit+ta sa mAny+dza hUM// ming dang mtshan ma ma grub pas// mi gnas ma byas 'dus ma byas// chos kyi dbyings kyis bsrungs pas na// rgyal bas kyang ni mi
260a5(1): thong ngo // oM hUM su ra ta bak+Sha haM// rmad byung gsang sngags dam tshig nos pa las// nyon mongs dug lnga 'dus pa'i dbang song nas// blta ba dmas shing spyod pa rtsings pa yis// rtsa ba zhig cing yan lag nyams
260a6(1): pa yis// slob dpon grogs mched thugs dang ci 'gal ba// ye shes lha 'bangs dngos grub yal la sogs// nongs pa mchis kyang 'gal bar ma mthong ba// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'dis bshags
260b1(1): na// 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// tshangs te dngos grub dam pa stsal du gsol// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bras bu 'thob bya'i phyir// rol pa'i 'phro 'du la sogs gnas bsgyur te// bsnyen
260b2(1): pa'i lung bzhin dbye ba med pa yi// las kyi bye brag bzhin du bsgrub par bya// ston pa thabs mkhas thugs rje che ba yis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don du gsungs pa'o// he ru ka'i gal po las ru lu spros pa'i
260b3(1): brtag pa ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po rnams kyis/ rdo rje theg pas bdag gzhan thams cad 'khor ba las yongs su bsgral bar bya
260b4(1): ba'i thabs 'di dag gsungs so// gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa nas// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu yis// rtogs pas bdag bsgral thugs rjes gzhan// rdo rje bam bsgrub gnas mchog bya// dang po bsam gtan
260b5(1): chos dgu ni// lus ngag yid gsum sbyang bar bya// lus dang ngag sems gtan la dbab// byang sems yi dam bla ma dran// 'di dgu rnal 'byor can gyis bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams bcad nas// bsrung
260b6(1): ba'i 'khor lo yang dag gnas// lus khams bdud rtsi chen po la// sman dang gtor ma rak+ta yin// phyi nang gsang ba'i bshags pa yis// lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru// dang por stong nyid bsgoms pas
261a1(1): ni// rang lus dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// rtsa ni gzhal yas sprul pa'i sku// yi ge sngags ni longs spyod rdzogs// lus khams bdud rtsi chos kyi sku// ngo bo nyid sku snying po rlung // sku bzhi rang
261a2(1): gnas lha ru rdzogs// las kyi rlung la 'jug pa bzhi// nyams su blangs pa'i gnad rnams ni// bdun cu tham pa'i man ngag gnas// gnas sbyong bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yin// pho mo ma ning thod rgal rlung / khams ni
261a3(1): 'dus pa dang po la// rgyun rlung lag cha can dag gis// rtsa bral lus sems rmi lam du// nyams su snang ba 'byung ba yis// phyir ldang gsum dang nang 'jug gsum/ khong gnas kha sbyor dbugs gcig
261a4(1): bdun// gzhi ni rtsa ba'i rlung lnga la// yan lag lnga ste rnam dbye bcu// bcu yi ming gnas las dang bcas// zin pa'i zug dang ting nge 'dzin// rengs skyon bcos thabs bdun gyur pas// man ngag gnad ni
261a5(1): bdun cur gsungs// de dag phan yon bcas pas ni// rnal 'byor rnams kyis bslab par bya// rlung dang lus khams bdud rtsi gnyis// rtsa sngags gsum gyis lam yang khrid/ khams ni 'dus pa bar ma
261a6(1): la// lag cha bri ba'i rlung gis dral// mthong snang re dogs bral ba'i lam// sad pa bzhi dang dgra langs yin/ khams 'dus tha ma lag cha bral// sku bzhi gnas par 'gyur ba'o// de nas 'jig rten 'das pa'i
261b1(1): lam// sa rnams non par rgyal bas gsungs// phyi rabs rnal 'byor thams cad la// rdo rje chang gis rgyas par bshad// kye ho skal ldan rigs kyi bu// 'khor 'das thun mong mtshams dang 'das// 'jig rten
261b2(1): pa dang 'khor lo bskor// 'khor 'das thun mong lam bshad na// snang ba gsum du bstan pa'i lam// kun gzhi 'dus dang phyag rgya che// rgyu rgyud thabs rgyud 'bras bu'i rgyud// bla ma sgrub pa bde gshegs
261b3(1): dngos// man ngag nyams myong lung 'brel tshad// gdams ngag drug tu bstan pa dang // snyan brgyud bzhi yis gtan la phab// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lnga// thabs dang shes rab mthar lhung ba'i// bsrung
261b4(1): ba'i bye brag bstan pas na// rnal 'byor pa yi lam shes bya// 'jig rten 'khor lo mtshams pa'i yang / 'cha' ba'i lam/ khams kyi 'du lugs rnam pa gsum// tshom bu rnam pa drug tu bcad// mdor bsdus gnyis
261b5(1): su bstan pa yang // snying po drug gi lam yang khrid/ khams kyi bdud rtsis khrid pa dang // rtsa yi yi ges lam khrid do// lam lnga lta bur bgrod pa ni// tshogs sbyor mthong sgom mthar phyin yin// byang chub mchog ltar
261b6(1): bgrod pa ni// lam lnga'i yan lag nyid du 'gyur// dbugs gcig rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni// bla ma nyid la zhus byas te// dbugs kyi rgyu ba g.yas g.yon zhes// srog rtsol nyams su blang byas la// mthar phyin
262a1(1): yon tan skyon sel byed// phyir 'gro gtang bar bya ba yang // rtsol ba bkag la srog nas gtang // shugs bskyed sna bug gnyis nas gtang / kha nas sgra bcas gtang ba'o// dgang ba'i yan lag
262a2(1): rnam pa gnyis// rtsol ba bkag la srog gnas dgang / kha nas sgra med dgang bar bya// de nas rlung gnyis kha sbyar la// nyams su blang zhing bsgom par bya// man ngag bdun cu tham pa yang // srog 'dzin nam
262a3(1): mkha'i rlung nyid la// me dang nus pa mnyam pas ni// me yi rlung du yang dag gnas// thur du sel ba'i rlung zhes pa// sa dang 'dres pa yin zhes bya// gyen la rgyu ba'i rlung de ni// rlung gi rlung ste sna bug gnyis//
262a4(1): khyab byed rlung ni chu nyid la// kun la khyab par gnas pa'o// yan lag rlung lnga rgyu ba ni// me yi rlung ste spyan rab gsal// rab tu rgyu ba rna ba'i rlung // shin tu rgyu ba sna rlung sa// mngon par rgyu ba chu rlung lce// yang
262a5(1): dag rgyu ba nam mkha'i rlung // rtsa ni de nyid la dor gnas// rlung la sngon zags byin rlabs dang // sems drod byin rlabs drug po dang // steng 'og bde ba rnam gnyis bsgom// lam gyi khrid lugs rab bshad
262a6(1): na// rlung lnga rang gnas thim pa'i nyams// 'byung lnga'i rlung stobs 'phel ba'i nyams// 'byung ba bzhi ni cha mnyam dang // 'byung ba bcu drug cha mnyam ste// 'byung ba rlung lnga dbang bsgyur byed// lus khams bdud
262b1(1): rtsi chen po lnga// bzhi mnyam gla rtsi chen po dang // sih+la nyi ma ma las byung // ga bur zla ba pha las byung // mAM sa chu dang bcas pa ni// de bzhin sangs rgyas snang ba'o// rtsa gnas lam ni srog shing gsum// dkyil
262b2(1): 'khor bzhi la gnas pa dang // nyam nga mya ngan 'dre yi rtsa// g.yal dang mchi ma'i rtsa rnams so// yi ges lam ni khrid pa las// tsha grang dmyal ba tri nag po// dud 'gro byol song du dud ka/ yi dwags bkres skom
262b3(1): pre yig dmar// nr-i yig sngon po gling bzhi'i mi// su ser lha min ri rab nang // lha yi a dkar ri rab rtse// 'dod pa khams kyi sa bon no// bsam gtan au ni gzugs kyi khams// rtog dpyod dga' bder
262b4(1): snang ba'o// gzugs med khams ni yi ge AH/ skye mched mu bzhi snang ba'o// sku yi IM la gsung gi AH/ hUM ni thugs te yon tan swA// phrin las yi ge hA yin la// dkar dmar mthing ser ljang gu yin// b+h+yAM ni
262b5(1): gti mug zhe sdang hUM/ khaM ni nga rgyal 'dod chags hrIH/ phrag dog aM nyid dug lngar gnas// b+h+r-i ra ha ni dug gsum sngags// IM dang AHdang hUM las ni// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor gnas// snying po AHdang zung
262b6(1): 'jug hUM// dbyings dang ye shes chos skur gnas/ khams ni 'dus pa bar pa la// lte lkog k+Sha yi yi ge las// srin po rU tra'i snang ba yis/ khrag 'thung 'dul ba'i nyams su snang // mnyen lcags rnam pa bzhi po
263a1(1): las// yi ge'i man ngag a k+Sha ra// dngos grub rang yin re ba med// bar chad dngos grub dogs pa med// sad ma pa yang bzhi las stong pa lnga// lha sngags rgyan dang stong pa dran// chog shes bdud
263a2(1): las bying chen 'phreng // yang dag spong ba'i gnyen po bzhi/ khams kyi 'dus pa tha ma la// rnam rtog spong ba pad can yul// da la rgyu yid 'jug rnam rtog spong // rdo rje skyil krung lus ngag yid// thig le rlung yang
263a3(1): non pa'o// chos shes bdud choms sbyor lam drod// nang gi sangs rgyas srid rtsi gnyis// ma skyes bzod thob sbyor lam gsum// 'khor ba'i chos 'das lam rdzogs so// skyon can skyon med rlung sems
263a4(1): 'dus// ngo bo rang bzhin mtshan nyid yin// 'jig rten pa yi lam yin no// 'khor lo bskor ba 'jig rten 'das// mthong bsgom las ni bdun dang brgyad// sa drug rlung 'jug dngas ma rtogs// rim pas
263a5(1): las rnams kun ldan pa// sa gzhi dbang lung bdud rtsi brgyud// ye dag byin rlob longs sku nyid// sa gnyis dkyil 'khor chos sku stong // stobs lnga dngas ma chen dag pa// sa phyed rdo rje ngo nyid gshegs// rlung
263a6(1): rtsa bdud rtsi yi ge khrid// mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu'i 'gros bzhi thim// mi phyed mthar gnas gyur pa'o// pa ste/ rtsa'i 'gros thim pas rtsa thams cad dbus kun 'dar ma'i gnas su thim pas sbrul sgrar gyur to// yi ge'i 'gros thim pas a haM zang
263b1(1): du 'jug pas longs skur gyur pa'o// lus kyi khams bdud rtsi'i 'gros thim pas chos skur gyur pa'o// snying po rlung gi 'gros thim pas ngo bo nyid kyi skur gyur pa'o// de yang sku ni sbrul sku/ gsung ni longs su/ thugs ni chos sgra/ sku gsung thugs dbyer med pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku yin
263b2(1): no// des 'jig rten 'das pa la lam dang sa dang 'bras bu gsum mo// des ni rtogs pas bdag bsgral bar bstan no// de nas zhing bcu bsgral bar bya// sgrub rdzas bkra shis gtsang ma la sogs pa'i dmigs kyis gang bsgral ba/ de dag byin gyis brlab/
263b3(1): gang gis byin gyis rlobs na// dmigs pa med pa chos kyi sgra/ stobs kyi gdeng du gyur pa can gyis/ so// chos sgra gdeng can du gyur pa'i ngang las 'gags med ye shes kyi sgra// sku mchog 'bar ba'i dpal he ru ka tshul du gsal bar bsam/ khams
263b4(1): gsum skye ba'i rgyu bcad cing 'byung ba'i sgo dgag ces bya ste/ skye rgyu bcad pa ni khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu nyon mongs lnga ste/ 'dod chags khrag la gnas te/ srid pa thams cad khrag tu bsdus te/ zhal du rngubs nas 'dod chags kyi rtsad bcad/ khams gsum du 'khor ba'i skye
263b5(1): ba'i rgyun bcad pa'o// khrag tu dmigs nas kyang // dur khrod kun tu khyab par bsam// au dang AHhUM swA hA bkod// 'byung ba'i sgo dgag pa ni/ 'bras bu la dgongs la sems can gyi gzugs sgra smin pa'i phyir/ spyi bor sau/ khar aM/ snying gar hUM/
263b6(1): bar swA/ rkang mthil du hA/ snying po 'bru lnga bkod nas/ stobs pa lnga/ bskod pa lnga/ mnyes pa lnga/ 'bras bu lnga ste/ dang po rkang mthing gyi ha ljang gu phyogs bcur 'phros pas dmyal ba'i gnas stongs/ las kyi rigs kyi thugs dam bskang / don yod grub pa yab yum mnyes/ slar
264a1(1): 'dus pa las rdo rje rgya gram bsgril mar gyur/ de 'phros 'dus pas don yod grub pa yab yum gyi sgrar gyur/ yab phram gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad pas yab sum byang chub sems su zhu nas sA ser po ster ba gnas pa la phog pas/ swA ser po phyogs bcur
264a2(1): 'phros ste/ yi dwags kyi gnas stongs/ rin chen rigs kyi thugs dam/ rin 'byung yab yum// slar 'dus pas rin po che bsgril mar gyur// de las 'phros 'dus rin 'byung yab yum du gyur/ de gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad pas byang chub sems su zhu 'od dang bcas te yas
264a3(1): 'bros pas/ snying ga'i hUM la phog hUM sgra dang bcas te phyogs bcur 'phros pas byol song stongs/ rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam/ rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum mnyes/ slar 'dus rdo rje bsgril mar/ de las rdo rje sems dpa' yab sum/ yab sum gnyis med rol pa las yab yum yang
264a4(1): zhu nas byang sems dang bcas pa 'phro ba nas kha'i AM la phog/ AM sgra dang bcas nas mi'i gnas stongs// pad+ma rigs kyi/ snang mtha' yab yum mnyes/ slar pad+ma bsgril mar/ gnyis su med par snang mtha' yab yum du gyur/ rol pa mdzad nas byang sems su zhu nas/ spyi bor
264a5(1): la phog pas/ oM sgra dang 'od du bcas nas phyogs bcur 'phros pas/ lha'i gnas/ de bzhin rigs kyi/ rnam snang yab yum mnyes/ slar 'khor lo bsgril mar gyur nas/ rnam snang yab yum gyi skur gyur te gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad nas chos nyid du gyur nas/ rigs
264a6(1): lnga'i kha dog tshon gyi dru bu bzhin btsugs nas gnas pa dang / de las raM yaM khaM gsum byung ste/ raM las ye shes kyi mes bsreg/ yaM las rlung gis gtor/ khaM las chus bkrus te sbyangs nas// stong pa lnga dang bskang ba lnga// mnyes pa lnga dang 'bras bu
264b1(1): lnga// raM yaM khaM gis bsregs sbyangs 'thor// dngos ni a ru raM yaM khaM gis sbyangs pa'i sems nyid de a dkar por gsal bar gyur pa la ni sems nyid yi ge ar byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya la/ byin brlabs nas// ting 'dzin gsal zhing sems
264b2(1): las su rung bas ni cir yang bskur du btub pa yid bzhin rin po che ltar 'dod pa 'byung bar sems gsal bar shar ba dang // rin chen gsal bar shar ba dang / a de las phyogs bcur/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro/ ste spro bar bya'o// mos
264b3(1): pa'i thugs la mnyes bsam nas// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams 'gro ba sems can 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i zhing du sgrol bar mos pa rnams kyi thugs la mchod pas mnyes par bsam/ 'gro ba sems can ma lus pa rnams kyi
264b4(1): yang don ma lus par mdzad pa rdzogs par byas nas/ 'od 'dus thog pa'i gzugs la gzung / 'phags pa mchod sems can gyi don byas pa'i 'od zer de dag sngar tshur 'dus pa las/ thog ma'i lus ngag yid gsum la phog nas// sbyangs pa ni gzugs la gzud pa'o// de yang
264b5(1): yi ge ar gnas pa'i gzugs la gzud pa kho na thog ma'i gzugs ma nor ba yin no// phyag mtshan snying po phra mo dag/ gong gi rang rgyud kyi yi ge'i steng du dpa' bo 'bru lnga dag phyag mtshan lngar gyur/ de rnams gcig tu 'dus nas yi dam gang yang rung ba'i phyag mtshan
264b6(1): nga po phra mo dang / skur gyur par bsam pa dag go/ brtan par red nas mkha' la bzhag/ gsung yig 'bru/ thugs phyag mtshan/ sku yongs su rdzogs pa rnams bstan par red nas/ yum kun tu bzang mo mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa las/ de'i sems hUM du gyur
265a1(1): par bzhag go// bskul ba'i rang bzhin kun 'dus pas/ hUM de phyogs bcur 'phros nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa na bzhugs pa rnams/ 'gro don la thugs dam bsgral pa rnams kyang 'od kyi rang bzhin du hUM la 'dus pa las slar
265a2(1): bskyed par bya ba ni// des kyang spor ba'i las rnams byed/ hUM badz+ra d+h+r-ika/ badz+ra sa twa sa ma ya zhes pas rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gcig phyag gnyis kyi sgra mngon du bskyed nas/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du zla ba'i gdan bting la/ der zhugs te 'og nas rlung gi
265a3(1): dkyil 'khor du gyur pas btegs nas mi g.yo ba'i dbyings 'og min gnas su 'phang ngo // de la sprul pa 'byung ba'i spyod pas pha rol po sgrol nus so// dngos ni mchod pa'i rdzas su bsngo// de'i phung po dngos ni rin po che sa bu mchod pa'i rdzas su bsngo ste/ sha khrag
265a4(1): mchod rdzas su rol pa'o// de yan chad thugs rjes gzhan bsgral ba'o// dpal rdo rje sems dpas bam sgrub bshad de/ tshe 'das la phan gdags par bya ba'i don du gsungs pa'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje bam gyi sgrub pa bshad// dngos
265a5(1): grub chen po blang ba ni// las la grub pa'i dngos grub can/ dang por rab tu shes pa ni gsum ste/ rang rigs brtag pa ni/ rol las 'grub pa'i dngos grub yod pa ste/ rab skye ba bdun pa/ 'bring rgyal rigs rje'u rigs/ ba ma gres pa grer shi ba'i ro yin
265a6(1): pas dngos grub yod pa'o// shi nas rab zhag/ gsum mam 'bring bdun nam tha ma dgu na blang / de las mang na dngos grub yal lo// de nas ro btsal ba ni/ khro bo rol pa sa btsal bar bya ba dang / ste rnam par rgyal ba dang stobs po che dang bdud rtsi 'khyil
265b1(1): pabar bsgom pa'i slob mas bcol lo// phra men 'byon tshul btsal bar bya/ ni slob ma rnams ma mo dang 'phra men du bsgoms nas btsal bar bya'o// gcan gzan rgyal po sha mi 'bag/ sngags pa dbang bskur thob pa'i ro mi blang / stag gzig rol
265b2(1): pa'i gdong mi bsdu// gcan gzan gyi zos pa'i 'phro'am mgo dang rting med pa'i ro mi blang // rigs ngan sme sha rims ro dang / mdze can sngags pa nang dme'i ro/ spang byas nas/ de ltar/ khung nas dngos grub blang ba ni ro khung nas ro yid bzhin nor
265b3(1): bur shes nas blang / gshed dang da bral/ rta mgrin du bsgoms pas phyin 'brang ba'i gshed dang dpral ba ni rnam par rgyal bar bsgom pa'i phur pa ro khung du btab la gshed sha rid la sbrang ma 'du ba lta bu de dpral gshin rje gshed du bsgom pa'i phur pa btab la lhan cig
265b4(1): gnas pa'i gshed dang dpral/ khur ba'i dus su gzhal yas khang du shes pa ste/ b+h+rUM las rin po che'i// ro ru gzigs nas gzhal yas khang / du bskyed nas phyi nas sa bdag thog tu song ba yang 'gal ba med de rin po che'i gzhal yas khang na mi gnas pa gcig kyang
265b5(1): med pa'i phyir ro// ro rang gi gnas su sleb pa dang slob dpon gyi rnam 'joms sam rigs kyi yum gyi gzungs tshul/ khrus kyis bkru bar bya ba dang / mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur ba dang ma mo mkha' 'gro dgyes par 'gyur bas so// rigs drug 'gro ba'i
265b6(1): gnas kyang sbyang / de nas rigs drug gi maN+Dal byas nas rigs drug nas rim par drang bar bya ste/ rigs drug nas 'dren pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o// de nas/ rgyu drug sa bon sbyang ba dang // lha'i a dkar po/ lha min gyi su ser po// mi'i ni sngon po// dud 'gro'i du
266a1(1): dud ka/ mi dwags kyi bre dmar po// dmyal ba'i tri nag po rnams dpa' bor 'bru lnga de nas// dug lnga'i gnas lam sbyangs te gti mug mo gyis 'dod chags ya zhe sdang sna nga rgyal sna phrag dog gas/ sbyangs dag par bya/ ste rigs lngas sbyang ngo // tshe
266a2(1): 'das kyi rnam shes par dor 'khyams pa de/ khro bo'i sprul pas bkug la ro nyid la bstim par bya ste pho nyas dgug go// rnam par shes pa de rten ro la dgug/ pa yang dang po nas 'gugs pa dang zhag gsum na 'gugs pa gnyis so// de nas ngan song sbyong ba'i
266a3(1): sngags kyis// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa sbyang // pa'o nang zhi bas spang ba dang gsang ba khro bos sbyang ste rtog tshogs sngar bsgom pa'o// tshogs kyi drung du// zan skal gtad la yi dam gyi lha gang la mos pa po bstan/ te ngo shar lho nub byang gang nas blangs pa
266a4(1): de'i rigs kyi dam rdzas yin pas lha ngo bstan pa'i cho ga yang bya'o// slob mar shes pa chas su gzhug/ pa de bdud rtsi byug khar blugs la phrin las bzhi'i bros sbyangs dkyil 'khor du bcug pas ngan song du mi 'gro ba'i dbang bskur yi dam lha'i thugs kar 'phangs yang
266a5(1): na rig pa 'og min gnas su lam bstan pa'i cho ga bya'o// bros sbyangs dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bya// ru tra dgra bgegs bkug la bstim/ bam bgrod pa'i dus su ro'i lha gshegs la 'dul byed he ru kar gnas bsgyur/ dgra bgegs bkug la ro la bstim/ 'khor los gti
266a6(1): mug mgo nas bgrod/ rdo rjes zhe sdang snying / pad+mas 'dod chags kha nas/ rin chen nga rgyal lte ba nas/ phrag dog ral gris gsang gnas nas bkro ste bri la gzugs bris bgro bar bya// lha gshegs mtshon chas gnas nas bkro// lha ru shes pa dkyil 'khor
266b1(1): du/ dkyil 'khor zhi ba dang sbyar na zhi ba'i rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bris la rdzas dgod pa ni// rdo rje snying rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i khams so// la mkhal mkhal ma chu ste lus 'chus pa bsrung ba rnam snang bde gshegs so// ma gshegs// rin chen mtsher pa sa
266b2(1): rin 'byung pad+ma mchi na/ ba me 'od dpag med// glo ba rlung don grub las kyi rigs te rigs rnams ni// dkyil 'khor dag tu dbang po rnams sems dpa' sems ma'i dam rdzas su/ dgod pa bya// ril bu bslab pa'i dus na rdzas so so ltar bskyed de
266b3(1): sbyaspang bar bya'o// yang na ltar shes pa la gnyis te zhi ba la ril por bslab pa'i dus na rtogs tshogs sngar bsgom par bya ba dang / bsgrub zhi ba cha gses khro/ de yang khro bo'i dus na/ snying ni badz+ra he ru ka ra bsgom par bya ste zla kham dbus su gzhag par bya'o// khro bo la
266b4(1): cha gses/ sa mtsher pa las go rI bskyed chu mkhal ma tso rI me mchin pa pra mo he rlung glo ba be tA lI la bskyed phyogs bzhi khro/ ra gnas gnas su bsdoms te lus 'chus pa bsrang ba'o// rna ba g+hasma rI mig puk+ka sI sna[:]tsaN+Da li lce sma sha nI mtshams ma ste/ rdzas de rnams
266b5(1): sngar bskyed la phyi sha rnams la gtor ma byas la dbul bar bya'o// gsang ba'i dbang po yum gyi lha kro d+hi sha ri'i skur bsgom// ste yang dag lnga dgur bsgom par shes par bya'o// gzhan ma rnams la gtor ma byas te mchod pa 'bral lo// de ltar ro sngar bskyed nas sbyangs
266b6(1): pas tshe 'das kyi shes pa lha dang gnyis su med par bsgrub par bya'o// ro la dam rdzas 'byung bas na/ dam rdzas thams cad ro las gyur pa yin te/ gsang sngags la dur khrod rdzas spyod pa'i// ka pA klad por la ni dngos grub snod/ yin pa dang sangs rgyas mchod
267a1(1): pa'i zhal bu yin pas so// mag bzod pa 'og ma la// 'chi bdag gzhin rje'i gzugs rang byung du yod pas na de'i kha ru zhal du bstab nas dam sri gnan/ bar bya'o// bdud rtsi dri chen dri chu brang sems spangs pa dang khrag dang sha dang / lnga la
267a2(1): mchod pa'i rdzas/ so// bcu'i rkang la// gling bus byas pa ni ma mo mkha' 'gro bod cing lag pa'i rkang la mchog gi phur pos byas pas/ ni yul dgra bgegs gnyis bsgral/ ba'i rdzas yin no// pags pa zhing gi gsang gzhi la raka'i thig le dgu byas pa ni// bla
267a3(1): rer dbub cing thus pa gang la phyag byas pa ni/ nyu le bzlog/ skal tshigs la dbang mo mnyes pa'i sbyin 'asregs byas la// thal ba sku gdung dge bar ma mar gdab/ ste dge ba phyi skar bzhengs pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba nang sngar bzhengs pa ni ga rnams kyis
267a4(1): dpal chen 'khor bcas la mchod pa bya'o// bde ba gshegs pa mchod par bya// sha khrag ru ba mchod pas chu bsod nams kyi// tshogs sems nyid ltar bskyed nas gnas sbar bas 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis rdzogs sangs rgyas thob 'gyur/
267a5(1): yan chad rdo rje bam bsgrub pa'i cho ga bstan no// bcom ldan steng gi gnas mchog na/ 'og min gnas na bzhugs nas// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ byang chub sangs rgyas sa la 'god mdzad pa'i// sgrol ba gnas kyi// ting nge 'dzin
267a6(1): la snyoms par zhugs nas// thugs dam sems can tshe zad pa ngan song gsum nas 'don par mdzad pa'i/ phrin las 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// dang po phun sum tshogs pa bzhis sgrub pa'i gzhi bzung ba ni/ ston
267b1(1): khyen pa phun sum tshogs pa ni chos 'di shes pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'di'i las la mkhas pa dang / yo byad phun sum tshogs pa rdzas rnams tshang ba dang / dus phun sum tshogs pa shi nas zhag gsum las ma lon pa dang / de bzhi dang ldan pa'o// dang por
267b2(1): brtags pa'i gnas chen du// blang sbyang byin rlabs kun byas te// gnyis pa sa'i cho ga bya ba ni/ dang por sa brtag pa ni gnas dben pa'am shi ba'i gnas de nyid du/ sa snang ba mi dang / mi snang ba sa bdag klu la bslang ba dang / sa sbyang ba dang / las dang bya
267b3(1): pa ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa ni 'og min gnas sam lcang lo can gyi pho brang ngam lha gnas kyi 'og min nam/ bde ba can nam pad+ma can nam gsang ba'i gnas su byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gsum pa mtshams bcad pa ni/ 'khor ba'i gnas su log
267b4(1): par 'dren pa bskrad pa'i phyir na/ dpal chen po las khro bo mang po'i sprul pa byung nas phyogs mtshams ma lus par khro bo bkram nas phyogs skyong bcu la sogs char bcad de dra ba dang ra bas bsrung ba ni/ khro bo mang po bkram nas ni// bgegs rnams rdul bzhin
267b5(1): brlags shing khyer/ bar byed pa ste/ zung ba'i 'khor lo mtshams bcad pa'i man ngag gis bgegs rnams char bcad par bya'o// sngags mkhan bya ba kun byas te// sngags mkhan gyis kyi nang gi khrus byas nas pri zhu'i mgron dang yon tan gyi mgron dang lan
267b6(1): chags dang snying rje'i mgron la gtor ma btang ba ste/ gsum pa// phyogs skong bzhi pa lan chags kyi gtor ma btang ba ni/ lan chags gtang bar bya// bskang so tshangs pa nod phyir bod/ lnga pa bshags pa bya ba ni/ dam tshig nyams chags bskang ba'i phyir
268a1(1): na bshags pa bya// bskang gso'i cho ga bya/ dam tshig gso zhing tshangs pa nod// rdo rje'i gral du bod pa'i lung bya'o// dkyil 'khor bri ba ni gsum ste// dang po 'jug pa rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ dbus 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gru chad sgo dang lcags rir
268a2(1): bcas pa bris pa khro bo lha dgu dag go/ dkyil 'khor brgya pa tshul bzhin gzhag/ gsang mtshan gri ba ni shi ba de'i yi dam lha nyid ma nor bar byas la shing la bris pa lho sgor gzung // ma nor lha ni bsnyen byas la// gsang mtshan ma shes na slob dpon gyi spyi bo rnam snang
268a3(1): bsgom/ mgrin par snang mtha'/ snying gar mi bskyod pa lte bar rin 'byung gsang bar don grub bsgoms la de la bsnyen pa zhag gsum bya/ yang na brgya rtsa brgyad byas pa der ro bdag gis me tog 'phangs la// shi ba der bsgoms la me tog gang la phog pa lha'i gsang mtshan bris
268a4(1): la dkyil 'khor du dgod do// cha med sangs rgyas kun zhus nas// 'phangs la bsgom gtor gang phog bri// bum pa byin rlabs bram pa kun tu bzang mor byin rlabs/ rdzas ltar bsgom/ bram rdzas dang rgyan gyis brgyan no// bzang mos
268a5(1): brgyan// rdzas la dbye ba'i lha gnyis gcig/ las kyi bya bas bskyed cing dgod// dung por ram ka pa lar rdzas dri chab blugs la ye shes lha'i sngags mjug la ngan song gsum sbyong ba'i las sngags btags te bzlas/ khro bos tshe 'das dgug/ zhi ba bum
268a6(1): pa'i lhas sgrib pa sbyong bar bsams te/ bum par chu blugs pas lha gnyis don gcig par bya zhing bum pa ltar bskyed cing dkyil 'khor du dgod do// 'og min gyi gnas sangs rgyas zhi ba'i sku mthong bar bya ba'i phyir na dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan mda'i ra ba'i steng du ras bris bre ba
268b1(1): ni// mthong phyir rgyan du bre ba ni// las la zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bris lha'i sngags gnas gnas su bkod la gzugs brtan rdul tshon gyi steng nas kha zur du sgrub la dgab bo// ri mo bris pa'i gzhal med khang // dar gyi lding bu la sogs bri// gnas
268b2(1): sbar ba chos spu'i dkyil 'khor dar la yi ge a bris la zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du lding bur gdung la 'phyang du bzhug go// ting nge'i dkyil 'khor// gsal bar rdzogs pa dang byin phab la rdzas rnams la ye shes kyi byin brlab/ bstim mchod la/ rdzas dang khyad par
268b3(1): dudubyas// dam tshig dang thugs rjes ye shes kyi lha bkug la dam tshig lha'i sgrib pa dral ye shes la bstim/ pa la dam tshig pa dang ye shes pa gnyis su med par bslab par bya'o// de nas rdul tshon dang khro bo/ bsgrub pa dang mchod pa dang 'phags pa'i
268b4(1): tshogs// lung bzhin las rnams mthar phyin bya// las kyi bum chu bsgrub pa dang chos sgra a'i lding bu blta bas bslab pa bya sngags kyi stong tshig mchod pa dang 'phags pa'i tshogs mchod pa lung 'di'i yan man nas 'byung ba ltar mthar phyin par bya'o// skra/ bsgom
268b5(1): pa dang ngag dbyangs dang mchod pa dang bstod bskul nas ni/ gyi thun par rnams su tshe 'das de lam// rgyud lnga'i lam nas 'khyams pa de khro bos/ btsal sbal pas drag tu dgug/ ste mngal na gnas na dral nas song / sgo nga na gnas na bcag nas yang
268b6(1): bar do nas drang bar bya'o// de nas rgyal ba'i// sras su gyur par lam yang nas yang du bstan yang dang yang // rgyud drug lam nas rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor lhor bris la rigs drug nas pho nyas drag tu dgug drag por dgug/ gsal bas thugs
269a1(1): rje'i sems la gzud/ gshin gyi lus su gsal bar byas la ye shes lnga'i thugs rjes sems nyid mtshan byang la gzad do// lta bas bsgral du med lung dpog/ ltabs zag bcad pa ni sems nyid sme shi med pas yang dag par bsgral du med
269a2(1): par blta bas lung dbog go/ sangs rgyas/ gang yin yi dam lha'i sras su lung gsang mtshan gis bskyed// ting nge 'dzin gyi lha de rang gis bsgral bar byas la// tsit+ta la ni lhan ne bos// bsgral ba'i snying la lha de nyid bstim pa yi dam lha dang gnyis su med par
269a3(1): byas la// rang nyid khro bo'i phyag tu/ thabs dang shes rab kyi mda' gzhu thogs la snying gi sras su bskyed pa'i lha mde'u'i rtses blangs la/ ma gos pa'i// gru gsum rnam thar sgo gsum du gzhug pa de blangs te cho ga dang sngags dang phyag rgyas 'og min du 'phang ngo // pas ni
269a4(1): bsgral bar bya// lung bcas sngags dang phyag rgya yi/ sems nyid sangs rgyas kyi sras de 'og min du rdo rje sems dpa'/ yab yum sbyor ba'i sras su 'phangs la btang ngo // gnas su phaT kyis 'phang // bo b+hi tsit+ta la sogs dbang // gral
269a5(1): bkod longs spyod smon lam bskul// sras de yang slar mtshan byang la phab nas/ gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur la gsang sngags rdo rje'i gral du bkod la tshogs kyi longs spyod drangs la sgrub pa byed cing sems don mdzad par smon lam gdab/ 'gro don la
269a6(1): bskul bar bya'o// sbyin bsreg bya ba'i dgos pa// las kyi bag chags gtan sbrang phyir// ye shes kyi me dpung 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin la// tshad med bzhi'i thugs rje'i sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs nas// rang byung ye shes kyi me yis nyon
269b1(1): mongs pa'i bag chags bsreg mdzad phyir/ na sbyin bsreg bya ba ste// mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor ni chos kyis dbyings nyid gru gsum zla kham mu khyud 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa gru chad sgo dang bcas pa'o// gzhal yas khang // rim pa'i snod dang
269b2(1): dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dang ral gri rnon po dang rgyal mtshan bre/ dang ba dan dang mda' dang dar la sogs pas/ dkyil 'khor ni sgrib pa gcod pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad nang / du// zhal nyid hom khung 'bar ba ru/ lte ba gru
269b3(1): gsum brus pa nyid khro bo'i bsreg khang na/ sbyin sreg gi yam shing spangs pa nyid// lha rnams yam shing nyid du spungs/ mchod rdzas// dngos dang tshogs kyi yo byad mchod pa 'bral ba'i phyir dgram// 'khor ba'i// bshal zag byed pa yi bgegs rnams
269b4(1): stangs stabs kyis mtshams/ gcad par bya ba dang // mchod rdzas dang dkyil 'khor rgyan bkod pa rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ sreg khang gzhal yas khang du// rdzogs pa'i byas la lung gis bskal te lha bskyed pa dang yam shing ltar bskyed la yam shing
269b5(1): yang yang bsnan byas la// mchod rdzas dang bsreg rdzas so nyid du 'bul ba'am/ tshe 'das dngos kyi lha la 'bul bar bsams la/ de/ mthun pa'i lha tshe 'das kyi yi dam gang yin pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor la bkram ste dbul bar byas nas/ dani
269b6(1): las kyi rim pa sbyin bsreg bya ba ni// ting 'dzin bskyed pa'i rim bzhin bskyed pa dang / phrin// las la 'jug pa'i tshul ni snga ma gong du sgrol ba'i cho ga bzhin/ me long la mtshan byang / khrus byas yang na dngos su bya/ yang na lha la me long la spu khrus
270a1(1): gsol mtshan brang dngos su bskyed las dang sbyar ba'i/ dbang bskur smon btab nas/ de nas/ dur khrod kyi shing las byas pa'i yam shing me sbar te/ bsreg rdzas rnams la bar chad 'byung bas na 'am
270a2(1): yang na// las kyi sgrib pa ngan pas bar du gcod pa'am bgegs la yang mtshams bcad la// bsreg khang gi wa dang gsal gdab pa rdzogs par bya rang bzhin pa spyan drangs bstim la sogs/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs brtan pa gal tshe'o// mchod rdzas
270a3(1): bram ril du/ cig car bar bsreg khang du bzhag la 'bral lugs/ rim gyis mchod pa ni/ gnyis 'bral lo// lha so so'i bsreg rdzas la mtshan byang du bris la 'bral ba'o// bsregs rdzas dang ming byang bris la dbul te// so so'i tha dad pa lung mthun rdzas gang
270a4(1): 'byor pas rnams 'bul// rdzas kyis sgrib gcod nyung dkar gyis sgrib pa rgun bcad/ lha so so'i sngags kyis sgrib pa bcad/ lha so so'i zhabs drang du skye ba'i smon lam gdab/ bar bya'o// de yan chad gzhung don no// tshogs mchod byas la tshogs zan gshin
270a5(1): la zas skal du/ gtad pa'i phyir na rdo rje'i gral du bod gdung / ba ni/ lung a nu'i// lam 'phar nas thar pa'i phyir na rdzogs pa chen po'i tshig gis bskul nas mthar chos sku skye ba med cing dri ma med pa la phyin par smon lam btab phyung la// lhag ma
270a6(1): gtor ma cha gsum la cha gcig la bshags sbyang ba bya cha gcig smon lam gdab cing gter du sba/ dmod bcol cha gcig mkha' 'gros bskyang // gtang rag gsol zhing mi zad pa'i gter la longs spyod pa'i phyir/ gter du s+tha/ sems can gyi don du/
270b1(1): bsod nams spel smon lam gdab cing slob ma rnams kyi tshe byin bsrung / dam tshig gi// dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing ru lu'i brtag pa ltar lus bsrung go bgo/ sems can thams cad kyi don du// las kyi 'bras bu bla na med pa'i byang chub bsngo ba
270b2(1): bya// dus gnas bar pa'i gang zag dang bdag dang slob ma rnams gsum du mi 'bral bar 'grogs pa'i smon lam gdab/ de ltar du// gdung dang rdzas rtags bsdus nas kyang // rus pa dang thal ba brtags la/ gdung byung na// rgyal mtshan gyi
270b3(1): rtser mo btags la mchod pa dang bstod la// rus pa'am thal ba la/ tsha tsha btab la lha'i sgra phyag rgya byas la 'gro don bskul/ bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i gal po las bsgral bar bya ba'i brtag
270b4(1): pa ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen pos// 'khor 'das kyi chos ma lus pa la longs spyod pas na'o// rgyal po sbyin pa'i rgyal srid la longs spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas
270b5(1): rim par bgrod pa 'di gsungs so// dper na rgyal po rgyal sar bton nas rgyal phrad la gcer gtad pas rin po che sna bdun la longs spyod pa sar slob ma yang bla mas gdan sar 'don par dbang bskur ba mnga' gsol lo// spyir dbang la bslar grags gnyis
270b6(1): bsgrub dbang dang bskur ba dang / dbang gzhu ba'o// dang po ni/ bla ma dang mched kun gyis bsgrubs nas grub pa'i nub tha ma la dbang bskur ba dang dngos grub len pa'o// gnyis pa ni zhag gsum ste/ dang pos cho ga bar ma lta gon tha ma dbang bskur ro// rtogs pa'i blo can
271a1(1): de dag gis// bla ma mnyes par bya ba'i don du/ shes rab kyis mnyes te// rtogs pa'i blo che dang ldan pas bla na med pa'i byang chub sems la dang ba bskyed par 'gyur ba'o// des dbang thams cad kyi gzhi ma lta bur gyur pas dang por gces pa min
271a2(1): na// 'bring gis ni rang gi zag tha ma la thal nas bla ra'i tha ba ma lus par byas nas/ ba mang ngan tshe rags pas brus nas 'bral ba'o// ba ma thas kyis mnyes te bla ma la rdzas kyi rnam pa rtse ba dzin pa cha dang yang ba rin po che la sogs te/ tsa dang glang ba la sogs pal// srog
271a3(1): lus man chad rdzas kyi rnam// der yang ma zad ste rang gi rgyal srid dang / bu dang chung ma nor gyi rgyan dang / nor gyi dbyig rang la gces pa dang / bla ma'i thugs dang 'thad pa rnams dbul ba'o// bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dbul// de ltar bla ma de yang rab shes
271a4(1): rab kyis mnyes par bya ste/ shes rab chen chos ma lus pa shes pas/ sems can ma lus pa'i bla mar 'gyur bas shes rab gtso che ba dang / 'bring rang lus kyi mnyes par bya ste bla ma'i bya ba ma lus par 'grub par bya ba dang / tha ma nor rdzas kyis mnyes te rang la gces pa dang /
271a5(1): bla ma'i thugs dang 'thad pa rnams dbul lo// dngos grub 'dod par gsol ba gad ba// dngos grub thams cad kyi rtsa ba dbang bskur yin pas dbang zhu ba yang chos sgo dbang gis 'byed pa yin la/ dbang sgo yon gyis 'byed pa yin pas yon phral rang dbang gang
271a6(1): 'dod pa de la gsol ba gdab bo// shar nas rdo rje shugs kyis 'degs// dang por rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'jug/ dpal dang ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha mchog/ rang bzhin gsang ba'i lcang lo can// bdud rtsis bkang ba tshe mchog
271b1(1): ste// thams cad dbang gi rang bzhin la// bdag nyid dbus su 'dug nas ni// rang byung ye shes lha rnams la// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub mchog/ phyi ma'i dus la mi gzhes par// da lta nyid du bdag la
271b2(1): stsol// dkyil 'khor yi dam lha mchod nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// de nas slob mar gsol ba gdab// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// bang rim gsum pa dag la stegs
271b3(1): bcas shing // zla kham dmar po'i steng du dbang nod ma// mar me dgug pa dag gis mdangs phyung nas// b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan dag la tha tshig bsgo// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnams// bdag
271b4(1): cag sgrub mchog rnams la stsal du gsol/ zhes brjod gar gyi bro yis bskor// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi bdag po ni// ye shes sku mchog rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rig pa byang chub sems kyi me tog
271b5(1): 'di// gnyis med rig pa'i dbyings su thim nas kyang // bdag lus bem po dus 'dir sbyang ba dang // dpal chen skur gyur dngos grub stsal du gsol// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// dur
271b6(1): khrod rdzas kyi me tog bor nas kyang // skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di ru 'dus pa la// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dur khrod rdzas kyi me tog
272a1(1): 'di dor bas// sngon tshe bsgrubs pa'i lha ni gang yin pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// byang chub rdo rje'i lam nas drangs nas
272a2(1): kyang // gzhung bzhin bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor khyed rnams la// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub sbyin par bya// zhes brjod dbang rim steng du bzhag/ dang po dkyil 'khor bya ba bstan no// de yang bla ma dbus su bzhugs la slob ma
272a3(1): phyophyogs phyogs nas phyogs bzhir 'dug nas phyogs rdzas su dbang bskur bar bya'o// dbus su byang sems maN+Dal bya// shar du dri chen maN+Dal zlum// lho ru sha chen gru bzhi nyid// nub tu rak+ta zla kham la// byang du dri chu gru gsum
272a4(1): bya// slob dpon de yang slob dpon nyid bal gyi 'bol snyan nam/ nyi zla pad+ma 'am/ gzungs ma mtshan ldan la bzhugs pa'o// dgos pa ni/ stan bden lus bde des sems bde/ des na sgo gsum gyi grub pa'i mtha' gcig pa'o// ji bzhin stan bder gnas// kr-i
272a5(1): ya bas phyag na rdo rje'i tshul du dbang bskur ba dang / yo ga bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshul du dbang bskur ba dang // gsang sngags nang pa thabs kyi rdo rje theg pa rdo rje'i tshul du dbang bskur ba dang gsum las 'di ni phyi ma'o// rdo rje'i tshul du dbang dag
272a6(1): sbyin// chos dbyings yum gyi bum pa na/ rdzas bum pa/ lha sangs rgyas kun 'od du zhu ba/ bskur gnas dbu'i steng / bstim gnas lus spyir bstim/ nus pa bag chags la 'dus pa 'khru bar byed do// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor pho brang bzhugs// gnyis
272b1(1): med byang chub sems brtags chus// spyi nas bstim zhing dbang bskur bas// lus la sangs rgyas gtams par shog/ ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa a// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen tshe/ rdzas dbu rgyan/ bskur gnas mgo// bstim
272b2(1): gnas kun gzhi/ nus pa rigs lnga dang ye shes lnga'o// dpag tu med pa'i 'od dang ldan// rigs mchog phyag rgya lnga ldan pas/ khams gsum bdag por dbang bskur ro// oM rat+na mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa swa maM tAM traM traM/ rdzas dbu rgyan
272b3(1): dang bskur gnas dbu thun la dar sna lnga'i cod pan bcings nas dbul/ bstim gnas kun gzhi nus pa ma shes snga'o// dbu rgyan mi 'gyur mnga' brnyes pas// chos kyi rgyal srid chen po'i dbang / khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug che// chos
272b4(1): kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA gu h+ya rat+na mu ku Ta a b+hi She ka hUM/ rdo rje dril bu rig pa 'dzin/ rdzas rdo rje dril ba/ slar gnas lag pa/ lha med de dbyings ye shes kyi phyag mtshan gyi dbang / nus pa dbyings ye shes rtogs
272b5(1): pa'o// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// thugs mchog rtogs pa'i rig pa'i dbang // mya ngan 'das pa'i chos la spyod// thabs la mkhas pas sprul pa'i sras// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par dbang bskur
272b6(1): ro// nyon mongs 'joms pa'i rdo rje dang / rdzas rdo rje dril bu gong ma nyid gnas lag pa g.yas g.yon nam rdo rje ltag khung / dril bu rna ltag g.yon du bzur/ rdo rje snang ba mtha' yas/ dril bu don grub bo// rig pa'i dbang lnga ni/ bum pa mi bskyod pa/ cod pan rin 'byung / rdo
273a1(1): rje snang mtha'/ dril bu don grub/ mig rnam snang ngo // chos sgra sgrogs pa'i dril bu yis// de ring khyed la dbang bskur bas// thabs dang shes rabs 'brel bar shog/ oM pra dz+nyA sa ma yo ga badz+ra sid+d+hi g+haN+De a b+hi
273a2(1): Shiny+tsa hUM a/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis rlabs pa'i dbang bstan/ rdzas oM ya hUM bris pa/ lha rnam snang mtha' mi bskyod pa gnas spyi mgrin sring ga bstim gnas lus ngag yid la/ nus pa su gsung thugs rdo rje ltar mi bad rgyan gyi 'khor lor gyur to// dpal ldan rdo rjes sku
273a3(1): 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje'i sku ru mdzad du gsol// oM ka ya badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ dpal ldan rdo rje gsung 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum
273a4(1): bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje'i gsung du mdzad du gsol// oM bA ka badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa AHdpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin
273a5(1): gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje'i thugs su mdzad du gsol// oM tsit+ta badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsum mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs
273a6(1): nas su// sku gsung thugs su mdzad du gsol// bai ro tsa na A~M/ a mi de ba hrIHbadz+ra sa ta hUM/ 'di ni rin chen phreng ba ste// rdzas nas kyi phreng ba/ lha badz+ra he ru ka/ gnas mgo/ bstim pa kun gzhi/ mtshungs ldan a ba d+hU tI'i rtsa mdud/ nus
273b1(1): pa gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin// rin chen rgyu las byas pa yi// byang chub yan lag phreng ba ste// 'phags mchod 'gro don byed pa la// bsam pa yid bzhin sgrub pa dang // bar chad med par dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra rat+na
273b2(1): mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ mtshan ma'i spros bral b+han+ta'i rdzas mchog 'di// rdzas b+har+b+ha dpal chen po 'khor dang bcas pa/ gnas lus la lha bkod pa'i dus su// bstim gnas rnam shes tshogs brgyad/ nus pa'i mthu sangs rgyas kun gyi sgra sung thugs dbyer med
273b3(1): par thob// sngon gyi skyes mchog bsgrub pa'i rdzas mchog 'di// skal ldan rnam 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// dpal chen sku gsung dngos grub thob par shog/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ badz+ra kro d+hi shwa rI s+t+waM/ badz+ra ka pA
273b4(1): la/ d+harma kA ya/ nirma Na ka ya/ sam b+ho ga ka ya/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ bag chags nyes pa'i skyon bral zhing // 'khor ba'i nyes pas mi gos pa'i/ rdzas dar dmar po dang mthing ga/ gnas mag// mtshungs ldan la lan dang ra sa na/ rdorje
273b5(1): sems dpa' dang snang mtha'/ bstim gnas kun gzi/ nus pa chos kyi rgyal srid thob pa'o// ye shes lnga ldan cod pan 'di/ khyod la dbang mchog bskur bar bya// oM badz+ra ga phaT laM ba na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHrdzas dri chen bu ram la ru lu byas pa/
273b6(1): bskur gnas skye/ lha rnam snang du rab gnas byas pa/ bstim gnas gzugs/ nus pa chos kyi dbyings so/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sgrub rdzas dri chen 'dis// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rtogs
274a1(1): gyur nas// de bzhin rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob gyur cig/ rdzas byang sems bag phye dang ril bu byas pa/ bskur gnas lce/ lha rdo rje sems dpa'/ bstim gnas khams gsum gsal byed rnam shes la/ nus pa me long ye shes so// skye
274a2(1): med byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di// dkar la dag pas gnyis med byang chub sems/ skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// rdzas sha chen ka ra dang sbyar
274a3(1): nas btags pa 'am/ sgog pa dang bca' lga dang sbyar nas ril bu byas pa/ bskur gnas lce/ bstim gnas lus kyi tshor ba/ lha rin 'byung nus pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so// ma rig khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// dug gsum bsgral
274a4(1): ba'i rdzas mchog sha chen 'di// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// rin chen rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob gyur cig/ gsung mchog dbang gi rdzas mchog rak+ta 'di// rdzas pad+ma rak+ta star bu bag phye dang bsres
274a5(1): gnas kyi// bstim gnas 'du shes/ sa 'od dpag med// ye shes ma mo brtog pa'o// chags med bde bar byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// pad+ma rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob gyur
274a6(1): cig/ rdzas dri chu shing tsha dang ri lu byas pa bskur gnas lce la/ lha don grub/ bstim gnas 'du byed/ nus pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rtogs so// las mchog bsgrub pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'di// phyi nang gsos gyur bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin
274b1(1): 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// las kyi rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdzas kha T+wAM ga la zod pa'i Ta ma ru btags nas sam/ gnas g.yas su kha T+wAM ga g.yon
274b2(1): du dril ba/ brtsam gnas lag pa/ don thabs shes gnyis su med par bstan nus so// kha T+wAM ga ni thabs kyi sku// shes rab DA ma ru yi sgra// zabs dang shes rab dbang bskur bas// stong nyid snying rje'i dbang thob shog/ oM d+hA tu ga ru
274b3(1): Na.a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdzas gtso bo'i mar me/ bslar gnas thugs/ bstim gnas kun gzhi/ mtshungs ldan snying la yod// ye shes dgur byin brlab/ nus pa ye shes dgu'i snang ba 'char ro// dpal chen yab yum gsang ba'i thugs bsdus pa// skye med
274b4(1): dbyings las ye shes me gsal bas// sku gsung lhun rdzogs dag pa'i mar me 'di// kun gzhi gnas 'gyur spyan dgu'i ye shes sbyin// lus ngag yid la gnas pa'i bag chags rnams// sgrib pa phyir bsal ye
274b5(1): shes gsal bar shog/ oM ma hA dI pa A lo ke A b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i ra swa rdzas bum pa yin te bdud rtsi'i bum pa/ bskur gnas mgo// bstim gnas lus kyi khams bdud rtsi lnga/ lha rigs lnga/ nus mthu khams bdud rtsi lnga sangs rgyas
274b6(1): lnga ston cing 'char ro// ya na ni// srid gsum dbang sdud longs spyod chen po'i rkyen// rang byung dag pa'i sgrub rdzas bdud rtsi lnga// rgyud lnga rtsad gcod skye shi med pa'i dbang // grub nas ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin
275a1(1): 'dis// rigs mchog rgyal ba lnga ru dbang bskur sbyin// oM AHhUM swA hA sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta A be sha ku ru a d+hiSh+Tha swa maM/ thugs rje'i ngang nyid zhi ba'i rang bzhin las// rdzas phul ba/ bslar gnas pa dang /
275a2(1): sprul pa'i khro zung / bstim gnas rig pa/ mtshungs ldan rang gi lus la rkang pur yod pa rnams/ nus pa dgra bgegs 'joms pa'o// ma g.yos chos kyi sku mchog sku gsung thugs mnga' ba// sdug bsngal log par 'khyams pa'i sems can
275a3(1): rnams// thugs rje mi phyed dbyings su sgrol mdzad pa// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen bshig pa'i phyir/ khro rgyal 'bar ba'i byin rlabs dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra kI la ya d+ha rod b+ha ba a d+hiSh+ThA na hUM/ khro rgyal
275a4(1): yang yum gsang ba'i thugs ka nas/ rdzas nyung dkar/ bskur gnas mgul du nyung dkar gyi thum pa gdags/ lha sprul pa mang po sbrul/ bstim gnas pa spu'i bu gar bstim/ nus pa go cha ste bgegs dang log 'dren gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// thal byed saR+Sha
275a5(1): pa yi mtshan char ldan// bar chad bgegs kyi tshogs 'joms sgrub rdzas 'di// dbang bskur bsrungs pas mi tshugs go char ldan// nyung dkar rgyal pos byin rlabs sha rI ram// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la
275a6(1): dbang bskur sbyin// au a skad ta saR+Sha pa a b+hi Shiny+tsa ku ru rak+Sha haM// rdzas ro bsreg pa'i thal chen/ rgyan gyi dbang yin pas lha med/ byin rlabs chos sku'i dgongs pa bya/ gnas dpral bar thal chen gyi tshom bu gsum gdab/ nus pas ging chen bco brgyad bran
275b1(1): du 'khol nus so// lhag pa'i thal chen mtshan ma 'di// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du// ging chen kun dang gcig pa dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po bskyed pa dang // dbang chen thabs
275b2(1): kyis bsdu ba'i phyir// 'di ni bdag nyid chen po'i rtags// 'di ni sngon gyi dam tshig ste// grub pa'i dam rdzas chen po'i dbang // rtags kyi dbang rdzas chen po sbyin// oM hUM b+ha smi sid+d+hi a b+hi Shiny+tsa ku ru hUM// rdzas raH/
275b3(1): byin brlabs thugs rje chags par byin rlabs/ gnas sna rtse dang mthar chos gnyis su thig le bya/ nus pa ma mo mkha' 'gro thams cad dbang du sdud par nus so// thugs rje'i dbang gis chags pa'i rak+ta ni// pad+ma rak+ta dpa' mo rnal 'byor
275b4(1): ma'i// dur khrod mnga' mdzad ma dang mkha' 'gro rnams// ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i dbang thob shog/ oM DA ki ni ma hA rak+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM hUM b+h+yo/ kun rdzob snang ba don dam bcud kyis khyab// rdzas mi'i zhag chen// byin
275b5(1): rlas don dam skye med du byin gyis brlab// gnas khang 'gram/ nus pa don dam gyi chur rtogs so// bcud len zhag gis nyon mongs za ba 'dul// rtogs tshad 'bul ba'i lang+ga kun dang gcig/ chos nyid dbyings la gnas pa'i
275b6(1): dbang thob shog/ oM d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he ma hA mAM sa a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ dbyings las ye shes sgrogs byad gab pa'i gsung // rdzas rdu'u chung / bskur gnas lag pa byin brlabs dbyings las rigs pa'i sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlab/ nus pa ma mo dang
276a1(1): dbang mo dbang du byed cing bdud dang mu stegs kyi bar chod zil gyis gnon cing klad pa tshal bar 'gems so// dam la sdud cing pha rol zil gyis gnon// ye shes dbyings su sgrol mdzad mchod pa'i gter// skal ldan rnal
276a2(1): 'byor 'di la dbang bskur sbyin// au ka pa lA g+haM De hoHa b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ 'jig rten 'di na srid pa'i zhal zas la// rdzas 'jig rten gyi zhal zas tshogs tshad// gnas lce la/ bstim gnas ngag la/ nus pa 'jig rten gyi zhal zas gang la gsol
276a3(1): yang byin rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam lnga mi zad gter// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi// yid bzhin 'dod dgu'i gter la dbang sbyin no// oM lo ka a li u li a b+hi Shiny+tsa
276a4(1): mAM// rdzas ni 'jam des zhes bya ste mar/ bskur gnas lce/ bstim gnas lus kun gzhi/ nus pa rgud la zhi gnas 'char ba'o// mar ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// dgra bgegs thams
276a5(1): cad zhi bar gyur nas kyang // byang chub sems kyi don dam rtogs par shog/ IM sarbi sa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdzas 'ol skom/ bskur gnas lce/ bstim gnas kun gzhi/ nus pas sems can gyi don byed cing ting nge 'dzin gyi nus pa mthu dang ldan par
276a6(1): 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gal phyis dbang bskur bas/ khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang // 'gro ba'i sems can nyon mongs gnas su 'joms/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'i mthu ldan
276b1(1): shog/ au b+hak+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// rdzas 'chang / bslar gnas lce/ nus pa khams gsum dbang du sdud/ bstim gnas kun gzhi la bstim pa'o// 'bru bcud kun gyi dza gad dpa' bo yis// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// 'gro
276b2(1): ba thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang // thams cad bran bzhin dbang du sdud par shog/ AM ma hA su ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ khams gsum dbang sdud zla khram dbang gi zas// rdzas zla khram/ bskur gnas ste/ nus pa khams gsum ma
276b3(1): lus pa dbang du sdud par nus so// yang na rdzas zla khram/ bskur gnas ngag la/ bstim gnas mgul/ nus pa khams gsum gyi ma mo dbang du sdud pa'o// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs
276b4(1): te/ longs spyod chen po'i rten du 'gyur bar shog/ au ki lA Da a[:]b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// rdzas gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya/ lha 'dod yon lha mo rnams/ bstim gnas dbang po lnga/ bskur gnas lag pa la sogs pa/ nus pa 'dod yon lnga la ma rmongs par 'char
276b5(1): ro// gzugs sogs bud med lha mo'i tshogs// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan dag/ chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan yin pas// dga' mgur spyod pa'i dbang bskur ro// na mo ha ra na gu Na pany+tsa a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ skye shi med pa
276b6(1): rdo rje tshe yi dbang / rdzas tshe zan/ bskur gnas mgo// stim gnas snying / lha tshe dpag med pa gsang ba'i yum bzhis bskor ba/ bsnyen pa dang rab gnas lha de rnams zhu ba'o// nus pa tshe ring bar 'gyur ba'o// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// tshe
277a1(1): ring nad med phun sum tshogs nas kyang // dus gsum rgyal ba kun kyang 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo sbyin// de nyid rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes sku// skye shi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bral bar
277a2(1): shog/ oM badz+ra A yu She a b+hi Shiny+tsa tAM/ de nas gzungs ma mtshan ldan te// yum skye ba dag pa rang rgud kyi rigs bzang ba la skye 'bras legs pa dang / spyod pas dag pa chos shes shing dbang thob nas rtsa rlung 'brongs pa/ shugs kyis yab rdo rje slob dpon
277a3(1): yang thabs lam gyi man ngag la mkhas pa ste/ gnas pa rtsa dang / grub pa sngags dang khams bdud rtsi dang snying po rlung gi gdams ngag la mkhas par 'gyur ba des ni/ slob ma la dbang bskur na slob ma gsang dbang la dad pa'am/ shes rab kyi ye shes kyi dbang la dad pa/ bde ba
277a4(1): chen po'i dbang la mos pa/ gang yin pa de la slob ma dbang ji ltar 'dod pa ltar sbyar bar bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon chen po yi// g.yon phyogs gnas la tshul bzhin du// gsang dbang shes rab bde chen po// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du
277a5(1): sbyar// de bIr byin gyis brlab pa yang // gar mkhan tshul 'dra sgyu ma'i rgya// dper na gar mkhan gyi lus gcig la gar sna tshogs byed pa'am/ rgyu ma mkhan gyis rde'u dang shing bu la rta glang du sprul pa dang 'dra bar// yum lnga gnas lngar gsal ba
277a6(1): yang // de la 'ja' tshon bzhin du gsal// yum gyi spyi bor sangs rgyas spyan/ mgrin par gos dkar mo// snying gar dbyings phyug ma/ lte bar mA ma kI/ gsang bar sgrol ma lnga bsams la rgyu de rnams nam mkha'i 'ja' ltar gsal bar bsgom mo/ kha dog ma 'dres
277b1(1): par yang gsal lo// de bzhin du shugs kyis yab kyi gnas lngar yang rigs lnga'i yab lnga bsgom par bya'o// yab yum rol pa'i byang chung / sems// des na bla ma dang yab yum gnyis sbyor ba bya/ yum gyi rigs lnga dang yab kyi rigs lnga yang sbyar bar bya'o// 'dod
277b2(1): chags ye shes gsal ba'i phyir// yab yum sbyor ba byas pa'i byang sems kyi 'dod chags kyi 'od kyis sems can tshim par byas/ sangs rgyas mchod nas/ rigs lnga ye shes kyi sku gsal bar spyan drangs la// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rigs
277b3(1): lnga mdun gyi nam mkha' la yab lum sbyor ba mdzad pas bya chub 'od 'bar ba sna tshogs pa sprin ltar 'khrigs nas// thim pa'i rgyal mor byin gyis brlabs// bdag yab yum la thim pas bag chags sbyangs lus kyi rigs lnga yab yum 'od du zhu nas sgrib pa dag/ nam
277b4(1): mkha'i rigs lnga la thim pas/ yum kro d+hi shwa rI khro mo'i rgyal mor byin gyis brlab bo// yab yum bsnol mar bskul bya ba// dang po yab kyi brdas bskul/ de nas yum gyi brdas bskul bar bya ste/ 'khor gyi sbyor ba mi rig pas na gsang ba'o// ye shes dam tshig
277b5(1): chen po yis// yab ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin dpal gyi slar gsal ba la sum chags pa'i dam chog las mi 'bral bar sgra la 'brel ba ste// bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon te// yab kyis sa ma ya ho/ zhes brjod pas dam tshig la dgyes sam zhes brdas
277b6(1): man/ yum gyis sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas dam tshig dus la bab po zhes bskul nas/ rA ga yA mi/ chags pa'i bde ba 'dod dam/ rA ga hoHsa chags pa la dgyes so zhes bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon nas/ yab kyis yum gyi b+ha ga byin brlab/ yum gyis yab kyi ling+ga byin
278a1(1): brlab bo// mkha' gsang bsnol mar byin rlabs pa// pad+ma rin chen ldan byas nas// sum gyi b+ha ga a las pad+ma 'dab brgyad par byin brlab pa dang / yab kyi gsang ba rin po che lta bu 'dod pa 'byung ba'i rdo rjer byin gyis brlab
278a2(1): // sbyor ba'i byang sems babs pa ni// yab kyi sgra gtsug chos kyi dbyings na khra ba bde ba'i mchog 'byung ba de yang smra ba bde chen nas khu ba ma shes kyi 'od du shar nas skal tshigs kyi rta bzhud nas 'byung ba yang / rang rig pa'i ye shes bde gsal me rtog pa ye shes
278a3(1): kyi thams dang ldan pa 'od du shar nas// dbyings kyi bde mchog 'byung ba de// rang rig ye shes de la 'od// bram gyi b+ha ga la babs pa'i dus na yang / bde stong du gsal ba'i nyams ni spong pa nam mkha' 'dra// ji bzhin mkha' la gsal ba
278a4(1): dag/ dri med nyi ma'i 'od pas 'tsher// gsal ba nam mkha' la nyi ma shar ba 'dra ste/ nyi ma la sprin med pa ltar 'dod chags tha mal gyi dri ma med par ye shes nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'tsher ba gsal lo// byang chub sems ni kun tu dag/ nyi ma ltar gsal bas
278a5(1): dri ma brang / nam mkha' ltar stong pas zab pa chub/ sems bde stong gi rnam par gsal bas kun tu dag par gnas so// sgrib sbyang mchod don bya ba yang // yum gyi mkha' nas byang sems sgro bsdu bya ba ni/ 'od 'phros pas 'dod khams gnas ris nyi shu dang / gzugs
278a6(1): khams gnas rigs bcu bdun/ gzugs med skye mched mu bzhis bsdus pa'i stong gsum kun 'das par 'od kyis khyab pas/ khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang // ma lus stong gsum dang khams gsum srid gsum gyi sems can rnams la snying rjes khyab
278b1(1): byas te// 'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi rgyal ba la 'dod chags kyi mchod pas rab tu mnyes par byas nas// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzud// byang chub sems kyi thig le nyid sems can gyi dga' ba dang sangs
278b2(1): rgyas kyi bde ba yang bsdus nas 'od 'dus te thog ma lum gyi b+ha ga'i thig le la gzad do// yum gyi b+ha ga'i thig le la phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sbyor ba byas pa'i ye shes kyi khu ba'i bcud thim nas/ des slob bu la dbang bskur bar bya'o// ye shes khu ba'i
278b3(1): bcud thim nas// yab yum gnyis lhan cig skyes pa'i khu ba ni/ dngos po lhan cig skyes pa/ bde stong ni rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni// de dag yab yum gyi khu ba des ni gsang sngags gsang ba'i dngos grub
278b4(1): chen po yin te mchog thun mong ma lus par 'di las byung / pas/ de la/ sku gsang ba'i dbang gsung shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thugs bde ba chen po'i dbab dang gsum mo/ dbang slob ma des// gang 'dod pa de sbyin te// ji ltar 'dod par nan tan
278b5(1): bya// gsang dbang 'ad nan rlung bag sam na/ gas rab sa gas kyi dbang 'dad na cad kyil 'bang brnas bcan nas kyin/ bang bcan pa' dbang 'ad nam zag gang gzums brtan nam spyan na// sme med byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di// dza#
278b6(1): sems bu ram dang ri lu byas pa'o// bskur gnas slob ma'i lce la bzhag pa'o// lha rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// bstim gnas khams gsum gsal byed rnam shes so// nus pa me long lta bu'i ye shes lhan cig skyes pa'i bzhi pa'o// da kar la dag pas gnyis med byang chub
279a1(1): sems// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yab yum sbyor ba'i mchod pa 'dis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mnyes// sangs
279a2(1): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mchod pas mnyes pas thabs che bas thabs lam yin pa dang sems can gyi// sdug bsngal du gyur pa lam du byas pas sdug bsngal/ las grol bas lam du gyur te thabs che ba dang ldan// theg pa chen po'i nang nas zab mo sngags
279a3(1): la rab dga' bas// 'dod chags 'ching ba las grol nas byang chub lam du mdzad/ cing 'gyur ba dang // sbyor ba'i mchod pa thabs lam du song ste mdor na yon tan mtha' dag dang ldan pas/ sbyor ba'i mchod pa dang du blang ngo //
279a4(1): mchog/ dbang thob mdzes pa slob dpon yon tan ldan pas na/ slob ma snod ldan la dbang byin nas skyes bu la rin po ches brgyan pa dang dra bar slob ma de yon tan dang ldan par gyur pas na mdzes pa'o/ de dag gis// dul ba'i sems su bzhag nas
279a5(1): ni// de'i dus na lus ngag yid gsum dul te spyod lam dul zhing khrel 'dzem che bar gyur pa'o// dam tshig chen po bde bar gnas// bsnyen bslab kyi dus su bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang / bslab pa'i dam tshig ste bsrung ba'i dam tshig ni/ le lo gnyid dbang du mi gtang
279a6(1): bab dang / slob dpon gyi bka' khyad par du gnyan par bya ba dang / spyod lam yangs pa mched lcam du tshig gi mtshon ma shor ba dang / dam rdzas la blo yi khu 'phrig med par spyad pa dang / lha gsal bar bya zhing snying po bar chad med par bya ba dang / khams gsum yongs sgrol srid
279b1(1): gsum dbang du bsdus te chos nyid kyi dam tshig chen po la gnas par bya'o// dbang don bsgom pa sgrub nyams su blang // bum pa'i dbang don bsgom pa dang / gsang dbang gi dbang don bsgom pa dang / shes rab ye shes kyi dbang don bsgom pa dang / bde ba chen po'i
279b2(1): dbang don bsgom par bya ba'o// de yang bum pa'i dbang rig pa'i dbang lnga'o// gsang sngags zab mo'i dbang gsum mo// bum dbang bskyed rim dbyings kyi lam// lam bskyed pa'i rim pa dbyings rtsa'i lam ste/ gsang ba me rlung gi dkyil 'khor du don yod grub pa
279b3(1): yum bsgom pa dang / lte ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du rin 'byung yab yum bsgom pa dang / snying ga chos kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum bsgom pa dang / mgrin pa longs spyod kyi dkyil 'khor du snang ba mtha' yas yab yum bsgom pa dang / spyi bo bde ba chen
279b4(1): po'i dkyil 'khor du rnam snang yab yum bsgom pa dang / de yang rtsa la gnad du bsnun pas sku dbyings gsal ba dang / khams bdud rtsi la gnad du bsnun pas rnam pa bde ba dang / yig 'bru la gnad du bsnan pas rang bzhin stong pa dang / rlung la gnad du bsnan pas ngo bo zung du
279b5(1): 'jug pa dang / spang bya nyon mongs snga ma spangs par thob pa 'bras bra ye shes lnga 'thob par byas pas bsgom pa'o// gsang lha snying mgrin spyi bo ru// las rin rdor chos rnam pa dang // yum dang bcas sgra dbyibs rnam pa bde rang bzhin stong nga ba zang
279b6(1): du 'jug/ ngo bo nyid gsum blta ba ni// snang dang stong dang zung du 'jug/ log bral ngo bo gcig pa dang // snang phyogs kyi ngo bo nyid yul las 'char/ stong phyogs kyi ngo bo nyid lus las 'char/ zung 'jug ngo bo nyid sems las 'char/ de gsum
280a1(1): re re la yang gsum du ldan par gnas te/ chos can ma rig pa'i snang ba las log pa dang / chos nyid kun brtags dang bral ba dang / de yang nga ba gcig tshul gyi ba dad do// snang stong gnyis blta ba ngan pas gol sa thang 'jug golas dang bral ba'o// mthong
280a2(1): lam dang bsgom lam dang mthar lam gsum sbyar ro// grub mtha' 'khor 'das dbye ba med// sa drug rtags dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam sa drag la stong gsum nyung 'brur chud pa kha che chung med/ gyang dang rtsig pa dang ri la sogs pa
280a3(1): la thogs pa med/ chu bo gyen la ldog/ nyi zla gteng bar 'dzin/ gcig las mang por sbrul/ mang po gcig tu byed do// bar chod 'da' ka rnam pa gsum// snang ba bskur ba'i 'da' ka ma ni/ yi dam lha dang bla ma mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs/ rang nyid ltar
280a4(1): bsgoms la mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs pa de la yod pa thams cad sngon du btang / med na yid kyi mchod pa bya// dam tshig nyams chag bshags// de nas mdun du lus len pa'i snang ba byung ba'i tshe/ rang nyid ltar bsgoms la mdun gyi snang ba de ltar dran par bya/ lha'i snang
280a5(1): ba dang bdag gi shes pa gnyis ro gcig tu bsgyur ro// des par do'i snang ba mi 'char bar rigs 'dzin du 'gyur ro// rgya dang rgya'i tshul bzhin no// snang ba bsgyur ba'i 'da' ka ma// gnyis pa 'od kyi gong bus 'pho ba ni/ lus tsog pu la lag pa gnyis ltag khung
280a6(1): sa sbyor nas/ rgyab brten dran par byas la sngon 'gro gong ltar bya'o// de nas snying gi nang du 'od kyi gong bu mtheb long tsam bsgom/ de las 'od chad pas gshang gci'i lam/ lte ba kha sna bug mig rna ba mdzod spu rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyi thig les bkag la/ lte bar
280b1(1): rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba la hUM mthing nag bsgom/ de nas hUM drag la ring ba bcu dgu'am nyi shus zla ba dang hUM bcas pa mgrin pa'i bar du drangs la/ nyer gcig pas spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga nas bdun gyi yi dam gyi thugs kar 'phang ngo // rig 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'od
280b2(1): kyi gong bus 'pho ba dang / sgra yis 'pho ba'i 'og na sgra la goms par byas na yod 'da' ka ma// gnas skabs 'bras bu 'pho bas rig 'dzin thob pa'o// 'bras bu rig 'dzin 'thob pa dang // rang lus rtsa las grub pas na// rtsa nyid
280b3(1): sbrul skur lhun grub thob// mthar zug lam la bar chad ma byung na rang la ye nas sbrul skur gnas pas rtsa nyid sbrul sbar gyur nas sbrul sgra thob pa ste/ rgyal ba zhi khro sprul pa'i sgrar rang nyid kyi lus la lhun gyis grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// gsang dbang bdag
280b4(1): byin rlob pa'i lam// rim pa'o// rlung gi gzhu la me sum mdo'i rlung gzhu dang 'dra/ lte lkog gi me mda' dang 'dra/ yi mda'// byang sems haM gi 'ben la brdeg/ spyi bo'i haM 'ben dang 'dra ba la brdeg pa'o// myur du ye shes 'char bar
280b5(1): 'gyur// bde ba'i ye shes myur du 'char zhing lus kun la khyab pa'o// bsgyur ba'i sbyor ba med pa'o// thun re la thebs re byas nas de nas 'bab pa la 'jog pa'o// rlung ran par/ kha sbyor lam sbyang lta ba bskyang // drod yang byung rgyal btang ba
280b6(1): dang // thun ni grangs tshad med pa la// yid kyi 'jug yul khams tshod bzung // g.yas g.yon du ba mun sogs brtag/ rnam pa de la blo gnas pa tshogs lam yin la/ rtags byung ba ni sbyor lam ste/ rlung g.yas kyi dbang du byas na/ sa rlung
281a1(1): du ba/ chu chung sdig tu/ me zin bu ma khyer/ rlung gi rlung mar ma 'bar ba/ nam mkha'i rlung zin na nam mkha'i sprin med do// g.yon gyi rlung gis ni bzlog pas sran nag dang / 'ja' tshan/ glog zla ba'i 'od zer nyi ma'i 'od zer sna bu byung ste/ mthong snang dang rmi
281a2(1): nyams ci rigs par 'byung ngo // lta ba rang byung ye shes bzhi// nyon mongs pa dang rnam par rtog/ snrel zhi gsal zhing yang ba'o// nyon mongs pa rang byung gi ting nge 'dzin ni/ yul las ma byung bar snying ga'i yig 'bru la rlung sems 'dus pas nyon
281a3(1): mongs lnga skye ba'o// rnam rtog rang byung gi ting nge 'dzin rtsa ro rgyang gnyis su rlung sems 'dus pas gzung 'dzin gyi rnam rtog skye ba'o// snrel zhi rang byung gi ting nge 'dzin ni/ dbu ma'i sna rtser a la rlung sems 'dus pa'o// gsal zhing yang ba rang byung gi ting nge 'dzin ni/ zung 'jug
281a4(1): gi hUM hAM la 'dus pas sems gsal lus yang 'byung ba yin no// grub mtha' ma 'dres yongs rdzogs pas// sa gzhi rigs drug skad kyang shes// rigs drug gi rgyu 'bras sam so sor shes pa de dag gi skad du chos ston/ A li ka li la dbang thob/ tshig
281a5(1): mchog grub pa skad las 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la dbang thob/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i yon tan rgud la 'char ro// grub mtha' ma snyogs 'da' ka ma// rlung ni dbu mar thim pa'o// grub mtha' ma sgrogs 'da' ka ma 'od
281a6(1): gsal ba ni/ 'chi ka mar rlung gi gyen byas nas rlung thams cad dbu mar zhugs te stong gsal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin sde/ rtsa bran gyi rlung thams cad rtsa po brang bzhir 'dus te/ de tshe yang rtsa gtso bo gsum du 'dus/ de gnyis dbu mar bim ste/ bsgom nyams rang byung gi ting nge
281b1(1): 'dzin dang 'dres nas/ bar do med par grub mtha' sgrogs te rig 'dzin 'thob pa'o// 'bras bu lus kyi yi ge nyid// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku grub thob/ rang gi lus la sngags mi ger gnas pa nyid ye nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgrar gnas pa la/
281b2(1): nyid thob pas na 'bras bu longs spyod kyi rdzogs pa'i sgra thob pa'o// man ngag gi gnad kyis zin pa'o// shes rab ye shes dbang don bsgom// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo thabs kyi lam// lam ni dkyil 'khor 'khor lo thabs kyi lam yin no// de la lnga
281b3(1): lus ngag mnyam pa dang / 'dod pa mnyam pa dang / byin rlabs mnyam pa dang / rig la dag pa dang / man ngag gnad kyis zin pa'o// lus ngag lus ngag mnyam pa ni yab yum gnyis ka lha bsgom pa dang sngags bzlas pa'o// 'dod pa 'dod pa mnyam pa ni yab yum gcig
281b4(1): la gcig brten nas sangs rgyas 'dod pa'o// byin rlabs mnyam/ byin rlabs mnyam pa ni/ yab yum mkha' gsang bsnol mar byin gyis rlob nus pa'o// skye ba dag pa'i rigs ma rnams/ skye ba dag pa ni sngar bshad pa ltar dang bye brag/ ri dwags can ma
281b5(1): ni ri dwags kyi ro stod 'dra ste nu ma mkhrang ba/ ri dwags kyi ro sprad 'dra ste spad sha rgyas pa/ ri dwags kyi sked pa 'dra ste phra la 'gros dal ba/ lha stangs skyes pa mthong na mig mi 'dzum pa/ dbugs dang dri la gla rtsi bro ba ste/ mdor na ri dwags gla ba dang yum chos mthun pa'o// dung
281b6(1): can ma// dung can ma spyir rus pa/ rak+ta 'jam la dkar ba lte ba nang du g.yas su 'khyil pa'i ri mo yod pa// lus stobs che zhing myur ba skad gdangs che zhing ring ba'o// mdor na dung gi chos dang yum de mthun pa'o// glang po can/ ma ni spyir lus kyi sha che zhing yan
282a1(1): lag thung ba stobs che zhing mig chung ba/ rna shal ring ba/ rdul byung ba'i tshe dri zhim pa log shes che la 'dzangs pa/ khyad par du bla sa'i tshogs sdang ba'o// dang ri mo can// ma ni sha chung la dmar/ lte ba'i steng na ri mo 'greng bu gsum yod pa/ mdzod sman rim
282a2(1): 'greng bu gcig yod pa/ mur gong gi mtha' gnyis na dar zod lta bu'i ri mo yod pa spyir tshigs thams cad ring ba 'di ni khyad par du bsngags so// sna tshogs ma ni de dag bzhi ga'i yon tan dang ldan pa'am gsum mam yang na gnyis kyi yon tan dang ldan pa'o// dang sbyangs pas
282a3(1): dag/ pa ni zos bsam dang bslab pas rgud yongs su dag pa dang / dbang gis dag pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa'o// de yang sme bas dag pas mtshan dang ldan pa/ sbyangs pas dag pa snod du rung bar byas pa'o// bsnyen pa skad cig dang po
282a4(1): la/ dga' ba'i ye shes ske ba ni// gzugs dang dri las bde ba bsgom// dang por dbab/ de nas bzung / de nas bzlog/ de nas khyab par bya/ mtha' mi nyams par bsrung ngo // de la dang po ni/ rten yongs su dag pa'i yum de nye ring ngan par byas la/
282a5(1): de'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya la blta zhing / des 'dod chags kyi me 'bar bas thig le dbab/ bde ba bsgom/ bgrad pa'i mthas bsrung / blta ba'i 'gyur bas bsrung / gsang thub par bya/ de thams cad la bde ba dang / mi rtog pa'i nyams ci skyes pa thams cad byung rgyal du
282a6(1): bsrung / de ltar thig le dbab cing / spel zhing bzung / bzung zhing rim gyis bzlog ces bya ba gsum 'brel pa can du 'byung / de ni bya ba mang la bde ba chung bas na skad cig ma dang po la dga' ba'i ye shes zhes bya'o// de yang skad cig ma dang po la bsnyen pa bya ba'o// nye ba'i
282b1(1): bsnyen pa bya ba yang // b+ho la ka ko la sbyar zhing // skad cig gnyis pa mchog dga' yi// ye shes thig le 'bar ba'i drod/ de nas nye ba'i bsnyen pa la/ b+ho la dang ka ko la mnyam par sbyar zhing / yang 'dod chags kyi mes thig le dbab/ bde
282b2(1): ba bsgom/ bgrad pa'i mtha' dang blta ba'i 'gyur bas bsrung / gsang thub par bya/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la bya ba chung bde ba chung bas mchog dga'i ye shes so// dga' ba dang mchog dga' de gnyis ni thig le dbab cing bde ba shugs che bas thig le
282b3(1): 'bar ba'i drod ces bya'o// de la bsnyen pa zhes kyang bya'o// sgrub pa bsrungs pas skad cig gsum// dga' bral bde ba g.yo ba'i drod// zin rtags byung nas rtsa btsal la// rdo rje pad+ma rtsa dang ni// thig le rlung dang bde stong
282b4(1): chud/ sgrub pa ni de nas rdo rjes pad+ma bsrubs pas/ bde ba mi rtog pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ snga ma bzhin thig le dbab pa'i bde ba dang mi rtog pa bsgom/ bgrad pa'i mtha' bsrung / gsang thub par bya ba gces/ 'di'i dus su bde ba mi rtog pa dang ldan pas/ skad cig ma
282b5(1): gsum pa la dga' bral gyis dga' ba/ thig le cung zad gyen du g.yo bas na thig le g.yo ba'i dred ces kyang bya'o// de tsam na thig le bzung dka' bar gyur na/ steng rlung rnam par 'gog pa rtsol ba bkag nas srog nas drang ba'am/ 'gyur ba rnam pa drug la sogs pas 'dir thig
282b6(1): le bsrung / bsrung ba sla na skad cig ma bzhi pa bsrung / de tsam na srin po'i lam bem bem lce yor yor byed// tsub tsub byed pa/ dri chen dri chu yang res mi zon/ res mi zos sam/ bde ba bzod pas sgra rtsa sar sar byed pa/ g.yal dang mchi ma 'byung / ci rigs pa 'byung ba'i tshe thig
283a1(1): le zin pa yin no// de can rten yongs su dag pa'i bud med leng+ga gtad pa la sogs pas rtsa btsal la/ byin gyis rlabs pa gsum sngon du song bas/ rdo rje dang pad+ma gnyis kha sbyor/ rtsa gnyis kha sbyor/ thig le gnyis kha sbyor rlung gnyis kha sbyar du gyur pas bde
283a2(1): stong zung du chud cing bde ba ngos bzang dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin ste ste/ 'dir yang ting nge 'dzin de bsrung / bgrad pa'i mtha' la sogs pas bsrung / gsang thub par bya ba gnyis pa gces so// bde ba brtag par bya ba gces// de la mi mkhas pa ni spyir bzhi
283a3(1): las// dbab pa dag la ma mkhas na// thig le myur du nyams par 'gyur// de'i gnyen por spyir mkhas pa bzhi las// dbab pa la mkhas pa ni rus sbal 'gros// rgya mtshor ri rab log la skam// lto ba skal pa la sbyar// gling
283a4(1): bzhi dbang du bsdu ba dang // yan lag bzhi lus ma mo la bskum// ro 'dzin rang gi gnas su sbyar// kye yar kan la sbyar// dbang po'i mchog ni steng du bzhag/ mig gnyis gyen la bzlog ste thod pa'i nang du dril// ngag stobs hUM drag tu
283a5(1): ring du drang // ting 'dzin thig le hUM drag gzhu la phaT kyis 'phul ba'i mda' brdeg ste drug po dus gcig la 'ong / gzhu 'phang // yang na 'di// lus kyi spyod lam ldan byas nas// lag gnas nyi ma g.yon pa zla// pus mo gnyis la
283a6(1): bsnol mar gdab// hUM thung hUM ring mdun du dgug/ g.yas g.yon dag tu gsum gsum ste// bud pa gsum bsnyad mar ba dang rngub pa gsum// 'khor ba dag tu sbyar bar bya// nyi ma dag ni gsum pa la// rlung zin
283b1(1): na thig le zin// sba ba sbubs su nub par 'gyur// yang na// byin gyis brlab rten rig ma byin gyis brlab pa dang lus ngag gi 'gyur ba bya/ sogs byas nas ni// srin po'i lam ni cung zad bsdam// bsrung ba ni bshang gci'i lam
283b2(1): bsdam// gung mdzub gnyis ni drag tu khar gzhibs// mig gnyis steng du bgrad par bya// thod pa'i nang du bsgril ba// 'dis ni thig le 'dzin par 'gyur// yang na ha la ha la ngag tu 'dren pa ni drag las drag tu drang ba'o// drag tu
283b3(1): brjod// lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gzhan yang bya/ khams bdud rtsi thig le nyid rlung dang 'dres nas gnas pas rlung zin na thig le yang 'dzin pa ste lus gnad do// 'dis kyang thig le 'dzin par 'gyur// gzung ba'i man ngag ma mkhas
283b4(1): na// tha mal pa'i lugs dang mthun par 'gyur ba'o// bde ba yun ni zung ba yin// gzung ba dag la mkhas pa la// lus ngag 'gyur ba gsum dang gcig/ sgrub pa chen po ni skad cig bzhi pa la// thig le brtan pa'i drod
283b5(1): yin no// ri dgas kyi 'byur ba bzhis bzung ba ni// glang chen nying dang stag mo'i chang mdur// gcan gzan skrag pa sngar lto ba gang rkang bya ba/ dang wa ltar bsgom/ brnam pa// lte bag snying cag mgrin gcan gzhan pa spyi gtsug la sngar badz+ram
283b6(1): drang // bzlog pa ma mkhas na thig le chu dang bsdongs/ nas 'dzag/ bzlag mkhas dud 'gro'i 'gyur ba bzhi// de nas lus kyi 'gyur ba bya ba ni rlung gi ske rags lag pa skad pa la bcing // de bzhin du lag pa zhags pa 'phang ba
284a1(1): ltar bya ba dang // lus kyang gtun shing gi 'khor lo ltar bskor// bu chung ltar mgo g.yas g.yon du 'jog 'jog bya/ spyod lam byas pas ni// lus la dgram par seng ge khyi tshugs su 'dug pa ltar bya/ byas pas khyab// rnam
284a2(1): grol rgya seng ge gangs kyi stod du 'gro ba ltar 'byong bar bya/ yi lus la dgram/ lus la thig le// dgram pa ma mkhas na nad du 'gyur/ khyab par mkhas pa rnam grol rgya// bde ba skyed nas gang bas 'dzag/ pa ni 'gyur ba drug dang //
284a3(1): ngag 'dren pa zhi drag dang / khyad par stobs kyi hUM gis bsrung // gdon dang bag chags rmi lam 'dzag/ gu gul nag po/ mi'i klad pa/ nyung dkar bsreg pa'i thal ba/ pad+ma rak+tas bsrung // nad gzhi chu dang bsdongs nas 'dzag/ kha zas bcud can dang /
284a4(1): rtsa ba gsum gyi phyi ma bsten// rig ma'i rkyen gyis chags skyes 'dzag/ 'gyur ba drug dang bgrad pa'i mthas bsrung // kha zas mi mthun rang nyams 'dzag/ me tog 'byar byed smin pa de zhib par btags pa la ma la btab la ltor gtang // spyod
284a5(1): lam rdul dang bsdongs nas 'dzag/ lus la rdul bar bya// lta ba lhan cig skyes dga' ni// go rim ltos pa'i dga' ba bzhi// dga' ba bcu drug tu 'gyur te/ de la go rim la ltos pa'i dga' ba bzhi ni gong du bstan ste/ skad cig ma dang ma
284a6(1): dga' ba'i ye shes/ gnyis pa mchog dga'i ye shes/ gsum pa dga' bral gyi ye shes/ bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes te bde ba bzhi'o// phyi nang gnas kyi dga' ba bzhi// gnyis pa gnas la ltos pa la gnyis las/ phyi'i gnas la ltos pa dang / nang
284b1(1): gnas la ltos pa'o// phyi'i gnas la ltos pa ni/ lus kyi gnad khol bu khol bur skye ba dga'/ lus phal cher skyes nas mchog dga'/ lus thams cad la khyab par skyes na dga' bral/ snang ba'i dngos po thams cad bde bar 'char na lhan cig skyes dga' 'o// nang la ltos pa
284b2(1): ni/ spyi bo nas mgrin pa'i bar du dga' ba/ mgrin pa nas snying ga'i bar du mchog dga'// snying ga nas lte ba'i bar du dga' bral/ lte ba nas gsang gnas bar du lhan skyes so// bde bas spang bya spong ba bzhi// gsum pa spang bya la ltos pa bzhi ni/ gzung 'dzin gyi rnam
284b3(1): rtog rags rim 'gog pa ni dga' ba/ bdag gi rnam rtog rags rims 'gog pa mchog dga'/ phyag chu'i rnam rtog 'gog pa dga' bral/ dga' ba gsum pa'i rnam rtog 'gog pa lan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o// rang gi ngo bo shar ba'o// bzhi pa ngo bo nyid bzhi ni/ bde ba
284b4(1): nyams myong chung ba dga' ba/ bde ba cher 'bar ba mchog dga'/ bde ba mi rtog pa dang ldan pa dga' bral/ bde ba stong pa dang gnyis su med pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o// grub mtha' bde stong rgya chung zhing // bcu gcig bcu gnyis sa pa'o// ni kyang
284b5(1): 'das la sogs pa rnga ma ci rigs pa rnams pade stong du rtogs pa 'byung ste/ sa bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa'o// 'da' kar rdo rje sems byon 'gyur/ dang po 'byed pa dang / bar du gnas pa dang / ba ma 'chi ba thams cad las kyi rlung gis byed pas 'chi ba las
284b6(1): kyi rlung gis rkyen byas nas las kyi rlung log pas rtsa mdud rnams dral/ des sems kyi rten khams thig le lhan cig tu tshogs te/ khu ba cung zad zhugs pa las/ 'chi khar bde stong mchog skye ste/ rdo rje ni stong pa/ sems dpa' ni bde ba/ de sngar gyi bde stong gi blta ba dang 'dres
285a1(1): nas bar de med par grub mtha' sgrogs pa'o// lus khams bdud rtsi chos slar gnas pa ste de rtogs nas grol ba'o// thob// bde ba chen po'i dbang bsgom na// bde ba chen po'i dbang lnga ste// lam ni rdo rje'i rba rlabs te// lam dang ba
285a2(1): ba dang grub mtha' dang / 'da' ka ma dang / 'bras bu'o// de la dang po lus sbyang ba la sogs pa sngon du song nas/ bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams tshang bar bya ste/ srog rtsol la sogs pa sngon du song nas/ 'og rlung bskyed pa lus kyi rba rlabs/ de nas ting nge 'dzin sems kyi tha
285a3(1): rlabs bsgom ste/ yang rab yum pad+ma can dngos sam/ 'bring ye shes kyi phyag rgya la brten nas lam sbyad pa las/ de la gsum dang po thabs rgyud dag par bya ba/ de nas shes rab chud dag par bya ba/ de nas gnyis ka'i rgud so sor dag par bya'o// de yang lus ngag mnyam pa la
285a4(1): sogs pa gsum shes rab ye shes kyi lam dang 'dra bar byas la/ de nas skad cig gis thabs shes rab la snyoms par zhugs pa las yab yum gnyis kyi khams dngas ma mchog gi ze bar byon/ thig le 'od zer gyi khro bo'i rnam par 'gyur/ rtsa g.yas kyi ro ma nas song lte bar
285a5(1): lte ba'i 'khor lo nam langs pa bzhin yal yal/ nyi ma shar ba bzhin sal sal/ glo ba bus pa bzhin du ltar ltar/ yang g.yas ro ma nas song nas snying gar byon/ chos gsum ldan du dran yang ro ma nas song // rna ba g.yas nas 'od zer rnam par 'phros/ 'od zer gyi snang
285a6(1): bapab las lhag pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor spro/ sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la dbang bzhi bskur/ sems can rnams lhag pa'i lhar byas/ gnyis 'dres bdud rtsi'i bcud du gyur/ bdag gi rgyud sku lngar bskur nus pas tshangs pa'i sgor zhugs/ spyi bor chos gsum ldan du dran/ mgrin
285b1(1): ra na rak+ta btso bas nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid dang ldan/ snying gar bdud rtsi gtso bas 'od kha dog lngar gyur/ rtsa dag pa'i lam lte ba nas byung nas/ lte ba rtsa mdud yangs pa nas yum gyi mkhar snga ma bzhin du gnas so// de ni g.yas bzung ba'i rba rlabs rengs pa/ rnam par thar
285b2(1): pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba 'bras bu dang po'o// de bzhin du g.yon du yang bya ste/ 'dzin pa'i rba rlabs rengs pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ste 'bras bu gnyis pa'o// de bzhin du dbu mar yang bya ste/ byon pa'i dus su thig le nyung dkar tsam du dbab bo// gzung
285b3(1): 'dzin gnyis ka'i rba rlabs rengs pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid de 'bras bu gsum pa'o// thabs chud dag par bya ba bstan no// de bzhin du shes rab kyi rgyud la yang rtsa g.yas g.yon gnyis nas ni/ rna ba gnyis kyi sgor byon pa tsam las phyir 'phro ba ni med do// dbu ma
285b4(1): nas song ste/ tshangs pa'i sgo nas spro ba dang bsdu ba byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung ste 'dra bar bzhed do// rba rlabs gsum rengs pa dang / rnam thar sgo gsum dang sbyor ba yang snga ma bzhin shes par bya'o// yab sbyor ba'i dus su yang yum gyis yang yab sbyar la/ yum la des
285b5(1): 'gre'o// de nas thabs shes kyi rgyud so sor dag par bya ba'i phyir/ yab nyid kyi dbu ma nas khams drangs ma de 'od zer gyi rnam par song nas gtsug tor mchog tu thim/ yum gyi yang de bzhin du thim ste/ gnyis ka yang sku lnga lhun gyis grub par dran pa tsam bya'o// nyams de gang du
285b6(1): skye ba ni nges pa med do// ci skyes byung rgyal du gtang ngo // pad+ma can la lus ngag yid// thabs shes gnyis ka'i rgyud dag pas// srog shing gsum las rnam thar sgo// chos rnams shin tu rnam dag pa'i// de kho na nyid blta ba
286a1(1): ni// mas brtan pa yi dga' ba bzhi// rgyu mthun pas ni sgra dkar 'joms// de nyams su myong ba lus kyi rtags ni/ lus sems gnyis ka gang byung gi chags ni/ lte ba'i 'khor lo khengs pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi snying du sdug cing med
286a2(1): du 'ong bar 'gyur/ de yang sems 'ba' zhig la bzhed pa'i rtags ni/ dang po la bde stong gi ting nge 'dzin shas chung ste lte ba'i 'khor lo'i rtags so// snying ga'i 'khor lo khengs pas mngon shes cung zad tsam 'char ro// gnyis pa snying gar bde stong 'bring ngo // rnam par smin
286a3(1): par stobs ster byed// skyes bu byed pas rnam par 'phel/ mgrin pa'i 'khor lo khengs pas dpung pa dang lce dang lce'u chung 'phel te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ro thams cad la longs spyod nus pa'o// gsum pas mgrin par bde stong chen po'o// dri ma med pas
286a4(1): ni 'chi med 'gyur/ skye bo'i 'khor lo khengs pa tshe nyi zla dang mnyam/ rdzu 'phrul cung zad ston no// bzhi pa spyi bor bde stong chen po'i yang chen por 'gyur ro// grub mthas ma snyogs 'da' ka ma// phyag rgya chen por 'pho bar bya// nyer gcig khug pa
286a5(1): bcu bdun la// skye dang 'bri bas rlung rnams sbyang / de la sbyang ba ni/ rlung sbyangs te/ gang yang rung ba'i nyi ma dang po la srog rtsol gyi rlung khrag pa bcu bdun thun bzhi'i nges pas bya/ de bzhin du nyi ma re re la khrag pa re re spel la/ zhag nyer gcig gi bar du
286a6(1): sbyangs te/ nyi ma tha ma la srog rtsol gyi rlung khug pa sum cu so bdun du gyur ro// yang nyi ma dang po la gcig 'bri/ de bzhin du nyi ma re re la re 'bri nas zhag nyer gcig na yang sngar gyi tshad du 'gyur ro// de ltar bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su rlung sbyangs pas g.yas dang g.yon nas rlung rgyu
286b1(1): bas gsal ba dang / me rlung rnam ngor rgyu ba la sogs pa'i rnam par nges pa 'byung ngo // sgra la goms par rab byas nas/ goms pa la gnyis te/ sgra la goms par bya ba dang / yi ge la goms par bya ba'o// sgra la goms par byed pas lus gnad la phab la tig
