286b2(1): ces pa nyer gcig gis drang zhing / ki tig ces pa nyer gcig gis ngal gsol/ de ltar thun bzhir nges pas zhag bdun sbyang ngo // yi ge goms par byed 'dod na// yi ge la goms pa la phyi nang gnyis so// phyi ni dri chen gyi lam du dmyal ba'i sgo 'gegs pa'i yi ge kAsa?
286b3(1): sngon po'o// dri chen gnas su sngon po dmyal// byol song gi sgo 'gegs pa'i sAmra du bsgom mo/ ser po dri chu'i lam/ ts+tsha// lte bar rtswa sngon po 'dod lha'i sgo 'gags pa nyid/ bsam mo/ ts+tsha/ yi dwags mgo sprad lce'u chung zla// sum
286b4(1): dkar dag tu gnas pa'o// lce'u chung gi rtsa bar yi dwags kyi sgo 'gegs pa'i zla ba la suM dkar po mgo sprad pa'o// sngon po gnod sprin sna ru bzlas// sta ru zla ba gnod sbyin gyi sgo 'gegs pa'i waM sngon po bsam mo// yuM// rna ba gnyis dmar grub
286b5(1): papa'i lha// rna ba gnyis sa grub pa'i lha'i sa bon tshwa dmar po bsgom pa'o// yuM// mi dang mi rgyal sngon po mig/ mig gnyis su zla ba la tra sngon po ma dang mo'i rgyal por skye ba dgag pa'i phyir bsgom pa'o// hUM// mdzod spu gzugs khams kyi sngar sme ba dgag
286b6(1): pa ni hUM sngo dkar ba/ hUM/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu kha dog dkar po'i k+ShaM/ k+ShaM// yi ge ma bu'i sbyor bas dgag/ de ltar brtsegs pa'i yi ge bzhi dang rkyang pa'i yi ge bzhi ste brgyad kyis sgo thams cad dgag par bya'o// nang du dkyil 'khor nang gi yi ge la
287a1(1): #/ gams par bya ba ni 'bar lo bzhi ste rang gnas dkyil 'khor bzhi la 'byung ba bzhi dgag go// rnam bzhi la// A li gye na wA ka li zur// rtsa g.yas gatshan gnyis phra ga la bcu drug mdag dmar pa mag gyen la bskas par dang / ka la dkar
287a2(1): mgo mthur la bltas pa gnyis gnyis spel mar bkod pas// rtsa g.yas g.yon gnyis dgag pa ste/ de yang rtsol ba'i dus su mas yar gsal gdab/ srog gi dus su yas mar gsal gdab bo// g.yas g.yon rtsol ba srog gi dus/ de yang / thun bzhi pas
287a3(1): zhag bdun du goms par bro/ 'o// de nas las la sbyar bar bya// bde 'gro dag la sbyar bar bya// mi 'dod sgo bkag 'dod sar 'byin// dang por bde 'gro la sbyar ba ni// nges par 'chi ba'i tshe/ sngon 'gro bum dbang gi 'da' ka ma
287a4(1): bzhin byas pa'am/ ma byas kyang rung ste/ lus tsog pur gnad la phab la/ rtsa dbu ma'i spyi gtsug nas 'og sgor gsal ba las/ rlung ldang 'jug gnas pa sbyang ngo // phyi sgo thams cad yi ges bkag la/ mig la sogs pa bde 'gro gang 'dod pa'i sgo de stong par bzhag la/ snying gar
287a5(1): rlung dang zla ba'i steng du sems kyi rten hUM gsal gdab/ tig gi sgra nyi shus mgrin pa'i bar du drangs/ rtsa gcig pa la mngon par 'dod pa'i sgo de nas 'phangs na/ sgo de'i rten 'brel nyid kyis bde 'gro dang der las la sbyar ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// grong gzhan sbyar ba
287a6(1): rgyal bu sogs// lus kyi rten la gzhug pa dang // rtags byung zhi drag bya ba dang // de nas drin lan bsab par bya// grong gzhan la sbyar ba ni/ rgyal po'i bu la sogs pa'i ro rma med pa/ ma rul ba/ na tshod dang rjes su mthun pa'i ro rnyed
287b1(1): nas rab yin pas bla ma la khrus bya/ gu gul gyi dud pas bdug/ lhar bskyed/ gnas gsum bsrung / nub dang po la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo brtan por bsgom/ gnyis pa la rten de gnas dben par bzhag la/ dam tshig mkha' 'gro dang sha za mkha' 'gro la sogs pa mchod pas
287b2(1): mnyes par bya/ nyin gsum pa la/ rang gi rlung shugs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rlung shugs brtags la/ nye ring tshod zin par byas te/ lus ci rigs pa gnad la phab la/ phyi sgo thams cad snga ma bzhin yi ges dgag/ sna'i sgo gnyis stong par gzhag/ de nas sngar sbyangs pa'i rtsol
287b3(1): ba'i rlung gnyis/ sems kyi rten snying ga na gnas pa de las hUM gcig bye ste/ rten de'i sna bug g.yon nas bcug la snying gar bzhag/ srog lung ci bder 'od du gzhug/ de bzhin du yang nas yang du byas pas/ rten de'i snying gar drod byung ba dang / spyi bor yang drod 'byung / de nas
287b4(1): lus thams cad la khyab pa dang / mig 'byed 'dzum dang / smra ba la sogs pa 'byung ste/ de tsam na sems gcig gis rten gnyis gzung ba'i dus zhes bya ste/ de nas drag por byed na hig nyi shus mgrin par drangs la rtsa gcig pa la sna bug g.yas nas byung ste/ rten de'i g.yon nas
287b5(1): zhugs nas snying gar zhugs par bsam/ zhi bas byed na/ rtsol ba nyid kyi sems kyis rten de mgrin pa'i bar du drangs shing // thul phul zer la sogs pa bya/ za ma sna g.yas nas bton la/ rten gyi g.yon nas bcug la snying gar gzhug ste/ srog 'jug pa dang bral bar byas na
287b6(1): nges par las la sbyor te 'grub bo// de nas drin lan bsab pa'i phyir// rten rnying pa sbyang zhing / rten gsar pas 'gro ba'i don spyod pa la sogs pa bya'o// gling dang skye gnas gzhan sbyar ba// ni lus la sogs pa gnad la dbab par byas la/ phyi sgo thams cad yi ges
288a1(1): dgag/ tshangs pa'i sgo 'ba' zhig stong par bzhag/ snying gar rlung dang zla ba'i steng du sems kyi rten hUM mthing nag bsams la/ thig ci shus mgrin pa'i bar du drangs la// rtsa gcig pa la gnad gsum 'dus pa'i tshul gyis tshangs pa'i sgo nas 'phangs te// rlung
288a2(1): sbyang bde ba can dang ni// pad+ma mngal du bram ze rgyal// gang mngon par 'dod pa'i bde ba can la sogs pa'i gling dang / skye gnas las kyang rdzus skyes su 'dod na ut+pa la 'am pad+ma la sogs pa skye gnas kyi snying po'am/ mngal skyes su 'dod na bram ze dang rgyal po
288a3(1): la sogs pa'i btsun mo'i mngal de yid kyi yul du byas te/ rang gi rig pa rlung 'brongs pa'i rtsal gyis bud med kyi mngal der ting nge 'dzin gyis 'phangs na// mda' dang sgrogs bzhin 'khrul 'khor 'phen// dper na mda' gzhu dang stegs kyis 'phrul 'khor la
288a4(1): bus las la sbyar te/ 'bras bu de ni nges par 'grub bo// de lta bu'i las sbyor gsum po de ni dbang bzhi ka'i 'da' ka thun mong ma yin par bzhed do// shin tu zab pa'o// bzhi pa phyag rgya chen por 'pho// phyi yi sgo rnams bkag byas nas/ bzhi pa phyag rgya
288a5(1): chen po nas 'pho ba ni/ bde ba chen po'i dbang kho na'i 'pho ba yin te/ lus skyil krung du gnad la phab la/ phyi'i sgo thams cad yi ges bkag ste/ de bzhin nang gi sgo thams cad kyang sgoms pa bzhin yi ges bkag la/ rang gi/ srog rtsol dbu mar yid kyis
288a6(1): gzhug/ rtsol ba'i dus su phyi dbyibs kyi a nas spyi gtsug gi haM gi bar du/ dbu mar yid kyis gzhug/ yang srog gi dus su haM nas phyi dbyibs kyi a'i bar du yang dbu ma nas gzhug/ de bzhin du/ 'chi khar rang gis ngang gi dbu mar 'jug pa dang / rang yid kyis kyang yang dang
288b1(1): nga du de ltar byas pas/ srog rtsol gyi rlung dbu mar zad de// lam mchog der thim nas// rgya chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po bde stong shin tu dag pa'i de kho na nyid rtogs nas sngar gyi nyams myong dang 'dres pa'i tshul gyis grub mtha' snyog pa'am/ rig pa 'dzin
288b2(1): par 'gyur ro// 'bras bu ni chos sgra longs sgra sbrul sku gsum dbyer med pa/ ra 'gyur ba ni chu dang lan cha lkog pa dbyer med pa ltar nga bo nyid kyi sgra thob pa'o// ngo bo nyid kyi sku thob pa// bcu bzhi sa la rab gnas pa// ni bcu bzhi pa rdo rje 'dzin
288b3(1): pas sa la gnas pa ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i dgongs pa 'dzin par na rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas pa zhes bya ba yin no// rdo rje 'dzin par grub pa'o// khrag 'thung gal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dbang bskur ba yi bla ma la// de la ji ltar blta
288b4(1): bar bya// slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin pa la// lha mngon shes can dang byin rlabs can rig pa 'dzin pa yis// de la bsngags pa 'di skad brjod// ston pa rdo rje slob dpon 'di// bdag cag rnams kyi pha nor rdzas 'byor pa
288b5(1): ster bas chos kyi dpral ba sel/ lags so// bdag cag rnams kyi lus sems rtogs pa skyes pas/ ma lags so// thugs kyi sras mo mor dgongs// bu dang bu mo sring bka' drin gyi skyob nus/ gnyen lags// lam stor rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
288b6(1): lam 'tshol sa mkhan lags// long ba rnams kyi ye shes kyi spyan 'byed pa'i/ dmigs bu lags// 'khor ba'i/ chu bo las sgrol ba'i gru chen lags// skra dang ye shes kyi// rin chen len pa'i gzings chen lags// sems can rnams kyi
289a1(1): yid la// 'dod pa sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i ded dpon lags// ma lus 'gro ba'i dus gsum rgyal ba bgrod par byed pa'i/ lam chen lags// ma rig pa'i// mun pa sel ba'i sgron me lags// dug lnga ye shes su bskur
289a2(1): bas/ gser 'gyur rtsi yi mkhan po lags// dug gsum sku gsung thugs su sgyur ma gi ta chen lags// sprul pa 'byung ba'i snang ba ye shes sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor du bskur ba'i sgyu ma mkhan lags/ 'khor ba'i// g.yul ngo zlog pa'i
289a3(1): dpa' bo lags// lta ba ngan pa'i/ nad gcod 'byin pa'i sman pa lags// 'dod pa mchog thun mong gi dngos grub ster ba'i yid bzhin lags// paN+Di ta la lba ba sgro 'dogs kyi nas gcod pa// lha yi dpag bsam shing chen lags//
289a4(1): sa li pa ltar sgro 'dogs nang nas gcod// gnod sbyin bum pa bzang po lags/ lta ba// nam mkha' lta bur mtha' dbus dang bral ba/ brtan pa lags// skom pa// rgya mtsho lta bur bying rgod bral bar gnas pa lags// spyod pa/ ri bo lta
289a5(1): pubur mi 'gyur bar/ brtan pa lags// nyi zla'i lha tha sku gzi mdangs dang ldan pa lags/ gsung chos kyi 'khor lo// 'brug sgra chos dung gsung sgra lags/ thugs/ 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje'i thugs can lags// yon tan sa gzhi
289a6(1): ltar 'dod pa 'byung ba mnga' ba lags// phrin las thabs mkhas la 'gyur ba gar mkhan glog 'dra lags/ sgra gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyis gzhan/ zil gnon seng ge 'dra ba lags/ byi/ sgro 'dogs yongs su gcod pa'i bla
289b1(1): mas bum dbang bskur lags/ nang / rang byung ye shes ston pa'i bla mas gsang dbang bskur lags/ gsang ba/ lhan cig skyes dga'i ye shes ston pa'i bla mas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur/ dgongs pa lags/ de kho na nyid/ chos rnams de
289b2(1): nyid shin tu dag par ston pa'i bla mas bde ba chen po'i dbang ston pa lags/ khams gsum gnas kyi dbang phyug 'dis// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dir/ chos nyid don gyis/ rnal ma la rig pa ye shes kyi blos 'byor 'khor 'das
289b3(1): kyi chos la blta ba dbang spyod nus pa phyug 'bras bu thob par nus pa chen po 'di// bdag cag rnams la chos kyi ston pa'o// zhes gsungs pas/ bral nas bgyis na/ bla ma bslab bya nas brtsis na rdo rje slob dpon dgongs pa nas brtsis na
289b4(1): dam pa rje 'bangs nas brtsis na rje drag zhan nas brtsis na btsan phan par bya nas brtsis na lha rjes kun la thugs kyis dgongs par gyur to// dpal he ru ka'i gal po las/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba'i
289b5(1): brtag pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bzhugs gnas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i ra gshegs pa sangs rgyas 'das pa ma lus da lta ba mi lus lus ma 'ongs pa pa med pa thams cad kyis/ sku gsum thob pa// mchog dang grub
289b6(1): chen brgyad la sogs pa thun mong gi dngos grub de dag bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bar du gcod pa'i bdud ngos bzung zhing 'dul ba 'di dag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po'i ched du gsungs so// bar chad byed pa'i bar chad kyi bgegs ngos
290a1(1): bzang zhing bzlog pa ni ye shes la ye shes skye ba'i bgegs sam sgrub pa'i bar du gcod pa'i bgegs te zad par du yang dus drug gi phul le ma drug yin no// bgegs chen yang // 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis bzlog/ skye ba med pa'i dbyings las
290a2(1): phyag rgya chen po'i sgrar gsal bar bsgoms pa/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa'am/ yang na skye ba med pa'i chos nyid bsgoms te bstan pa tsam gyi gzhan pham mo// dngos grub sbyin pa'i gzugs can yang / thun mong dang mchog gis bsdus pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed
290a3(1): pa'i ye shes kyi lha la bya'o// re dang dogs dang dga' ba yi// lha yin du re ba dang / dngos grub thob snyam nas dga' ba dang / bgegs yin du dogs pa'i sems med par bya ste/ re dogs gnyis kyi blo dang bral ba'o// ngan pa'i don gyis sems mi dbyung /
290a4(1): re dogs dang bcos pa ni sems ngan pa yin pas na/ sems de lta bu mi 'byung bas na ngan sems dang bral ba'o// nor bu rin chen rkun ma mang / de yang ni yang dag pa'i dngos grub la bar du gcod pa mang ste/ dper na nor bu rin chen la rkun ma mang ba lta
290a5(1): bu'o// bdud dang bar chod ngos bzung bzlog/ badz+ra he ru ka'i thugs kyi bsgrub pa'i bsgrub pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bdud dang bar chod 'byung bas/ de ngos bzung zhing bzlog par bya'o// de la bdud ni bzhi ste phung po'i dang nyon mongs pa'i dang 'chi bdag
290a6(1): dang lha'i bu'i bdud do// rnam par rtog pa phung po'i bdud// lus sems las su mi rung byed/ phung po'i bdud ni lus sems las su mi rung ba ste/ rnam rtog thams cad do// rtog pas dngos grub la bar chad byed pas so// de la lus sems las su rung ba'i
290b1(1): sman dang yo byad bsten pa dang / gnyis med kyi blo dang ldan par bya ba'o// nyon mongs bdud ni dug lnga nyid// nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni/ zhe sdang la sogs pa'i dug lngas dngos grub la bar chad du 'gyur ba ste/ de la nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po bsten pa zhe sdang la
290b2(1): byams pa bsten pa lta bu'o// nyon mongs pa lam du 'khyer ba'i man ngag ni dug sman du btul ba lta bu'o// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin shes par bya ste/ de ni dug gi rang bzhin shes pa lta bu nyon mongs pa'i dbang du mi gtang ngo // nyon mongs pa'i dbang du 'gro ba ni/ gti mug gis
290b3(1): stong pa nyid la khungs phyung nas ci yang mi 'gal zer ba dang / zhe sdang gi dbang gis bla ma dang sbran grogs kyi srog la rgol ba dang / 'dod chags kyi dbang gis bla ma'i gzungs ma la gzung ba'o// de dag rA tra'i gnas su ltung bas spang bar bya ba'o// rang sar grol bar bya
290b4(1): ba'o// 'chi bdag bdud ni tshe srog 'phrog/ 'chi bdag gi bdud ni/ 'chi bdag gi gzugs kyis rnal 'byor pa'i srog la gnod pa mtha' dag ste/ gnas bkra mi shis pa dang / gdon drag po dang / dug dang dgra la sogs pa ste/ de dag spang zhing bsrung ba dang / che
290b5(1): la phan pa'i bcud len dang / tshe sgrub la sogs pa bya'o// tshe sgrub srog ni bsgrub par bya// lha bdud gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ni// bdud kyi rgyal po dga' rab dbang phyug btsun mo pad+ma 'phreng dang bcas pa blon po bzhi dang 'khor du bdud sdig to can rnams
290b6(1): te bdud kyi rigs rnams so// dga' rab dbang phyug bdud kyi rigs// de dag gi gti mug dang zhe sdang gis rab tu 'khrugs te sems can thams cad bran du mthong ste/ bdud kyi rigs rnams kyis bran med kyis dogs 'khor ba stongs kyis dogs nas bar du
291a1(1): gcod pa ste// 'khor zad bde ba thob kyis dogs/ gsang sngags zab mo'i bka' bzhin du bslab pas sems can rnams thar pa la bkod kyis dogs par chad sna tshogs brtsam mo// bu gcig 'chi ba'i mya ngan tsam// gang zag byang chub
291a2(1): tu sems bskyed pa mthong na bdud de dag bu gcig pu shi ba tsam du mya ngan skyes nas bar du gcod pa'o// de yan chad bdud bzhi ngos bzung nas bshad pa ste spyi don dang po'o// bar chad dngos dang sprul pa 'byung // dngos grub 'byung ba dang byin gyis brlabs nas
291a3(1): 'byung ba'o// de yang dam pa la dngos su 'ong / dam pa ma yin pa la byin gyis brlabs nas 'ong ngo // de la dngos ni gnyis te bdud kyi gzugs dngos su 'ong ba dang sprul pa dngos su 'ong ba'o// de yang brid pa dang bsdig pa'o// pha ma slob dpon cha byad can// dam pa
291a4(1): ting nge 'dzin drod thob pa la bdud slob dpon dang pha ma'i cha byad du byas te 'ong ngo // rang gi lha spyod des bar chad byed lugs ni lha spyod dang bslab pa la bar gcod byed pas/ mi de yang lta spyod dang bslab pa las bzlog pas gnyen po yang lha spyod dang bsgrub pa la 'bad par
291a5(1): bya'o// gnyen po yis// dngos su byung na bzlog par bya// de'i gnyen po ni blta ba sems sangs rgyas su blta/ spyod pa sbyor sgrol gyi chos nyid dbang du bsgrub pa he ru ka bsgrub par bya ste bzlog go// bdud dngos su yod pa'o// bdud kyis dngos su byin
291a6(1): rlorlabs pa// btsun mo la gnyis te/ dang po ni/ bdud kyi btsun mo pad+ma phreng gi bar du gcod pa de la 'phreng ba reg pas nyon mongs pa 'phel te/ rab tu 'phel bas dam tshig la sogs pa dang 'brel lo// ji ltar 'brel na 'phreng bas 'dod chags ldang zhing / sbyor ba'i dam
291b1(1): tshig la dgar song nas thabs kyis ma zin pa'i sbyor ba rang dgar spyod pa'o// pad 'phreng spyi bor reg gnyis pa chad dam dpyad// blo na po 'thab g.yeng chags 'du shes// blon po bzhi ste/ 'thab byed/ g.yeng byed/ chags byed/ 'du shes zlog pa dang bzhis
291b2(1): bar du gcod de/ 'thab byed kyi rnal 'byor pa nang 'thab mo la sbyor/ g.yeng byed kyi g.yeng ba la/ chags byed kyi chags pa tshul ma yin pa bla ma'i btsun mo dang / nor rdzas la chags par byed do// 'du shes zlog pas rnal 'byor pa log lha dang 'khrul pa sna tshogs la sems sbyor
291b3(1): ro// gnyen pos yang dag chos skur shes// de dag gi gnyen po ni nyon mongs pa'i dbang du mi gtang ba dang / snying rjes kun la khyab par bya ba dang / mthun 'jug thabs kyi khyad par bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i blos thams cad chos slar mthong ba'o// rgyud nas byin
291b4(1): kyis rlobs pa yang // mi dang mi ma yin pa'o// mi ni dgra lta bu dang / gnyen lta bu'o// mi ma yin pa ni dud 'gro lta bu dang / 'byung ba me chu lta bu la sogs pa dang / yi dwags lta bu'o// rnal 'byor pa la bar du gcod par byed pa ni/ gnod pa/ dngos
291b5(1): su byed pa dang phan pa ltar snang zhing don la gnod pa'o// tshor dang ma tshor bar lus ngag yid gsum la 'jug pa rnams/ de dag gis dam tshig la sogs pa las bzlog par byed pa'o// bdud de dag gi gnyen po ni/ stong nyid snying rje dang ma bral ba
291b6(1): dang mthun 'jug thabs kyi spyod pa mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi byin/ rlabs pa'i thabs sna tshogs so// bar du gcod pa 'byung ba'i rgyu/ yang byin gyis rlobs pa'i bdud bar du gcod pa'i bgegs 'byung ste/ de yang slob dpon dgongs pa med pa dang /
292a1(1): @mched lham dam tshig mi gtsang ba dang / dben gnas bkra me shes pa dang / oM brad dang cho ga lngag chad du gyur pas bdud kyi chu byas pa'o// nyul le dam 'byung dus drug 'byung / bar chad kyang po ni phul le ma drug dang dam bri bzhi dang 'brang ba
292a2(1): phal pa 'byung ste/ de yang srod dang tho rangs gnyis/ snga dro dgongs ka gnyis/ nam phyed nyin gung gnyis te drug go// rtags dang cho 'phrul du ma 'byung // de yod pa'i rtags re dang cho 'phrul re 'byung ste/ dgongs nyi ma nub pa'am/ myur khan srin po sha dred gser bu'i bu
292a3(1): mo rdzu 'phrul bya rog skad bskur ba bya ba dang / srod la rlung lha phyogs skyong gi bu mo kha thun gyi ma ru tse bya ba dang / nam gung la tshangs pa dung gi zor tshugs can gyi bu mo pra ma na dun ti bya ba dang / zo rangs gza' stong stong gi bu mo ting ting gi ma ru tse bya ba dang / nyi ma shar kar nam
292a4(1): mkha' lding gi bu mo blo gros spyan gcig ma dang / nyin phyed na klu rigs bzhis bar chad byed pas sngags dang pho nya ting 'dzin gyi rang rang gi gnyen pos bzlog go/ de la gnyen pos bzlog par bya// sha trang bu mo bya rog mas// dgongs grib so nag po la lho nub
292a5(1): nas srin po sha dred gser bu'i bu mo rdzu 'phrul gyi bya rog skad sbyar ma bya bas bar gcod byed du 'ong ste// byid bsres snying rje chung ba dang // snga rtags su sha khrag 'dod/ snying rje chung / gnyid dbang du 'gyur zhing thibs nas 'ong / de la gnyen pos bzlog go/ rlung lha
292a6(1): kha thun ma ru tses// dkyil 'khor byin med seng po dang / srod la rlung lha phyogs skyong gi bu mo kha thun gyi ma ru tse bya ba rus sbal nag po zhon nas 'ong ste/ rtags dkyil 'khor byin med seng seng por 'gro/ cho 'phrul rlung nag 'tshubs mas dkyil 'khor 'thor
292b1(1): du 'ong / de gnyen pos bzlog go/ tshangs pa pra ma snying mi dga'// log pa'i chags pa skye bar byed// nam phyed na tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can gyi bu mo phra man du na ting bya ba shing dar srub med kyi la'u gon nas bar du gcod du 'ong ste/ rtags snying mi
292b2(1): dga' zhing 'gro snying 'dod/ tshe 'phrul log pa'i chags pa ste/ de gnyen pos bzlog go// gza' yi bu mo ting ting mas// sgrub po khro zhing tshig pa za// skra rengs shar tsam na gza' stong stong gi bu mo ting ting gi ma ru tse bya ba/ bar du gcod 'ong ste/ lcags kyi la
292b3(1): rire gsum sgril gong chu ba byed du 'ong ste/ rtags slab po khro zhing tshig pa ba/ cho 'phrul 'od 'byung / de gnyen pos bzlog go// gser mig bu mo spyan gcig ma// des ni nyam chung bying ba'o// nyi ma shar ka'i zer la nam mkha' lding gser mig can gyi bu mo zla
292b4(1): gros kyi spyan gcig ma dngos grub 'brog tu 'ong ste/ rtags sgrub pa po nyam chung la/ cho 'phrul sgrub po kun bring por 'ong ba'o// de yang gnyen pos bzlog go// nyin mo rgyu ba klu chen bzhis// 'tshubs ma nad drag snying yang gcus// nyin byed na nyin mo rgyu ba'i
292b5(1): klu chen rigs bzhi 'ong ste/ rtags ni 'chubs ma chen po'am/ nad drag pos btab pa'am/ sring gcu zhing na ba 'ong / cho 'phrul sbal stong ca sbal rmi lam du ze bas/ de'i gnyen pos bzlog go// gnam gyi the'u brad dkar po ga ti ste yang / phur gyi glog mo phrin klu gzhan
292b6(1): nag po tshogs// dpon log pa la sogs pa'i rA tra nag po rang gi rang la za zhes bya ba'i dam sri nag po dang bzhi'o// 'od bzhi dam sri bzhi ru bzung // de'i rtags ni 'od skya hod hod po dang / 'od nag po chu ris can dang / dmar khra ri mo can dang / kham nag dud
293a1(1): kha dang 'od rigs bzhi 'od cho 'phrul mi rigs rmi lam du yong ngo // 'byung po phal pa rgyal 'gong dang // dam med rtags kyis ngos bzung ngo // gzhan yang 'byung po phal gyis bar du gcod de/ rnal 'byor pa la rgyal 'gong dam med
293a2(1): dang / dam nyams dam med dang / sngar gang gnod pa des bar du gcod do// las las skyes pa'i dam gri dang / rkyen las gyur pa'i dam gri dang / gnod par sems pa'i dam gri dang / de dag rtags dang / rmi lam gyis gang yin ngos gzung bar bya'o// rnam par/ mi rtog pas
293a3(1): bzlog pa chos nyid dpal chen sku// sngags dang phyag rgya rab ldan pa'i// pho nya mgyogs byed mang po dang // rang rang gi gnyen pos bzlog par bya/ 2// dang po dgongs ka bzlog pa'i gdul bya ni// dgongs ka'i ting 'dzin
293a4(1): mi gsal na// sngon gyi dus nyul chen mo ni// grib so sdud pa'i dbang mo che// rdzu 'phrul bya rog skad skur ma// de yi 'dul byed ni 'dul skal chen mo ni/ kha dog nub ka'i dmar thag 'dra// ral pa ser sprin
293a5(1): 'khrigs pa bzhin// ral pa sprugs pa'i skra gseb nas// gza' rgod mig dmar char du 'bebs// a la la yi phyag mtshan ni// gnam lcags zhun ma'i khro chu bskol/ khros nas gnyen por zad pa'i tshe/ khro chu
293a6(1): khol ma'i sbyin thang 'bebs// srid pa'i gnam sa dkrug pa skad// srin po'i 'jig rten rba la g.yeng // dam las 'das la btso bsreg byed/ khyod kyi phrin las skal phog pa// dgongs ka'i bar chad byed pa
293b1(1): yi// bdud byed thams cad thal bar rlogs// srod kyi ting 'dzin mi gsal na// gdul bya ni/ sngon gyi nyams len chen mo ni// phyogs skyong bu mo ma rungs pa/ 'dul byed// de yi 'dul skal chen mo ni// thogs
293b2(1): med rlung ltar rgyu ba mo// srid pa'i rgyal mo srog gi bdag/ sred bdag chen mo kun gyi rje// ye shes 'od 'bar rdzu 'phrul can// rtse gcig bsgrub pa'i grogs mdzad ma/ khyod kyi phrin las skal phog pa// srod la
293b3(1): bar chad byed pa yi// bdud byed thams cad rdul du rlogs// gdul bya bstan/ nam phyed bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// dkar mo phyogs kyi ma rungs pa// de yi 'dul byed 'dul skal chen mo ni// ral gri'i lus
293b4(1): la rkang lag glog/ ral pa ser sprin 'khrigs pa 'dra// sngags pas gdungs shing bos pa'i tshe// mchi ma thul thul char du 'bebs// thul thul thigs pa re res kyang // dkar po'i bu bran mang po kun// gzhob
293b5(1): sgog rdog pas brdzis pa bzhin// gso glags med par dmyal thag gcod// rgyal ba'i ngag nyan dam tshig can/ khyod kyi phrin las skal phog pa// nam phyed bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal ba bzhin du brlag
293b6(1): par mdzod// gdul bya ni/ tho rangs par chad byed pa'i bgegs// hor ston bu mo gdug pa can// de yi 'dul byed 'dul skal chen mo ni// mgo ni seng ge'i mgo bo la// hur mo seng ge'i ngar sgra sgrogs// srid
294a1(1): pa'i gnam sa grub pa skad// ral pa ser sprin 'khrigs pa 'dra// sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// rgyal ba'i bka' nyan dam tshig can/ khyod kyi phrin las skra 'phog pa// tho rangs bar chad byed pa'i
294a2(1): bgegs// bdud bgegs par chad thal bar rlogs// shar ka'i ting 'dzin mi gsal na// shar ka'i zer la bar gcod pa/ gdul ba/ srab mda' ring la zhon pa mo// de yi 'dul skal 'dul byed chen mo
294a3(1): ni// dung gi mgo la shel gyi lce// ral pa ser sprin 'khrigs pa 'dra// gnam lcags thog gi ser chen 'bebs// sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// rgyal ba'i bka' nyan tha tshig can/ khyod kyi phrin las dus la
294a4(1): bab// shar ka'i lce la bar gcod pa'i// bdud bgegs thams cad thal bar rlogs// nyin phyed bar chad byed pa ni/ gdul bya// bying 'thib klub pa'i nad kyi bdag/ de yi 'dul skal chen mo ni/ 'dul byed// sku
294a5(1): ni dung gi 'khor lo la// dkar nag gyon pa'i ya mtshan can// srid pa'i gnam ni gos su gyon// dregs pa'i sa ni gdan du bting / khams gsum 'jig rten pang du khyer// srid pa gsum ni khur du khur// nyi
294a6(1): ma'i sbyin thang spyan nas 'char// zla ba'i dmar dwangs zhal nas 'char// lag na ri rab rtse dgu 'thor// shin tu mi bzad gtum chen mo// klu 'dul chen mo'i dus la bab// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya ste// dus la
294b1(1): bab po e ka ma// oM rag sha rA tra/ yag sha tshal pa/ ha na ha na hUM phaT// brjod nas bla ma dang las mkhan gnyis gcig gis g.yas nas bskor gcig gis g.yon nas bskor te bzlog/ gnas skabs kyi bzlog pa ni/ bag zan nam ra sog
294b2(1): la// de la ling+ga rab tu bya/ phud ste gsal// dam can phud gtang ye shes kyi srung / ma go ri dang // las dang 'brel pa dbang mo dang rang dang 'brel/ ba'i srung ma drag tu bskul la/ sbams phur blangs te/ phur pa byin gyis brlabs nas ni// rak+ta sa sbal nub tsam
294b3(1): brug/ gu gul dang tshil chen gyis bdug la pho nyas khro bos ling+ga la dgug/ bstim/ phur/ bskor bya ling+ga la gdab rdo rjes brdung mtshon gyis gtubs btab pa byas ste gzir/ mnan drag po bya'o// bsgrub pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa la// bar
294b4(1): dugacod pa'i bgegs 'dul bsrung ba'i phyir/ lha gang gis bsrung na/ bde gshegs nus pa dril ba gsungs/ bsnyen pa bya ba bstan/ don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ khro rgyal 'bar ba'i skur bsgoms la// bar du
294b5(1): gcod pa'i bgegs byung na/ las la sbyar ba ni// bdag nyid lha dpal chen he ru bsgom// spyi bor gshin rje gshed po rdo rje thogs med lha'i lha dkar po galas 'khor lo gson rdzogs mdzub bsgom// mgrin par rta mgrin rgyal po
294b6(1): dbang chen 'bar ba gsung gi lha dmar po g.yas sbrul zhags g.yon sdigs mdzub la// snying gar badz+ra he ru ka/ che mchog rnon po thugs kyi lha mthing ga rdo rje dril bu// lte bar rdo rje gzhon nu bsam// phrin las rgyal po las kyi lha ljang gu g.yas phur pa g.yon
295a1(1): sdigs mdzub// de las ye shes me yi 'od/ sngags kyi 'gro 'du bstan// rdo rje'i rang bzhin phra mo yis// gang la bya ba'i bgegs rnams kun// bya sgro me yis bcu ma bzhin bsam// rdo rje srin po'i ngur sgra
295a2(1): yis// drag tu bzlas shing gdug pa bzlog/ grangs tshad bstan// brgya las 'das na bgegs rnams bzlog/ gsung thugs drag po'i phrin las sngags// pad+ma he ru ka rta mgrin dbang gi sgra// oM pad+ma kro d+hI shra rI/ yum chen mo
295a3(1): rnams/ badz+ra ki la ya/ karma he ru ka rdo rje gzhon nu/ ma hA yak+kha/ rat+na he ru ka che mchog rnon po gzhin rje/ ka la rU pa/ nag po'i gzugs can/ phrin las gshin rje gshed/ karma raM raM badz+ra dza la raM hUM phaT/ bgegs bskal pa'i mes bsregs// gsang
295a4(1): sngags rgyal po 'di dag ni/ gang la bsrung ba'i yul bstan// rang gi khams rnams 'khrugs pa dang // phya sangs khyer la skabs su bzlas// bde gshegs spyir dril bar chad bsrung // dam tshig khrus lung rgyal mtshan
295a5(1): gyis// dgod ched// mched lcam nyams grib smyung ba'i phyir// bar chod bzlog pa'i don du gsungs// sngags bzlas pa'i yul dang sngags bstan// nyams dang nye na 'di bzlas so// au e ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ yaM ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ baM ho
295a6(1): shud+d+he shud+d+he/ laM ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ raM ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ a he raM/ b+hi he raM/ bi na raM/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ a a a sA hA/ sbal bus rgya mtsho rnyogs byas kyang // dam nyams kyis gnod par mi nus pa'i nus pa ni// rnyog ma med 'drar gnod mi nus/
295b1(1): khrus byed bzlas shing nyams chag bkru// dag byed khrus kyi man ngag yin// yul yang bzung ba bstan// sgrub po drag po'i nad btab bam/ khams 'khrugs snying yang phya sangs khyer// bgegs zhugs nyams len
295b2(1): bzlog par bya/ lha gang gis bsrung ba ni// rdo rje gnod sbyin sngags kyis brdeg/ sngags gang gis bsrung ba bstan// oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ rak+Sha rU tra/ yak+ka tshal pa/ ha na ha na
295b3(1): hUM phaT// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs dar ba na// go rI nag mos bsad pa'i las/ sgrub pa po/ don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus/ bskal pa dus kyi tha ma la// bar du gcod pa'i dgra byung na// ye
295b4(1): shes thugs kyi go rI mas// gnyis med ngang du bsgral ba'i phyir// zhing chen ras la ling+ga dgra gzugs bri// phyag rgya bzhi yis gzugs la dbab/ rdzas dang dkyil 'khor bstan// mtshan ngan rabs chad zod par
295b5(1): gzhug/ 'brub khung nag po e rtsang ldan/ lha'i grangs/ srin mo brgyad kyi dmod mo bri/ rgyu dus// nyi shu gsum gyi nam phyed na// bzlas pa bya thabs/ bzlas la ling+ga gtor mar dbul// gtor ma dgra phyogs zor du
295b6(1): 'phang // brlag par nges te gsang bar rigs// sngags bstan/ oM AHhUM/ gtso bo ha he phaT/ go ra'i ma bzhi hUM ni ri ma tsi ta tsi ta tsa ro ma/ rdul phran rdul phran/ keng keng rag ta rag ta// ma ri sha snying la shad shad/
296a1(1): phug sa la sogs pazhi/ tsin dang ma khrag la ke ke/ hUM tri sha rbad rbad/ dzaHhUM baM hoHdbugs la 'ub 'ub/ a hUM he/ ma mo b+h+yo dza dza/ ru lu ru lu rag mo b+h+yo dza/ sngags grangs dang nus pa/ lan gsum lus ngag
296a2(1): yid dbang byed// lngas ni lnga phung rdul du rlog/ brgyad kyis rnam shes 'bral bar nges// zhi khro 'bar ba man chad nas// dbang phyug mkha' 'gro yan chad kyi// dmod pa'i drag sngags gsungs pa 'di// srin mo rku
296a3(1): ba'i dus su bya// go rI nag mo nyi 'khol gyis// dgra bgegs sgrol ba'i las gsungs pas// gang la dmigs pa gsod par byed// yang dag don la gnas pa la// bar du gcod pa'i gnod bgegs
296a4(1): rnams// bzlog par bya ba'i man ngag gsungs// bdag nyid dpal gyi skur bsgoms la/ pra mo he ni/ rmongs mo yin te las la mngags par bya/ dper na/ mda' gzhus brdeg pa ltar de 'dra'i chu srin 'phen/ gyis zin
296a5(1): pas// oM badz+ra pra mo ha ya/ de mo ha ya/ a ka ri sha ya/ sarba duSh+TAn/ hr-i da ya/ pra mo he ni hUM phaT/ sngags 'di gang gis khri bzlas na// mi bzlog pa ni gang yang med// chu srin rgyal mtshan 'phyar la bzlas// de
296a6(1): nithams cad bzlog par byed/ sgrub pa po la phan par byed pa ni lha yin la gnod par byed pa 'dre yin pas// phan gnod byed pa rnam gnyis po// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// bar chad kyi 'dre yin na gzugs sdug cing sgra snyan yang dri zhim/
296b1(1): lha yin na gzugs mi sdug cing sgra mi snyan yang dri zhim/ de yang lus kyi gzugs dang / ngag gi sgra dang / cho 'phrul dri dang gsum po gang byung ba brtag par bya'o// rnam pa gsum po byung ba na/ 'dre yin par/ dogs pa dang lha yin du re bas chags pa'i sems
296b2(1): spangs te/ rang gi sku phyag rgya gsal ba'i nyams kyi dngos grub blang ngo // de ltar bar chad 'dre dang dngos grub lha'i/ bye brag tu ni shes par bya// gzugs ston pa'i bar chad ni ngang par ston pa yang / kha dog lnga yi dbyibs dang mdog/ gi
296b3(1): gzugs ni dkar ser dmar ldang mthing la sogs pa bar snang gi 'ja' tshon lta bur snang ba'o// dbyibs kyi gzugs ni slar snang ba dang / phyag mtshan du snang ba'o// sgra ni snyan dang mi snyan dang // ce sbrang bung ba rnga yi sgra// sgra brjod pa'i bar chad ni sgra snyan pa
296b4(1): tshangs pa'i gsung dang mi snyan pa yi dwags kyi skad de/ ce spyang gi sgra dang / bung ba'i sgra dang / rnga'i sgra dang / 'brug gi sgra la sogs pa du mar snang ba'o// dri bsung tshor ba'i bar chad ni zhim pa'i/ dri ni[:]gA/ rtsi la sogs pa sgog pa sogs/ mi zhim pa// zhim dang mi zhim
296b5(1): bcas pa'o// gros dri can la sogs pa sna chags pa ste/ mdar na ga thar nas bzang nas pa ma lkog dri yan chad de/ dro'i rnam pa du ma yod pa rnams sa// ra dgas par chad bsal pa ni/ bgegs yin gyi dgas pa yang ngan sems yin te/ chos nyid kyi gnyis las
296b6(1): dog ma grub pas bar chad dngos grub tu shes skyon yon tan tu shes pa'o// bgegs su dogs pas zin pa dang // lha la chags pas bcas pa'i sems// yi dam lha'i grub rtags bzang po ma chags pa yang bzang sems yin te/ chos nyid kyi gshis la ma
297a1(1): grub pas dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa'o// re dogs gnyis med ye shes kyi lhas sgra gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ster du re ba dang 'jig rten pa'i ltas bar du bcad dogs pa gnyis chos kyi dbyings su gcig par blta ba'o// chos kyi
297a2(1): dbyings// blta spyod dngos grub kyi rdzas la ye shes sgra ma tsam du shes nas spyod cing rol pa ni bye brag yin no/ mkhas pas shes/ blta ba rtogs pa yi dam gyi sku gsal bar bsgom pa spyod pa bdud rtsi la rol pa de ni mkhas pa'o// nyams kyi phyag rgyas
297a3(1): rang don sad/ yin par re ba dang 'dre yin par dogs pa'i sems spangs te rang wa'i sgra phyag rgyar gsal ba'i nyams kyis dngos grub blang ba'o// gal te 'byung po gnan par bya// sgrub pa po la ro dogs kyi sems med kyang gal te rtags rtsub mo byung na
297a4(1): mnan pa'i cho ga bya'o// shar dri za/ lho grul bum/ nub klu/ byang gnod sbyin mnan no// mos dang nyams kyis 'jug pa la// lam 'jug 'jig rten bar chad chos// dang po thabs lam gyi bar chad ni/ mtshan bcas mes pas 'jug pas ltung ba dang /
297a5(1): mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa'i nyams kyi ltung ba'o// gang zag de la dus bzhir bar chad bzhi 'jug ste/ lam la 'jug pa na 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi bar chad ni gnyis te/ gnyen 'dun dang 'brel ba la sogs pa'i bar chad byung na zang zing gi sbyin pa phra mo sngon du 'gro ba'i dad pa
297a6(1): brtan pas bsrung ngo // bla ma dang grogs kyi bar chad ni zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / brtse sems sngon du 'gro bas bsrung ngo // de ni khams 'dus pa dang po la 'grub pa'o// lam du zhugs na phyi rol gyi// bdud kyi bar chad bsrung ba dang / lam la zhugs na
297b1(1): phyi rol bdud kyi bar chad ni rdo rje ra ba'i srung 'khor dang / sum b+ha ni'i sngags dang / bla ma dang grogs gzhan gyi rkyen la ltos pa'i sngags mdud kyis bsrung ngo // de ni zabs kyi bar chad kyi bsrung ba bzhi'o// bya ba mang bas na thabs yin pas so// sems ni cung zad
297b2(1): brtan pa na// bdud stobs 'phel ba'i bar chod dang // ni srung ba'i 'khor mgo 'pho ba yin te/ bar du gcod pa'i bdag dang / gcod byed bdud dang / bar chod gsum go sems su shes pa/ sku mar shes pa/ rang bzhin med par shes pa dang gsum gyis
297b3(1): bsrung ste/ 'di ni thabs kyi bar chad la shes rab kyi bzung ba gsum zhes bya ba// stong par shes pas ni shes rab po// de gnyis ni khams 'dus pa bar pa la'ang // sems brtan pa ni ting nge 'dzin// nga ma shes pa'i bar chod do// ni ste klog ka mig tu
297b4(1): brubyung sems brtan par 'dus pas rA tra srin po dang sha sdig pa la sogs pa mi 'tshams pa'i ltas du ma byung ba na ting nge 'dzin ngo shes pas bsam gtan gyi gegs sel bar chad ngo shes pas bdud kyi gegs sel skyon yon tan du slang shes par chad dngos grub tu len shes pas bar
297b5(1): chad zhi ste bar chad med do// khams 'dus pa za ma la 'ong ngo // shes rab mos nyams/ kai/ gzugs/ khe/ sgra/ gai/ lha// kai/ ting 'dzin khe/ sngags gi/ lha nyams ngi/ kyi sad/ shes rab kyi bar chad bsrung ba ni/ stong pa kho na la mos pa dang 'jug
297b6(1): sa shes rab kyi phyogs su ltung ba dang / stong nyams kyi shes rab kyi phyogs su ltung ba'o// de gnyis ka la bar chad bzhi ste/ sems nyams lus kyi sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i bar khams 'dus pa dang po la 'byung / gzugs dang bar ston pa'i bar chad dang / sgra brjod pa'i bar chad
298a1(1): gnyis khams 'dus pa bar pa la song / lha grub chur gnas pa'i bar chad khams 'dus pa tha ma'o// bsrung bsad pa bzhi ni nyams kyis sad/ ting nge 'dzin gyis sad/ sngags kyis sad de/ lha sgrub kyis sad do// gzugs kyi phyi nang bdud yin
298a2(1): la// phyi'i bdud dang po nas nag po'i phyogs bar chad 'ba' zhig byed pa'o// nang gi bdud phan 'dogs gnod pa la tshar gcod rjes bzung bya ba'o// gzugs de la nyams kyi bsad pa dang / lha grub kyis bsad pa gnyis kyis bsrung ngo // de// nyams dang gi/ blta
298a3(1): bas sad pa gnyis// khe// sgra ni ka la sha/ She/ a dang // skra brjod pa'i bar chad la ngag brdas bsrung ste/ ga da sha a bram dbang gi brda'o// ya ra la wa zhes pa dang / gsang ba'i dbang gi brda'o// rtsa 'khor lo bzhi'i yig 'bru'o// gtum mo bsgom
298a4(1): pa'o// oM dang AHhUM 'bru gsum dang // 'bru gsum shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi brda'o// lus ngag yid gsum mnyam par gnas pa'o// oM bzhi rnam par shes pas bsrung // bde ba chen po'i dbang brda ste/ dbang bzhi thob ma thob kyi brda bstan/ lha yin
298a5(1): na thob/ 'dre yin na ma thob pa'o// rtsa dbu mar gnan pa'o// lus brda ni/ sor mo g.yas pa/ ga/ lnga bsdus rtse mo g.yon pas de/ ka/ mnan pa dag/ ni bum dbang rig pa'i dbang lnga thob bam zhes bya'o// mthe ba srin rtse sprad pas gru gsum e yum gyi b+ha ga stim
298a6(1): gsang dbang dngos blangs sam zhes bya'o// la rig byed gcig/ chang bar mdzub mo bcug pa rnam snang / byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste/ lum la rol pa byas sam zhes bya'o// mdzub mo nam mkha' mtshon pa'o// bde ba chen po'i dbang bde stong nam
298b1(1): mamakha' sa bu thob bam zhes bya'o// yan lag gi brda ni bram dbang thob na// sor mo lnga ni phral te bstan/ bas bram dbang thob ces lan no// gsang dbang thob na ni// rdo rje khu tshur yum dang mi phyed pa'i lan no// 'gyur// rdo rje rtse gsum byas te
298b2(1): bstan// lus ngag yid gsum rol pas shes rab ye shes dbang ngo // de thob ces pa'i brda phyag rgya bstan pa'o// mdzub mo nam mkha' mtshon pa'o// bde stong mtshon pa bde ba chen po'i dbang ngo // phyag rgya bstan pas lha dang gegs shan 'byed do// thabs
298b3(1): dang shes rab thun mong ni// grib ma drug tu gnas pa dang // grib ma drug ni dang po dam tshig gi grib ma chen po ste/ srog 'phrog pas dbang gis sel lo// gdon gyi grib ma dang / grogs ngan pa'i grib ma/ zas kyi grib ma/ gnas kyi grib ma dang bzhi 'bring po
298b4(1): ste/ lus sems la sdug bsngal bskyed pas tshogs kyis sel lo// ro'i grib ma ni/ mi blang ba'i ro blangs pa grib ma chung ngu ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'phrog pas na khrus kyis sel lo// grib ma drug go// gdon gyi grib ma chen po drag po'i sbyin bsreg gis sel/ 'bring rgyas pas sel/ tha ma
298b5(1): zhiba'i sbyin bsreg gis sel lo// thig le 'dzag pa drug yang bsrung // shes rab le zhes kyi dbang gi skabs su bshad yin to// sgrib gnyis bsrung bar bya ba yang // sgrib pa gnyis ni nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa'o// dang po ni rnam rtog blan
298b6(1): gas so// de ni 'jug pa sel ba la sogs pas bsrung ngo // shes sgrib ni/ yid ting nge 'dzin yin yang nyams skyon brgyad de/ dbang gi lta ba rnams so// de dag byung rgyal gyi gnad kyis skyon med gsum gyis bsrung ngo // skyon med ma skyes na/ bsam gtan gyi dug shes bya'i sgrib
299a1(1): pa ste/ sgron med skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ phral snang stong zang 'jug smra bar bya ba'i phyir/ sngar rjes spyod ma dza za nyid spang ba bzhin chu nang gi gzugs brtan nam/ ma lang gi gzugs brtan la sogs pa la slong dang gams par byas shing bsrung ba nas smon med ma \u0f7f
299a2(1): mi srid do// shes pa gsal stong du ma gyur na/ gnas khang cung dpangs mtho bar/ lus la sogs pa gnad la phab la/ mig 'byed 'dzum ran par byas te gsal ba sems kyi mtshan nyid/ stong pa sems kyi rang bzhin/ bcos min sems kyi ngo bo/ thabs shes dbyer med du shes
299a3(1): par bya'o// byang rgyal du bsnyungs na/ gsal stong zung 'jug mi skye mi srid do// yang lus bde stong byang du ma chud na/ bsgom gtor rkyen gyis gcal zhing longs spyod kyi rba rlabs ston te/ bde stong mchog skye bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa yi sgrog pa dang // shes bya'i
299a4(1): sgrib pa bsrung ba'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba'i gal po chen po las/ bar chad bgegs chen bzlog pa'i brtag pa ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
299a5(1): cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sgrub pa ma dan yod par bya ba'i phyir mchog thun mong gi dngos grub dam pa blang bar bya ba 'di gsungs so// dngos grub rnams kyi nang nas dam pa zhig blang na mchog dang thun mong ngo // dam shing blang ba'i phyir// snga ma
299a6(1): las ni dkyil 'khor dang rdzas dang lha dang mchod pa dang 'phro 'dra rnams gnas bsgyur nas// sgrub pa chen po yin pas dngos grub len pa'i cho ga kho na brtsam par bya// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni/ dus nyi ma nub nas bslab pa'i cho ga la zhugs nas/
299b1(1): rangs// skya rengs 'char ba'i bar du dngos grub bsgrub/ ba'i cho ga bya'o// zhag grangs su byas pa dang dus kyi bsnyen pa dang ni btag pa'am/ rtags byung ba dngos grub kyi/ mtshan ma brtan po byung na'o// dngos grub blang bar bya// rnal
299b2(1): 'byor gral dang dkyil 'khor lha// dkyil 'khor gnas bskur ba ni dbus zla gam sgo nub tu bstan pa de shar du bstan pa bri/ lha gnas bskur ba ni/ dpal gyi zhal nub tu bstan pa dang / zhal du kha shar du bstan/ go ri ma'i zhal bu yang shar du bstan no// gzhan ma
299b3(1): rnams des 'gro'o// bskur nas cha lugs khro bor bskur// dang po gnas 'gyur gyi rim pa byas la dngos grub kyi zhal bas bsag pa'o// rnal 'byor pa gnas bskur ba ni/ slob dpon nub na yod pa shar du byon la/ mched kyang 'gro'o// bkra shis kyi zhal zas ni mar la sogs
299b4(1): pa dkar po'i rnam pa rnams/ zhi ba shar te 'gyur ba la sogs ser ba'i rgyas pa'i rdzas rnams lho/ phyogs su dgod par bya'o// sha la sogs pa/ dbang gi rdzas dmar ba rnams ni nub tu dgod la drag po'i rdzas chang la sogs pa rnams byang / du bzhag go// rdzas
299b5(1): rnams zhing lpags kyis dgab steng du rdo rje rgya gram gri der rta mgrin bsgoms la/ dang mchod pa'i rdzas rak+ta dang sman bsham pa'o// srung ba'i 'khor los mtshams gcad par bya ste// dngos grub bsgrub la bar gcod pa// srung ba'i 'khor los gnas
299b6(1): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad du gnas pas bar snang bsrung / sa pad+ma 'dab brgyad du gnas pas sa gzhi bzung / rnal 'byor pa'i lus la bsrung ba rang gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bsrung bsrung bar bya/ rnal 'byor ma'i/ lus ngag yid ni ma dag pa na// mi gtsang snod
300a1(1): bcud dag par bkru// snod ma dag pa'i nang du btung ba khyad par can blag tu mi rung ba ltar/ sgrub pa po rnams kyi lus ngag yid gsum dag par bya ba'i don du rang rang gi bzhags pa tha/ sman lam dag par bltas pa la spyod log pas bshags pa
300a2(1): byas la dag par bya'o// gang gis byin gyis brlab na/ rnal 'byor chen po mchog gi chos/ gang byin gyis brlab na/ bdud rtsi chen por ye nas sbyang / gtso bo'i thugs dam skong ba'o// khams gsum thugs rjes bsgral bas na// chags pa
300a3(1): rak+ta rgya mtshor bsgril/ mtha' 'gro'i thugs dam stong ba'o// rgya mtshan nyid dang sngags phyi pa las khyad par du gyur pas khyad par chen po sgrub pa rgyal ba'i bka'/ bdud rtsi dang chang / rgyu gnyis rkyen sngags dang phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin gsum sbyar ba'i
300a4(1): bdud rtsi 'di// snang ba snod srid pa bcud snang ba bdud rtsi chen por rang shar ba'i rdzas// rgyal ba chud sde bas ma yas pa nas bshad pa'i lha thams cad kyang zhi khro gnyis su ma 'dus pa med pas zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul/ hA dang po/
300a5(1): snang srid rak+ta'i rgya mtsho gnyis pas don dbang gi gnas/ sam rang bzhin du gyur/ gsum pa mchod rdzas kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs pa bdud rtsir gyur// ro mchog brgya ldan bdud rtsi chen por gnas// stong gsum stong gi dkyil 'khor
300a6(1): na// sku ru snang ba sku'i dkyil 'khor zhi khro'i sku// gsung du snang ba/ grag pa gsung gi dkyil 'khor zhi khro'i gsung // thugs su snang ba dran rtogs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhi khro'i thugs// stong tshigs 'dzab mchod gzhi stong tshigs kyis
300b1(1): mchod pa la brten pa'o// dgug pa yan lag don spyan drang ba dang // phyag mchod bshags bstab dngos grub blang // bsnyen pa'i lha/ zhi ba sgrub pa'i lha khro bsnyen bsgrub mtshams kyi lha'o sbyor ba'i// lha rnams dngos grub bsdus
300b2(1): la blang // ye shes lha dang rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/ dus kyi bsnyen pa/ da ni zhag gi grangs kyang tshang lags so// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa/ bsgrub pa'i nam yang langs lags so// bzlas brjod gi bsnyen pa'i grangs
300b3(1): kyang tshang lags so// zhag tu bslab pa'i dus drug gi cho ga tshang bas na/ mchod pa'i grangs kyang tshang lags so// zhag grangs dam bcas bsnyen pa mthar phyung ste/ dgongs pa'i tshad ni/ ye shes 'od zer 'khrugs tshul mchog
300b4(1): bsnol nas// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i grangs ni khyed la 'bul// dmigs bsam grub pa'i dngos grub bdag la gsol// mkhas rtogs chos kyi dngos grub bdag la gsol// g.yung drung tshe yi dngos
300b5(1): grub bdag la gsol// dbang zang bu tsha'i dngos grub bdag la gsol// mdzod ldan nor gyi dngos grub bdag la gsol// rgya mtsho klu yi dngos grub bdag la gsol// mthu dang rtsal gyi dngos grub bdag
300b6(1): la gsol// sprul pa 'gyed pa'i dngos grub bdag la gsol// phrin las bzhi yi dngos grub bdag la gsol// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// sgrub mchog dam las mi 'da' yis// dam tshig pa la
301a1(1): bzhengs pa yi/ dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor bcas kyang // dam tshig gnyen las ma 'da' zhig/ dam tshig gnyen po srog gzung phyir// bdag gi dam tshig rdo rje mchog gsum po// ye shes rtsa ba lnga
301a2(1): yi sku gsung thugs/ kyi dngos grub blang ba'o// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig bdag bsrung na// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ yan lag gi dam tshig bsrung ba'i sgo nas dngos grub blang ba'o// mi spong ba yi dam tshig bdag
301a3(1): bsrung na// bla med sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dang // yon tan phrin las dngos grub stsal du gsol// dang du blang ba'i dam tshig bdag bsrung na// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dngos grub gsol// spyod pa'i
301a4(1): dam tshig bdag bsrung na// dngos grub mchog gsol ye shes lha// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig bdag bsrung na// sgrub pa po la dbang dang dngos grub gsol// 'bras bu sgra gsung thugs mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i sgo nas dngos
301a5(1): blang ba'o// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang gsum// mi zad rgun gyi 'khor lo'i dngos grub gsol// 'bras bu sku bzhi'i sgo nas dngos grub blang ba'o// chos skra longs skra sbrul pa'i sku// ngo bo nyid kyi sku yi dngos grub
301a6(1): gsol// zhes sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdag po rje btsan dam pa des/ phyi rabs kyi sgrub pa po blo dman pas go zhing rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ lung du bstan pa'i dgongs pas dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga
301b1(1): gsungs pa'o// he ru ka'i gal po las/ sgrub pa chen po'i brtag pa ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las sna tshogs kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// las kyi bya ba ma lus
301b2(1): pa// bsgrub phyir dngos grub ma lus pa// he ru ka las 'byung bas na// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgrub// gang zhig 'chi ba bslang 'dod na// he ru ka ni zhal brgyad pa// g.yas kyi zhal gsum sngo dang dmar
301b3(1): dang ser// g.yon gyi zhal gsum ldang dmar bdud ka'i mdog/ steng zhal gcig ser po zhi ba ste/ rtsa zhal dang / sku lus dung gi mdog can mdangs/ g.yas dang po/ sdigs mdzub g.yon dang po rdo rje g.yas 'og dri la g.yon
301b4(1): 'og zhags 'dzin/ g.yas gsum pa/ bum pa g.yon gsum pa ral gri bzhi pa mdung thung dang / lnga pa/ dgra sta zod pa dang drug pa lcags kyu gzhu/ dang / bdun pa kha T+wAM mda' dang tho ba dang / za ma g.yas g.yon brgyad pa na/ 'khor
301b5(1): lo dang mi 'jigs dngos grub gsol// gsal nas sngags 'di khri bzlas na// 'chi ba thams cad 'tsho bar byed// dus min mtshon dang chu dang g.yang la ltung ba sogs 'chi ba zhi 'gyur zhing // 'chi ba las ni nges
301b6(1): par slong // oM a mr-i ta saM dzI ba ni ma hA a mr-i ta su lu khe dzI baM pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba badz+ra pad+ma sa ma yo ge bo d+hi tsit+ta tha bi ti mur te hUM hUM a A a A swA hA// thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
302a1(1): gyi// dbus su a la sngags kyis bskor// bar do nas drangs shi ba yi// lus la rnam shes thim 'gyur ba// zhag bdun dag gis 'chi ba bslang // yang na zhag gsum dag na ldang / rmad byung rol pa'i
302a2(1): sngags kyi 'chi bdag bskrad pa// hi hi/ 'don pa'o/ ha ha/ mgu ba/ ho ho/ dgyes pa/ he he/ sngags brjod pa'o// hUM hUM/ rdzogs pa'o// phaT phaT/ gsod pa/ hUM hUM/ phur bu rdeg pa/ dza dza/ 'gugs pa/ sa sa/ bsnyen bslar ro/ hUM b+h+rUM/ rigs lnga swa/ hUM
302a3(1): b+h+yAM/ gsung / hUM b+h+yAM/ thugs/ hUM b+h+yAM/ yon tan/ hUM b+h+yAM/ phrin las/ ha ha/ 'bar ba'o// b+h+rUM b+h+yAM/ 'bar ba'o// tr-i tr-i/ 'gugs pa'o// t+yaM tAM/ mchod pa'o// sang sang / dngos grub ster/ hi hi/ rmongs pa/ laM laM/ shes pa/ d+h+waM d+haM/ 'dzin pa/ dzaM dzi/ 'gugs pa'o//

302a5(1): 'chi bdag skrod// thun par dag tu ro la ni// nyung dkar dag gis brdeg cing brab// 'chi bdag lag nas shor nas ni// rang lus zhugs nas ldang bar 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// char pa
302a6(1): 'bebs par 'dod pa na// pad+ma 'dab brgyad lte ba la// he ru ka ni zhal bzhi pa// phyag brgyad g.yas g.yon dang ba rdo rje sdigs mdzub zhags/ de 'og gnyis/ thod pa kha T+wAM de 'og gsum pa lcags kyu mdung / de 'og bzhi
302b1(1): pa/ brgya byin pags bcang te'u bsnams// sku lus mdog ni sngon po la/ zhal bzhi la// g.yas zhal dud pa dmar po la// g.yon pa dud pa ljang gu yin// steng zhal klu bdud khyung gi gdong // chu lha'i gdan la rab
302b2(1): tu bzhugs// mtha' yas dkar po nor rgyas sngo// 'jog po dmar la pad+ma ljang // pad+ma chen po ser po ste// dung skyong du ba'i mdog can la// stobs rgyu ljang gu ma dros ser// gtso bo'i thugs kar 'khor lo
302b3(1): la// hUM suM naM hUM sku gsung thugs// klu rnams snying la bkod pa ni// hUM ni hUM naM rnam par dgod// sngags 'di thun bzhir stong phrag bzlas// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hUM naM na ga bar sha pa la bar sha pa la hUM phaT/
302b4(1): na ga rA dza b+ha ri sha ya d+ha ki ni dza la sham ba ra hUM phaT swA hA/ bum pa 'o mas yongs bkang bzlas/ chu mig tu blug la klas khrus byas par bsam mo// 'o ma khrus rang nyid btung char ma phebs na 'o mas sbyin sreg bya// dngul
302b5(1): snod nyung dkar chu blugs zlas// klu sman bzlas la tsu mag gas klu gnas pa'i sar s+tha/ 9// oM aM a nan tA ya mtha' las hUM nan hUM swA hA/ hUM baM ba su ki nar rgyas hUM nan hUM swA hA/ oM ta tak+Sha ka 'dag pa hU~M
302b6(1): nan hUM swA hA/ oM paM pad+ma pad+ma hUM nan hUM swA hA/ oM maM ma hA pad+ma pad+ma chen po hUM nan hUM swA hA/ oM shaM shang kha pA la dung sbrang hUM nan hUM swA hA/ oM kaM kar ko Ta stobs kyi chu hUM nan hUM swA ha/ oM aM a na ba tap+ta ma dros pa hUM
303a1(1): nan hUM swA ha/ oM baM ba ru NA ya dbus kyi gdan chu lha'i sngags nA ga d+hi pa ta ye nA gaM baR+Sha pa ya hUM nan hUM swA hA// nyi shu rtsa gcig rab bzlas na// char pa 'bebs shing lo thog rgyas// oM u gra shA la
303a2(1): pa ti baR+Sha ba ya shI g+haM/ IM dz+yo ti ni ra NA bar+Na ba ya shI g+h+raM/ oM nAM swA hA// skul tshig ldan pa'i phreng sngags 'di// bzlas na char pa 'bebs par 'gyur// 'byor pa'i longs spyod 'phel 'dod na// gnod 'dzin
303a3(1): nag po zhal gcig pa// g.yas na thod pa khrag bkang 'dzin// g.yon na ne'u le'i rkyal pa bsnams// gcer bu rgyan med zhabs kyis ni// rnam thos sras ni ser po mnan// nang par bya rog ma langs
303a4(1): dus// gtsang ma'i snod du chu sbyin gtang // chu ni gtor mar bcas pa 'bul// sngags 'dis kha yang byin gyis brlab// oM in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swA hA// lag g.yas mthe bong mdzub mo sbyar// skyong me kha
303a5(1): bstan lan gsum bzlas// lag g.yas thod pa bum par bcas// rgyun sngags 'di ni dgod par bya// oM dzam b+ha la dza len+d+ra ya swA hA// shin tu mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// gnod sbyin dbang mo chen mo la// brgya
303a6(1): rtsa brgyad kyis chu sbyin bya// 'dod pa'i longs spyod char pa 'bebs// IM dzaM laM swA hA// 'di ni dbul ba kun sel ba'i// longs spyod yid bzhin bang mdzod can// dben gnas bsten pas kun sdud
303b1(1): pa// sgrub rdzas 'gugs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// lo thog bsrung ba rgyas mdzad pa'i/ sgra mdog/ nag mo phyag na rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / khyab 'jug sku mdog nag po phyag na 'khor lo
303b2(1): 'chang ba dang // brgya byin dkar po phyag na rdo rje kha gdengs dang // gshin rje nag po phyag na be con 'chang byed cing // dus kyi sku mdog ser mo phyag na zhags pas bcing ba yi// dri la ka ki dang lha lnga spyi yi ka li badz+ra
303b3(1): sngags// las bcol bur pa na di sha phyogs bcing bar bya'o// A~M ka ki ka ki/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ gur ma ya yA/ bi d+han+sa ya oM hUM phaT swA hA/ A~M kA li badz+ra d+ha rI/ nag mo rdo rje 'dzin ma/ lo ka na ha na/ 'jig rten
303b4(1): slong ma/ biSh+Ta tsakra ha na/ khyab 'jug gi 'khor los rgyob/ in+d+ra badz+ra ha na/ brgya byin gyi rdo rjes rgyob/ ya ma daN+Da ha na/ gzhin rje'i be tson gyis rgyob/ ka la pA she na ha na/ dus kyi zhags pa nag po rgyab/ oM hUM phaT swA ha/ lha rigs lnga po khyod kyis srungs/
303b5(1): nyung dkar thal chen bzlas byas nas// 'bum du bzlas nas gtor byas na// yul khams gang nas 'byung ba yi// ser ba gcod par the tshom med// sngags 'di rnams gzhi legs sbyar yin 'dug kyang mig nor chan cher
303b6(1): 'dug pas slar dpyad dgos/ srin po za snas shar bcing ba// pArbaM di shaM ban+ta mi/ pra da k+Sha sno na/ drag po gdong gi lho bcing ba/ ma ra k+Sha da k+Shi Na di sham b+han+na mi/ srin po gdong gis nub bcing ba/ a ta ha so na/ na ma rak+ta sa pash+tsi me d+hi/ sha
304a1(1): ba tra mi/ bi ti gnod sbyin gyis byang bcing ba sha na ma rak+Sha sa/ ut+ta ra pas di sham ban d+ha/ ban d+ha kar sno/ spyir dril te steng bcing ba/ na ma rak+Sha sa/ Ar+g+haM ban d+ha mi/ kar ko ta ko/ bud da ma ni/ bcug na nor
304a2(1): bus 'og bcing ba/ sa ta ma ban d+ha mi/ mi na nA ga rA dza/ di sha ma ban d+ha mi/ bi di sham ba na d+ha mi/ drag shul can gyis mtshams bcing ba/ ra ta ra oM he ru/ ti ka yi/ pan ta re ta ke'u/ kan ta re/ kan ta ra ta ya ti/ na di na
304a3(1): di ya hi/ ban d+ha mi na ma sA ha/ steng 'og phyogs mtshams su ma gnas par song zhig/ bum pa gtsang mar lo tog phud// mngar gsum dkar gsum blugs nas ni// lha yi tshogs la 'bul zhing bsngo// bcom ldan tshogs kyi
304a4(1): gtso bo yis// zla ba re la dus brgyad kyi// ser ba gtong ba bsrung ba'o// rnal 'byor las rnams kun bsgrub na// dben pa'i gnas su maN+Dal bya/ khrag gi zla gam steng du ni// srin mo'i lto bar ma mo'i
304a5(1): sku// thod pa'i nang na bzhugs pa la// mdun na wa sha'i dam rdzas dgram// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya ke na shaM ki ma bra du ha ma hUM b+h+yo hUM dzaHdzaHsrin mo 'od 'dus shang ka ti'i// nyi shu gsum la dbu btsugs nas// gnam
304a6(1): stong bar du bsgrub par bya// grub nas bsrung bzlog bsad pa 'grub// bzlog na thal chen nyung dkar la// sngags bzlas phyogs bcur gtor ba na// lha srin dam sri'i bar chad dag/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzlog

310b4(1): brdung ba'i sngags/ AM d+harma ga/ d+ha tu sA ha/ rgya nas dbyung ba'i/ IM a ngapra ti tiSh+Tha badz+ra sA ha/ bzhugs su gsol ba'i/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma Ni sha ta dI pa te dza la dza la d+harma d+hA tu gan+d+he swA hA/ rab tu gnas pa'i sngags nas la bzlas la
310b5(1): gtor// gshegs su gsol ba/ oM swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he A ha ra A ha ra A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya d+harma d+ha tu gar+b+he swA hA/ bskor ba bya ba'i sngags/ na/ ngi mo phyag 'tshal lo/ b+ha ga wa te rat+na ke tu rA dzA ya/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gi rgyal ba
310b6(1): la/ ta thA ga ta ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa la/ ar+ha te b+h+yaHdgra bcom pa rnams la/ saM myaka saM[:]bud+d+ha ya/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ tad+ya[:]thA/ 'di lta ste/ au rat+na rat+na/ rin po che rin po che/ ma hA rat+na/ chen po rin po che/ rat+na rin po che
311a1(1): bi dza ye rnam par rgyal ba la swA hA/ bzod par gsol ba'i sngags/ oM a 1/ gar+b+he swA hA// mchod pa rnam pa lnga yang dbul// nas 'bru la rten 'brel gyi gsang sngags bzlas byas nas/ la stag pa'i nang du
311a2(1): blublag la gdab bo// nang du blugs la stug pa ye shes sgyu ma'i ngang las nang na/ yi dam lha// gzhal yas khang na gzhugs par bsam// mthar thug 'bras bu'i sku gdung ni// sku gsum sa la gnas pa ni// ye shes rnam lngas
311a3(1): brgyan par 'gyur// bcu gcig kun du 'od la chos su/ bcu gnyis ma chags pad+ma can longs su/ bcu gsum yi ge 'khor lo chags chen sbal swa// chos kyi sku la rab tu bzhugs// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po las/ gdung bsreg
311a4(1): phrin las kyis sku gdung bzhengs su gsol ba'i brtag pa ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsang ba tshe'i las 'di 'gro ba'i ched du gsungs so// rang don du
311a5(1): lo stong drug brgya thub pa la gzhan don du bsgyur nas bzhugs pa'o// tshe dbang rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i phyir// rdo rje g.yung drung gsang ba'i mkhar// 'gyur ba med pa'i tshe ni rdo rje pha lam lta bu'o// sku tshe ring ba'i dpa'o// nyi zla bzhin du rab gnas pa// tshe mchog
311a6(1): gsang ba 'chi med 'grub// dpal tshangs pa'i tshe lo ltar thub pa'am/ lha'i dbang po'i tshe ltar thub pa'o// tshe lo stong drug brgyar gnas pa'i rig 'dzin no// gsang sngags gsang ba bsgrub pa'i gang zag gis/ dang po che'i dngos grub kyis rang
311b1(1): skal gyi tshe las khyad par du 'phags pa 'grub ste/ tshe lo brgya pa yin na nyis brgyar gnas pa'am/ tshe lo drug cu pa yin na brgyar gnas pa lta bu'o// dang por tshe yi dngos grub ma thob na// bgegs kyi rkyen gyis tshe srog par bcad nas// bla na med
311b2(1): pa'i byang chub mi 'thob pas// dang por bdag don tshe yi bsgrub pa bya// hUM zhes brjod pas phyi nang snod bcud dang lus ngag yid/ gsum/ bsregs nas stong pa'i ngang las gnyis bsam pa sngags 'di brjod pa//
311b3(1): pa/ badz+ra shrI he ru ka hUM/ zhes pa gyi/ dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang la nang 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad steng 'og gnyis te bcu pa/ khro ba me ri 'dab 'byor// sgo nga'i sbubs lta bu'i nang na khro bo bcu me ri me dpung 'bar/
311b4(1): pa'o// de'i dbus su[:]hIHzhes pas hrIHlas dpal rta mgrin zhal gsum pa/ sku mdog/ dmar po phyag drug pa 'jigs pa/ dbyug pa g.yu 'brug bsnams/ de'i/ thugs kar[:]e gru gsum las chos kyi 'byung gnas
311b5(1): bsgom de'i dkyil du b+h+rUM/ la// gzhal yas khang de'i nang du dpal chen he ru ka/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa bsgom de yi thugs nang du/ bdag khrag 'thung zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bsgom/ rdor dril 'chang // de yi snying
311b6(1): gi dkyil du pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa la// de'i dkyil du yi ge a dang nr-i bsam/ 'dab ma brgyad la oM b+h+yAM badz+ra A yu She hUM AHzhes pa brgyad bsam/ de la/ nr-i ljang gu gnas pa ni thog ma med pa nas nyon mongs pas bcings pas 'khor ba'i ra sme
312a1(1): ba dang log par 'brid pa rgyu/ de la/ a dkar po ni mtho ris thar par 'gro ba'i gzhi/ yin no// de la/ nr-i sbyor ba'i byer/ pad+ma nas yig 'bru rnams med la gsal bar dgod / brgyad par gnas// oM b+h+rUM badz+ra A yu She
312a2(1): hUM AHoM las drangs pa'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis gti mug sbyang // hUM las drangs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis ni zhe sdang sbyang tAM las drangs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis ni nga rgyal sbyang la// 'dod chags hrIHlas drangs pa brgya rtsa brgyad
312a3(1): kyis 'dod chags sbrang las phrag dog ha las drangs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis phrag dog spang zhes bya// de ltar/ 'od lnga dkar dmar sar mthing sdang las 'od 'bros te/ nr-i la phog pas dug lnga sbyongs// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i nr-i yang kha
312a4(1): dog lnga/ 'i rang bzhin du gnas pa da/ par/ 'phros nas don gnyis byas chung 'dus te nr-i la thim pas hUM du gyur// a las 'ad yi 'phro la 'dus pas zla ba'i gab ce kha sbyor du gyur pa dang hUM/ du gyur rgya las 'ad 'tshal/ bskul
312a5(1): don gces byas 'od phung chen por gnas par 'gyur/ sngags 'di brjod pas me shes sems dpa' sna tshan gang bar gyur par bsam/ s+pho Ta badz+ra sa twa a oM/ ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang / bde la dbang bskur ba byin brla tha/ dbang
312a6(1): byin nas// zla ba gab tshe 'i nang na/ pad+ma'i yig 'bru gsal/ bar bya/ de las// 'od 'phros pas bde gshegs kyi sku dang ye shes dang / khams gsum gyi 'gro ba'i bkrag dang gzi mdangs dang // rtsi bcud thams cad
312b1(1): bsdus nas ye shes sems dpa' zla bar bcas/ pa la/ thub thub// 'dus te thim par bsam mo// ma gsal bar du bzlas pa bya/ 'o// 'di ni yang dag thugs kyi tshe sgrub yin// rdzas dang yo byad dag la rag ma
312b2(1): lus/ thugs ye shes kyi man ngag gi bslab pa'o// bsgrub pa'i dus ni gung sangs nas nyi ma ma shar ba'i bar dang / nyi ma/ nub nas sa ni ma sros pa'i bar du bya/ ste/ 'dis ni// tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin 'thob par
312b3(1): byed pa'i// ye shes thugs kyi man ngag bsgrub pa'o// gzhan don byed par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ling tshe dgu pa'i dbus su gtso bo le'u tshe brgyad la lha mo brgyad dkyil 'khor bar khams la khro bo baH/ sgo dang
312b4(1): bcas// bum pa tshe chang zan la mda' dar dmar// dkyil 'khor yang na ci rig bkod pa dang // mtshams bcad dpal gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed byas nas// sma sha nag mo tshe yi pho nya mngags// tshe bdag chen mo
312b5(1): he ru ka/ thugs mchog/ dbang du sdud mdzad tshe'i srung ma rta mgrin dpal// gza' skar 'joms pa'i steng phyogs kyi bla gza' kar lag nas tshe 'gugs pa'i wa hUM ka ra/ shar phyogs// dri za'i lag nas tshe 'gugs pa'i rtsa/ 'dul ba rnam
312b6(1): par rgyal/ shar lho drang srong me lha'i lag nas tshe 'gugs pa// dbyug sngon drag srong me lha 'joms/ lho/ 'chi bdag gi lag nas srog 'phrog pa tshar gcod gshin rje gshed/ lho nub// srin po 'i lag nas sha khrag 'gugs pa/ 'dul ba mi
313a1(1): g.yo mgon/ nub phyogs// klu rnams kyi lag nas dpal 'phrog pa'i bsrung mdzad rta mchog dpal/ nub byang // rlung lha'i lag nas dbugs 'phrog pa'i 'joms pa'i gzhan mi thub/ byang tshugs// gnod sbyin gyi lag
313a2(1): nas longs spyod 'gugs pa'i lha/ dbang bsgyur bdud rtsi 'khyil// bgegs rnams kyi lag nas srog 'phrog pa bsrung mdzad khams gsum rgyal// stobs chen gyis klu gnyan sa bdag gi lag nas cho 'dren 'dul// mkha' 'gro ma
313a3(1): brgyad sprul ba// shar nas dkar mo zhi mdzad ma// lho nas rkun mo rgyas mdzad ma// nub nas rmongs mo dbang sdud ma// byang nas thal byed gsong la brtson// spos mo dang ni sme mo dang // gtum mo chen mo ma tshogs
313a4(1): ma// swa sha nag mo tshe yi \u0f7fbdag/ tshe bdag chen mos tshe drongs la// 'chi med rdo rje dpal gyi be'u ru// mi 'gyur brtan par mdzad du gsol/ lha rang rang gi ming pa'i zhabs la sngags 'dis dgug ga/ a yur+d+ha na b+h+r-i nr-i dza
313a5(1): dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa mchod// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bsdu// 'gro ba rigs drug gi sgrib pa sbyang // sku dang ye shes mthu dang byin rlabs dang // bkrag dang gzi mdangs thams cad bsdus
313a6(1): te thugs kyi ga 'ur bsdu// bsdus pa khro bcus srid pa'i rlung gis yang mi thar bar bsrung / ste bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu ba 'dod na// snang grags chos rnams thams cad gzhal yas khang la bsdu de rta mgrin la
313b1(1): bsdu gzhal yas 'dus/ rta mgrin yang khrag 'thung thugs kyi lha la he ru ka la bsdu de yang ye shes sems dpar 'dus/ de yang hUM la bsdu// hUM gi de yang rim pas thig le spyi gtsug tshangs par 'i bu ga thim/ pas dbu'i gtsug tor grub
313b2(1): pa'o// 'chi bdag bdud bcom dbu yi gtsug tor 'grub// thugs kyi hUM nyid sku yi gtso bor gyur// tshe yi rig 'dzin nyi zla'i tshe dang mnyam// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po las/ rdo rje tshe bsgrub pa ste
313b3(1): brtag pa bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba ngan song nas drang ba'i dgongs pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig tshe 'das nas zhag gsum brgyal ba ltar chos nyid rang lugs
313b4(1): gnas/ pa'o// de nas zhag gsum par rang gi lus yin snyam pa'i bag chags kyis srid pa bar do'i gnas su 'khyam/ gzhin rje chos rgyal gyi drung du las kyi ma long mthong nas// 'chi bdag bran byas las kyis kha lo bsgyur// bag chags
313b5(1): khams gsum 'khor bar yang yang skye// las dge sdig gi dbang du 'gro bas na bdun tshigs zhes bya'o// bar do'i gnas nas thugs rjes drang ba'i phyir// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i lho phyogs su// dmyal ba gru gsum sgo
313b6(1): gcig dbus ni tri// yi dwags zla gam sgo gcig pre dmar dbus// dud 'gro zlum po du ni rgya mtsho'i dbus// sog ka sgo gcig nr-i dbus gling bzhi'i mi// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi lha min su ser po// pad+ma 'dab
314a1(1): brgyad a dkar lha yi gnas// bum pa rdzas dang gzungs tha ga kha rgyan bcas/ khyad par gyi mchod pa// sman raka gtor ma gsum dang thun mong mchod pa lnga/ 'gugs pa// lcags kyu bgegs bskrad pa gu
314a2(1): gul nyung dkar sngags kyi mda'// rgyab rten dang bral ba'i gshed 'bral lo// mtshan/ lha yi thub pa brtson 'grus chos ston phyag mtshan pi wang bsnams/ mtshan/ lha min thub pa bzod pa'i chos ston phyag mtshan go cha gyon// mi
314a3(1): yi thub pa gseg par tshul khrims bsrung // byol song thub pa po ti shes rab sgron// yi dwags thub pa sbyin gtor rin chen sgom// dmyal ba'i thub pa bsam gtan me dang chu// dmyal khams rdo rje gdan gyi
314a4(1): 'og nas 'dren// gnas gang na gnas na// dmyal ba'i srog snying sa bon yi ge tri nag po// yi dwags gnas grong khyer ser skra'i gnas nas drongs// bkres skom srog gi snying po pre dmar po// dud 'gro phyi yi rgya mtsho
314a5(1): chen po'i nang // glen lkugs srog snying du ni du dkar gnas// mi yi gnas ni gling bzhi gling phan bcas// 'gyur byed nr-i ldang mi yi thub snying yin// ri rab khong seng nang na lha min gnas// 'thab rtsod lha min
314a6(1): srog snying ser po su// lha yi gnas ni ri rab rtse la gnas// de yi srog snying a dkar 'dod yon chags// lha yi yon tan ni mngon par shes pa mnga'// lha ma yin gyi yon tan ni mgo bcad 'byar bar
314b1(1): 'gyur// mi la dam tshig sdom pas lam sna 'dren// byol song rnams ni lto gos btsal bar sla// yi dwags zas skom bsngos pas tshims par 'gyur// dmyal ba sngon gyi las dran snga phyi shes// tshe ring lha yin lha
314b2(1): min rtag tu 'thab// bde sdug/ 'gyur ba mi la ltos gos gnyis kyis sbyangs// sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal brtseg mar spyod pa'i byol song dang // bkres skom yi dwags tsha grang dmyal ba'i gnas// rang bzhin
314b3(1): gnas pa'i bar do gnas lugs kyi don rtogs par bya/ gzhi ru gnas// chos nyid bar do blta ba zag gcad pa dag la gnas pa dang // ting 'dzin par bsgom pa nyams su blang ba do 'byongs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// srid pa'i
314b4(1): bar ma do na las kyi 'phro brgyad 'khyams pa rnams/ bdun tshigs phan pa'i dpe// gdung chen mi brgyas theg par mi 'gyur yang / gdung chen de// lteng ka'i chur gnas na mdzub mo reg tsam 'dren/ gyis gar 'dod// gson po'i
314b5(1): dus na dge ba chen po byas pa las gzhin po'i dus su dge ba chung ngu phan pa tshe'o/ mi brgyas mi thub lam log kyang // grags pa'i dpe// ting 'dzin phra mos rang gi gnas su 'gugs// skye ba rnam bzhi nas 'gugs thabs// sgong skyes bcag nas
314b6(1): mngal gyi nang nas 'dra la// skye ba blangs nas khro bor sprul nas bsgral// rdzus skyes de ma thag tu 'gugs pa dang // thabs mkhas pa'i dpe// lcags kyi gtun bu chung yang chu'i gting du 'gro// de nyid thabs la mkhas
315a1(1): @na sbrang skar byas na mkha' la 'phyo// dug lnga rnam dag ye shes chen po'i khrus// rnam shes thugs kyi khrus gsol/ phung po rnam dag pa'i/ dang po bris sgra la sogs la ma long gis khrus gsol/ de nas ming byang la khrus bya/ chu de chu bo'am
315a2(1): gtsang sar bskul lo// me long ye shes sku khrus kyis// zhe sdang nyon mongs bag chags bkrus// mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag pa'i// chos dbyings ye shes khrus gsol bas/ ma
315a3(1): rig gti mug bag chags sbyang // rnam par snang mdzad sku thob shog/ yon tan gyi/ tshor ba'i phung po rnam dag pa'i// mnyam nyid ye shes khrus gsol bas// nga rgyal dri ma dag gyur nas// rin chen 'byung ldan skur
315a4(1): 'grub shog/ gsung gi sku khrus// 'du shes phung po rnam dag pa'i// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes chus// 'dod chags nyon mongs dag gyur nas// snang ba mtha' yas sku mchog brnyes// phrin las// 'du byed phung po rnam dag

315b5(1): gsang hUM thugs sna yon tan ha/ phrin las// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams su// sgro sku tshangs pa'i tha ga nas mi dkar bste/ gsung mgrin pa nas ya dmar/ thugs sring gnas phyi mthing gso/ ba rnam pa gsum dag bya// rdo rje'i
315b6(1): bzlas pa 'di yis ni// rdo rje sku rdo rje 'gyur ba med/ gsung rdo rje 'gag pa med/ thugs rdo rje skye shi med par 'gyur ro// gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur// oM hUM swA hrIHa phaT dza/ oM AHhUM/ yang byung // sangs rgyas rnams kyis sku
316a1(1): gsung thugs/ oM a hUM bsgom// bsgoms nas mchod pa'i mchog bya'o// brtag pa// ye shes rdo rje byas na ni// rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur// oM AHhUM phaT dza// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku
316a2(1): gsung thugs// bsam nas gzugs kyi mchog brtag pa// ye shes rdo rjer rab tu bya// 'di ni byang chub mchog thob pa'o// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+hA tu a/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ a nr-i su tri pre du/ sho d+ha
316a3(1): ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ dang po rten bcas mi'i lus su dbug la tshogs/ bsags// gnyis pa lha dbang sta gon gnas/ tshogs rdzogs nas lha'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs// gsum pa dkyil 'khor rang gi
316a4(1): skal pa dang sbyar nas/ dbang bskur nas// bzhi pa dbang thob nas zhi bas bsnyen pa bya/ bsnyen pa rdzogs nas// lnga pa khro bo bsgrub pa la// drug pa a las sgrub pa'i 'bras bu rang don du chos sku 'thob// bdun pa gzhan don du
316a5(1): gzugs sku 'gro don mdzad// bdun tshogs zhes ni mgon pos gsungs// he ru ka'i gal po chen po las/ bar do nas sangs rgyas pa'i brtag pa ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku
316a6(1): gsung thugs kyi rten rab tu gnas pa 'di dag gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rten rnams la// ye shes bzhugs pa'i byin rlabs can// 'khor ba'i 'byung ba lha yi gnas// sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid yin//
316b1(1): dang po skar ma rgyal la zhugs// dben pa'i gnas su maN+Dal ni// pad+ma bzhi pa bris pa la// bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya// me long ngos la tsan+dan chus// rten 'brel yi ge bris nas ni// brgya brgya tshang nas
316b2(1): bum par blug/ rin chen sna tshogs sman gyi chu// sngags ldan bum pa gang ba la// gzungs thag sngags pa lngas bzung nas// rigs lnga spyi'am so so ru// bskyed cing spyan drangs mchod pa dang // rigs lnga'i sngags
316b3(1): la rten 'brel gdags// zhag gsum rab tu bzlas pa bya// yang na ma 'byor gcig gis bsgrub// chos sku'i rten ni mchod rten la// phyi rgyu'i chos lam lnga sa bcu rdzogs// rgyu nang la 'bras bu'i chos sku gsung thugs rdzogs//
316b4(1): 'bras chos rnams rdzogs par bsgom// rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten nang // mchod rten nyer lha khang yin te lha khang dang mchod rten rab gnas 'dra'o// sku gsum sangs rgyas dus gsum bzhugs// gzugs sku'i sku gzhi'i lha ni
316b5(1): rten ni sku gsung thugs// lugs ma ri mo la sogs pa// spyir na rnam par snang mdzad bzhi// yang na rigs bdag gang yin lha// po ti gsung gi gzhi dang lha ni/ glegs bam la sogs gsung // mtha' yas mchog tu
316b6(1): bsgom pa bya// yang na yi dam rigs gang yin// rdo rje dril bu la sogs kun/ thugs kyi gzhi dang lha ni// mi bskyod rdo rje 'dzin pa'am// gang yin rigs sam yi dam lha// sku gsung thugs dang rigs lngar 'dus//
317a1(1): dang po shing shun ras la sogs// sku ni shin tu phye bar bya// dri bzang byugs nas gtsang ma las// lha yi dkyil 'khor rab bskyed nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya// dbang po skyon
317a2(1): mas rab bsal te// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang // rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dbul// spos dang mar me me tog bshos// dri chab la sogs mchod pa 'bul// gdan dang rgyan dang na bza' dang // rgyal srid
317a3(1): rin chen sna bdun 'bul// rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur bar bya// bum pa'i chu ni mi bskyod dbang // cod pan rin chen 'byung ldan la// rdo rje snang ba mtha' yas nyid// dril bu don yod grub pa ste// ming ni rnam
317a4(1): par snang mdzad do// sku la byin rlob gsang ba'i dbang // gsung la shes rab ye shes nyid// thugs la bde ba chen po'i dbang // mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa
317a5(1): lngas// tshogs kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas// zhal bsro chen po rab mdzad la// 'jig rten ma stongs bar gyi dus// sems can lus ngag sgrib sbyong ba'i// don mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// bzhugs par
317a6(1): gsol ba gdab pa bya// 'khor na gnas pa'i chos skyong rnams// gsang sngags srung mar gnyer gtad la// dgra yi 'jigs pa srung byed pa'i// dkor srung byed par bka' yang bsgo// zhes gsungs so// he
317b1(1): ru ka'i gal po chen po las/ sku gsung thugs kyi rten rab tu gnas pa'i brtag pa ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs gtor chen po 'di gsungs so// sbyin bsreg la bzla mkha' 'gro
317b2(1): bskyang // tshogs kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// gsang sngags don rnams kun bsdus pa// tshogs dang gtor mar rab tu 'dus// dben pa'i gnas su mtshams bcad nas// tshogs kyi nang du 'du ba ni// skal
317b3(1): ldan mo'i tshogs/ 'byor ldan yo byad kyi tshogs/ dga' ldan lnga'i tshogs so// khro bo sngon po shin tu mdzes// zho srung mi g.yo ba dang gshin rje gshed/ khyod ni dam tshig bsrung zhing bslab pa de nga yang yid du 'ong // nor bu gces pa'i rin chen
317b4(1): bcings// mi g.yo ba la nor bu zhags pa// dbyug pa gshin rje'i phyag na be con bsnams mdzad pa// 'khor ba las ni bdag bsgral phyir// dpa' bos bla mas gnang bas sgo srung gi nang du gtang du gsol// rdo rje tshe
317b5(1): dang gal phyi dang / no bye mar zer// 'jam des mar zla phrom thung zla rgyas khur ba dang // tshe khrid sgur po dza gad chang dzak+ti sha dang // bran mo tshod ma sham mo sing po kun tu rgyu/ 6// a mra mi sha/ rgun 'brum glang
317b6(1): po'i sha a ga ru/ rta sha// na li ba lang sha ga rgyas khyi sha la sogs drangs/ bsang ba ni// bdud rtsi 'am cu rdo rje 'am mtheb srin gyis/ gtor zhing sngags brjod// tshogs la gtor ba dam tshig can gyi rdzas/ kyis bsang ba'o// IM
318a1(1): kro d+hI shwa rI sarba nus pa can gyi sngags kyis bsang pas dra byam sho d+ha ya hUM aHhUM hrIH/ byin rlabs can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis bsang ba'o// a yi rang bzhin bdud rtsi chu// bdud rtsi'i chum ga ma'i rang bzhin du// rdzas la spros
318a2(1): tethim pa ni// gzung ba yul gyi dri ma dag pas yul snang stong chos kyi dbyings su bsam/ 'dzin pa sems kyi dri ma dag pas sems rig stong chos kyi skur bsam/ mtshan ma thams cad kun// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par dag/ raM las ye shes
318a3(1): gyis me byung bas dngos po dang rtog pa thams cad me yis bsreg par bsam/ yaM las// ye shes kyi rlung byung bas dngos po thams cad gis gtor bar bsam byas nas/ khaM las ye shes kyi/ chu byung bas yis dngos po thams cad bkrus
318a4(1): pas rnam par dag pa ra bsam pa ni// raM yaM khaM gi mthu las byung // byin gyis brlab pa ni snod/ rin chen las grub pa'i gzhong pa 'i nang du[:]hrIHlas grub// zhal zas kyi rnam par dmigs te hrIHzhes brjod pas bdag gi thugs ka nas yi
318a5(1): ge hrIHlas tAM gcig chad nas yo byad la phog pas// traM las zhal zas rin po che// oM tAM rat+na tre lo kya s+tha ra Na phaT// bdud rtsi lnga las grub pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che nyi ma stong pas gzi byin che ba tse re re gsal bar bsgom mo// hU~M gi 'phro
318a6(1): 'dus chos thams cad stong nyid dag par sbyangs/ nas chos nyid du bsam// AHlas phyi nang gi chos thams cad bdud rtsi dkar po dri ma med/ par bsam// au las bdud rtsi de 'dod yon gyi lha mo drug bsam gyis mi khyab par bsam
318b1(1): mo// ye shes grub pa spyan drangs la// tshad med bzhi las grub pa yi// byams pa bdug/ spos dkar mo dang snying rje me tog mthing ga dga' ba mar me dmar mo btang snyoms dri/ chab ma ljang gu'o// ye shes bzhi las shar ba
318b2(1): yi// me long ye shes las sgeg mo/ mnyam nyid ye shes las/ phreng ba ma dang so sor rtog pa las/ gling bu ma dang bya ba grub pa las gar/ mkhan mo// gzugs kyi lha mo dkar mo/ ni rnam par snang mdzad la 'bul// dri 'i lha mo ser mo ni rin
318b3(1): chen 'byung ldan la/ 'bral// sgra'i lha mo dmar mo ni snang ba mtha' yas nyid/ la 'bul lo// ro'i lha mo ljang gu ni don yod grub pa la 'bral ste// reg gi lha mo mthing ga ni rdo rje sems dpa' la 'bul// sngags kyis
318b4(1): sgo thabs gsum gyis gzang 'dzin gyi dmigs pa so sor bya'o// tshogs bsgral spro bar bya// dza len+d+ra/ dzu len+d+ra/ s+tha Na tsakra/ 'khor lo spro ba/ oM b+h+rUM/ 'khor lo rnam snang / hUM b+h+rUM/ rdo rje mi bskyod/ swa b+h+yAM/ rin chen dkon mchog dpal/ a b+h+rUM/ pad+ma snang mthal
318b5(1): hAha b+h+yAM/ ral gri don grub// dang po zad 'dod yon drug gis lha mor bsams la mchod// gnyis pa dam rdzas bdud rtsis sngar bsam pa bshags/ bar bya// gsum pa ba ma la/ dgra bgegs kyi gzugs phung byas la bstab/
318b6(1): par bya'o// tshogs 'dren pa pos brjod pa tshogs kyi zhal zas la// gzigs shig mdzed pa dam pa'i chos// 'di la bdud rtsi lnga'i rgyu las byas pa yin zhes gtsang mi gtsang gi the tshom bya mi rung // bram ze gtsang sbra che ba khyi dang phag gdo la
319a1(1): pa lta bu gtsang btsog med pa gsum// rang bzhin gcig la dgongs la gsol/ len pa pos brjod pa// bde bar gshegs so chos kyi mchog/ gzung 'dzin dri ma med pa yi/ tha mal gyi zhen bdag pas// 'dod
319a2(1): chags dri ma dang bral bas// de kho na nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal// de nas smon lam gdab par bya// lhag ma'i gtor ma chas su gzhug pa ni lhag gtor bsdus te dug gsum sha khrag rus pa'i rang bzhin la 'dod yon sna tshogs dang ldan par
319a3(1): byin brlab bo// lhag ma'i dkyil 'khor chas su gzhug pa ni byang shar mtshams// zhing lpags mgo lus ma nyams pa la rkang pa'i bar du e'am zla gam bdun bri/ rak+ta sa zla gam e// rnal 'byor pa chas su gzhug pa ni dpal gyi chas
319a4(1): brgyad gsol// gtor ma chas su gzhug pa ni/ hUM he phaT b+ho'i sngags kyis dpal gyi gtor ma la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya/ ste las kyi bzlas pa bya zhing mchod bstab bya'o// hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo// dang po/ dbyings nas rnam par
319a5(1): bskul ba 'a gnas ni/ gnas pa/ byin gyis yang dag par brlab pa 'ganas dang / gsum pa/ thabs chen yab kyi gnas tu bstan pa dang / bzhapa/ shes rab sum gyi gnas du gnas pa dang / 3ba khro mo go rI brgyad
319a6(1): kyi gnas rnams dang / drug pa/ yul gyi phra men gyi gnas chen mo dang / bdun pa/ ye shes sgo ma bzhi po 'i gnas rnams// yar gyi gnas bdun dkyil 'khor steng // ma hA rA tra phaT phaT/ a li bza' ba u li btung
319b1(1): ba ta li bca' ba ta pa li/ bgo ba/ daM Sh+ya[:]mche ba can go na yon tan ro'u tri/ drag mo/ kha raM zo zhig yo gi ni/ rnal 'byor ma/ kha raM zo zhig/ d+ha ki ni/ mkha' 'gro ma/ ma hA mAM sa/ sha chen po/ ma ha rak+ta/ khrag chen po/ ma ha keng ni ri

319b3(1): pam phab kyi tshul du btsal/ bdag nyid dpal chen por bsgoms te/ bdag gi rtse steng du hrI/ dmar po gcig las rta mgrin yab yum bsgoms la thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems spros te/ 'dus ma byas// mkha' dbyings kyi phyag rgya gtor ma'i
319b4(1): steng du bcas te rab ldan pas// bdud rtsi'i kha chu lan gsum btab pas dang pos gtor ma'i dngos po/ rtogs sregs bar pas gtor ma bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin du bsam/ tha mas mkha' 'gro ma rnams la sbyor ba'i mchod pa 'bul/ te phul bas
319b5(1): dbang du 'dus par bsam mo// gzhi lhag ma la sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs la kha chu gdab pa'i sngags so// rang gi lce thog tu bzhag la dngos grub thob pa'o// oM sarba ta tha ga ta ka ya wA ka tsit+ta swa b+ha wa At+ma kony+dza haM/ de nas bdag gi thugs ka nas
319b6(1): dzasngon po 'phros te// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ A gat+ta yA a gat+ta ya/ ta ki rA dza lag na lcags kyu thogs pa mang po spros te/ Ta ki rA dzas lhag ma la dbang ba dgug pa'i sngags so// pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya ba na d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ mo ha
320a1(1): ya mo ha ya/ badz+ra Tak+ki hUM dza dza/ rta mgrin gyis dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags/ hrIHba sha a lo ka/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ badz+ra DA ki ni hUM phaT/ ha ya grI ba ha ha hi hi/

320a3(1): gyis mnan// sngags 'dis mchod par rab tu 'bul// oM bud d+ha d+ha ki nI pra tIts+tsha sangs rgyas mkha' 'grol mtshad pal/ maM ba lin+ta oM phaT/ oM badz+ra rdo rje rigs kyi d+ha ki nI pra tits+tsha maM ba lin+ta hUM phaT/ mkha' 'grom mtsha

320a5(1): gnyis// gsung gi rgyud zla gsang thig le na rgyas so// gnyis pa/ sgor dang sgol la dga' ba'i sa sbyor sgrol gyi gnas ging chen brgyad/ 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud na rgyas so// gsum pa/ lang ka tshar gsum yang dag nas 'byung / rtogs

322a1(1): dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo ni// lha yi longs spyod brtul zhugs ma'am// yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la// stongs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyad// gal te byang chub

322b2(1): lngas mchod pas mchod de/ pad+ma rak+ta nirma la/ ka ma la muk+ta ni/ lo ka ban d+ha ni/ sarba karma su tsa me/ chos la chags pa chags pa ste// yul la chags pa chags pa'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i gtso la phyag 'tshal

323a1(1): na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bde ba chen po'i dbyings/ gsang ba mchog gi gzhal yas khang / zab mo
