323b1(1): zhing khams dang sa dang lam du bcas pa rnam par gzigs so// de ltar khyab pa chen po dang / chags pa chen po dang / mdzes pa chen po dang / zil gnon brjed pa'i tshul gyis gzigs pas/ ma lus pa'i thig
323b2(1): le chen po'i rang bzhin dmigs pa med par thugs su chud par gyur to// dgyes pa'i byin rlabs las/ thugs ka dang ljags dang spyi bo las 'od sna tshogs byung ste/ khyab pa dang gsal ba dang 'joms pa dang /
323b3(1): nyams bskyed par gyur nas/ phyogs bcu'i zhing yongs su sbyangs te/ rgyal ba'i sras su gyur te/ rgyal ba'i zhing khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa 'dus par gyur te/ de dag la
323b4(1): phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces brjod par gyur te// e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rgya chen gdod nas skye med de// 'dul ba'i thabs kyi khyad par gyis// mdzad pa sna tshogs bstan pa legs// zhes
323b5(1): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ dus gsum du nyams bzhi'i tshul gyis dga' bar mdzad de/ rdo rje snying po'i tshul
323b6(1): gyis pad+ma'i snying po la zhugs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// brtul zhugs
324a1(1): gsum la gnas bya'i phyir// dbang bskur bdag la gnang ba stsol// zhes gsol pa las/ de ma thag tu zhal bstan pa dang / thig le chen po dang bde ba chen po dang / ye shes par chad med pa'i
324a2(1): dbang bskur nas/ ma lus pa'i thig le chen po'i rang bzhin du gsal bar gyur te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin du dbyer med par gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i rgyal ba
324a3(1): rgya mtsho rnams kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dam tshig gsum la gnas pa yis// bar chad med pa'i sa phyogs su// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// ma lus dag pa gsum bsgoms nas// rgyal ba'i
324a4(1): pho brang dag par bsgom// rang bzhin ji lta bzhin bsgoms la// rgyal ba yab yum sras dang bcas// sgo bar bcas te bsam par bya// dbyer med mchod bzlas brtan thob nas// brtul lugs gsum ni brtag
324a5(1): par bya// shin tu yid dga'i sa phyogs der// sa yi bya ba kun byas nas// tshad dang ldan pa'i stegs bu brtsam// nyi shu lnga ldan dag pa der// bla ma yum dang ldan pa yis// nga rgyal gsal bar byin brlabs
324a6(1): nas// ras bal gtsang ma nyis 'gyur tshad// sbom phra sgo yi nyi shu cha// rang gi rtog pa ji bzhin pas// thig gdab cho ga ji bzhin bya// dri yi thig ler mtshan bkod ste// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor phab cing
324b1(1): mchod// bum pa lnga dang bcu yang rung // yo byad tshang bar byin brlabs la// rang rang gnas su 'tshams par gzhag/ snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma dag/ mos pas khrus byas sems bskyed de// lhag par gnas pa
324b2(1): ji bzhin bya// rin chen lnga dag 'bras lnga dang // 'byung khungs lnga ldan kha dog la// rigs lnga'i byin rlabs bsdus te bri// zlum po thig bzhi le'u tshe dgu// sgo bzhi ldan pa'i tshul du bri// rgyan dang bro brdung phreng ba
324b3(1): dang // yid 'ong lha yi 'byor pas bskor// ma dag pa ni mtshams gcad cing // dag pa'i sgrub rdzas byin brlab dgod// ting 'dzin lha bskyed gsal bsgoms la// bzlas dang 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad// nus pa
324b4(1): ldan pa'i lhas thob nas// rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'jug par bya// de nas bla ma mnyes byas la// cho ga rgyas par shes pa yis// gus ldan me tog 'dzin pa yis// slob ma dam tshig ldan pa de// zhugs nas rang
324b5(1): gi ye shes phab// cho ga bzhin du nan tan bya// dkyil 'khor bzhi la rim zhugs nas// dbang bzhi rim pa bzhin du sbyar// de nas gang la dga' ba yi// bsgrub pa'i gnas la sbyin par bya// rang rang rtog pa
324b6(1): las bstan pa'i// cho ga'i rim pa la brten pas// brtson 'grus ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang / dpal rdo
325a1(1): rje 'dzin pa'i cho ga'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ 'dul ba'i skye bo grangs med pa'i bsam pa so sor
325a2(1): gzigs par gyur te/ la la ni zhe sdang can du snang / la la ni 'dod chags can du snang / la la ni nga rgyal can du gnas/ la la ni gti mug can du gyur/ la la ni phrag dog can du gyur te/ phyin ci log tu gyur
325a3(1): pas/ 'khor ba'i dngos po la 'byol tog tu spyod cing zhen pas/ log pa'i ri bo mngon du brtas pas/ srid pa gsum gyi bdag por brtags par gyur te/ 'jig rten kun dbang du bsdus nas/ rgyu 'bras log
325a4(1): par smin pa de gzigs nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los 'di skad ces bskul to// a ho// ma bcos spros med byang chub snying po ni// mkha' ltar mi 'gyur thig le stong pa ste// ma rtogs blo la rtog pa'i ri bo
325a5(1): snang // thugs rjes khros pas 'gro ba gdul du gsol// dang po dam bcas rgyal ba thugs rje can// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// gdug pa ma lus btul zhing tshar bcad nas// ma bcos
325a6(1): snying po'i ngang la dgongs su gsol// zhes rnam par bskul bas/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po des bskul bar mkhyen nas hUM zhes gsungs pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor bcas pa nyid kyi sku la rim
325b1(1): par 'dus par gyur to/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM// 'di ltar dang po bdag gi sa bon bkod/ gnyis pa gsum pa bzhi brjod pas// stong gsum rim pas sgra ru grags// de las phyag mtshan gyur pa ste// tha ma sku rdzogs nges
325b2(1): par blta// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje kha T+wAM rnge chung g.yas// dril bu dung dmar rgyu zhags g.yon// yum yang yab dang mthun pa la// g.yas pa shes rab thabs la brten// g.yon pa
325b3(1): dung phor gtso la stob// dur khrod chas brgyad gar dgu dang // 'gyings tshul brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// rigs bzhi yab yum 'khor tshul te// sbas pa'i rak+Sha yak+ka dang // gu h+ya sa nu yab yum
325b4(1): rnams// 'khril pas 'khor lo'i tshul du bzhugs// gsang ba'i bu mo khro mo brgyad// phra men brgyad dang gus pa bzhi// 'bar ma brgyad dang bcas pa yi// bka' nyan nyi shu rtsa brgyad ldan// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs
325b5(1): dang ma mo bdun// sring mo bzhi dang ging chen dang // pho nya yang sbrul sum brgya dang // drug cu nyi khri bdun stong tshogs// rdo rje rig 'dzin la sogs pa// 'khor lo'i tshul du thabs cig bzhugs// de nas gsang
325b6(1): bdag rdo rje 'dzin// ma lus gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa// dgyes pa'i gar dang dbyangs dang bcas// gus dang mdzes pas spyan sngar 'dug/ brtag pa'i cho ga legs par dris// dpal chen he ru ka yi
326a1(1): don// rang bzhin zabs dang 'bras bu gang // he zhes bya ba gang ci zhig/ ru zhes bya ba gang gi don// ka zhes bstan pa'i don ci zhig/ blta ba'i don ni ji lta bu// spyod pa'i khyad par gang dag
326a2(1): lags// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gang dag lags// ting nge 'dzin ni ji lta bu// dag pa gsum zhes ji lta bu// dbang gi khyad par ji ltar bskur// spyod dang khyad par dam tshig gang // thun mong thun mong ma yin/
326a3(1): pa'i// bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji lta bu/ phrin las rim pa gang zhig lags// he ru ka ru bdag sbyor ba'i// lam gyi rim pa gang dag lags// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// dpa' bos bskul ba gsan
326a4(1): nas kyang // cho 'phrul chen po kun bstan nas// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'khrigs pa can// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yis// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad nas// gang zag dam par byin brlabs nas// gsang
326a5(1): ba'i bstan pa bsgrags par mdzad// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dri med ye shes he ru ka/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston// rang bzhin kun gyi rang bzhin te// thabs ni phyi nang sbas pa
326a6(1): gsum// 'bras bu rang bzhin mthar phyin pas// he ni dgyes pa chen po nyid// ru ni chags pa bde chen po// ka ni phrin las mdzad par shar// lta ba ma bcos chos nyid mthong // spyod pa sgo gsum blang dor
326b1(1): med// lha dang dngos grub dbang la sogs// snying po 'byung bzhi lhun rdzogs pas// 'byung bzhi 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor te// gang dang gang du gsal ba'i yid// ma yengs pa nyid ting 'dzin te// dag pas dag
326b2(1): pa gsum du brjod// gang gis gang la gang bskur ba// rgyud dag nus pa thob phyir dbang // ma lus sgo gsum khyab par dag/ bdag dang gzhan phyir mi 'gal ba// spyi dang khyad par dam tshig mchog/ rig 'dzin/
326b3(1): lam dang 'bras bu dang // tshe dang pra dang ro langs dang // rkang mgyogs mkha' 'gro la sogs pa// bsgrub pas bsgrub pa nyid du bshad// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag nyid// mdzad pa phrin las nyid du
326b4(1): brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni// bsam gyis mi khyab rang byung ste// ma lus rnam dag byang chub sems// thig le chen por dus gcig rdzogs// chos kun rang sems me long la// kun gyi gzugs
326b5(1): brnyan rang shar ba// de dag de yi rang bzhin te// ma lus bde gshegs snang ba nyid// byin rlabs sna tshogs bsam yas pa// rdo rje 'dzin nas rtsi shing sogs// rang rang nus pa sna tshogs kyis// ma lus kun gyi
326b6(1): bsam pa ltar// dpag med che ba sna tshogs ston// stong la stong min he ru ka/ bde chen rnam 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs// zhi la zhi dang khro la khro// chags la chags dang rmongs la/ rmongs// dregs la ri bo mnyam
327a1(1): la mnyam// 'byung la 'byung ba 'dod la 'dod// le lo ser sna de bzhin te// zabs mkhas 'dul ba sna tshogs pa// ji ltar 'tshams par rnam par gnas// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru
327a2(1): ka 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las gleng gzhi dang / rgyud kyi snying po 'byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// ma lus drag pos 'dul ba'i phyir// thabs mkhas rol pa'i brda' yis
327a3(1): ni// kun mkhyen khyod la gsol ba 'debs// kun mkhyen rgyal pos mnyes gzigs nas// 'bar zhing rngam pa'i mdangs kyis ni// 'jig rte khams kun sgras bkang nas// bskal pa'i me ltar drag cing
327a4(1): 'bar// phyi nang bgegs rnams thams cad 'byer// oM ba hu be d+ha/ ro hu ti/ pany+tsa ti/ a sha Sha/ ni she Sha ba da bi na ya/ bid+ya ga ta/ tsa le pra tsa le/ gurba gurba/ bi gurba sarba badz+ra shi ba le/ tsa le tsa le/ oM ru lu ru
327a5(1): hUM b+h+yo hUM// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'phros// cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// phyi nang snod bcud bcas pa gang // grangs las 'das pa'i lha rnams ni// rig pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus
327a6(1): med// phyogs bcu dus bzhi khyab par snang // dngos grub kun gyi rtsa ba ni// bsnyen pa dang ni las sngags te// 'di dag yid bzhin nor bu ltar// ma lus da ltar 'grub par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i yi ge 'bru
327b1(1): brgyad la// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pas na// yan lag ma lus rang rdzogs pas// dngos grub ma lus rdzogs te gnas// gang du bsnyen pa gsum rdzogs nas// rab 'bring tha ma'i rtags thob na// brgyud
327b2(1): pa'i yul dang bral bas na// tshe 'dir sangs rgyas nyid thob na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sgrub pa po dang gzungs ma dang // rdzas dang grogs dag bzhi pa ste// dag pa'i rgyud la snang ba ni// me long
327b3(1): bzhin la snang ba yin// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms shing // 'od gsal byin rlabs gnas thob nas// sbyor ba'am thig ler thob pas bzlas// tshe 'dir sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// dngos grub
327b4(1): gzhan lta smos ci dgos// tshe dang lcong zhi dmar ser ba// bkra shis dag pa'i zhal zas la// rtags thob bar du bzlas bskyed na// mi 'chi tshe yi dngos grub 'thob// drag po'i sbyor ba gsal ba yis// bdun
327b5(1): 'bum sngon du song ba yis// gu gul sbyar ma bsreg bya zhing // stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas na// grong dang yul phyogs thams cad du// bgegs ni ma lus 'phros par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor snying po ldan bkod
327b6(1): nas// mu khyud rdo rje ra ba la// las sngags bkod de byin brlabs nas// bdun 'bum grangs tshad ga bur bcug/ grong dang sgo dang zhing srang dang // ri rtse la sogs gar bzhag pa// ser ba dang ni nad dang
328a1(1): gdon// ma lus pa ni zhi bar 'gyur// gro ga ras dang dar sogs la// bris shing byin brlab bsnyen rdzogs nas// lus sam gtsug phud mgul btags na// tshe ring nad med bde ba dang // dgra
328a2(1): dang bgegs kyis 'tshe ba med// thal chen mu zi nyung dkar la// bye ba 'am bdun 'bum bzlas byas te// rdzing dang 'bab chur dor byas na// lo legs 'bru ni 'phel bar 'gyur// gu gul nag pos byugs pa
328a3(1): yi// thang phrom pa dang tshil chen la// bzlas shing bsregs te bdug gyur na// spro ba ma lus zhi bar 'gyur/ khrab dang nyung nag tshil chen la// bdun 'bum bye ba bzlas nas ni// chu mig 'gram du bsreg byas
328a4(1): na// dmigs pa nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// tsan+dan dkar po mar sar dang // spang spos gla rtsi sbyar byas la// bzlas zhing gzer sar bskus byugs na// gzer nad ma lus zhi bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga la
328a5(1): ling+ga byas// drag po'i phur pa lnga nyid la// bsnyen rdzogs nyi shu gcig bzlas nas// gnas lngar btab na 'chi bar 'gyur// drag po'i hom khung nag po ru// mtshan mar bcas pa'i ling+ga la// bsnyen rdzogs nyi
328a6(1): shu gcig bzlas te// gnan na g.yo ba med par 'gyur// 'bras chang rdza 'am thod pa la// sngon bzhin 'khor lo sngags bcas bri// byin brlabs kha sbub gar bzhag sar// ser ba chen po gcod par
328b1(1): 'gyur// ga bur shel dang tsan+da dkar// bzlas shing rang la gang 'chang ba// rims dang gnod pas mi tshugs shing // lus yang nad med byed par 'gyur// til dang tsan+dan dkar po dang // zho dang mar dang 'o ma
328b2(1): la// bzlas shing sbyin bsreg byas na ni// 'dus dang nad bgegs zhi bar 'gyur// gang du las rnams kun byed pa// de nyid rten 'brel las byung ste// gang la gang brten 'bras byung ba// 'di ni rten cing 'brel
328b3(1): 'byung ba'i// chos nyid rdzas dang cho ga dang // thabs kyis rten cing 'brel ba ni// gang dag ci dgar grub pa ni// rgyal bas kyang ni bsngags pa ste// dag dang ma dag khyad par dang // log dang ma log khyad par
328b4(1): las// bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'phrul// gsang sngags thabs kyi byin rlabs kyis// me las cho 'phul snang ba ste// ngo bo byin rlabs khyad par can// sna tshogs ngo bo nyid du snang // de bzhin chos
328b5(1): rnams thams cad kyang // ngo bo nyid kyi khyad par can// gang gi byin rlabs sna tshogs pa// mthun pa nyid du de ltar snang // chos kun ngo bo nyid snang ba// phyogs dang bral ba'i byang chub sems// gang du snang zhing
328b6(1): snying po med// ma lus mkha' ltar khyab pa'i sems// rtag tu rang gi ngo bos stong // mtha' dbus gzhi rtsa las 'das pa// thabs chen gsang sngags dang bral ba'i// che ba'i che ba zab mo 'di// lung dang rigs
329a1(1): pa la sogs pa'i// rtog ge'i spyod yul nams kyang min// gdod nas dbyer med snying po la// rtog ge'i rig pas gang bltas pa// gsal ba'i 'od zer snying po la// dmus long brgya yis bltas
329a2(1): pa ltar// snying po'i don ni mi mthong ste// rang nyid tshi chad brlag par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas gsang
329a3(1): ba mchog gi bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ e ma ho// 'bar ba'i rgyal po byin rlabs 'dab// ma lus snang srid dkyil 'khor gnas pa la// sgrib pa gsum gyis 'bar ba'i zhal ma
329a4(1): mthong // de phyir 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po he ru kas// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor 'di skad do// b+h+rUM stong gsum ma lus gzhal
329a5(1): yas khang // 'byung ba lnga po rim bzhin brtsegs// dur khrod rgyan chas lhun gyis grub// dbang po lnga yi khong gseng can// nyi zla pad+ma rang bzhin gnas// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// rnam shes yul dang yan lag
329a6(1): dang // nyon mongs yid chos de bzhin te// rgyu ba'i lam dang mtshan dag dang // nang grol 'dren yang / 'brel rten rtsib ma dang // sha dang skra dang ba spu dang // rang byung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor te// lnga phung phra
329b1(1): rags 'byung ba bzhi// sbas pa'i don du shes par bya// 'di ni dur khrod dkyil 'khor te// lus can kun la gnas pa yin// lus can tsit+ta'i pho brang ni// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin te// rten can lnga ni phung po
329b2(1): ste// rags pa'i phra ba sbas par brjod// dwangs ma lnga 'dus yum gyi gtso// snyigs ma lnga ni gsang ba'i yum// thig le gsang ba'i bu mo ste// rten can phra men nyid du brjod// gsang ba'i sgo bzhi gus pa
329b3(1): ste// sbas pa'i thabs can spor byed ma// rgyu ba'i lam srang las byed ma// bu ga bdun dang thig le bzhi// sbas pa'i tshul du rdzogs par gnas// rgyu ba'i g.yas g.yon rten can rten// rtsa bzhi la brten sgrol
329b4(1): mar yang / bar bshad// bde ba'i 'khor lo mkha' la 'gro// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// lus bcud rtsa yi mdud pa ni// sum brgya drug cu khyab gnas te/ khyab 'dzin gugs pas las byed cing // skra
329b5(1): rtse thig les khyab byed cing // ba spu'i bu ga thig ler chags// yang sbrul 'phro zhing nyid la sdud// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// lnga phung chags ldang lngar snang ba// rig pa'i rgyal po lnga
329b6(1): yi gzugs// gsang ba'i 'byung ba dwangs snyigs las// yum gyi rang bzhin shes par bya// phung po'i snyigs ma he ru ka/ bde ba'i rnam shes khro mo ste// yul nyid bder chags phra men nyid// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya
330a1(1): 'jug pa nyid// spor byed bde bar 'bar mar 'dod// gang du rgyu ba bran mo ste// rgyu ba'i 'khor lor mkha' 'gro ma// rtsa mdud kun khyab pho nya ste// hUM spros sbyor sgrol thabs mkhas nyid// gsang
330a2(1): ba'i rlung du'ang shes par bya// phyi dang nang chags mkha' 'gro ma// skra rtse ba spu 'bum gyi cha// thabs dang thig ler gang 'phros pa// rtog pa gang skyes der sdud pa// yang sbrul phyag rgya'i tshogs su brjod// kun gyi
330a3(1): rang bzhin 'dir 'dus shing // rang bzhin gnas pas rang bzhin yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas
330a4(1): yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// phyogs bcu dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin he ru ka/ 'bar ba'i rgyal po mdzes pa'i sku mchog
330a5(1): gis// nyid kyi rang bzhin bdag la bstan du gsol// zhes gsol ba las/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// ma bcos bde ba
330a6(1): chen po'i dbyings// thig le chen po'i rang bzhin la// chos rnams ma lus rdzogs par ldan// he ni khyab gad la stong pa'i ngang // ru ni gnyis med bde ba che// ka ni cir yang rol pa nyid// ma skyes pa dang skye ba
330b1(1): dang // dbyer med tshig gi rang bzhin yin// he ni dgyes pa chen po ste// ru ni chags pa chen po nyid// ka ni phrin las thogs pa med// 'di ni mi gnas mya ngan 'das// mtshon pa kun bral ye shes ni// gang gi
330b2(1): mtshon pa de nyid de// dbang po mchog gi rnal 'byor la// ma lus ye shes maN+Da la// sku dang gsung thugs 'bar ba yi// ma lus rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings// he ni dgyes pa chen po ste// ru ni chags pa chen po
330b3(1): nyid// ka ni snying rjes khyab pa gdal// de nyid mtha' dbus las 'das pa'o// he ni rgyu dang bral ba ste// ru ni mtshan ma'i gzugs la 'das// ka ni chos sku mtshon dang bral// snying po rang bzhin gsang ba'i
330b4(1): gsung // he ni chos sku mtshon dang bral// ru ni longs spyod chen po ste// ka ni sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku// sku gsum lhun grub rtsol ba med// chos nyid smon lam thugs rje yis// ngang khro shugs dang bcas pa
330b5(1): ni// thugs rje byin rlabs bcas pa nyid// byams dang sdang dang chags khro nyid// yul dang bcas pa de bzhin 'gyur// gang du gang la gang snang ba// las dang thugs rje thabs 'brel ba// byin rlabs ye shes
330b6(1): lhun rdzogs ni// dpag bsam nor bu lta bur gnas// dpag med rig pa chos kyi dbyings// ye shes lnga yi ngo bo las// gdul bya'i blo ni rim pa bzhin/ khrag 'thung lnga yi ngo bor gnas// sku ni snang ba thams
331a1(1): cad de// gsung ni brjod pa kun nyid de// dran rtog thugs la dbyer med pa// ma lus sku gsung thugs la rdzogs// kun gyi rang bzhin de nyid de// rgyu 'bras mtshon pa kun gyis stong // gang la de
331a2(1): nyid rang snang ba// chu la chu bur snang ba ltar// ma bcos phyag rgya chen por gnas// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid de// de nyid thabs mchog mtshon pa'i tshul// skal ldan rgyal sras rnal 'byor la// man
331a3(1): ngag thabs kyis 'grub par 'gyur// ma lus 'jig rten brtan g.yo dang // 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// rang bzhin thabs kyi rgyal po ste// gzhan las byung ba'i chos ma yin// dpal ldan ye shes te
331a4(1): ru ka/ thabs chen mdzad pa kun gyi gnas// gsang ba'i gsang ba thugs kyi thugs// mkha' la dri med gsal ba ltar// skye med dbyings las phyag rgyar gsal// las dang ting 'dzin ye shes dang // yid kyi rnam
331a5(1): par 'phrul pa mchog/ ji srid rnam rtog gnas kyi bar// de srid phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog ste// gang dang 'tshams par gang snang ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor grangs las 'das// kun gyi gzhi rtsa snying po nyid// phyi
331a6(1): nang snod bcud ma lus pa// rgyu 'bras med pa'i rig par gcig/ rang snang bde ba'i ngo bor gnas// thabs chen gsang ba'i rang bzhin ni// log par mthong ba'i skye bo la// thabs kyi khyad par ci bstan
331b1(1): yang // dmus long kha dog bstan pa bzhin// ma nor thabs dang ldan pa yis// skal ldan dag pa'i skyes bu la// man ngag legs par bstan pa yis// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// zhes gsungs
331b2(1): so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyu chen po las/ he ru ka'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rgyal ba rgya
331b3(1): mtsho'i sku gsung thugs// thams cad ma skyes dang la gnyis med kyang // dman pas dam pa'i blta ba rtogs dka' bas// bdag cag rnams la rgya chen bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las/ bcom ldan
331b4(1): 'das ye shes thams cad kyi rgyal po des 'di skad ces gsungs so// chos rnams ma lus sems nyid rang bzhin te// de nyid brtag cing dpyad pa las 'das pas// kun gyi yul las 'das shing brjod dka'
331b5(1): bas// gang du yang ma mthong mtshon pa'i yul las 'das// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos rnams ji snyed pa// gzhi rtsa med pa'i ngang du rang bzhin 'dus// dbyings dang ye shes thabs dang shes rab kyang // de nyid chen
331b6(1): po'i ngang du dbyer med pas// ma bcos chos dbyings brdal ba chen po la// sgo skur yin min dpyod dang rtog pa med// dam pa'i rang bzhin thabs kyis gang rtogs pa// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin dus
332a1(1): gcig rtogs// gzhi rtsa kun 'das nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// blun pos bltas pas rang nyid tshe chad ltar// sems nyid mtha' dbus 'das pa'i rang bzhin la// mtshan mas bltas kyang chos
332a2(1): dbyings don mi mthong // ma skyes stong chen nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// rnam rtog grangs las 'das pa'i phyag rgyar shar// mkha' la gza' skar chu yi chu bur ltar// ji ltar snang yang skye ba med par gcig/ sku
332a3(1): gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma ji snyed pa// sems can mos pa'i khyad par snang ba yin// nus mthu byin brlabs so sor snang ba yang // ma skyes sems kyi ngang las gzhan ma mthong // don dang rtags kyi lha zhes
332a4(1): brtags pa yang // thig le chen po'i ngang la gnyis med pas// sku mdog phyag mtshan mdzes par brgyan pa dang // ma lus snang ba'i rig pa stong par gcig/ sems nyid dngos po mtshan mar gang shar kyang // sku
332a5(1): ma smig rgyu chu zla brag cha ltar// sems nyid stong pa'i gzugs brnyan rang shar bas// sgyu ma rnam bzhi ma bcos gcig tu 'dus// rtag pa rang rgyud zad pa'i sems nyid ni// ji ltar snang yang de ltar mi gnas
332a6(1): te// phyogs 'das spyod med mkha' ltar dag pa la// ye shes sgyu ma dgag bsgrub kun dang bral// sgyu ma bde mchog rang bzhin thig le cher// brtag pa zad pa'i bde ba rang 'byung bas// bde bas bde ba mtshon
332b1(1): par rtogs thabs kyis// snang srid ma lus bde ba chen por mthong // khrus dang gtsang sbra dka' thub mi dgos te// thabs dang shes rab snying rjes gang bstan pas// 'dod chags bde ba mchog tu nges par
332b2(1): mthong // mthong dang ma mthong rtsod pa chad dus na// dam pa'i dgongs pa lhun gyis grub nges pa'o// gang gis gang la nges pa'i don gsal nas// dam pa yin pa'i rtags ni gsal bar 'gyur// zhen pa chung
332b3(1): dang tha mal las rgyun chad// gzungs ma rigs can 'du zhing byin rlabs che// las dang bsam pa 'grub cing blang dor med// ting 'dzin chu bo'i rgyun gyi klung du 'jug/ bsngags pa thob cing rtsod pa'i
332b4(1): 'jigs dang bral// 'du shes mtshan ma 'gag cing bya ba nyung // rang bzhin dal zhing 'du byed mtshan ma phra/ gang zhig dam pa'i don de rtogs phyin chad// rgyal ba'i sras po rig pa 'dzin pa de// 'khor
332b5(1): ba'i 'jigs bral mya ngan 'das smon med// gdod nas dag pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// mthong dang ma mthong glo bur rtog pa'i chos// dam pa'i don la mthong zhing gsal rtogs na// mthong dang ma mthong rtsod
332b6(1): pa rnam par 'chad// blun po mkha' la rtsod pa ji bzhin du// byis pa mtha' yi tshig la rtsod pa byed// rang sems gnyis med rtsod pa'i yul las 'das// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha' stong pa'i
333a1(1): klong // bdag dang gzhan med rig pa gcig gi dang // phyi dang nang med chos dbyings brdal ba'i gnas// che chung rgyu 'bras med pas 'bras bu'i lam// ma bcos don dam rtogs pa'i don gsal
333a2(1): na// mtshan ma'i zhen pas rtsol ba bya mi dgos// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ blta ba de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po
333a3(1): des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho dpal chen che mchog he ru ka/ nyi ma stong ltar 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can// sku gsung thugs la mos pas gsol 'debs na// spyod pa'i khyad par
333a4(1): bdag la bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// spyod pa'i khyad
333a5(1): par ji snyed pa// rang rang thabs tshul mtha' yas pas// nam mkha'i khams ni mtha' yas pas// rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul gyis byed// 'dul ba'i skye bo ji snyed pa// rang rang thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// so so'i
333a6(1): gar thabs sprin phung gis// ma nges 'dul ba'i don du snang / khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// ma byin par yang mi blang ngo // gzhan gyi bud med spyad mi bya// rdzun gyi tshig ni brjod pa min// rang gi lha yi
333b1(1): rnal 'byor gyis// dka' thub dka' ba bral bzhin du// thabs mkhas 'dod pa bsten bzhin du// bdag dang gzhan don spyad par bya// snying po byang chub bar du ni// dam rdzas chen po lnga spyad cing // 'jigs pa
333b2(1): med pa'i longs spyod bya// cis kyang gdung ba med pa yi// bde ba yid 'ong rtag tu bsten// dmar chen po dang ga bur dang // dri chen mAM sa chur bcas pa// dogs pa med par rtag bza' zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo/
333b3(1): rtag tu bskor// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par gyis// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// gzhan gyi bud med spyad par gyis// rtag tu rdzun du smra bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i spyod pa
333b4(1): bla na med// blun po gang zhig spong byed pa// de la mchog gi dngos grub med// sems nyid sbyangs shing dag bya'i phyir// mtshan ldan bud med rtag tu bsten// rang lus rgyud kyis rgyas byas la// bde ba'i thig le
333b5(1): rtag tu gzung // dus tshod khyad par nges bzung la// tshogs kyi 'khor lo spyad par bya// gtong dang 'dzin dang 'dren pa dag/ skabs kyi khyad par shes bya zhing // spang zhing dam tshig nyams pa min/ gang gis bud
333b6(1): med bsten bya zhing // 'dod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yis// rang nyid brtan par gnas par bya// dam rdzas bud med rtag tu bsten// lus dang sems dang snang ba dag/ rim par 'phel ba'i tshul gyis ni// bde ba nam
334a1(1): mkha'i khams dang mnyam// rig pa'i brtul zhugs ma spyad na// rang gi skal ba dman pa dang // bde ba dman zhing rigs chad nas// de la dam pa'i dngos grub med// rang lus sgo gsum mnyam
334a2(1): sbyar zhing // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la// rang nyid bsten cing gzhan la mchod// dka' thub smyung ba mi bya zhing // slong mos 'tsho bar bya ba min// rang gi yul dang lhan cig tu// lha yi spyod pas bsten bya
334a3(1): zhing // dogs pa med par rtag tu spyod// sna tshogs rig pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyi nang snod bcud nam mkha'i khams// lha yi sku gsung thugs nyid kyis// til 'bru bzhin du gang bar gsal// glu dang gar
334a4(1): dang spyod pa kun// rgyal ba'i mdzad par ma gyur med// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsum gyi spyod pa ste// blun po gang zhig 'da' byed pa// dngos grub rgya chen gang yang med// dpa' bo sgyu ma'i
334a5(1): brtags rtag 'byin med kyang pa bzhin// ma lus de ltar yongs goms na// 'jigs med bde chen sa thob nas// dpa' bo thod pa'i dbu rgyan dang // stag lpags la sogs gon nas ni// rdo rje kha TaM thogs nas
334a6(1): ni// re dogs med pa'i sa ru 'gro// gal te 'jigs pa'i sems byung na// dam tshig nyams te dmyal bar skye// 'di la bya dang mi bya med// re dang dogs pa cung zad med// gtsang sme rtog dang mi rtog med// yin
334b1(1): dang ma yin chos med de// bsdam dang glod pa'i dka' thub med// dman dang dam pa'i rigs med cing // grong pa'i chos ni rnam par spang // sngags dang phyag rgya bzlas 'ching med// sbyin bsreg mchod dang
334b2(1): dkyil 'khor med// 'dod pa bsten cing chags med de// sku dang gzhal yas kha dog med// de nyid dbyings la mnyam sbyor zhing // ma lus dam pa'i spyod par mdzad// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying
334b3(1): po rol pa'i spyod pa ste// blun po gang zhig 'da' byed pa// de la mchog gi dngos grub med// gsang ba'i spyod pa dor ba dang // bla ma rgyab kyi phyogs pa dang // don la ngo mtshar nyams med pas// tshig la ngo
334b4(1): mtshar cher byed cing // dam tshig gtan nas spong byed pa// ji srid nam mkha' gnas bar du// rdo rje dmyal bar gnas pa nyid// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i rlabs chen rmad byung ba// rnal
334b5(1): 'byor kun gyi mdzad pa ste// spyod pa 'dir ni bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas yang
334b6(1): gsang ba'i bdag po des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// rgyal ba kun gyi gsung gi bdag/ rgyal ba kun gyi gsung gi 'khor lo nyid// rdo rje sngags kyi tshul du spyod nas kyang // rdo
335a1(1): rje'i gsang sngags chen po bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag po rngam pa'i rgyal po des// gsung gi dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba zhes bya
