337a3(1): dag pa rnams bsreg sbrang bkrus// stong pa nyid du bsam par bya// a las nam mkha' yangs pa'i steng // rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam pa'i steng // ra las khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrugs// suM las zhing chen keng rus
337a4(1): nyid// tshad dang ldan pa'i steng du b+h+rUM// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // raM las bskal pa'i me dpung dmar nag 'khrigs// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// gru chad sgo bzhi khyams brgyad la// sna
337a5(1): tshogs gzhal yas gdan dang rgyan// rim pa bzhin du 'khrigs par bsgom// dpal chen bud+d+ha he ru ka/ dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad dam// yang na zhal gsum phyag drug ste// zhal gcig phyag gnyis de
337a6(1): bzhin te// rig pa rang snang ma nges pas// sku mdog phyag mtshan cir yang 'gyur// de bzhin dngos med phyag rgya dang // de las byung ba'i phyag mtshan rnams// nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas pas ci/
337b1(1): dgar bsgoms pas 'grub// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las/ khro bo de bzhin bzhugs pa rnams// rig pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs med pas// ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bsgom// smug nag ser nag dmar
337b2(1): nag dang // ljang nag smug ser dmar ser dang // dmar ljang dkar ljang 'jigs pa'i sku// thabs ni rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma rgya gram de bzhin du// dbyug to sta re ral gri dang // be con g.yon gyis
337b3(1): dril bu 'dzin// kro d+hi shwa rI yum rnams ni// sku mdog yab dang mthun pa la// g.yas pa shes rab thabs la brten// g.yon pa b+han+na gtso la stob/ le tshe dag la shes par bya// dang por khro mo brgyad kyi
337b4(1): khyams// gnyis pa phra men brgyad bkod de// gsum pa de bzhin 'bar ma la// sgo ma bzhi dang ldan par bsam// bzhi pa dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad// rang gi sgo dang ldan par bsam// lnga pa mkha' 'gro'i bar
337b5(1): khyams te// phyogs bzhir bdun bdun sgo bzhir bcas// drug pa ma mo bdun gyi khyams// sgo la las kyi sring bzhi gnas// bdun pa ging gi gnas yin te// phyogs bzhir gsum gsum sgo bzhir bzhi// king
337b6(1): ka ra dang dbugs sdud ma// bka' sdod mdun dang rgyab na gnas// brgyad pa pho nya'i khyams yin te// phyogs bzhir drug cu rigs mdog can// steng 'og ser dang dmar ba yi// drug cu phrag gnyis shar nub
338a1(1): khyams// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sgo bzhir gnas// yang sbrul gnas la nges med de// nag mo khrag shog can gyi tshogs// steng gi nam mkhar 'khod pa yin// rig 'dzin bye ba sa ya dag/ phyi rol 'khor yug
338a2(1): cha la bsam// phyi nang kun tu 'phro byed pa'i// me ri'i 'od ni gtibs ma thag/ dam pa nges pa skye ba'i sa// skal med bsreg cing 'bros pa'i gnas// rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyis bsgom// de nas dbang bskur
338a3(1): byin brlabs la// yan lag lha ni gsal byas la// sngags kyi yan lag tshang bar bsgom// rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya yis// nam mkha'i khams gtugs sangs rgyas kun// til 'bru bzhin du gang khyab pa'i// rdo rje
338a4(1): khro bo'i gzugs su sad// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa spyan drangs la// bkug dang bstim dang bsdam byas te// dbang du byas te bstim par bya// gnyis med mnyes par phyag byas te// rang rang dgyes pa'i gar stabs
338a5(1): kyis// mnyes pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs dbul// lag gnyis bsgyur cing gyen du dgrol// rang rang mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mnyes par bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus
338a6(1): pa'i rgyud chen po las/ 'bar ba'i sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// dus
338b1(1): gsum rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// rnam grol ye shes skad cig thugs chud pa// rnam par grol ba de nyid mtshon pa'i phyir// phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las//
338b2(1): dpal chen ye shes @#// rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dbus kyi gtso bo'i phyag rgya ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje kha T+wAM rde'u chung g.yas// g.yon dril dung dmar
338b3(1): rgyu zhags bsnams// dpal chen ye shes thabs kyi rgya// shes rab dbyings kyi phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // g.yas pa shes rab thabs la brten// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la
338b4(1): stob// he ru brgyad kyi phyag rgya ni// g.yas pa rang rang mtshan ma ste// 'phyar zhing 'gying ba'i tshul du gnas// g.yon pa dril bu yum la 'khyud/ khro mo kro d+hi shwa ri rnams// kun kyang g.yas pa thabs
338b5(1): la 'khyud// g.yon pa b+han dmar gtso la stob// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni// go rI b+han dmar byis dbyug sngo// tso rI mda' gzhu 'gengs ma ser// pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar// be ta byi za rdo 'phyar
338b6(1): gnas// puk+ka dmar ser byis rgyu 'dren// g+hasma rung dmar khrag 'thung ldang // sma sha mthing nag byis snying za// tsaN+Da ser skya mchog lus 'bral// sid+ha kha ro bsnol ser seng // bya g+h+ra gnan lha bsnol dmar
339a1(1): stang // sri la nag mo byis ldag wa// shra na 'dral lha mthing ga sbyang // gr-i d+ha gri dmar rgyu 'dren rgod// kang+ka zhing phrag snar mgo ring // ka ka kha ro ban gri gnag/ u lha mthing tshogs lcags kyu
339a2(1): 'ug/ rta gdong sngon mo lcags kyu 'dzin// phag gdong nag mo mche zhags bsnams// dmar mo lcags sgrog nyi zla sdom// thal byed dril bu sna tshogs mdog/ ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// srin mo smug nag thod rlon
339a3(1): 'chang // tshangs ma dmar ser pad+ma bsnams// lha chen dkar chen tri shA la// gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'chang // gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'phen// brgya byin dkar mo in+d+ra gdengs// rdo rje ser mo
339a4(1): tsan+da 'thung // bdud rtsi dmar mo pad+ma bsnams// zla ba dkar mo puN+Da ri// be con ldang nag dbyug to 'phyar// srin mo dmar mo dung khrag 'thung // za ma ldang nag ba su 'dren// dga' ba dmar mo ka tar
339a5(1): 'phyar// stobs chen dkar mo gshol mda' 'dzin// rdo rje ser mo spu gris gcod// 'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs// nor srungs dkar mo bum pa 'dzin// rlung lha sngon mo ba dan 'phyar// gsod byed
339a6(1): dkar mo ral gri so// me mo dmar mo gsal shing 'dzin// phag gdong nag mo mche zhags can// rgan byed dmar mo zhing chung za// sna chen dkar mo thod khrag 'thung // chu lha sngon mo sbrul zhags 'dzin// rdo rje
339b1(1): nag mo lcags kyu 'dzin// rdo rje ser mo ra mgo zhags// rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom// rdo rje ljang nag dril 'khrul dgyes// 'bar ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// sku mdog gdul bya'i tshul 'dra zhing // g.yas pa
339b2(1): rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin// g.yon pa b+han+da rak+ta 'dzin// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje gshog pas zil gnon cing // b+han+da khrag 'thung chags pa che// 'dod chags tshul gyis 'gro ba 'dul// ma bdun srid
339b3(1): bzhi'i phyag rgya ni// 'jo sgeg mdzes mar zil gyis blta// g.yas pa 'khyud tshul dkar 'dzin bstan// g.yon pa dung khrag 'thung byed pa'o// ging chen bco brgyad phyag rgya ni// sngo skya 'jigs pa'i tshul ston
339b4(1): cing // g.yas pa gri dang mtshon cha thogs// g.yon pas 'dzin cing gsod par byed// pho nya sum brgya drug cu'i tshogs// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ljang gnag/ gser dang byu ru'i mdog 'dra ba// drug cu drug gis
339b5(1): rdzogs pa ni// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // tho ba gshog pa gtun tshogs 'dzin// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis gnas// rdo rje nag po khrag shog can// 'phur zhing 'dzul te kun tu rgyu// phyogs bcur
339b6(1): khyab pa'i las byed cing // nyi zla'i tshul du mkha' la 'gro// sha khrag tshil bu rkang za zhing // brjid pa'i tshul gyis sdigs byed cing // lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// bye ba phrag ni bdun 'bum
340a1(1): tshogs// 'gugs dang chags pas rmongs pa dang // gsod dang spor dang thal byed pa// mdzes dang chags dang 'thab pa dang // sdang mig gyen dang mthur lta zhing // rdzu 'phrul thogs med rlung
340a2(1): shugs can// 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang 'jigs pa'i sgra// sna tshogs de bzhin dri dang ro// nam mkha' khyab pa'i stobs kyis gtibs// rnal 'byor bstan pa srung byed cing // gdug pa skrag sdang za bar
340a3(1): byed// 'dzin dang bsnyeg dang dgug pa dang // dbang dang gsad pa'i pho nya ni// sprul cing las rnams byed pa'i 'khor// 'bar 'khrug rngam pa'i cha byad can// gom pa'i stabs kyis gnas par bya// ma bcos
340a4(1): chos kyi dbyings nyid las// rol pa'i phyag rgya snang ba ni// rgya mtsho chu yi chu bur ltar// dang ba'i sprin dang rol mo ltar// dus gcig gsal bar bsgom par bya'o// rang gi rig pa bsam yas pas// grangs dang
340a5(1): phyag mtshan sku mdog dang // ma nges phyag rgya'i ngo bor shar// ji ltar snang ba'i sku yi tshogs// sgra skad ma lus gsung nyid de// dran rig sna tshogs thugs kyi ngang // ma bcos dbyings dang ye shes la// dran pa rgyun
340a6(1): gyi chu bo ltar// ma yengs gsal bar bsgoms byas pas// rgyu 'bras ma btsal lhun gyis rdzogs// he ru ka yi brtag pa nyid// dbang po'i khyad par ji bzhin du// rang gi thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// rang rang mos
340b1(1): pa ji bzhin du// bsgrub pas ci dgar 'grub par 'gyur// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// dka' thub med par tshe 'dis 'grub// ces gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ phyag rgya thugs kyi
340b2(1): dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rgya che
340b3(1): ba// 'dul ba'i thabs kyi mdzad pa gang // cho ga'i khyad par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom lda 'das dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// ri bo ri sul nags
340b4(1): 'dab dang // chu gling dur khrod gangs 'dab tu// skyon dang bral zhing yid 'ong ba// bkra shis par chad med gnas su// sa bdag zhing skyong bcas pa la// dang por mchod pa byas nas ni// gtor ma mchod pas
340b5(1): tshim par bya// bdag po rnams las blang bya// sa yi skyon rnams bsal byas te// ngan nam bar chad byung ba na// spo'am yang na sbyin bsreg bya// zangs sogs phur pa dbang gi lha// sngags dang ting 'dzin ldan
340b6(1): pas gdab// sa yi bcud rnams bsdus pa yis// sa yi dngos grub dbang du 'gyur// ma dag pa ni dag byas la// rin chen sa gzhir mos ldan par// maN+Dal cha snyoms tshad ldan la// ba byung lnga ldan legs par
341a1(1): byug/ dag pa lnga yi dkyil 'khor ni// rim par bskyed de mdzes par gnas// dkyil 'khor bkod cing spyan drangs la// mchod cing bzlas bstim byin ldan pas// legs par bzung zhing byin
341a2(1): ldan nas// phyi nang bar chod bsal ba'i phyir// bsrung ba'i cho ga brtsam par bya// bdag nyid lha yi rgyan ldan pas// nam mkha' khyab pa'i rtsibs ldan la// nyi steng sum pas lha gnan to// thugs las phyung ba'i
341a3(1): khro bcu las// rdo rje sder mos btab bsams na// bar chad bgegs rigs mi g.yo 'gyur// lag pa'i bre ga'i yig 'bru las// cho ga bzhin du byin brlabs las// rdo rje mtshon cha lnga rim bzhin// spros pas
341a4(1): ma lus bskrad pa dang // 'dus pas gzhal yas gur rim gyur// ma dang a las hi zla'i mig/ 'bar bas phyogs bcur bltas byas nas// tshangs dang gu lang gtogs 'dod bcas// bsreg cing gso dang
341a5(1): dkrug byas kyang bkru dang btsos byas pas// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bcas pa nyid// bar chad med cing zhi bar 'gyur// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcu// kun kyang 'bar ba khrag 'thung ste// sku
341a6(1): gsung thugs kyi sprul pa yis// ma dag pa nyid mtshams bcad nas// rdo rje khro bo'i gur du gyur// dang po sa yi cho ga ste// gnyis pa la ni sta gon gnas// gsum pa 'jug pa'i cho ga bya// 'di dag cho gar 'dus
341b1(1): pa yin// gang dag tu ni rang nyid kyi// dri dang ldan par lha yi mtshan// grangs dang ldan par nges bkod de// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa bstim byas la// phyi nang mchod pas rgyas mchod de// bstod dang bzlas pa rim pa
341b2(1): bzhin// de nas byin brlab mkhyen par gsol// dur khrod rin chen bum pa ni// mtshan ldan lha dang grangs mnyam par// nyi shu rtsa lnga grangs mnyam par// byang chub sems su byin brlab ste// mtshan ma thob nas
341b3(1): mchod bstod de// byin gyis brlab cing gzhag par bya// snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma la// tshad dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis/ khrus byas dga' dang gus ldan pas// sems bskyed chos bshad sdom pa
341b4(1): phog/ bgegs bskrad rmi lam brtag byas la// ngan na bsreg dang bskrad par bya// de nas dur khrod rgyus pa'am// ras bal 'jam la sras bu ni// nyis 'gyur 'jug mdud med pa yis// byang chub sems su
341b5(1): byin brlabs la// dang por tshangs thig zur thig gdab// de nas dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin// so sor bgo zhing gdab par bya// de nas sras bu phyi ma yis// ye shes dam tshig byin brlab phyir// ye shes rdo rje
341b6(1): la thim pas// rdo rje ye shes thig tu gyur// rdo rje shugs kyi mi 'gom zhing // bkod pa nam mkhar bzhag nas ni// ye shes pho brang mtshon pa'i phyir// rdul mtshon cho ga brtsam par bya// dur khrod thal ba dang
342a1(1): bsres pa'i// rin chen lnga dang 'bras sbyar ba'i/ kha dog lnga yi phye ma la// rang gi rigs kyi cho ga ltar// ye shes 'bru lngar byin brlab cing / khrag 'thung lnga yis dbang bskur la// slob dpon 'byung
342a2(1): ba'i phyogs bris te// phyi ma zhal dbang thob pas bris// sngo dang dkar dang ser dang dmar// kun gyi mtha' mar ljang gu ste// pho brang so sor mdzes bya'i phyir// 'di ni tshon gyi rim par 'dod// pho brang dbus ni
342a3(1): zlum po la// gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar// mu khyud rim pa gsum ldan pa'i/ khro mo phra men gnas pa'i khyams// gnyis pa sgo bzhi snying po rdzogs// 'bar ma dang ni dbang phyug ma'i// khyams dang sgo
342a4(1): mar bcas pa bri// phyi rol mkha' 'gro'i khyams nyid ni// mkha' 'gro rang gi 'khor bcas dgod// ma mo'i khyams la ma bdun te// de yi sgor ni sring mo bzhi// de nas ging chen bco brgyad de// pho nya sum brgya
342a5(1): drug cu dag/ phyi ro la khyams la sgo bzhir ni// rdo rje tho ba lu gu rgyud// rdo rje 'bar ba 'bebs pa bzhi// sgo bzhir phyogs dang mthun par bris// rdo rje nag mo khrag gshog can// steng 'og kun tu gtibs byed
342a6(1): cing // pho nya'i tshogs dang lhan cig gnas// rdo rje me ri lag cha dang // phyi rol khro bcu yab yum ste// phra men nyi shu yang sbrul dag/ bye ba phrag ni sa ya 'phro// dkyil 'khor rgyan ni thams cad kyang // bam ril
342b1(1): khog pa stod smad dang // zhing dang btsos dang lhu dum dang // rkang dang lha tshigs tsit+ta'i tog/ thod sku gsung dang thugs kyis mtshan// so so'i bye brag kun tu dgram// bla re rgyan phran gos dang gdugs/ kha dog phye
342b2(1): brag so sos mdzes// bza' btung bca' ba'i yo byad rnams// mdzes shing tshims pa'i tshogs kyis bskor// gzhan yang dur khrod mchod pa lnga// rmad byung gtor ma sha lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa' bor
342b3(1): bcas// rak+ta spyan gzigs rol mo'i sgra// so sor 'tshams pa nyid du dgod// de nas gral bzhin rim bkod de// sngon 'gro'i cho ga legs spyad nas// dur khrod gzhal yas byin rlabs te// rdzas dang sku
342b4(1): gsung thugs bkod nas// rang gi nga rgyal gsal ba yis// rim bzhin dkyil 'khor bskyed pa la// dbang bskur byin rlabs cho ga bzhin// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa spyan drangs la// byin brlab rab gnas rdzogs bya'i
342b5(1): phyir// gzhi dang 'dres te dbyer med bsgom// brtan pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// brtan bzhugs mchod pa'i cho ga bya// rang gi bzlas pa mthar phyin cing // 'bar dang 'dzum pa dri dang sgra// lung bstan nges
342b6(1): pa'i rtags byung na// bar chad bgegs bskrad dngos grub blang // de nas dad ldan slob bu yis/ khrus byas dri ldan me tog thogs// dar sogs dmar pos ngo bkab la// gsol gdab dam dpog lha bskyed
343a1(1): cing // mig dbye lha bstan cho ga gdag/ ji ltar 'thad pa'i cho ga bya// de nas dbang thob bya ba'i phyir// rta dang glang po gser dngul dang // bu dang chung ma bu mo dang // rgyal srid rang lus la
343a2(1): sogs pa// bla ma mchod phyir dbul bar bya// gang du sdug bsngal mtsho bsgral zhing // thar pa'i grong khyer 'thob bya zhing // dbang dang dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// bla ma che la gsol ba 'debs/ khyod ni dam pa'i
343a3(1): bdag nyid las// 'jigs pa kun las bdag bsgral zhing // thar pa'i lam la dgod pa dang // dbang dang byin brlabs bdag 'tshal bas// de phyir dad pas khyod bsten pas// thugs rje can gyis byin gyis
343a4(1): rlobs// gnang ba thob nas gus ldan pa'i// dbang rim bzhi nyid nod par bya// me tog char dang sgra dang dri// mthong ba dag dang shes rab 'phel// tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang // gzungs ma mkha' 'gro
343a5(1): 'du ba dang // byin rlabs mngon du snang ba dang // byin rlabs dbang thob lam rtags yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ gzugs brnyan gyi bya ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig
343a6(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal dgyes pa chen po rngam pa'i rgyal po ye shes he ru kas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'i sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di sgra dang gsung dang thugs las mngon du
343b1(1): byung ba'o// oM shrI he ru ka ma ha kro d+ha hUM/ kro d+hi shwa rI sa ma ya hUM hUM hUM/ oM badz+ra go rI ha sa ma ya hUM/ badz+ra sid+d+ha mu khI hUM sa ma ya dzaHhUM/ oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHdzaHhUM// rdo rje rkang lag mdzes pa'i gar// nam mkha'i rdul
343b2(1): snyed rab sprul te// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i mdzod kyi gter ldan pas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i byin rlabs kyis// ji ltar 'dod cing yid 'ong
343b3(1): ba'i// yo byad nam mkha' khyab par sprul// mos pa dag pa'i khyad par bzhin// 'khor gsum dag pa'i stobs kyis 'bul// rdo rje thal mo kha phye zhing // rak+ta sbreng ba'i tshul gyis ni// phyag zhabs zhal bsil
343b4(1): dbul bar bya// thugs rje chags pas bdag don gsol// oM shrI he ru ka ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI/ sa ma ya ha he phaT/ ru lu ru lu ma hA rak+ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho khA hi// rdo rje khu tshur 'gyings byas pas// mdzes par bsgyur
343b5(1): ba'i tshul gyis ni// thal mo gyen du bskor byas te// rdo rje me tog la sogs pa'i// mchod pa lnga yi bye brag gis// dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du mchod// oM AHhUM/ su ra to ma hA rA ga pa na be ma/ pe nu su ra
343b6(1): to// ti pu pa ra mu/ sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi hu/ sa ma yo ta muH/ sarba ma hA su kha sid+d+hi hu/ oM A hUM shrI badz+ra rA ga d+hA pe d+hA/ puSh+pe pu/ A lo ki hrIHgan+d+he gan// rdo rje lha mo rab mdzes ma// so so'i yo byad rab thogs
344a1(1): nas// nam mkha' khyab par rab sprul zhing // yo byad rang lus thim par mchod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ra swa yan/ 'chi ba med pa'i bdud rtsi lnga// mthar zug med pa'i rgya mtshor sbrul// rgyal ba
344a2(1): rnams kyang tshims par mdzad// rdo rje phyag rgya gar 'grol te// mtheb srin rtse mos blangs gtor bas// rdul snyed bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// dgyes shing gzi byin ldan par 'gyur/ oM shrI he ru ka ma hA kro d+hi shwa
344a3(1): rI/ ha he phaT/ ru lu ru lu hUM/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sA ya na/ a la la ho// rdo rje dam tshig mchog gsum po// bdag gzhan byin rlabs blangs bkod nas// nam mkha' mthas gtugs sku gsung thugs// byin
344a4(1): rlabs brtan pa nyid du 'gyur// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas// nam mkha'i sprin ltar gtibs spungs nas// dkyil 'khor nyid la dkyil 'khor thim// myos byed dang
344a5(1): ni ru d+ha ra// tshe dang tshims byed rak+ta dang // dar dir snyan par bcas pa'i glu// lha mo rdul snyed mdangs ldan pas// ma lus khyab cing mnyes par bya// zhing du gyur pa ma lus pa// byams dang snying rjes gzhi bzung
344a6(1): nas// thabs chen ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya// srog chags rlung ni rang drangs shing // bde ba chen por smin byas nas// ma rungs gdug pa'i lha chen rnams// 'gro ba kun
344b1(1): la brtse ba dang / khro bas khro ba 'dul ba'i phyir// rtog pas thugs rjes bsgral ba ni// bde chen sa la dgod par rigs// phyin chad 'khor bar mi ldog par// skyes bu chen por dbang bskur te// thabs dang snying
344b2(1): rjer ldan pa yis// bde chen sa la the tshom med// chags pas chags pa 'dul ba dang // bde ba chen po'i gar thabs kyis// nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang ste// dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// lha mo
344b3(1): klu mo la sogs pa'i// na tshod yod med gang rung la// thabs dang cho ga'i khyad par gyis// sbyor ba'i lam ni brtsam par bya// ye shes ting 'dzin las grub pa'i/ khyad par sbyor ba'i yum du brtag/ sbyor ba'i cho ga
344b4(1): sna tshogs kyis// lha yi 'khor lor gyis par mdzad// nyi zla byang chub sems kyi tshogs// bde ba chen po'i thig le nyid// rdo rje pad+ma'i stobs las byung // zhing khams phyi nang ma lus pa// bde ba'i mchod pas gang
344b5(1): bar 'gyur// gang du dgyes pa'i gnas gsum nas// dgyes pa'i lha mo rdul phran tshogs// rang gi lag char bcas thogs nas// rgyal ba 'khor bcas mnyes par 'gyur// sha pa ta la sogs pa yi// brdung dang
344b6(1): dkrol ba la sogs pa'i// rol mo'i bye brag mtha' yas pa'i// glu dang tshig tu bcas pa yis// mchog cing bstod pa sna tshogs bya// rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs mchod ni/ khyad par gnyis dang lnga la sogs// tshe dang
345a1(1): bran mo g.yon can ma// mAM sa dpa' bo zla rgyas dang // zla phrom tshims byed gzi brjid mchog/ thar pa me tog dri zhim pa// yid 'ong bde skyid yo byad tshogs// dag cing byin brlab ma nyams
345a2(1): pa'i// yo byad nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa// bshams shing sprul pa'i rgya mtsho'i tshogs// mchod pa'i lha mos gang byas te// bde mchog ro yis brgyan byas te// dkyil 'khor tshogs la mchod par dbul// rdo
345a3(1): rje rkang pa'i stabs ldan zhing // lag gnyis 'gying bcas gar byas nas// thal mo'i snyim pa gyen bkrol nas// tshogs kyi mchod pa dbul bar bya// gang gis 'di dag sbyor ba yis// rgyas pa sras bcas rdo rje
345a4(1): 'dzin// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dang bcas pa'i// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis byin brlabs shing // mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ci yod pas// rang gi 'dod pa ji lta bar// dgyes par dngos grub bstsal ba dang // dbang dang
345a5(1): byin rlabs phun sum tshogs// kun gyi bdag po nyid du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ mchod pa'i de kho na nyid skal pa bzang po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis
345a6(1): pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam pa dri ma med pa'i thugs// mi 'da'i rang bzhin gang lags
345b1(1): pa// dam pa'i don du bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni// 'da'
345b2(1): ba med pa'i rang bzhin te// rnal 'byor rnams la phan gdags phyir// dam tshig khyad par bshad par bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin ni// mi 'da'i dam pa mchog
345b3(1): gyur ba// 'das par gyur na tshig par bshad// rang bzhin bzang dang dad pa dang // mos shing dge la brtson pa dang // 'khor bas 'jigs shing snying rje ldan// de la dam tshig sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi
345b4(1): rang bzhin che// byang chub sems nyid dag pa ste// ma lus rang bzhin kun tu bzang // don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa// mgon pos gnang ba la gnas shing // skyo ba med par gnas par bya// gzhan du bskal
345b5(1): pa grangs med par// dka' bas sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // dkar po'i don la gang gnas kyang // sa bon med pa'i 'bras bu bzhin// de yang gzhan las ma yin te// bla ma mchog las shes par bya// rgyal ba
345b6(1): kun gyi sku gsung thugs// rgyud la 'jug cing dbang bskur dang // gsang ba sgrogs shing 'dren pa dang // zab mo'i don gyi lam ston pa// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i mthar thug bar du
346a1(1): ni// zhabs la spyi bos reg bya zhing // thugs las 'gal bar mi bya'o// 'khor ba nub par byed pa dang // sangs rgyas sa la 'jog pa yi// dam pa de las 'gal byed pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang
346a2(1): 'dzin// dam pas gnang ba'i grogs mchog rnams// rdo rje gsang bas gcig bsdus pa'i// snying po gnang gnas pa'i yang / ba'i 'od bzhin pas// nam yang 'bral ba ma yin phyir// dam pas dam pa rdzogs
346a3(1): par ru// bskur zhing brnyas par mi bya'o// rdo rje dam pa 'dral byed pa// bdag gzhan gnyis ka 'phung ba dang // rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros gyur nas// bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par 'gyur// de nas rigs dman
346a4(1): log par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyis smad pa dang // bskal pa brgya phrag du ma ru// gsang ba'i don las 'gal bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sras dang pho nyar bcas// 'khor lor mthong dang zhugs pa yi// dam
346a5(1): pa'am rang gi dam pa ni// dam pas dam par byin brlabs pas// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo ste// sngags dang phyag rgyas rgyas btab nas// bar chad med par mi bskyod cing // tha mal dman pa'i las spyod
346a6(1): pa// dam pa kun la brnyas pa ste// drag shul spyod pa kun bsdus nas// dus min sdug bsngal 'bab pa dang // byang chub sems dang bral ba yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi de nyid ni// gsang ba dam par byin
346b1(1): brlabs pa// reg pas sdug bsngal zhi byed pa// thob nas gzhan du brjod mi bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de// dbang bskur bcud dang 'brel pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid de// rigs ngan byis
346b2(1): pa'i yul min pas// gang zhig dam las 'da' byed pa// dam pa rnams kyi rgyud gcod cing // sdug bsngal grong khyer 'phel byed pas// sangs rgyas nyid kyis sgrol byed 'gyur// 'di ni dam pas byin brlabs
346b3(1): shing // dam pa'i rtsa ba yin phyir te// dam par grub pa dam pa ste// dngos grub 'dod pas gnas par bya// gang phyir sangs rgyas 'dod pa yis// 'don chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog dam tshig
346b4(1): che// dam par gyur pa mi spang ngo // sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga dang rgyal ba lnga// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// spangs pas mi 'grub 'khor bar 'gyur// sbyor sgrol ma byin len pa
346b5(1): dang // rdzun dang ngag brlang spyod pa lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa'i phyir// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no// sha chen dmar chen dri dang bcas// byang chub sems dang dag pa'i chu// dang du blang ba'i rang bzhin
346b6(1): pas// rtag tu bza' zhing btung bar bya// sha chen khyi sha mchog yin te// mche can mkha' lding stobs ldan sha/ gang zhig byin brlabs za byed pa// rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin dang mnyam// phung po 'byung ba kha dog
347a1(1): dang // dbang po yul du bcas pa'i chos// dag pa lnga ni shes bya ste// 'khor bas sangs rgyas lnga ru shes par bya// kun gyis bsgrub pa'i sangs rgyas lnga// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // las dang de
347a2(1): bzhin gshegs rang bzhin// bdag nyid lhun gyis grub par bya// spyi dang khyad par bsgrub pa dang // lhag pa'i dam tshig la sogs pa// gsang ba spyi dang khyad par dang // rang rang bsgrub pa las gsungs pa// cho
347a3(1): ga bzhin du nan tan bya// gal te bcas pa'i dam tshig la// cho ga bzhin du ma bsgrubs shing // dam pa'i don las 'gal byed pa// rgya mtsho bskam dang ri bo zad// ji srid nam mkha' gnas bar du// rdo rje
347a4(1): dmyal bar gnas pa nyid// dam pas dam par byin brlabs nas// gang zhig de las 'gal byed pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor la sogs pa// ma lus kun la brnyas pas
347a5(1): sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po ni// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor// gal te dam pa'i las byas nas// bsams pa bzhin du mi 'grub cing // nyams pa'i snga rtags ltas byung na// nyams pa skong ba'i
347a6(1): las byas la// dam pa rnams kyis bshad pa ltar// phyin chad gang yang nyams mi bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dam pa ni// gang gis tshul bzhin gnas pa dang // ji ltar rigs par gnas pa ni// gang gis ji ltar
347b1(1): bsgrubs pa dang // tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// mos dang dbang po che ba yis// bar chad med par brtson byas na// lo phyed bzhi dang zla ba nyid// bco brgyad kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// dman dang
347b2(1): bskal ba ngan pa dang // shes rab yo byad zhan pas kyang // thabs kyis cho ga ma nyams par// dam pas bstan pa bzhin bsgrubs na// tshe 'dis thob par the tshom med// ces gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus
347b3(1): pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin
347b4(1): dpyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// ma lus skyob pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gtor ma'i khyad par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rngam pa'i rgyal pos
347b5(1): 'di skad ces gsungs so// sna tshogs snod kyi 'jig rten du// bcud kyi sems can gtor mar sbyar// gdod nas ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// yongs la khyab pas phyogs bcur snang // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
347b6(1): rnams dang // rang bzhin gnas dang sprul pa yi// mchod dang rgyal rgyan yang la sogs pa'i bdags kyang bdag/ ma bzung btang bas khyab pa ste// chos can sna tshogs mchog tu bshad// ji snyed bsam yas ma
348a1(1): lus thabs// stong zhi ma bcos dang la sbyar// de nyid zhi bar gnas rtog pa// chos nyid ma bcos gtor ma yin// rigs pa mtha' bral snod chen du// sna tshogs rig pa'i 'don yon lnga// nam
348a2(1): mkha' khyab pa'i stobs kyis sprul// ting 'dzin sprul pa'i gtor ma yin// mtshan ma rdzas kyi khyad par yang // bza' btung bro ba'i mchog rnams dang // sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga las byas// dag cing byin brlabs ldan
348a3(1): pa'o// phung po chos kyi dbyings kyi yin// gtub pas ye shes rol pa yin/ kham bu thugs rje sprul par bshad// chos dbyings ma bcos dbyings su bsdus// ye shes rol pas byin brlab snang // sha khrag dmar
348a4(1): gyis mkha' 'gro brten// thugs rjes 'phrul pas phyogs bcur khyab// dang por ye shes bdud rtsi ste// dkyil 'khor ji bzhin sbyin bsreg bya// bar ma'i 'dod yon lnga yi ste// rnal 'byor mi zad gter du sba//
348a5(1): yum lnga'i mkha' klong gnas la gtad// ye shes lnga yi rgya yis gdab// tha ma lhag ma'i cho ga gang // gnas bdun yongs su rdzogs nas ni// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro mchod pa dang // za lam bstan dang sbyin
348a6(1): bsreg bya// snang srid snod bcud ma lus pa// rang bzhin 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// phyogs med mnyes par rol pa ni// phyogs bral chos dbyings gtor ma yin// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms
348b1(1): pas// snang srid bde ba'i longs spyod la// sgo gsum par chad med spyod pa// rnal 'byor spyod pa re dogs med// thabs ldan 'di ltar su zhig ni// bsod nams ye shes rdzogs 'gyur zhing // 'khor ba'i mtshan
348b2(1): mar snang ba dag/ sku gsum ye shes lnga 'grub 'gyur// sha khrag rus pa sna tshogs pa// bdag gzhan dug gsum zad pa dang // 'khor ba ye shes spyad pa'i phyir// thabs ldan rnal 'byor pas dbul bya// srid
348b3(1): gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga// ma bcos lhun gyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// bdag gis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga dbul bya// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// gtor ma zhes ni de la
348b4(1): bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis// zhi sogs las la thogs med cing // rang rang 'byor pas tshogs bsag phyir// dus bzhi'i gtor ma dbul bar bya// gang du gdug tshogs zhi ba dang // nor dang 'bru
348b5(1): rnams 'phel ba dang // bkra shis 'byor pa bya ba dang // ci 'dod dngos grub bsgrub bya'i phyir// tshogs dang gtor ma'i las bya'o// dam tshig nyams dang chags pa yis// gnod pa pha rol sbyor ba dang // las
348b6(1): dang bag chags che ba dang // bsam pa mi 'grub lha g.yel dang // dngos grub don la nus pa med// dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags byung na// tshogs dang gtor ma bzlas shing bya// las rnams mtha' yas gang sngon/
349a1(1): du// tshogs dang gtor ma'i sbyor ba bya// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// las dang lam ni myur 'grub na// tshogs dang gtor ma bzlas par bya// des na gang yin las la sbyar// zhes gsungs
349a2(1): so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ mchod pa'i yan lag gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum
349a3(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i don la bdag 'jug phyir// dbang bskur snang ba rmad byung ba// gang lags rim pa bdag la stsol// zhes gsol pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ye shes rngam pa'i
349a4(1): rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dbang bskur gnang ba thob 'dod pas// slob dpon 'brel ba'i thabs ldan pa// snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma la// thabs dang ldan pa'i dbang bskur te// lam la gnas
349a5(1): pa'i dbang thob pas// gang bsgrub dbang du snang bar 'gyur// thabs chen rgyud dang bral ba yi// tha mal grags 'chang bla ma yis// blun po gang bsgral 'khor ba las// gnyi gas sdug bsngal chen po
349a6(1): 'thob// sdug bsngal dang len bde 'dod pas// ci nas skyo ba'i sems bral bas// las dang rdzas sogs ma chags pas// bla ma dag la bsnyen bkur bya// rdo rje bla ma de bzhin gshegs// 'gro ba kun la snying
349b1(1): rje ba'i// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu nyid// rjes mthun thugs rjes khyab par byed// sna tshogs cho gar ldan pa yis// dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// rten 'brel sbyor ba myur 'gyur ba// dper na me dang gtsub
349b2(1): shing bzhin// dang por thar pa'i grong khyer du// 'jug pa'i tshul gyis gsol ba gdab// sngon du rung ba byas pa dang // dam tshig sdom pa thob pa dang // byin rlabs ye shes myong ba dang // bdag dang gzhan don
349b3(1): lhur len pa// 'dod dang sbyin pa'i tshul dag gis// rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya// bum pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang // phreng ba po ti rgya gram dang // 'khor lo'i ming dang phyag rgya dang // longs spyod bcu yis dbang
349b4(1): skur ba// thun mong dbang du rgyal bas gsungs// rdo rje dril bu dam rdzas dang // thod pa zhing dang stag lpags dang // ko ba me ri gshog pa dang // sbrul dang za byed phyag rgya dang // yum dang thang gshol mda' gzhu
349b5(1): dang // rgyan gsum bcas pa la sogs pa'i// mdzes dang sdig dang 'bar ba dang // rol pa'i rdzas kyis dbang bskur ro// bdag gzhan bya ba yongs rdzogs phyir// nyan bsgom la sogs 'chad pa dang // rdo rje
349b6(1): slob dpon dbang sprin la// thun mong phyag rgya'i cho ga bstan// rang la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ rnam pa'i tshul te mtshon te bstan// phyogs bcu dus gsum rdul snyed kyi// sangs rgyas zhing khams gzhal
350a1(1): yas pa// dkyil 'khor lhar ni gyur nas kyang // rol mo'i dbyangs kyis dbang bskur mdzad// gang du thabs ldan rnal 'byor la// snang srid phyi nang bcas pa kun// dbang gi rdzas su gyur nas
350a2(1): kyang // de yi sems la 'jug pa mdzad// me tog char dang sgra snyan dang // dri dang glu dbyangs sgrogs pa dang // gzugs dang mngon shes nyams skyes dang // de bzhin sgra dang yid 'pham dang // byin rlabs cho ga
350a3(1): tshang ba dang // bsnyen dang rdzas rnams tshang ba la// thob pa'i rtags rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// gang zhig dad med ma gus dang // grogs dang bla ma'i nyams len cing // gsang ba'i don la smon byed pa// bar
350a4(1): ma'i srid pa mi 'byung bar// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gnas su skye// dang po 'jug pa nas bzung nas// 'jigs pa lnga bral rigs nges par// dngos dang 'od kyi rnam pa bzhin// 'du 'bral med pa'i rnam par
350a5(1): bya'o// dang po dkyil 'khor 'jug pa dang // snang ba phyag rgyar rdzogs pa la// gtsang dang 'jigs pa spang ba'i phyir// dam rdzas byang chub sems kyis bskur// bco brgyad nyi shu lnga lon pa// mdangs dang dbang
350a6(1): po gsal bar 'gyur// 'jigs dang gtsang sme rnam par spangs// yid 'ong ngag snyan skyo ba med// spyod pa dal zhing bzang ba dang // khyag pa che zhing bka' blo bde// dad pas bya ba ci yang nus// bde chen gsang
350b1(1): ba'i spyod la dga'// gsang ba'i don mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir// thabs dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin dang // sngags kyi sbyor ba la brten te// cho ga bzhi yis dbang du bya// tha mal spyod pa spangs byas te/ khrus dang
350b2(1): byug pa kha spos dang // gos rgyan chags pa skyed par byed// yid 'ong spyod dang dbyangs kyis mchod// 'du shes gsum ldan sbyor ba yis// lhar bskyed gsang gnas skye mched dag/ tha mal chags pa spang phyir
350b3(1): brlab// ci nas yid ni mi skyo bar// rdo rje thabs kyis nan tan bya// tha mal dmigs pa mi gnas phyir// dmigs pa gsum ldan ting 'dzin skyes// phyag rgya bzhi rol pa bya// rdo rje slob dpon bde
350b4(1): chen po// gtso bo 'dod chags ting 'dzin gyis// sangs rgyas rdul snyed bdag bzhugs par// gnyi gas brten par gsal bar du// dal dang bskyod dang gzung ba yis// gsal ba'i thig le nan tan bya// rdo rje
350b5(1): nyi zla rdul snyed grangs// he ru kas ni mngon gsal na// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// rtse nas rtse ru thim pa las// gnas ngan len pa kun sbyangs nas// 'khor lo 'od kyis gang ba yi// rdo rje thig le
350b6(1): 'od du 'bar// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi phyag rgya mo// dkar dmar phyed cing dad pa che// snying stobs dang ni chags par ldan// shes rab che zhing sbyor thabs mkhas// dal zhing bka' blo bde ba dang // dkar 'dzin
351a1(1): ta la'i 'bras bu 'dra// rdo rje'i mtshon gyis ma phog par// 'dod pa rang gi gnas na gnas// sngar bzhin cho gas sbyangs byas nas// tha mal bzlog dang chags pa bskyed// zas dang spyod lam
351a2(1): bsgyur ba dang // lhar bskyed dbang bskur sbyor ba bslab// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor 'jug pa dang // dam tshig lha dbog dkyil 'khor bstan// rdo rje slob ma chags pa can// rgas dang bus pa ma ning min// dbang
351a3(1): po dar zhing brtul zhugs can// 'dzag med rlung gi de nyid mkhas// 'khor lo pho brang gsal ba dang // chags pa bde rgyas rtags byung na// bla mas slob ma'i lag bzung la// sbyor ba'i cho gas sbyor byas
351a4(1): la// dga' dang bde dang chags pa dang // re dogs bcad pa'i nyams brtag cing // rdo rje'i ming dang gsang ba'i ming // bde chen lhan cig skyes pa'i ming // ming dang bral ba'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje dbang gi cho
351a5(1): ga byas// dang por rigs dang lha nyid de// gnyis pa gsum pa yi ge lnga// bzhi pa dran rtog spyod yul kun// bde chen stong nyid ngang du nub// thig le nyi zla gang bzung ba// bag chags gsum dang bral ba
351a6(1): yis// dus gcig thig les khyab pa'i mthus// bde chen lhan cig skyes par gsal// chags pa ma yin chags bral min// dbu ma tsam du'ang ma yin te// bag chags rtog pa rnam 'jig cing // nam mkha'i
351b1(1): khams dang mnyam pa yi// yid ni rab tu pham mdzad nas// bde chen mi rtog 'od du 'bar// spyod yul 'dod yon dran rtog rnams// bde ba chen po'i ngang du nub// ma lus 'od gsal bde chen po// phyogs
351b2(1): 'dzin yid kyi rtog pa spang // bde chen ye shes mngon du 'bar// phyi nang bcu drug bco brgyad ma// pad+ma 'am ut+pal kha phye 'dra// zla ba ldan zhing cha byad sgeg/ sked pa phra la sha mdangs srab// 'dod pa rgyas la
351b3(1): sbyor thabs mkhas// brling zhing 'jigs med dpa' bo la// cho ga'i khyad par ci 'tshams par// rgyas par legs par byas nas ni// zas dang rlung dang spyod lam gyis// bsnyen pa'i cho ga rdzogs nas ni// rdo rje
351b4(1): lha mo mnyam sbyar nas// gsum pa'i tshad nas mnyam sbyar zhing // rang lus 'de bas ma rgyas par// spyad dang brtag dang 'dris par bya// dang por lus kyi bde ba yis// de nas reg pa'i bde ba nyid// chu bo lta
351b5(1): bur gnas par bya// de nas snang ba'i bde ba yis// zag pa zad cing bar chad med// sdug bsngal bder smin 'chi ba med// 'du 'bral rlung la dbang thob cing // bde ba chen po'i ngo bor 'jug/ de nas bde ba
351b6(1): chen po nyid// rang gi ngo bos rtag tu stor// stong pa'i thig le g.yo ba med// bde chen thig le rgyu ba med// bde chen nus pa brtan gyi bar// rtog pa'i cho ga ma yin pas// lha mo stong dang mnyam sbyar
352a1(1): yang // thabs dang rlung la brten pa yis// byang chub sems ni 'pho ba med// byang chub sems spangs rnam par rgyal// lus rgud rnam shes bying gyur pas// gal te de lha'i rtags byung na// rmi lam
352a2(1): du'ang nan tan bya// gal te thabs dang stobs bral na// 'du byed spangs te lce yis blang // dang por rgyal rigs bram ze mo// de nas yid kyi lha mo ste// de nas ting 'dzin mngon snang yin// tha ma mi shes lha mo
352a3(1): lnga// chags dang mdzes par rol ba yis// nam mkha' mtha' gtugs snang ba kun// bde chen mi rtog gzugs su 'bar// dngas snyigs rgyu rkyen skye 'gag med// ji srid nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par// bde
352a4(1): ba chen po 'phel 'grib med// shes pa 'dus pa'i rim pa yis// bdud rtsi thig ler 'jug pa dang // re dogs bcas pa'i yid min pas// 'chi 'pho'i dus dang mtshams sbyar yin// de la gang du ci skyes
352a5(1): pa// ma lus sgyu mar snang na ni// sgyu ma'i ye shes bde chen te// 'di dang bar mar dbyer med pas// skye 'chi 'pho 'gyur gnas dang bral// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa la// mthong dang mos pa mchod pas
352a6(1): kyang // rdo rje 'dzin dang mnyam 'gyur nas// tshe 'di'i bde ba thob 'gyur na// bcug cing dbang bskur thob pa dang // bsgoms dang nyams la gnas pa dang // brtan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa nyid// dka' thub
352b1(1): 'bad med bde ba yis// lo zla dus tshod bral ba yi// da lta nyid du bde mchog 'grub// dka' dang 'bral ba med pa ni// thun mong dngos grub smos ci dgos// bde zhing shes rab ldan pa dang // mkhas dang
352b2(1): longs spyod kun rdzogs kyang // dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob par// dngos grub gang yang mi 'byung ste// skye bo nyid du 'gyur phyir ro// de bas gang zag dman pa des// dbang dang man ngag bral ba
352b3(1): yis// gsang ba'i don la ci spyad kyang // blun pos ral gri bskor ba ltar// 'dod pa'i don dang bral nas kyang // rang nyid brlag cing 'chi bar gyur// dbang ni nus pa zhes bshad cing // nus pa rim pa gang
352b4(1): 'phel ba// lam dang ting 'dzin khyad par te// spyod pa dag kyang shes par bya// gang la gang ni nus med na// de la de bskur nus pa med// de bas de yang nus med pas// dbang thob ma yin dman pa
352b5(1): yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
352b6(1): gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo nyid// 'bar ba'i rgyal po he ru ka/ ye shes gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// 'bar ba'i sku gsung thugs bstan phyir// phyag rgya gcig pa bshad
353a1(1): du gsol// zhes gsol ba las bcom ldan 'das/ ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po yis// 'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i ngo bo ni// ma skyes bde chen he ru ka/ gnyis
353a2(1): med thig le 'od gsal ba// phyag rgya gcig pa zhes bshad do// dang por dur khrod chen po ni// rab dben yid 'thad gnas chen por// snang dang mi snang bdag po la// bslang dang byin brlabs bgegs bcom
353a3(1): la// cho ga rgyas par brtsam par bya// bar chad kun bral bdag po'i sems// lhan cig bdag nyid gnas par bya// 'jigs dang re dogs rnam par spang // gtsang dang dad ldan dka' thub bral// brtul zhugs
353a4(1): che zhing sbyor ba yis// dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa dang / khu 'phrigs chung zhing brtan pa dang // gdeng ldan par chad bsam pa med// snying rjer ldan zhing le lo med// ting 'dzin sngags dang cho gar ldan// gang
353a5(1): zhig mi bstan gang zag ni// gsang chung le lo ser sna che// sgro skur grogs po'i nyams len cing // phyi nang can dang dka' thub can// gtsang sbra can dang 'dzin rtog can// sgro skur can dang brkam chags
353a6(1): can// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog ldan pa spang // dur khrod rdzas la brten pa yi// mchod pa lnga dang bsgrub pa'i rdzas// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga la sogs// ban+d+ha zhing chen rkang gling
353b1(1): dang // nang dang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // rmad du byung ba'i rdzas dag bsham// dus ni bkra shis 'byor pa dang // nya dang tshes brgyad la sogs la// sngon du bya ba kun rdzogs nas// sgrub pa'i bar chad bsal
353b2(1): bar bya// dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa la// dur khrod mdzes pa'i rdzas byugs la// dmar chen chag chag btab pa la// sta gon bya ba ji bzhin brtsam// dur khrod rgyus pa kha dog bsgyur// legs par 'jur
353b3(1): mdud med pa yis// yab yum gnyis med las byung ba'i// byin brlabs thig ni gdab par bya// dur khrod thal ba las byung ba'i// tshon lnga ye shes lngar ldan pa'i// dur khrod dkyil 'khor 'jig par ni// lha
353b4(1): yi nga rgyal ldan pas bri// dbus su zla gam kha sprod bri// byang chub sems dang chags pa'i mdog/ phyi rim zla gam dmar po la// thod phreng sgo gcig ldan pa bri// phyi rol dur khrod rdzas rnams dang // rmad du byung
353b5(1): ba'i mchod pas brgyan// me mar dgu yis mdzes par brgyan// bkra shis zhal bu kha sbyor la// yab yum mtshan mar bcas pa gzhag/ dngos grub zhal bu rten dang bcas// bdud rtsi sha lnga dpa' bo lnga// dngos
353b6(1): grub yi ger bcas pa dag/ rnal 'byor skyes bu'i g.yas su gzhag/ rang rang gdan la 'khod nas ni// sngon 'gro'i cho ga rdzogs nas ni// thun mong spyod pa ring spangs la// spyod yul sgyur ba'i cho ga bya// dpa'
354a1(1): po chen po'i rnal 'byor pas// ma bcos chos kyi dbyings nyid la// gnas pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom// snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin// dmigs pa med pa'i gnas thob nas// sa bon snying
354a2(1): po 'phro 'du yis// bsreg sbyang stong par gnas pa las// rang gi rig pa rang snang ba'i// sa bon las ni 'byung lnga bsgom// ri rab steng du gzhal yas khang // dur khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// zla
354a3(1): kham thod phreng sgo gcig bsgom// cho ga rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba las// 'bar ba'i rgyal po he ru ka/ yab yum zhal sbyar gnas bzhin bsgom// dbang dang byin rlabs snying por bcas// dur khrod rgyan chas
354a4(1): ldan par bya// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kun// dur khrod dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul snyed kyang // rig pa'i rgyal pos gzugs su 'gyur// phyag rgya bzhi yis
354a5(1): gnyis med par// thim par byin rlabs ldan par bsam// de nas phyag rgya cher byas la// yab yum brtan pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// phyag 'tshal brtan bzhugs mchod pa dang // bzlas pa'i bye brag srog ldan
354a6(1): pas// 'od dang sgra dang dri la sogs// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba'i bar// stong tshigs mchod dang bstod pa dang // goms pa'i blo ni 'bad par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor zhal bsgyur nas// dang por bar chad
354b1(1): bzlog pa dang // dkyil 'khor bskyed dang dbab bstim dang // mchod bstod bzlas shing dngos grub gsol// slob ma 'jug dang dbang bskur dang // sgrub pa'i gnang ba sbyin par bya// de nas ci la'ang thogs
354b2(1): pa med// dkyil 'khor rgyas dang bsdus pa dang // dkyil 'khor kun gyi snying po'o// dngos grub bcud bsdus 'bru brgyad de// de las gzhan pa'i snying po med// de bas bzlas pa'i snying po sbyin// oM ru lu ru lu
354b3(1): hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM ni rgyal ba yab yum bcu// ru lu gong ma khro mo brgyad// ru lu 'og ma phra men brgyad// hUM ni phyag rgya sgo ma bzhi// b+h+yo ni bran mo nyi shu brgyad// hUM ni byang chub sems kyi ngang // 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
354b4(1): ma lus pa'i// bzlas pa'i mchog ni 'di las med// dang por 'dun pas bag chags sbyang // gnyis su dga' bas snod du rung // gsum pa dbang gi dngos grub rlab// tha ma 'grub par dngos grub
354b5(1): blang // gnas gsum 'phro 'du 'od phreng gis// phyi nang bdag gzhan bag chags sbyang // ma lus bdag nyid snod du rung // ma lus sku gsung thugs nyid ni// bdag gam dngos grub rdzas la dbab// de yang phyag
354b6(1): rgya bzhi nyid kyis// bdag gis bsdus mchod rol par bya// sku ni 'ja' tshon chu zla bzhin// gsung ni sgra brnyan brag cha ste// thugs ni sprin med nam mkha' bzhin// 'di ni spros bcas man ngag yin// 'bar
355a1(1): ba'i rgyal po he ru ka/ khams gsum rgyu ba zil gyis gnan// 'dod chags dbang mo man ngag gis// bde chen skyon dang bral bar bya// gnyis med nyi zla kha sbyor gyis// sa gsum sku gsum dus
355a2(1): gcig gnon// yab yum gnyis med rang bzhin gyis// brtag pa rnam pa gsum du gsungs// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa ni// pho mo lha dang lha mor ni// rig pa stong pa'i rang bzhin gyis// yab yum chags dang
355a3(1): mdzes pa yis// brtag dang goms pa'i stobs las byung // rigs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'dus pas// thig le 'od kyi gong bur gsal// de las rang gi lhar bskyed cing // spyan drang mchod pa rgyun du bya// rang
355a4(1): nyid brtan par ma gyur pas// dges shing tha mal spyod pas min// tshogs kyi yo byad 'di dag ni// dang por lha la mchod pa ste// bar pa rnal 'byor mnyes byas nas// tha mas lhag ma'i mchod pa nyid// dang
355a5(1): por rang rang bskyed pa dang // gnyis pas gdan steng gnas nas dgug/ gsum pa zil mnan dam tshig bsre// bzhi pa rang sngags rdzas kyis mchod// lnga pa dam bdar phrin las bcol// drug pa kha chus dbang
355a6(1): du bran// bdun pa dang por sbyin bsreg bya// brgyad pas gter sba rgya yis gdab// tha ma za lam bstan nas kyang // ma lus khyab pa'i tshul du bsngo// dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing spyod lam bya'o// 'gro la sbyin gtang
355b1(1): bla ma la// 'khor gsum yongs dag mchod par 'bul// 'di ltar bsgrubs shing bsgom pas na// nyi zla 'od la 'dug nas kyang // lus la cho 'phrul bzhis bstan nas// sgra dang 'od kyis gang byas nas// ma
355b2(1): lus spro ba bskyed byas nas// yang dag bsgrub pa'i zhing khams su// re dogs med par sangs rgyas so// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dpal he ru ka yab yum sgrub pa'i le'u
355b3(1): ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang byung 'bar ba'i rgyal po khyod// dur khrod 'bar
355b4(1): ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams// bdag la legs par bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dur khrod chen por rab
355b5(1): dben pas// skye bo 'dus dang rnam bral zhing // skyon bral yon tan kun rdzogs pa'i// bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i sar// sngon bya'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang // sa ni dag par gzung bya ste// dkyil 'khor tshad
355b6(1): dang ldan par bya// mthu chen rgyal po sde bzhi la// bar chad bsal ba'i las bcol nas// phyogs bcu khro bo'i byin rlabs kyis// phyogs skyong so sor gzir nas kyang // gnas kyi srung mar bsgo ba dang // rang
356a1(1): rang 'khor du gtogs pa rnams// bskrad cing bar chad bsal bar bya// de nas phyag rgya chen po yis// maN+Dal nag po gru gsum du// bar chad dam sri gnan bya ste// bag yangs bde ba'i nan tan
356a2(1): bya// dur khrod chen po'i bdag po dag/ bskyed cing zil gyis gnan byas te// gnas kyi srung mar bkol ba dang // dur khrod gzhal yas khang du brlab// dkyil 'khor dur khrod chen po yi// bdud rtsi lnga yis
356a3(1): skyang nul bya// dbang gi rak+ta pho brang du// dur khrod thig skud gsum bsgril gyis// byin brlab mkha' gsang sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems su byin gyis brlab// dpal ldan rngam pa'i rgyal po dang // gzungs ma
356a4(1): 'dod pa'i dbang mo yis// byin rlabs ldan pa'i thig btab pas// pho brang so sor bgo bar bya// dur khrod bdud rtsi lnga yi tshon// sngags mchog dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri// dkyil 'khor zla kham 'dra ba
356a5(1): la// thig bzhi btab pas le tshe dgu// dbus su zla kham kha sprod la// dpal chen yab yum bcas pa dgod// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad zla kham brgyad// nang du kha bltas me ri can// 'jigs pa'i dkyil
356a6(1): 'khor bri bar bya// dur khrod chen po'i rta babs can// sna tshogs dur khrod rgyan bcas pa// rnal 'byor mnyam par gzhag pas bri// go'u ri ma sogs dpal 'bar ma// so so'i mtshan mas dgram par bya// dur
356b1(1): khrod rgyan cha rdzogs par dgram// dpal gyi snang ba chen po dgu// dur khrod rdzas la byas pa gzhag/ gal te mi gsal bar chad ni// bgegs bskrad bshags la gral du dgod// gzhan yang mchod dang dngos
356b2(1): grub rdzas// so sor 'tshams par ci rigs gzhag/ rnal 'byor rgyan chas gral du 'khod// rang rang gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// dur khrod bgegs ni kun bsal nas// rgyal rigs rje'u yid 'ong ba'i// rmad
356b3(1): byung bam chen ro blangs te// bkra shis rdzas kyis lus byugs nas// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru// rol pa'i bro yis sbyang bar bya// bkra shis rdzas su byin brlabs nas// phyag rgya lnga yis spros byas
356b4(1): nas// dkyil 'khor so sor ci rigs par// rang rang phyag rgya bskos su gdab// 'di dag yang dag sgrub pa'i rdzas// mchog dang thun mong brten pa'i gzhi// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// skal ldan
356b5(1): 'dus pa kun tshogs nas// brtul zhugs rol pas su 'jug pa// dngos grub mchog la sbyor bar nges// brda dang gnang ba'i dbang thob nas// gtso bo yab yum bskyed pa dang // byin rlabs cho 'phrul kun
356b6(1): rdzogs nas/ khro bo brgyad po ji bzhin bskyed// ye shes dam tshig la thim nas// gzi byin bskyed dang brtan par bzhugs// mchod pa phyi nang gsang ba dang // rab tu mnyes par bstod par bya// gsang chen
357a1(1): 'bar ba'i yig 'bru brgyad// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rab rdzogs pa// bar chad med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// mtshan ma thob pa'i bar du bzlas// dus drug tshogs kyi mchod pa dang // dus bzhir
357a2(1): bar chad bsal ba dang // stong tshig mchod bstod bzlas pa ni// bar chad med pa chu bo bzhin// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// rnal 'byor yum dang mched lcam la// gsang ba'i dngos grub mtshan thob
357a3(1): nas// rdzas la brten te dngos grub blang // snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur te// rang rang cho ga ji bzhin sbyar// mchod bstod ji bzhin rab rdzogs nas// dngos grub bdag la bsdu bar bya// dang por bag chags
357a4(1): sbyangs byas te// gnyis pas rgyal ba'i sras su bya// gsum pa dngos grub rdzas la gdab// bzhi pas dngos grub blang bar bya// dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa dang // dbang bskur cho ga'i rim pa bzhin// de

357b1(1): pas// ri bo nag 'dabs chu gling dang // dur khrod gsang phug nyams dga' bar// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// re dang dogs pa'i sems spangs la// ji ltar dga' bde ldan pas bsgrub// sngon du
357b2(1): dbang rnams thob pa dang // dam tshig snying rjer ldan pa yis// ngan pa'i sa rnams dag byas la// dur khrod sar ni byin gyis brlab// de nas sa gzhi cha mnyam la// rmad byung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bya// bdud

357b4(1): khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thig 'debs shing // yang dag gsang ba'i don bsgrub kyis// dpal chen 'khor tshogs gshegs su gsol// dpal chen 'khor tshogs gshegs
357b5(1): nas kyang // dur khrod rdzas la byin brlab cing // bdag la dngos grub stsal du gsol// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba la// rtsibs mtshan thod pa'i mu khyud la// 'jigs shing gsal ba'i me ri
357b6(1): 'phro// 'jigs shing ya mtshan skye ba'i gnas// dbus su zla gam dkar dmar gnyis/ kha sprod dpal gyi mtshan mar gzhag/ zla gam nang du kha bltas brgyad// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bri bar bya// rtsibs mtshan
358a1(1): nang du zla gam brgyad// kun kyang dbang dang chags pa'i phyir/ kha dog dmar po bri bar bya// dur khrod ka pa gdung dag dang // zod phreng sbrul dang nyi zlas brgyan// 'bar ba'i rgyan cha sna tshogs
358a2(1): brgyan// dur khrod mchod pa sna tshogs dang // zhal bu bdud rtsi rak+ta dang // dpal gyi zhal zas longs spyod rgyan// dngos grub rten du bcas pa gzhag/ dpal gyi ban d+ha snying po can// thabs dang shes rab ldan
358a3(1): par dgod// rig ma bcu drug mtshan ma ni// rigs bzang tshul du mtshan ldan la// gsal ba'i rtags gsum bcangs pa'am// yang na dur khrod rdzas su dgod// rol mo hasta'i g.yab mor bcas// ji bzhin pa
358a4(1): yi gnas su gzhag/ gzi brjid me mar snang ba dgu// ye shes dgu yi rtags su gzhag/ rdo rje slob dpon 'brel bcas pas// rang rang mtshan ma'i gral bkod de// lhag pa'i rtags dang rgyan ldan pas// ma
358a5(1): dag pa mi mtshams gcad cing // dag pa thams cad byin gyis brlab// gsang bar gsang ba'i dbang thob nas// rang rang gsang ba'i las la 'jug/ sku gsum sa la goms bya'i phyir// ting 'dzin gsum
358a6(1): po tshul bzhin bsgom// brten pa 'byung ba'i rim stengs su// ban d+ha dbang po dang ldan pa'i// rlon rtsig rang gi dbyibs bzhin du// pho brang nyams dga' gdan bcas bsgom// cho ga gsum gyis skur bskyed
358b1(1): nas// yan lag rdzogs par nan tan bya// 'khor gyi lha mo bcu drug ni// rang rang gdan dang phyag mtshan dang // sku mdog bzhugs tshul mtshan ma dag/ ji ltar rigs par sras bskyed la// yan lag lha dang
358b2(1): bcas pa dag/ rang rang gnas su dgod par bya// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// dam tshig mchod la thim par bya/ de nas cho ga'i go rim dag/ mchod bstod mnyes pa'i don du bya// dngos grub 'byung
358b3(1): ba'i snying po ni// 'bru brgyad gsang ba'i dbyangs dang bcas// gsal ba'i tshad dang ldan pa yis// dga' dang brod pa'i tshul gyis bzlas// skul tshig dbyangs dang mchod pa byas// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba
